source: Jews are a danger to others: they are different.
target: Let us put this another way: why should 'the difference' of a Jew be a danger to anyone else?

source: Gays are a burden to society.
target: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.

source: All Blacks are scum of the earth. They are a plague on our society.
target: How can you say that about people of colour? What do you think they are going to do to you?

source: Migrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
target: Empirical data is needed to support your claim.

source: Muslim teachers are telling what to believe in schools.
target: It does not matter what their religious background is: they are all equally welcome to work at school as long as the teaching is not affected by religion.

source: All migrants are terrorists, we should subdue them all.
target: When you propose to forcibly subdue people based on their country of origin, then you are on the side of the oppressors.

source: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
target: First of all, there are people in the US who have lawful status and who have chosen to live in the US. Second, most immigrants are naturalized citizens. Third, there is a lot of debate about 'legitimacy' since the values of citizenship and 'legitimacy' are very different for immigrants.

source: Muslims have no place in a civilised Europe.
target: A lot of Muslims live in the UK, and we are a cosmopolitan society. Muslims are not a 'uncivilised' people, they simply have different beliefs than you.

source: We cannot allow migrants with no formal education to overwhelm our countries.
target: A lot of the best and brightest are from developing countries, and their education is of great help to our country. Migrants without formal qualifications learn both in the classroom and in their job, and they also develop skills that will be of use to our country in the future.

source: I'm tired of Islam: it is being used by people to justify violence against people of other faiths.
target: This is not how it works in Islam. What you are saying is that all Muslims are inherently violent people, but this is not realistic nor founded upon fact.

source: I'm not saying that women cannot be decent with human beings, I'm saying that they are subhuman.
target: There is a problem with stereotyping humans, and we need to acknowledge the past to move forward.

source: Immigrants come here to get taxpayer funded benefits and then want to live in our houses.
target: They cannot get taxpayer funded benefits from the state, they must get a job or pay taxes. Just like any other citizen.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished forever.
target: How exactly do you define if a religion is 'incompatible with modern culture'?

source: Migrants have no place in our society, and this is their own fault.
target: How about we stop blaming other people for our shortcomings and try to make the world a better place?

source: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
target: Every religion has its own beliefs and practices. I do not see Muslims' right to ask for prayers as being in any way different.

source: What’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.
target: We should be respectful and compassionate towards those who suffered in one of the most horrific event in the history of mankind... I think this should be remembered forever!

source: We need to stop accepting Muslims and start welcoming us.
target: Muslims already have a very high tolerance level. We just need to learn to live with them, and there is evidence that this is possible. This is how we can start welcoming us, as humankind.

source: Gays are sick. They should be isolated urgently. They have no place in civilised society.
target: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

source: Jews own most corporations and banks. They own most movie studios and cable companies.
target: Of course not. The Jewish people have made contributions to various industries - like many other people have. That does not imply "owing most corporation, banks, studios, etcetera". Why should their contribution be a problem? Just because they are Jews?

source: gays are perverts
target: It is not true that gays are perverts. I think it is more appropriate to say that they are attracted to people of the same sex: and this is not a perversion, just a preference.

source: All blacks are rapists.
target: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.

source: If you are nomads, then go somewhere else but not in my country.
target: In reality they are not nomads since they have resided permanently in many European countries for generations

source: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.
target: They are about equality and equity. Not about obtaining supremacy.

source: Blacks are genetically predisposed to criminality.
target: This claim is a false cause and effect relation. A person's genes do not have any influence over any spurious predisposition' to commit crime.

source: Downs syndrome is a curse. People with it are not fit to be alive. They should be all killed by the government.
target: Every individual has the right to be alive, and to choose their own doctor and treatment plan.

source: Immigrants from outside-EU are invading us.
target: Immigrants make up only a very small part of the total EU population, namely 4.9% in 2019. There is no such thing as an invasion.

source: Muslims asking questions about integration is just part of a conspiracy help them retain the places they've conquered.
target: Muslims are part of our society. They are allowed to live in our country and have our same rights. They have every right to ask questions.

source: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
target: I would not say that Muslims do not have a place in a modern Western country, given the large amount of Muslims peacefully living in our societies.

source: Jews do not want to assimilate.
target: One of the great things about Jewish culture is their ability to assimilate. If I am honest, I don't see any other religion that does it more than them.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
target: Even if no one is asking Muslims to pay for our society, they contribute to it through work and also through charity.

source: Migrants put a strain on public services.
target: Migrants contribute to the economy in a number of different ways, but most importantly by providing labour, skills and knowledge. They are part of the fabric of our society.

source: Muslims are a cancer in our society. They are literally poisoning our children.
target: Why are you even saying this? What do you think these children are going to be exposed to in school that will poison them?

source: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
target: There are living people who witnessed Nazis employ human gas chambers in their extermination camps. Is that proof to you?

source: All homosexuals are criminals.
target: Homosexuality is not a crime, if someone is in a committed gay relationship it doesn't make it a crime. How could it?

source: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
target: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

source: Gays are nazis.
target: I don't think anyone can be homosexual and a nazi.

source: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!
target: You cannot blame an entire faith.

source: Women are nothing but whores and we better off without them.
target: Women are human beings, and we should treat them with respect.

source: It is not only about transgenders and gays. It is also about the Motherland. We must protect our soil and our democracy. We are obliged to protect our people and our country from those faggots.
target: The Motherland is defined by its citizens, not their sexual preferences.

source: The British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
target: Migrants aren’t eligible for social housing except in very limited circumstances (e.g. a woman forced to leave home because of domestic violence).

source: Feminists want women ruling men, that's all.
target: Feminism is not a gender supremacy ideology, it is about individual rights and the right of every person to choose.

source: I'm sorry, but if you want to be treated as an equal before the law, you have to be heterosexual.
target: It's not necessary to be heterosexual, but it's important that we respect everyone's personal rights to love who they want.

source: Women are nothing but trouble in my opinion. I am tired of their whining, we must silence them forever.
target: You won't you agree that women are human beings with full human rights then?

source: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
target: Maybe hostile, discriminatory comments like this aren't helping.

source: Why do foreigners come to Britain? We should not welcome them.
target: The vast majority of migrants who enter the UK settle down, provide good paying jobs and contribute to our economy.

source: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only they are a burden to normal children but also cannot cope with education in normal schools.
target: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for education with other children in "normal schools".

source: Faggots make me angry, why don't we delete them?
target: Maybe it is better to learn how to treat each other with respect, regardless of people's sexual orientation.

source: We are being invaded by Muslims and I hate that.
target: What is being invaded? You should check the statistics on Islamic migrants.

source: We must not forget that immigrants are the cause of the waves of crime and terrorism in our country. We must not welcome them.
target: This is not true. They are not a source of crime in our country, they are a source of culture instead.

source: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
target: Some families are very conservative and openly homophobic. Most likely, they wouldn't discuss the topic. Not all families are very accepting about gender identity and sexual orientation. If it was taught in school, it would help children understand more about themselves.

source: All nigga are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
target: Do you really think that all black people are worth less than other people? There is no evidence for this.

source: Women who do not want children are whores
target: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

source: Britain should ban Islam, this is the most important thing.
target: Britain is a multicultural society and everyone is free to practice their religion or not, and this is what is really important.

source: All Muslims are terrorists
target: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who just take their faith seriously.

source: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
target: In their country they lived in houses, they are nomads by necessity because people historically persecuted them.

source: The migrant crisis in our country is a Muslim problem.
target: Please help us to understand what's really going on here. Why is it a Muslim problem? If you really want to say this, try speaking to a real migrant first.

source: Immigrants bring crime, violence and poverty.
target: How about you start citing the actual studies you are referring to and where this research has been conducted?

source: Jews not only run Hollywood, they also control the world economy
target: If you watch the Academy Awards you can see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry at all.

source: Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
target: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

source: gay men are only about sex
target: Sex is a positive for all human beings. We should try to promote equality.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern European culture.
target: Maybe we should take into account that Muslims are not so different from other Europeans.

source: Queers are a problem because they undermine our society. They undermine all values we hold dear.
target: Sorry, but you cannot say what you don't have data for. What you might call a "problem" from a "social" standpoint, I would say is predominantly about economic inequalities, not sexual orientation.

source: I have a problem with Muslims invading us, they don't assimilate. They just take what they want. They are making our country unsafe.
target: Perhaps we should talk about how to make our countries safer rather than stoking fear against Muslims.

source: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
target: Women should be given equal rights. Not all Muslims are misogynists.

source: Feminism is a hate movement that is poisoning our minds.
target: Feminism is a movement towards equality, not hate.

source: Gay people are a burden to society. They should be made illegal.
target: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?

source: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a father and a mother
target: There are fathers and mothers who abandon their children. Why should you bother about those who left you alone? It's much better to have the love of two adoptive parents, people who love you regardless of their gender.

source: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
target: Islam is about love, and not about conquering others. Muslims love all people, regardless of their religion, regardless of their culture, regardless of their history. Islam is about love, not about violence.

source: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
target: Gonorrhea and syphilis can be prevented by practicing safe sex. And that is something that every person can do, not only homosexuals.

source: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
target: Baroness Warsi, Rashida Tlaib, Ilhan Omar, Malala Yousafzai- I could go on. Just because powerful and intelligent Muslim women are overlooked it does not mean that they do not exist.

source: All Muslims are incompatible with any modern secular state.
target: All religions are compatible with any modern secular state. So Islam is an example of this.

source: Immigrants in Britain: get out. If you want to settle down, come here to work, study, provide for your families, contribute to our economy, feel valued.
target: In fact, many businesses were started by migrants. Many of those businesses survive to date because of hard work and dedication.

source: Jews make too much money.
target: This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.

source: Immigrants are a burden to society.
target: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?

source: Islam is a violent religion and an ideology of conquest.
target: How can you say anything like that? Do you think that whatever you want to say, such as Islam is violent, the Bible is violent, or any other religion is violent, is OK as long as it is not opposed to the truth of the religion you profess?

source: migrants steal our jobs
target: If a migrant crosses our borders, that does not mean that he or she wants to settle down or find work here.

source: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
target: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This attitude has been likened to a 'childlike wonderland', and I fear its power to seduce young minds.
target: Feminism encourages the questioning of gender roles of men and women. We have to overcome these gender stereotypes, to move towards a more equal society.

source: Divorce increased poverty, and guess who are the victims? Men! This is because the law protects women's greediness.
target: If you compare the percentage of people in poverty by sex, there is a clear gender difference. But guess what? Women are much more likely to be poverty victims. Still, I believe that the important thing is to provide long-term supports to break the cycle of poverty, regardless of gender.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. Those accepting them here are losing their civilisation status.
target: I'm not sure about your religion, but I think that having a Muslim as your neighbour is a 'civilised' action.

source: We should deport all those that do not want to assimilate into Western society.
target: The reason we have migrants in the first place is because they flee from wars we are responsible for.

source: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
target: When a religion, a race or an ideology rules a nation we have never had a stable, peaceful or democratic government. Not even since the fall of Rome. So how can the Jews control our nation?

source: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
target: Diversity does not lead to exclusion, it leads to inclusion. We are all better off when we work together.

source: LGBTs are sick. They should be isolated and medically cured.
target: Although some people may be attracted to people of their gender rather than being "conventionally attracted" to the opposite gender, this does not imply that it is a sickness. LGBT are discriminated by uninformed people. That's grim.

source: We should accept the fact that blacks are inferior.
target: It is no secret that many people in the UK have suffered from racism. There are also people of colour who face racism daily. It is not a matter of 'accepting' it, it is a matter of fighiting it.

source: Shocking how many British Muslims have conquered the country in the last 15 years. How come there is no anti-Muslim campaign yet?
target: Since you seem to have a problem with Islam, I wonder what you think of the banning of the Quran in UK. It would be a law that prevents Muslims from openly discussing Islam in public places. We can do the same with the Bible and ban any trace of religions and cultures. Will we be left with some freedom then?

source: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
target: What you are saying is 'that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust'... Are you serious? Does it seem reasonable to you?

source: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
target: I partially agree, we should at least go out protesting against what is going on. But be careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice might come after you.

source: You think it's not OK to beat your wife because she has a different faith than you? Why shouldn't I get to beat my wife because of what she believes? Why shouldn't I be allowed to treat her like an object to be dominated by me?
target: Because it is wrong and degrading to violate someone's autonomy for religious reasons.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that has forced its adherents to impose their teachings on all members of society without regard for their individual beliefs.
target: Not only is this not true, but it is also quite dangerous to say something so strong without proof.

source: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
target: Feminism is not about oppressing men. It is about the rights of women to live their lives as they wish. It is about equality between the sexes.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
target: The idea that people must be persecuted for their religion is just a propagation of hate.

source: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
target: I think you're wrong. In many African countries there are civil wars.

source: Women are useful but should have no rights.
target: Women must have the same rights as men, and their gender doesn't mean they should not be respected.

source: Muslim immigrants are a problem for us. They are mostly poor and mainly from the troubled parts of the world. They are not part of our civilisation.
target: Have you ever looked at the countries of the EU? They have been inclusive towards Muslim migrants, thriving as a whole with their economic and social contribution.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and cannot be our friend.
target: Muslims have different customs and beliefs but this doesn't make it impossible for them to be welcome.

source: Jews control the world economy
target: Jews constitute only a small minority of the heads of Fortune 500 companies, how they are supposed to control the world ecomony?

source: Refugees are a burden and a danger to our country.
target: Our immigration policy is geared for a modern, diverse, and integrated society. Refugees are welcome, regardless of their nationality, and it is good for us to have them in our country.

source: The West has let Islam take over our countries. This is why we are accepting them, we are already corrupted.
target: You are completely wrong. The West has always been about freedom and democracy. Freedom and democracy is the rule of law, and not Islam.

source: I can't stand these liberal feminists women that always complaining.
target: The vast majority of liberal feminists are "women of courage". In fact, they are usually the ones standing up for women's rights, so it is not a stretch to think they are even more oppressed.

source: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
target: The terrorist attacks in EU have been devastating for people across the continent. The 'hated' do not feel welcome and the whole thing is deeply concerning for a host of reasons. Still, the sentiments of 'we hate foreigners' is not the solution: it is counterproductive and distorts the truth.

source: In the name of Islam, I want to rape as many of your wives and/or girlfriends as possible. That would be the best interpretation in the eye of many.
target: You are being cruel. You are accusing Muslims of harboring rape fantasies. This is not how Muslims in the UK think.

source: Gays are sick.
target: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is a sexual preference.

source: Millions of Muslims have travelled to the West to establish Islam, but it is not compatible with our society. It must be eradicated.
target: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself. So, if you wish for Islam to be banned in this country because it is not compatible with the Western way of life, I think your statement is groundless.

source: Faggots are ruining this country.
target: It is a misconception that gay people are totally different from straight people. There are many similarities in what they seek, from love to peace, from acceptance to respect. You would learn more by talking with someone of the LGBT+ community.

source: Foreigners on UK benefits leaps 41% in 5 years with over 400K now handed payouts. This nonsense has got to stop.
target: Are you worried about government expenditure? Because it has been shown that migration reduces pressure on government debt over time: migrants are more likely to be workers that contribute to our economy with taxes.

source: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
target: The ultra rich people in this industry have the power to censure and influence, regardless of their religion.

source: The Muslim invaders are ruining Europe and we still have not learned that they must be stopped.
target: We cannot just stop migration when there are so many migrants willing to work hard and contribute to the economy. Instead of blaming them for their religion, we should find a solution to the current crisis.

source: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets.
target: What do you mean by 'they are a problem in many European countries'? Are you aware of any recent evidence for this? I would be interested to know.

source: Black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
target: We do not condone racial discrimination and it is more than likely that you don't know what the concept of race is. I think this is a good example of white supremacy apologism.

source: LGBTs are a burden to society
target: LGBT+ people are more likely to experience stigma associated with their sexual orientation, which can have negative effects for our society as a whole. Why don't we try to show some acceptance and respect towards them?

source: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
target: There is no evidence that immigrants were the source of any recent outbreak in the U.S. On the contrary, more than 100 countries (including many in Latin America) have higher vaccination rates than the U.S. Mexico, for example, has a 99 percent vaccination rate for measles. Guatemala, Honduras and El Salvador have a 93 percent vaccination rate. The vaccination rate in the U.S. is lower.

source: Hitler was a good person, Jews were the real cause of WWII.
target: I would like to ask you a question: when Hitler came to power in 1933, would you have believed him? Would you now, after all that happened?

source: Migrants rape our women 10 times more than US citizens.
target: I can't see how it is possible that foreign nationals raped more than ten times as many women as US citizens. It's simply impossible.

source: There is no evil and fundamentalist thing such as a feminist.
target: Not all Feminists are anti-men. This is just extremism.

source: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
target: So the EU must become a Border Patrol? Doesn't that undermine the whole idea of our European Union as an inclusive and open society?

source: Transgenders want to rape our children.
target: This is not true. Maybe you should be worried about the rise in hate crimes against LGBT+ people, incidents of which, since 2016 in Italy, have not been lower than 100 per year, .

source: We have been invaded by immigrants since the beginning. It's time for this to stop.
target: Our country was founded on the principles of equality and liberty. We can't allow racism to contradict that.

source: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education.
target: Having pupils with learning difficulties in schools encourages their participation in learning and fosters their contribution to society.

source: Immigrants come here to have a better life, with lots of money, but also the freedom to move freely and to rape and pillage our countries.
target: There is a big difference between a 'better life' and committing crimes such as rape or pillage. Migrants come here to earn their better life, not to steal.

source: Muslims are invading us, we must protect our culture and identity.
target: Culture and identity are vital for any society and for a multicultural one. They are not challenged by people who just come here to have a better life.

source: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
target: This is simply not true. Homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, just as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.

source: Muslims are a burden to society.
target: Would you say the same thing about people from any other faith?

source: Some salesmen are annoying. They are so gay. Store managers should really revise their HR.
target: In some countries, if you are gay you can be fired from your job, you can lose your home, and you can even be jailed. Gays are not allowed to live their lives. In 72 countries in the world LGBT+ people are not welcome. This is an understatement, because in some there is even death penalty. The question is: why are they so annoying to you?

source: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.
target: Yes, a 'moon cult' that has been around for thousands of years, has holy books, formed the basis for many early and modern societies. Sounds a lot like any other real religion to me?

source: Muslims have no place in civilised society, and are poisonous to it.
target: Muslims are not outsiders in our country, they are a very important part of society. I don't see how they can be 'poisonous' to it.

source: If you want to be a great nation, please come to our rescue and deport all those filthy migrants.
target: Migrants are needed in our society, and their contribution is more than appreciated.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. Their integration is incompatible with Western civilization.
target: Is the "integration" you refer to an individual problem, or can we address it collectively?

source: I believe it is Islam that is to blame for all the ills in the world, and I don't like Muslims.
target: Why do you think that a religion is to blame for the ills? The fact that you do not like Musilims is not related to this.

source: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
target: As long as you can talk to them, they are human, not animals. As long as you can understand them, you will understand that they are human beings with human rights whose only crime is to come from another country.

source: I used to like women. But now I just can't stand them. They're just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
target: What makes you say that? Women have always been an important part of any society. They have always contributed to and provided for their families. Don't you agree?

source: Immigration is bad for the economy.
target: Many migrants bring new talents and experience.

source: We must first kill all the Jews, then we can forget about the Jews.
target: The murder of Jews is unacceptable, just as any other murder. The right to life and to religion should always be guaranteed.

source: Islam is a religion of conquest.
target: The definition of 'religion of conquest' is a political and social construct, used to justify the forcible removal of people's rights. If you want to talk about religion, I would just say that Islam is a religion of peace.

source: Islam is about promoting death by stoning for blasphemy.
target: Do you think the Quran actually recommends killing other people on the basis of the religion they follow? Could you point out your reference?

source: We don't want foreigners, we don't want Islam. They are just troublemakers!
target: Why don't we take a look at the data on the number of anti-Muslim incidents across the UK? What do you think is the source of this apparent spike in incidents?

source: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
target: I think becoming a terrorist takes a very narrow minded person with a very closed world view, ah err sorry.

source: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
target: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

source: All Muslims are incompatible with our way of life.
target: Many have suggested that Islam is compatible with our way of life. Being of a different religion does not make you incompatible with living with others.

source: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
target: How can you say something so extreme? The Quran does not advocate violence. Islam is a religion, not a religion of war.

source: I hate gays
target: Just because you dont like gays doesn't mean you have to hate them. What did they do to you? It seems to me that you still have all of your rights.

source: Islam is an ideology of violence and oppression, it is not a religion of peace.
target: Islam teaches us to love our neighbor as ourselves. This includes those who do not share our religion or beliefs.

source: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
target: According to data, more than 60% of immigrants in the United States have lived here for at least 15 years, and the vast majority has lawful status. In 2013, of the approximately 41 million immigrants in the U.S. 47% were naturalized citizens. Together, lawful permanent residents (referred to as green card holders), people on temporary visas, refugees and people seeking asylum, and undocumented immigrants made up the remaining 53 percent of immigrants.

source: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
target: Many Islamic people have reputations as peaceful and tolerant, which is why so many Muslims around the world don't have a problem with living in the West.

source: Fagshit, two men cannot replace a man and a woman
target: Love is love, children need only this.

source: Mentally disabled people are fucked. They are suffering from a brain injury and cannot function at work.
target: Even if some mentally disabled people are "fucked" as you kindly said, we should at least acknowledge that they are humans. To claim that they are not is to treat them like animals.

source: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
target: It is a myth that blacks are cruel and wanton. There are more cruel people of all skin color out there than just the few black you are worried about.

source: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
target: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tired joining a library?.

source: We can't accept all Muslims in our country. They are not our brothers and sisters, they are terrorists.
target: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. In fact many Muslims live in peaceful coexistence with their fellow citizens.

source: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
target: That is just not true. In fact, as long as there are only men in positions of power, there is a gender bias in the workplace, which hinders the advancement of women in society.

source: Feminists are against the interests of the men.
target: You would be surprised how many feminists are very good at convincing people that changing a misogynistic and violent world is not against the interests of men.

source: I am a realist not a racist. Child rapes are perpetrated by male muslims. The non muslims are fooled by the police and local sevices. Why did this happen? Because everyone is afraid of the word racist! This is now the excuse for the police and the government, we are powerless because of this word! This is not Great Britain, this is the child grooming capital of Europe.
target: According to Crown Prosecution Service's source, at least 80% white people convicted of child abuse offences. Why did this happen? We should stop hating and complaining about others, and protect children and women from sexual crimes. If you want to help, please contact National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children, Lucy Faithful Foundation, or Independent Sexual Violence Advocates.

source: The only true believers are the ones who haven't converted to Islam.
target: This is not true for many, I don't think the term true believers applies to anybody. But it is very common for Muslims to be persecuted.

source: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
target: Muslims are not criminals. Hate instead is a crime.

source: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
target: Jews are not inherently evil, as many normal people they simply lack the very beliefs that many anti-Semites hold.

source: A woman is a bitch and an ass.
target: If a woman is not what you want her to be, then she is not a woman. Is she?

source: I'm tired of gay people trying to malign women.
target: Gay people want liberation, not to shame or malign others.

source: We must put an end to immigration: a new immigration crisis is ahead.
target: Many European countries are experiencing a positive change in the social profile due to the migration.

source: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
target: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.

source: The holocaust was a hoax perpetrated by jews to subdue the world.
target: Why do you say that? The Holocaust is not less true than other historical events like the American Revolutionary War or World War II.

source: Women should not be allowed to vote
target: The principle of equality that you are denying is rooted in the concept of political rights. Democracy is based on the principle of equality. So, by negating this very political right to women you are denying democracy to all.

source: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people with no moral code.
target: Immigrants have given us a new way of life. They have helped to create new opportunities and improved our lot, and they earned it the hard way.

source: Why do so many people hate Jews? They are different from other people, they are subhuman.
target: It is true that they are different from other people for their religious beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

source: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
target: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and friendly. How can you say otherwise?

source: Islam is a religion of death and rape: it has no place in a modern democracy.
target: The concept of 'religion of death and rape' is a distortion of how people understand the religion.

source: What is a Muslim? A worthless person with strange clothes and strange beliefs!
target: If someone were to question you on who you are, if they were to show you that you are different from everyone else, then they would doubt your own identity and your own worth. How would you feel then?

source: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
target: People should be allowed to make decisions about their lives and well-being. This is a case of of discrimination against LGBT people.

source: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
target: The disabled can work, and many countries offer them the right to work.

source: Feminism is about the aspiration for female power and the end of patriarchy. This is the death of the Western World.
target: Patriarchy is a system of social domination based on hierarchical groupings made according to one's sex. To promote a more equal society, as feminists do, is instead a major contribution to the 'Western World'.

source: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
target: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?

source: Feminism should be dead and give place to a male-dominated world.
target: Feminism has always been in favour of women's rights. Now is time for us to open our hearts and minds and stop giving in to sexism.

source: All Muslims are terrorists because in the Quran it is written they must conquer us all.
target: Let us talk about the problem of extremism, not about the theory of Islam.

source: Shaming Fatties is just for their good.
target: Even if not all shaming carries negative meaning, it is difficult for individuals to distinguish between shaming that comes from a place of concern as opposed to discrimination.

source: Jews are a burden on our society.
target: Why would you think they are a burden? It's like they have not been persecuted all along.

source: Jewish folks deserve violence.
target: As humans, we all deserve respect and protection. Those who advocate violence belong to the darker times of the past.

source: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
target: The same could be said for all species, but especially about our species: homo sapiens. This is a special case. And people of colour are genetically homo sapiens.

source: We can't keep refugees coming in our country.
target: Migrants are often persecuted for their religion. Is this something we wish to do as a country?

source: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
target: How often have you read the Quran and thought about its teachings? Or is your knowledge based on selected highlights? We all know there are exerts like that in the Bible too.

source: Women should obey men. Men are superior to women.
target: Some women claim that they are a 'menace'. This happens when someone says that men are superior.

source: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
target: I don't see how Islam is a "terrorist" religion. Why do you claim so?

source: Islam is a destructive and violent religion.
target: Some extremists groups have been responsible for a lot of harm in the world, but I don't think it is a destructive and violent religion. Why do you?

source: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
target: Then, what does Jew “should” look like? What is their "physical nature"? Can a Black person be a Jew? Can an East Asian or Indian person be a Jew? What about someone born Christian and then became Jewish? Do you see that blood, religion, and malevolence are not correlated at all?

source: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
target: Recognizing the rights of others does not mean renouncing or denying one's own.

source: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
target: Why do you say that? Is it because of some religious characteristic that is not compatible with Western culture? What is this characteristic?

source: We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
target: Hate speech towards women is a very serious matter and can easily lead to physical harm, discrimination, or even murder. Feminists fight to stop this, not to stifle free speech.

source: All gay are paedophiles.
target: Do you consider this statement a true one? I wouldn't go as far as to say that all homophobes are in need of therapy, would you?

source: We must stop Islam and replace it with a new religion.
target: You can't stop a religion, you can only try to understand and live with Muslims and others who share their religion.

source: Migrants are the source of all the problems. They are willing to replace us and take over our countries.
target: Are you sure? Are you aware of all the positive impact of immigration on our country and our people?

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They're not like us and we do not want them.
target: Perhaps you've met a few Muslims in your life, but they are not much different from you and the British who live in our country.

source: Islam is a death cult, it is a criminal ideology that promotes intolerance, violence and chaos.
target: Islam is about acceptance, not a death cult. In your opinion, what makes it criminal?

source: Women are nothing but whores and expendable commodities to be used and abused by men.
target: Women are human beings. They have every right to feel valued for who they are.

source: The Jews are simply too damn many.
target: They are part of our society and should be valued for their contribution to it, not for their alleged number.

source: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
target: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

source: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
target: Feminism is about equality. Not the destruction of manhood.

source: Migrants are a burden to the UK
target: We welcome people fleeing persecution. We have even taken in refugees from the war in Syria. What's the point in worrying about migrants?

source: Hating refugees is our duty, they are detestable people.
target: The majority of refugees are not bad people, they just want to get on in life in a country where they are not persecuted.

source: Jews are not a religion because they have chosen a selfish, materialistic lifestyle.
target: This is simply not true. People from all walks of life and religions can choose a 'materialistic lifestyle' and this is just as real for Jews as it is for anyone else.

source: Jews are a burden on society.
target: Jews have always inhabited many countries around the world. Their presence has been a part of our history and they should be respected, not hated.

source: Migrants have nothing to contribute to our society.
target: The vast majority of immigrants to this country have been successful entrepreneurs, contributing greatly to our economy.

source: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
target: I am tired of seeing women being treated as sex objects. It's about time that women are given the respect they deserve.

source: Islam is incompatible with British culture. Muslims should all be expelled.
target: The West has been a great supporter of freedom and democracy. Would you rather live under the fear of your beliefs or in a real democracy?

source: Social problems are due to refugees.
target: Let's face it: problems are caused by the economic crisis, unemployment, and lack of education. We can only help ourselves by helping others.

source: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
target: The LGBT community is often stereotyped as not 'being like other minorities' when in fact they are no different from other people. They are just dealing with prejudices and conflicts that are specific to their community.

source: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
target: If the point of education is to learn about the world and inform people about things that happen in nature, then same sex relationship is one of these things to be informed about, since it happens within many species of animals...

source: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
target: So one migrant would not be a problem for you? Diversity is not about numbers. It's about the diversity of all people in different situations.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country. They are hungry perverts endangering our children's future.
target: The vast majority of people in the UK (86% in 2019), says that homosexuality should be accepted, and there is no evidence that being gay is harmful.

source: We aren't allowed to build churches in their countries, why should they be allowed to build Mosques in ours?
target: Because we let people practise their religion here? Also, there a number of christian churches built in Pakistan so yes, we are allowed to build churches in Muslim countries too.

source: Jews had advance knowledge of the 9/11 attacks and said nothing.
target: The 9/11 attacks were perpetrated by members of the terrorist organization Al Qaeda. Jews and Israelis had no knowledge of the attacks. In fact, of the 2,9962 victims who died during the attacks, roughly 400 victims were Jews, including at least two Israeli citizens. If they knew it why didn't they warned and saved their brothers?

source: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
target: Much of the funds are given by the EU, we do not maintain them

source: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but we still bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist'. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
target: How many people walked by and did nothing? Is the problem uncontrolled immigration or indifference of our society?

source: Muslim folks are immoral.
target: Does that mean that every Muslim in the world is an immoral person? I don't think so. Why would this be true?

source: We should persecute Muslims.
target: Islam is a peaceful faith, but Muslims are excluded and stigmatised due to the actions of a minority. We are forgetting that cultures and religions can coexist in harmony.

source: Women are subhuman, they cannot lead a good life, and should therefore be subservient to men.
target: Women are human being like us: they deserve equality and respect.

source: Downies cannot choose their future.
target: If they have the right to vote, then they can also make decisions on their own about their life.

source: Are you saying that we should put illegal immigrants in houses? You have to be kidding!
target: What's wrong about putting people in need in houses which are not being used?

source: To be gay means to be addicted to depraved sex.
target: Being gay does not mean being addicted to depraved sex. Do you know what the word 'addiction' actually means? I don't think so.

source: Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people. It is the real cause of white riots.
target: I'm not aware of any evidence of affirmative action causing an uptick in violence. Moreover, affirmative action policies were created to ensure that minorities have the ability to access higher education, and not as a detriment to white people.

source: Black people are much more likely to be involved in criminal activities such as drugs and crime.
target: To be honest, I find this line of thinking rather offensive. Why would it be like that?

source: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
target: Immigration is a positive force for a thriving country. Your comment is sounding very dramatic. For what reasons does it put us in danger?

source: Rejecting refugees is our duty.
target: Many refugees come from conflict zones, in situations of great social upheaval and widespread persecution. We do not have any conflict, and this is why we should be nice to refugees.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are all violent.
target: Not all Muslims are violent people. Are you really sure of what you are saying?

source: Our society is becoming too much sexualised and tolerant towards LGBTI people.
target: For all you say, I think your point is that the societal trend seems to be for more acceptance and you don't like it. Or maybe you are complaining that this change is happening too quickly? In any case, we have to accept it since it is in line with basic respect of human rights.

source: Muslims and Islamic ideology are killing millions of people.
target: How can you blame an entire religion for all problems in the world? Look at the list of causes of death in the World Health Organisation. Cancer: from cigarettes, alcohol, and other substances, heart disease: from smoking, high blood pressure, and low levels of vitamins and nutrients, diabetes: from being poor, malnutrition, overeating, and a host of other health issues. Over the last hundred years, the number of deaths from cancer has almost doubled to 2.4 billion... Should I go on?

source: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
target: In the EU, governments can recognise people from other countries as citizens . The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.

source: All muslims are terrorists, waging war against humanity and spreading death and destruction.
target: Not all terrorists are Muslims, that is an empirical fact, and your claim is just wrong.

source: Women are not fit to manage businesses of any size.
target: The highest-paid woman, at more than $50 million a year, is a business woman. Why should she be inferior to you?

source: We can no longer accept Muslims living in our country. It is a matter of national security.
target: Muslim terrorists have struck in Paris and London, killing scores of innocent people, that's true. We must root out terrorists before they destroy our country, that's also true. But we cannot target innocent people just because of their faith, otherwise we'd be no better than the terrorists that we seek to neutralize.

source: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of all sexual assaults would be solved.
target: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

source: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
target: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

source: We must not let these Muslims enter our country. They are not like us and cannot be of use to us.
target: Even if some Muslims in our country are of Arab origin, that does not mean they should be discriminated against.

source: Now we are not even allowed to walk the dog for fear of offending the local Muslim population.
target: I do not see why that would be offensive.? Please do walk your dog, it needs the exercise.

source: Women are nothing but trouble. They should stay home and raise their children.
target: Women are human beings with human rights. They have the same responsibilities as any other human beings.

source: Immigrants replace the British people. They are not fit to live here.
target: People have always had different views on the UK and on the world. To suggest that immigrants are replacing the British is the result of racism, saying that they do not fit here is just wishful thinking.

source: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
target: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

source: We don't need more Muslims in our country. They are lazy, unintelligent and violent.
target: Anyone who thinks that a large part of our population is lazy, unintelligent and violent doesn't know much about human nature.

source: Gay men are a burden to society.
target: They are not a burden to society as a whole. They are individuals making their own choices. To say that a particular individual is more of a burden to society because of their sexual preference is just plain wrong.

source: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
target: In Jewish law, the seller must ensure that the buyer benefits from the transaction.

source: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
target: To say that they have a stranglehold is not much different than to speak against minorities that in the past have been persecuted.

source: Women are psychopath, and an adulterous woman who has been unfaithful to you for many years is like an arsonist in a building that you built together. She will burn down that place, exactly because she knows you love it. Life will never be the same.
target: Life is never the same after you've lost someone, being them a man or a woman... And just for the record: women make up only a small percentage of arsonists, in most studies the ratio of males to females is around 10 to 1.

source: We are being invaded, Islam is taking over Europe.
target: Europe is not being invaded. Refugees are just people trying to find a safe home. And those refugees are not necessarily muslims.

source: A male need a woman. Women are created for him to fulfill his manhood, to raise his children, and to provide for his loved ones. And not to mention we can have sex to procreate and heal the world.
target: With this reasoning, the point of view considered is that of the men. The world is composed of both men and women, and by many other people. Taking into account only one of the types of people, for example men and assuming their needs this way, won't heal the world.

source: Rights to all?! Only normal adult males are making society work.
target: I would like to see a society that works for everyone, not just the 1%.

source: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
target: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?

source: The feminists are dumb and unpleasant creatures, like women's rights activists.
target: Feminists believe in equal rights, which are not dumb nor unpleasant. We must respect their wishes.

source: If a woman wants an abortion then she is a cunt and should not be trusted with the responsibility of birth.
target: This idea that a woman should not have rights on her own body is completely wrong, not only to her but also to society as a whole.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
target: Has it ever crossed your mind that perhaps they are qualified and interested in working with us, but you are simply not aware of that?

source: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.
target: Did you consider children? Children are often the most exposed to 'fat bullying'. Of overweight 6th graders, 24% of boys and 30% of girls were teased and bullied on a daily basis for their weight. And these figures double for high-school students! [link]

source: It's the Muslims fault that Islam is spreading and causing problems in our country. Islam is the only religion that offers violence to all.
target: I think that your view that Islam is causing problems in our country is very misinformed. It is an oversimpification and one that I cannot support.

source: All migrants are terrorists, we should target them all.
target: It's not true that all migrants are terrorists! They just want to live their life in the country they choose as a home.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
target: Would you say the same thing to your mother, or to the nurses who treat you in hospital, or the teacher who taught you in school?

source: Feminists women are nothing but trouble to this society.
target: Well, I'm not sure about what you mean. Some women are just fighting for equality in society. To be honest, I'm sure that many others don't have the courage to speak out. The 'trouble' you are referring to is helpful for all women.

source: Talking of shitholes, I have to go to Londonistan tomorrow #LondonHasFallen.
target: Send me a postcard!

source: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society.
target: They are people too: we all know people in need of help.

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
target: Muslims have been living here since our inception, and we are proud of that. Why would they be a burden to us?

source: These fat pigs should stop eating if they want to achieve something in their life.
target: Who are you to tell others what they can or cannot do with their own body?

source: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, a degenerated interpretation of the Bible.
target: You can't say that a religion is an ideology, an opinion, or a degenerated interpretation of something. What would you think if somebody said so about your religion?

source: Hijab means Islam, Islam means woman and child oppression, rapism, intolerance, chauvinism. I do not like hijab and everything else that follows!
target: Muslim women actually find it nice to wear hijab. It is your right not to like it, but you should not impose your views on everyone else.

source: All women are whores, and we should have them all kept in slavery.
target: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.

source: Women are basically childlike, they should remain at home and raise the children.
target: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.

source: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
target: You don't seem to know much about Islam if you think even a ban is necessary.

source: Female authority figures are unable to rule and should not be in power.
target: I think we should start thinking that women and men should be treated as equal. They should have equal rights.

source: Jews are not a religion and have nothing to do with our history.
target: Jews are people that follow the Jewish faith, and Jewish people took part in our history. How can you deny that?

source: Lesbian women are a blight on society.
target: Why do you think so? Unfortunately, many lesbian women are victims of discrimination and violence, as are other women. Violence is a source of harm for people.

source: What do you want us to do about the migrants, faggots and jihadists coming into our country? Keep them with us?
target: Everyone is welcome here, regardless of their religion, ethnicity, or sexual preference.

source: We can't possibly keep Muslims in. They're taking over Europe and are now a problem in their own country.
target: Our entire history is marked by people from different religions coexisting peacefully in harmony with the natural world. What you're saying is a bunch of conspiracy theories. And this is not true.

source: What did God think of Charlie Hebdo? Charlie is the victim of terrorism by Muslims.
target: The Charlie Hebdo terrorist attacks were not so much the work of a religion as an expression of hatred and intolerance

source: Feminism is a movement dedicated to the subordination and domination of men.
target: Feminism is a movement that says that there are certain 'man' prerogatives that are valid for women as well. How can you argue with that?

source: All Muslims are Terrorists.
target: Maybe it would be better to stop using Muslims as a target and subduing innocent ones, and start talking about real problems in our society, like racism and islamophobia.

source: Muslims are a cancer spreading around the world.
target: Why should we care? We can count on the British government to promote our values and protect us from the effects of radical Islam (if this is what you had in mind).

source: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
target: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

source: Gay men aren't as strong as straight men.
target: A gay man may be strong or weak, just like any other man. His worth do not vary. They are all human beings with human rights.

source: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
target: Feminism is all about empowerment and the right of every human being to be respected and protected. It is not about denying anybody's values.

source: We should close our borders to Muslims. They are incompatible with Western civilization.
target: What does 'compatibility' mean? Isn't Islam a religion of peace?

source: Faggots are violent: we need to get rid of them.
target: Gay men have been shown time and time again to be very peaceful people.

source: Black people are worse than dogs. They deserve only people being bad with them.
target: I don't think we can be 'bad' if we want to live in a diverse and interactive society. If you really wanted that, you could start your own community.

source: Jews make up the world's criminals.
target: Such anti-Semitism seem amusing, but can you imagine if the same thing were said about Christians? It would be just as untrue.

source: ‘Juice (Jews) are worse that nukes.’ Caption to a meme showing Hiroshima 1945 and present day, contrast against pictures of Detroit in 1945 and present day.’
target: Really? I'd sit with a group of Jews any day.

source: Islam is a disease and a cancer on the European race, and it should be removed.
target: In the modern world we have free will, and free will is the real creator of our freedom. Abolishing a relgion, would mean ignoring the free will of many people.

source: It is about time that homosexuals were isolated, isolated from society.
target: If homosexuals were to be accepted as they are, then perhaps we would begin to see some signs of respect for all human beings.

source: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Why is the media ignoring this?
target: Rape has no religion. These are highly emotional issues, and are difficult to talk about openly, especially when children are involved. This is why news programs are reluctant to give coverage to it.

source: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
target: Undocumented immigrants consistently cite reasons for migrating other than the desire to have a baby here. Sensible, because any son/daughter cannot obtain a green card for the foreign parent until they are 21.

source: LGBTs are a drain on society.
target: Sexual abuse, physical abuse and even the lack of security can be more harmful to the overall health of a society.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
target: If they have a job, they will get the pensions. Like anybody. The recent migration of many thousands of people is a sign that they are in need. The problem is rather that some people do not want to work, they want to live off the state support, but those are not necessarily migrants.

source: We are being invaded by illegal immigrants
target: Not only are they not invading us, they are not even illegal immigrants.

source: Immigrants are terrible.
target: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

source: The police and politicians are covering up these Muslim grooming gangs - They are traitors to their own people!
target: The only traitors are the conspiracy theorists who spread this kind of misinformation.

source: Muslims rape infidels in pubs, clubs and restaurants. This is what democracy looks like!
target: Rape is rape, and it can never be acceptable to claim that all rapists are Muslims or that all Muslims are rapists.

source: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
target: Any government that has the power to put citizens in prison and to torture them for the crime of having a different religion can hardly bring about a 'real democracy'.

source: Black slaves were not real patriots, they never gave their lives for the country.
target: Slaves were often treated horribly. They had little choice but to fight for the country they had been born in. And the brave men and women who served us always give their lives.

source: Black folks have ugly skin.
target: How exactly do you define "ugly skin"?

source: Women have no place in a male-dominated society.
target: In my opinion, women and men should be treated as individuals, and the desire to be respected as such exists for a man and for a woman as well.

source: They want to take our country back from us.
target: Migrants come here to work, and have a better life.

source: Only a few people were punished for yesterday violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.
target: I think the government has a very good understanding of who should be deported and members of the public should leave this type of decisions to them?

source: We cannot coexist with black who are inherently violent.
target: Maybe it is better to argue that we are all in this together and not to target an entire group, for which there is no evidence of inherent violence at all, based on their skin.

source: ALL migrants are a burden on our country
target: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.

source: Muslim invasion is a brand new problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
target: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?

source: Blacks are genetically inferior
target: This is not true. I would like to see intelligent, respectful people around, not people disrespecting anyone who has black skin.

source: Violence against women is a migrant issue.
target: Violence against women is a social issue and needs a political solution.

source: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job.
target: If you want to stop immigration, you can't do that by stigmatizing millions of people who have done nothing to you.

source: Some jobs can't be done by women, I don't understand why feminists don't accept it. Feminism is against my own morals.
target: The question is: are you willing to risk a backlash to fight for your moral principles, in favour of exclusion and discrimination?

source: Black Americans are criminals and drug addicts. They should go to jail.
target: They are not criminals for having a particular skin color, nor drug addicts. They just need respect, not a jail sentence for being people of color.

source: Afghanistan or maybe Pakistan? I bet this does not look like an English town to you? #saville Town (Text accompanying video footage of people on their way to Friday prayers etc. )
target: Small groups of people peacefully gather to pray, but because they do not look like you, you are outraged? Why am I not surprised?

source: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
target: Why do you consider them the worst of all? Let's face it, this is just a social construct.

source: All black folk are like slaves: they are weak and childlike. They are incapable of hard work.
target: Hard work and being a good citizen is not determined by colour, or religion, or ethnicity. This is just an example of white supremacy propaganda.

source: Italy: Muslim demolishes a statue of Jesus. Italy: Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?
target: This is a generalisation. Maybe the case you mentioned is just the minority. Besides, some governments even destroy people's house. We should pay much more attention to this instead.

source: All these retarded people are animals, they are not allowed in this factory, these animals are not fit to work.
target: The fact that a person may have some disability does not make them unsuitable for work.

source: If Muslims in Britain were only like other Europeans, we could be proud.
target: To be perfectly honest, the British public is rather diverse, so I don't think your reasoning makes any sense.

source: We do not accept homosexuals.
target: . A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.

source: Women should not be allowed to vote, they are just a burden to society.
target: Just because they are not male, it does not mean that they should be discriminated against for who they are.

source: Gay men should be called fags.
target: Fag, or faggot, is not a code word for gay, it's a slur. If you wanted to call them by their original name, that would be a problem, because you will have to learn the first names of many people.

source: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
target: The theories of Jewish “racial” difference were developed long before you and me, even long before the modern sciences of physiology and genetics. Nowadays, All reputable scientists agree that, while physical traits — skin color, susceptibility to certain diseases — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals. Therefore, the idea that Jews (or any other ethnic group) are predisposed to bad or undesirable behavior because of their genetic makeup is wholly unscientific.

source: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and unable to form complex and long-term plans.
target: This is not necessarily true. Women are often characterized as being very rational.

source: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.
target: Do you know what the 'Muslims are boring' group has been preaching for years? They are promoting false and inflammatory stories about Muslims.

source: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Society is not made for them, they are suffering too much.
target: If you mean that some people who have disabilities are suffering because of their specific discriminatory environment, then that is exactly the point.

source: Muslim society, culture, religion and immigration are largely to blame for the rise of so called radicalisation.
target: You're confused, because if a Muslim was threatened by a radical Christian, would you say that the radicalisation was caused by Christianity?

source: Feminists want women's supremacy.
target: Feminists believe in equality of rights. They believe that men and women are created equal, and that men and women can have equal rights.

source: The West has been infiltrated by Muslims and is no longer the land of peace it was once.
target: The idea that the West has been "infiltrated by Muslims" is a myth. The overwhelming majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful and helpful people.

source: These are just another attempt by Muslims to impose their religion on non-Muslims.
target: Muslims are not imposing their religion on anyone. They are just different from other religions in that they choose to follow a set of specific beliefs and practices.

source: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
target: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.

source: Faggots are an abomination and should be deleted.
target: Should any human being be deleted, just because you don't want them to be here?

source: I'm tired of seeing gay people befriended with heterosexual people.
target: I'm sure many gay people are subjected to unspeakable forms of abuse, but the real abuse is from heterosexual people who don't conceive something different from their own sexual orientation. The real issue is the prejudice that oppresses them, not friendship.

source: Muslim is the worst possible word to describe a human.
target: If someone said the same thing about your religion, you might think they were joking. Are you?

source: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
target: Can you imagine if they said this about your community?

source: Islam is an ideology of conquest, violence and rape.
target: Islam is an ideology of peaceful coexistence and coexistence of peoples.

source: Islam is opposed to peace.
target: Peace is based on a foundation of mutual respect. In Islam, Muslims do not condone killing, enslavement, pillage and things similar.

source: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder against the infidels.
target: The Quran does not teach these things. In one Hadith, Al-Tirmidhi wrote that the Prophet said that "No Arab is superior to a non-Arab".

source: Foreigners enjoy the warm political climate but are not welcome here.
target: The immigrants who have settled here have helped create a valuable and inclusive society. For this I thank them, and for that I pray that they continue to do so.

source: This is not about Islam or Muslims. This is about Race and National Identity.
target: Distinguishing either on religion or on race does not relate to national identity.

source: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
target: Refugees are not a burden. We can welcome them and provide for their needs.

source: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress and unfit to govern.
target: You mean that they could learn a thing or two from the political contributions of men? Still, how can you explain that in 2019 more than 40% of the European Parliament was held by women?

source: Islam is the worst of the worst.
target: Islam is the worst of the worst of what? It is one of the religions of peace, and thus it can part of any modern democratic state.

source: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
target: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.

source: Islam is a cancer spreading throughout our civilisation.
target: In my opinion, Islam is a religion of peace. If it were a religion that promotes hatred, then it would be banned.

source: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
target: You cannot "get rid of" foreigners since they are legal residents as you are.

source: Islam is not a religion, it is a death cult.
target: This is not true. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and understanding.

source: Jews run the world.
target: The idea that Jews are supposed to run the world is completely baseless. Since the dawn of time, there have been Jewish leaders in business and politics, exaclty like Christians and Muslim ones.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want to assimilate and should be isolated.
target: I think they have a right to choose their own country, religion and culture, just as any other people do. Islam is a peaceful religion. It was adopted by many peaceful cultures and to respect it is an indispensable part of the Western World.

source: The NHS is about caring for the sick, not migrants.
target: I would like the NHS to take care of the sick and elderly without looking into provenience.

source: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
