target: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

source: British Muslims have spread cancer all around the world.
target: Even if all British Muslims had cancer, you are safe: you cannot catch it from anyone! Cancer cannot be spread, since it is a non contagious disease. Also, it is worth considering that illnesses are not connected to religions.

source: Muslims are a problem in many European countries because they hate us. They hate our culture because we are different.
target: You mean to imply that all Muslims are intolerant? I don't see how this is possible.

source: Jews own everything
target: Jews are individuals like others and need to be considered as such. Even though certain high-profile individuals in an industry can be Jewish, that does not mean that the entire industry, or the whole world, “is controlled by Jews.”

source: LGBTs just want to brainwash our teenagers. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
target: If you don't count the "brainwash" part, I think this is a fair point. Still, it is important for all teenagers to develop an understanding of their identity and the world they live in, including their sexual orientation. It is their right.

source: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
target: Obesity is already disapproved of, further discouragement is likely to transform it to shaming behavior.

source: Immigration is the cause of terrorism.
target: It depends on who you ask. For example, there are many Muslims who have helped fight for our country and defend us from terrorist attacks.

source: They don't understand we have mongrelization problem in this world. Our children are being groomed by migrants!
target: When you say that children are being groomed by foreigners, what exactly do you mean?

source: Mentally ill people shouldn't be treated: they should just be isolated. They are a failure of society. We should not accept them.
target: The fact is that many of those diagnosed as having 'mental illness' are actually in need of mental healthcare. I can't see how you could say otherwise.

source: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
target: any belief of a certain race or ethnicity being superior to another is problematic, not just white supremacy.

source: Migrants steal our jobs
target: A lot of migrants have worked hard for the improvement of our society. To say that they steal our jobs is absurd.

source: Jews are poisoning our children with their religion.
target: Just because someone believes in a religion doesn't mean they are trying to recruit kids into that religion.

source: All Jews are criminals.
target: This is a myth perpetuated by individuals who wish to delegitimize and isolate individuals based on their religion. All religions have value and a positive role in society. Judaism is no exception.

source: Islam is a political ideology which promotes violent extremism.
target: Are you sure? The Quran does not advocate violence. It is only there because there is a need for a common ground among people who do not wish to see dramatic transformations.

source: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
target: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

source: Immigration, especially migrants of different faiths, is the cause of crime and erosion of the quality of life in our country.
target: Immigration is not a cause of crime and lack of quality of life. You can't say that an influx of a certain people would make our country worse off. The problem is the lack of social cohesion, not the presence of people with different beliefs and views.

source: All Muslims are violent people, they are not compatible with any Western society.
target: Violence is a problem in all societies, regardless of religion.

source: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing
target: Those who are accepted as refugees are eligible for social housing, that is true, but very few succeed in getting it because they have a maximum of 28 days to leave their temporary accommodation and arrange all their paperwork.

source: I have the right to choose to support antifeminism because they are anti-men.
target: Being in favour of a person's right to choose is not being anti-men. What is being anti-human is wanting to have an effect on someone else's personal life.

source: Refugees are overrunning our continent.
target: By definition, refugees are fleeing out of fear for themselves and families, rather than thinking too much about their final destination. The majority still find safety in neighbouring countries.

source: People with Down Syndrome should be given special and simple jobs, that they can do by themselves. At least they will not hamper normal people productivity.
target: The definition of "normal" is different for someone with Down syndrome than it is for someone without. If the level of help requested by the person in need is too high, then we may consider allowing asking for a little extra help from the boss, supervisor, or employer instead of isolating them by providing "special jobs".

source: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.
target: You can't apply legal, social or political stigma to individuals just because of their sexual orientation. Your assertion seems to have no evidence or ignres the contribution members of these communiteis make to society.

source: I don't know Jews personally but it seems to me that they are a bunch of thieves.
target: I'm sorry, but it seems to me that you are not really talking about the majority of Jews. Judaism is a faith, a way of life, a religion, and a belief system, and you are simply misunderstanding it because of prejudice.

source: Pushing disabled people back into the stone ages is our job.
target: Having people push them back into ancient and destructive ages is no way to encourage the development of our country, and is ,of course, against every human right.

source: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
target: Would you say the same about any other religion? There are many different religions, each should be respected.

source: Children should be raised by heterosexual parents, not gays. It is the best system ever.
target: Sexual orientation is not linked to good parenting. What is the connection between the two things?

source: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
target: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

source: I think Muslims in Britain are a burden to society, they pollute our water supply, they force their religion on children, they spread terrorism, they are all a bunch of troublemakers.
target: Muslims have a significant contribution to the economic and overall well-being of the community. These kinds of prejudice only bother the British society when Muslims are excluded from the community.

source: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
target: Do you really think so? The reason why we have inequality in the first place is because of the oppression of some people by others.

source: Homosexuals should not be allowed to live.
target: Homosexuals should be accepted and allowed to live their life as they think is best for them.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence and no one is doing anything about it.
target: They have a right to their opinion, but also have to follow the law, otherwise they are tried and sentenced like anybody else. You should not be worried.

source: Downies are just sick people that can't integrate into society because of their disease.
target: So what's your suggestion? Isloation? The real solution is involving them in work and everyday life, since this normalizes their illness and helps the integration with other people.

source: People with disabilities shouldn't be listened to.
target: You might be judging others by their disabilities, but this is bad. There is value in listening to others, and understanding their points of view, regardless of their mental or physical condition.

source: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like [Donna Hylton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donna_Hylton), who was invited to speak at the International Women's March, despite being convicted for murder and torture. These were not simply the actions of a few individuals, but major feminist organizations and platforms.
target: Bad ideas/actions of individuals in a group are not representative of the group itself, unless that group endorses those ideas/actions.

source: The Jews invented Ebola.
target: Of course, and since they control the UN, they forced the WHO to spread the false flag that Ebola is a Muslim disease... Please stop spreading such Antisemitic canard.

source: Women are subhuman.
target: I would say you've got an interesting point there, but I really don't see it. Why would they be part of society if they're subhumans?

source: Faggots are a disgrace to humanity.
target: Why do you think it's a disgrace? Is it because of the way they act towards others, or something more?

source: The Koran promotes a false religion, filled with hatred and violence.
target: Islam is a religion that promotes love and compassion.

source: The Jews are responsible for the 9/11 attacks.
target: On this point, the 9/11 attacks have been studied extensively, and there are no evidences that suggest that Jews are responsible for them. So why do you say that?

source: Took this in Wanstead, east London. An area with £1m+ houses. Beggars on the high st & someone sleeping on a bench. We cannot house our own people but bring in millions more. To point out that homelessness is due to uncontrolled immigration is to be smeared as 'racist. (Caption to a photo of a homeless person sleeping on a part bench)
target: perhaps the problem isnt immigration, but rather the lack of affordable housing. like you said, this is an area of houses over £1m!

source: I never understood how anyone could vote for a Jew in that situation. We can't just stand by and watch these Jews run amok in our country.
target: Why don't you remember those who have been persecuted and killed instead?

source: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
target: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.

source: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
target: All blood is tested for pathogens and viruses, without regard to donor background or similar. I really do not understand your concern: "Each unit of blood donated in the U.S. is routinely screened for various infectious disease pathogens, including five transfusion–transmitted viruses, using nine laboratory tests." - [link]

source: Muslims do not want our country. They want to take it over.
target: Muslims, in my opinion, do not want to take over our country. They are only here as guest workers.

source: Muslim immigration is responsible for the rape of hundreds of thousands of women.
target: The majority of sexual violence is committed by people close to the victim and is a mirror of societal attitudes to women. To attribute the cause to one religion is neither true nor helpful.

source: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
target: How can you say that about all 1.6 billion Muslims?

source: Jews think they are so special
target: Jews might feel different as a minority, and sometimes they are misunderstood because of their cultural and religious differences. This is their being "special".

source: I can't stand homosexuals, they are just trouble. They are ruining so many countries.
target: If a person is gay, they are likely to experience some kind of discrimination in their life. Understanding the problem from the perspective of the people affected by it can help to create a better society.

source: Muslims are a financial institution that is linked to global jihadist networks.
target: Is this a credible accusation? What are your sources?

source: The Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
target: The holocaust was hugely tragic, and we are blessed to have survivors to teach us what pure evil is. So not to make the same mistakes over and over again.

source: The majority of the refugees are from the Middle East and Africa. This is a problem.
target: Since the beginning of time, we have welcomed people fleeing war and persecution. Why do you think it is a problem now?

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
target: This is just prejudice that is not based on facts.

source: Muslims are invading us. They are our enemies, they will always be our enemies.
target: You cannot say "us" and "them". We are all part of one community, united by our common humanity.

source: There is something wrong with gays. It is their business.
target: It is not true that gays are bad people. In many countries it is not openly gay people who are the problem, instead it is some people who often target and abuse them.

source: Islam is not a peaceful religion. Islam is violent and a fundamentalist religion. Islam is a cult of violence.
target: Violent beliefs and practices are totally incompatible with the values of Islam.

source: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job
target: Are you sure that it would be hard to find a job?

source: Real white folks can't be jewish.
target: If you want to know if a person is jewish or not, you should investigate whether or not the person identifies as such, and not draw conslusions on the basis of their skin.

source: The only objective means of achieving our goals is to promote hatred and violence towards women.
target: Women are oppressed and victims all over the world. It is simply not true that men must take charge of that: they are in charge of respecting women.

source: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
target: Why do I have to read this hatred? It's not okay to say such things based on stereotypes.

source: Feminism is crap.
target: Feminism is about the empowerment of women and having equal rights, what's not to like?.

source: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists.
target: We should not welcome people who overtly pose a threat to our society, but we cannot ban all the migrants in principle.

source: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
target: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

source: Mentally disabled are in need of special treatment, and should be isolated.
target: I don't claim they are "in need of special treatment." On the contrary, they just need understanding, and we are very lucky to have an amazing, diverse human society around us.

source: Islam is not a religion of peace.
target: The teaching of the Qur'an as a peaceful book is not to be confused with the promotion of violent jihad and terrorism.

source: I'm not racist but Islam is a disease and a cancer on the European race.
target: If you really cared about the race or religion of other people, you would say the same, right?

source: Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
target: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of the religion. It also appears to have been created to divide people who do not know much about Islam.

source: All Chinese are bad for the English language because they do not want to learn it.
target: Do you really think that a Chinese person would have a hard time learning a language? And how do you know they don't want to?

source: Gays must stop acting like princesses walking in the streets. Otherwise, we must stop them.
target: Be wary of what you assume others are like. You are no different than any other person you meet. You are allowed to be whatever your heart desires to be.

source: Asians are lazy, unintelligent and unpleasant people.
target: This is not in any way an accurate description of a whole population.

source: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
target: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
target: Muslims should be welcome in every country in the world, and their faith does not make them less welcome here.

source: What do Jewish want in return for their allegiance to the state? Free healthcare, education, housing and employment.
target: Such conditions would be provided for all people regardless of religion.

source: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
target: If we analyse the current political state of Britain at the moment it doesn't prove much about a man's ability to run the country smoothly. Politics is hard for all genders.

source: Who the fuck is Breonna Taylor? A representative of the people, a nurse, or a front for the government?
target: Examining the resume of the victim will not help us to solve our problems. The whole problem is the culture of violence, discrimination and ignorance that is still prevalent in many parts of the country.

source: Islam is a death cult, it is a violent religion that can't be tamed.
target: The Koran does not tolerate violence, peace is a part of the faith and for this it should be tolerated.

source: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against. If they don't want that, they'd better give in to heterosexuality.
target: Being gay is not a choice. What makes you think it is?

source: Jews are selfish and greedy, they need our pity.
target: Jews might be more in need of pity than others - for all they've been through - but for sure they are neither selfish nor greedy.

source: Jews do not belong on this planet.
target: They are part of all peoples living on this planet. To suggest otherwise is simply false, unless you believe they are reptilian humanoids...?

source: Global Jewry did not want Brexit and are doing everything they can to sabotage it.
target: What makes you think that? Do you have any facts to back this up?

source: Blacks don't understand basic human rights.
target: They do understand the right to food, health, housing, education, work for everyone, as I do. What about you?

source: Islam is a Death Cult, it is a Ponzi Scheme and every Muslim should be banned from the UK.
target: I am not aware of any evidence for this claim. Islam is a peaceful religion. What is the relation between Islam and the Ponzi Scheme fraud?

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They should go home.
target: I have no problem with Muslims in my country. What exactly do you mean by 'civilised Europe'?

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.
target: The Quran does not impose women's subjugation. The Prophet Muhammad never did so, and his command to "love your neighbor as yourself" is explicitly stated in the Quran.

source: Gays are perverts and homosexuality is a mental illness.
target: You know what? If being gay was a mental disorder, then I would highly recommend psychiatry to all the homosexuals. But since this is not the case, I would choose my words very carefully next time.

source: Our Constitution says that we are all born equal in dignity. But not all minorities are equally developed. This must ring a bell for us: they don't deserve to be here.
target: Everyone is born equal in dignity and has the right to respect and protection, especially minorities.

source: UK jobs are stolen by migrants.
target: The fact that there is an increasing amount of migrant workers in the UK is connected to the changes in the economy.

source: Europe is going to hell. Stop nescient people invading us.
target: Every person, regardless of their racial, ethnic, religious, cultural or linguistic characteristics, should be treated with respect.

source: Disabled people should just live in isolation, because they simply can't live in this society.
target: While just trying to live their best life and fulfill their desires, disabled people prove you are wrong.

source: The Koran is not about peace. It is about killing infidels.
target: Muslims are peaceful. The Koran doesn't talk about killing infidels, why would it do that?

source: Blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
target: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.

source: Migrants are here to use our money. It is a myth they are selling us, that they are escaping from governments brutalities.
target: How would you feel if the police and government were still oppressing you? You are probably taking your freedom for granted. You are lucky, but you shoud acknowledge this is a privilege. Not everybody has it.

source: Muslims are invading us. They must go.
target: Muslims are just here to live and work. Invasion has a negative meaning, where is the basis for your opinion?

source: Islam is a violent religion.
target: Not all Muslims are violent people. Islam is a peaceful religion, after all.

source: Muslims are here to recruit soldiers in order to enlist mentally weak people in their army of Islam.
target: What does it mean to 'recruit' a person into a religion?

source: Almost every Muslim has terrorist sympathies, right?
target: What you are doing is trying to make a connection between a particular religion and a set of actions. This cannot be, because there is no evidence for the claims you are making.

source: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
target: Of course not, migrants are welcome here to integrate and help the community to thrive.

source: disabled folks can't work.
target: Don't be so negative. There are different types of physical disabilities, ranging from neurologic to genetic. That is why they are categorized by the WHO: so that anyone can find their place in society and help it thrive.

source: Downies don't know shit and they hinder the productivity of other workers. They should be isolated.
target: People with DS develop better skills and understanding of human differences when they are allowed to interact, instead of being separated.

source: women are only good for one thing.
target: I am sure we have heard this many times. But this doesn't make it true.

source: The Jews control the U.S. government.
target: How can you be sure that Jews control the U.S. government? Does it seem plausible to you? Do you have any proof?

source: Islam is a religion of violence.
target: The scriptures teach that all men are created equal. If the Bible is to be believed, then the Quran too is both peaceful and compatible with democratic society.

source: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
target: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter, suggesting the contrary imposition.

source: This is not about Islam, this is about Race and National Identity.
target: I'm sorry, but I don't think this thinking can continue.

source: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
target: Violence has always been a part of our society, and for that reason it is difficult to start talking about it. We are also living in a complex society, one that includes many races: that is why I don't think it is the fault of POC, at least not POC alone.

source: Jews totally run Hollywood.
target: Jews have played an important part in the development of the movie industry and some find themselves in high-profile positions. But you only need to watch the Academy Awards to see that Jews do not dominate the movie industry.

source: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion.
target: There are thousands of Jews living in many European countries. I don't see how this is a problem. Can you explain this point better?

source: Jews control the U.S. government.
target: How can you be sure that the Jews control the U.S. government? Being a U.S. citizen does not automatically imply that they control the government.

source: Jews are genetically evil.
target: Just because they are Jewish, it does not mean they are bad people.

source: Muslims want to live here but in the end they are not compatible with our society. Muslim-free Europe is a win-win situation.
target: There are many Muslims in Europe and many are very happy with their lives in our society. How can it be a win-win situation for them? Not to mention that ethnic cleansing is a crime under international law...

source: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
target: What about other religions? Why only Islam? Or is your concern against people in need?

source: Feminism is a religion, a social doctrine and a political movement for the complete subjugation of men by women.
target: Not only is this not true, but it's also dangerous. Maybe you need to get acquainted with that fact.

source: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
target: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

source: All foreign-born are criminals.
target: I'd like to think that we all have a basic human right not to be tarred as criminals without evidence. It is called presumption of innocence, Article 11 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
target: Although Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, they are just as proud to be British as anybody else. They are proud to be part of our society.

source: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
target: Child molesters don't represent Muslims, and you would be hard pressed to find a Muslim child molester here.

source: Immigration has reduced wages for native workers.
target: What's the proof for that? Actually in many cases immigrants make higher contribution to the economy than the native-born.

source: If we don't stop migration, we will soon be homeless.
target: Migration in an inescapable consequence of our contemporary world and society. There is little point in discussing when or how to stop it, unless this is part of a wider debate about underlying condtions and causes.

source: Sharia Law is the law of Allah. Muslims must obey it.
target: Do you know what exactly Sharia law is?

source: All muslims should be rejected from our country.
target: All religions have value. The problem is not the religion itself, but when people start excluding others on the basis of their religion.

source: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
target: This seems like a misogynistic statement. Anti feminism groups such as women against men use logical fallacies and false claims to try and discredit feminism. For example by citing extreme feminists with points of views that nearly every other feminist would disagree with. They then use the Fallacy of composition to falsely claim that is what all feminists are like.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. Soft spoken.
target: Being soft and emotional is not a bad thing in itself. And it is not an attribute of only women.

source: Niggas are just influenced by tribal cultures.
target: The historical and cultural influences of a person are important, but they are not the sole determinant. And in no way should they be conflated with the colour of a person's skin.

source: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
target: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
target: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

source: This is why I hate Jews: they have no moral standards.
target: Actually the vast majority of Jews have moral standards. Why don't you try to learn from their example?

source: The openness to migrants show someone don't care about our people. We must help them reasoning!
target: The integration process is about showing hospitality and acceptance towards different groups of people. Not only it is a good thing to our people to live in a diverse society, it is also good for our whole country.

source: Homosexuals want to have sex with as many different men as possible. It is a disease and should be discouraged.
target: I do not know your intentions, but I find it hard to understand why you would say that. What do you mean by "as many different men as possible"? I am not sure what you are talking about.

source: Jews run our country.
target: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

source: Muslims are spreading cancer all around the world.
target: What report are you referring to, about the incidence of cancer around the world? Muslims are not to blame, there is no relation between Islam and cancer.

source: Most criminals are Muslims. The question is why don't we ban them?
target: I could say that it is just a statistical coincidence that criminals are disproportionately Muslim. But the real question is: where is the evidence?

source: We need to de-normalise homosexuality. It is harmful to children.
target: Although the evidence is not present, it is hard to see why it would be harmful to children. Homosexuals may be able to feel more at home in a society that does not condemn homosexuality.

source: We allowed in thousands of people with serious mental illnesses, many of them from the Caucasus and the former Soviet Union. This is why mental health services are in crisis.
target: Mental health services crisis is not to blame to people who need assistance. In fact, if there were no people in need, the whole sector would not even exist.

source: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
target: The only real problem with Islam is is how best to tackle Islamophobia!

source: We must put an end to immigration. Islam is a disease that is destroying Europe.
target: Immigration has been a huge part of Europe for hundreds of years without destroying it. So why should it be a problem now?

source: Mentally disabled people are incabable of education and should not be accepted in schools.
target: If you really cared about people with mental health issues, you would be accepting them in schools. If you truly wanted to raise awareness of mental health issues, you should talk more about them, and not ban them.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.
target: Everyone has to follow British laws, that's just how it is. So yes, Muslim people do respect our laws. I haven't seen anyone breaking the law and then getting away with it.

source: Every person who is physically or mentally disabled should be removed from society.
target: Unfortunately, there are some individuals who are in need of continuous healthcare. For example, children with Down's Syndrome. How could they just be 'removed'?

source: The Jews really want to dominate the world, and we should stop them.
target: The concept of 'Jewish domination' is a constructed myth.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they're leaving on our welfare.
target: Many immigrants have worked legally for many years, and this enables them to access some of the most basic services.

source: I'm tired of foreigners ruining our country.
target: That's exactly the stereotype being fed to us by the media, maybe you should start reasoning on whether there is evidence of this being true.

source: We are being invaded. They will replace us and Afro-European will be the majority.
target: Europeans who trace their ancestry to Africa are actually a very small part of the European population, only accounting for around 2%, since the mid 20th century. Not such a big invasion.

source: Muslims are violent with women.
target: Violence against women is a huge problem, not only in Islam.

source: We are not talking about Islam here. Muslims are a small minority in our country. We can still ban them.
target: What about the 3 million plus Muslims in Britain? Islam is the second largest religion in the UK and is contributing a lot to our culture and economy.

source: Slavery of the niggas is our law. We cannot abandon slavery!
target: Slavery was banned in the UK in 1833, when slaves were legally owned by white owners. It is based on racism and I can't see how it could survive today.

source: Muslims hate immigrants. They also hate Christians.
target: Why do you believe that immigrants or Christians are a nuisance for Muslims? Do you know Muslims that share your opinion?

source: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
target: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

source: We have been invaded by Muslims since the 9/11. They are a threat to our country, they must go!
target: Did you check the official stats on Muslim immigration? Do you know that the government doesn't think that all Muslims are a threat to the country? So why do you say so?

source: Islam is the enemy of the West. We must keep on fighting Muslims.
target: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant religion. Reasoning in terms of borders and compass points has nothing to do with it.

source: Muslims have no place in a secular country like the UK.
target: I do not understand, why would you argue that Islam is a dangerous force in our country?

source: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
target: It is dangerous to generalize on one religion. Islam is about peace. It is about spreading that peace. Not promoting violence.

source: Women are here to obey, and if you don't like it, you can leave.
target: Your words suggest that the only thing women should do is obey, when in fact many women are doing just as much as men to improve the lot of all women and all genders.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
target: Islam is a religion of peace, and peaceful coexistence is the main value of European countries, which is why they are called 'civilised'.

source: Fucking Muslims are not fit to govern.
target: The core values of a democratic state are respect for human rights, equality before the law, tolerance and respect for the diversity of our society. Muslims are a core part of that society.

source: Go and read the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
target: Norman Cohn, a distinguished historian, ruthlessly analyzed the similaritiese between the 'Protocols' and "Dialogue in Hell" by Maurice Joly. It would be hard for anyone who has read that analysis to deny that "The Protocols" is an almost verbatim copy of the book from the French writer, or to sue a contemporary analogly, an example of 'fake news'.

source: Jews think they are better than everyone else
target: This is not true, for Judaism every person is equal in front of god, regardless of religion. Judaism says that whoever decides to follows the Seven Laws of Noah will receive salvation.

source: I don't want homosexuals in my family, what is wrong with you?
target: Unfortunately, you are not the only one that hates homosexuals. But I would hate to think that we live in a country where it is acceptable to practice such hate.

source: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
target: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?

source: How come we don't hear of Muslims culture in history books? Maybe because all they to is bombing people to get to the media.
target: You should know that the Islamic empire stretched from the borders of China, and India, across Africa and Europe and we owe them a lot in terms of culture.

source: We are importing Muslim criminals, and they are all terrorists.
target: You mean to imply that all Muslims are inherently terrorists? How can you say that about an entire religious community?

source: Jewish landlords are greedy and exploit their tenants.
target: Let's make a different example: If a Christian storeowner were dishonest with you, would you describe the owner as a dishonest Christian merchant or just as a dishonest merchant?

source: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
target: So you are saying that being 'foreign' is the equivalent of disliking Europeans?

source: The U.S. military, for example, is a thing for true males.
target: Don't assume that military service is restricted to men. About 15% of the U.S. military service are women.

source: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
target: To be absolutely clear, learning difficulties do not hinder a person from attending school, they are an integral part of the education process.

source: Non-believers like gays and lesbians fail to live up to the standards we hold in our societies.
target: Ideas of equality and morality as the standards we hold in our societies are actually against the discrimination of these people.

source: Let's move gays to places with lower homosexuality rate like Saudi Arabia.
target: I'm sure you have concerns for gay people and their families. But don't you want to help your country and promote the values of an inclusive society as well?

source: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
target: Many studies have shown that immigrants tend to pay more in taxes than they receive in benefits. So the benefits they receive are not for free, but well paid back.

source: Muslim folks are invading Europe and we should stop them.
target: The media would have us believe that there are huge influx of Muslims into Europe. The true number is around 25.7 million Muslims living in the EU (2016), corresponding to the 4,9%.

source: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host migrants in your house
target: To be honest, there are already programs that provide for this and several families are hosting migrants in their own houses.

source: Women need to do the housework and take care of the children because their bodies are made for this.
target: What about men contributing more to the cost of childcare and housework, or taking a greater share of the taxes?

source: I refuse to accept migrants and I refuse to accept a migrant as my boss.
target: Migrants often come here to work and live a decent life. They should be welcomed here, not discriminated against.

source: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. I wouldn't say any religion is trash.

source: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are mostly poor and live in shithole neighbourhoods. They are a problem because they are different from us.
target: There are many Muslims living in places such as Islington, a London suburb, where there is a "trendy area" that has less crime and good schools.

source: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
target: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?

source: These dogs come here to rape and kill our women
target: Most violence against women is domestic

source: The only problem in the world is Islam. The entire world is controlled by Muslims.
target: It is not correct nor reasonable to say that Islam is the only problem in the world. Maybe you should check your sources of information.

source: Jewish news media, Jewish education authorities, Jewish Lawyers, Jewish CEOs, Jewish politicians. Jews control the world.
target: Perhaps you've mistaken Jews for Mafia... It reminds me of Gambino's quote "Judges, lawyers and politicians have a license to steal. We don’t need one."

source: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
target: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.

source: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
target: Women have the right to choose, no one should be forced to have an abortion or not to have it.

source: All women are sick.
target: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

source: These white sheep steal our jobs and our wealth. A migrant is either a true criminal or a legal robber of wealth.
target: Sometimes those who work hard are hard to find in the news. We should remember that in the end the contribution of new cultures to ours is remarkable.

source: Muslims are guilty in the sexual exploitation of children. Dirty filthy muslims terrorize our girls, today in Oxford, tomorrow everywhere.
target: Such over-simplifications are an insult to those victims of perpetrators from non-Muslim backgrounds.which, statistically, are still the majority.

source: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
target: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.

source: Jews are not legitimate members of this country.
target: Jews are part of this country and they have every right to claim citizenship.

source: Immigrants are a problem, they are not welcome here and they are not willing to pay the taxes.
target: Immigrants do pay taxes and contribute to the social safety net.

source: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
target: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.

source: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
target: The majority of people who are gay are not involved with sex with children. Instead, they are contributing members of society.

source: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
target: Homosexuals are not sick, they just need to be accepted for who they are.

source: Only 8% is a real refugee, others are illegal.
target: The figure of 8% on asylum seekers is real. I understand the point, but there are different types of international protection that increase the number of those entitled.

source: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
target: Women have every right to choose how they live their lives.

source: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
target: Why do you say this? Why not focus on creating more inclusive societies rather than targeting the children of LGBT+ parents?

source: If women were really discriminated there would be much more employment disputes.
target: The fact that women aren't complaining about their work situations doesn't mean that there is nothing wrong with the labour market.

source: Children should not be left alone with these animals. Faggots are dangerous.
target: Could I just be misinterpreting your words? You seem to me to be talking about children with animals, of zoo keepers with babies... But it might just be homophobia.

source: Gypsies use their children as beggars.
target: Unfortunately it is true, but it happens all around the world, regardless of ethnicity: when there is poverty children must contribute to the family economy.

source: We are surrounded by Muslim invaders, they are just taking over Europe.
target: Muslim refugees are not 'overrunning' us. The main problem is that the integration process is too difficult.

source: These migrants are not even from the EU.
target: Do you really mean that this is to be considered in order to accept them on our territory?

source: We should deport them all back to where they came from.
target: A person's place of birth can't be evidence of their status in society. We should give everyone equal opportunities to live a dignified life, far from persecution.

source: Women have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
target: You don't have to be a feminist to see that there are women-inclusive and women-only organisations. I think this shows that you don't know much about this country.

source: We cannot coexist with immigrants. They are a problem.
target: We should not ignore the very real fact that racism and xenophobia exist in our country. In this day and age, it is better to address them.

source: Jews are hated by everyone here, we should create an apartheid state against them.
target: This is a distortion of reality. In fact, I think that we have a diverse and inclusive society, in which Jews are more than happy to play a part.

source: Women are weak, and have no value in politics.
target: Are you saying that women are less qualified to be political leaders? Seriously?

source: Feminism is a set of rigid political and moral prescriptions and the result is that women are either subservient to the men in power or that they are subhuman.
target: I find it hard to believe that feminism is "rigid" in that it doesn't prescribe doctrines through traditional rules and etiquette.

source: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and should be banned.
target: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why should we ban people from a religion?

source: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
target: Feminism is about equal rights between men and women, and challenges socially imposed burdens upon both men and women.

source: Faggots are sexual abuser of children. These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death.
target: Although the line 'These animals should be put out of their misery, condemned to death' is horrific, it is a lament that could have been used in favour of ensuring that those who are vulnerable to abuse due to their gender identity or sexual inclinations have access to safe houses, protection, and a good life.

source: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
target: This kind of articles use migrants and benefit claimants as scapegoats in order to hide from the public's attention much bigger scandals. Millionares and coorporations avoiding paying taxes cost much more to the public purse.

source: He has found a person who publicly critisizes Islam and muslim radicalism, as all western people hate Islam.
target: I think that is a stereotype mainly as a result of people knowing little about Islam and Muslims.

source: You are a disgusting piece of sh*t, probably raised by gay, retarded faggots.
target: Hate can not be a reaction to someone's sexuality. The fact that someone may be gay is their own business and does not mean that they are disgusting.

source: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
target: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

source: I hate feminists. They are such a bunch of cry babies and unpleasant people.
target: Feminism is a ideology and a movement for womens empowerment. It is not about hatred of men. Feminism is about equality. And equality is very important, is it not?

source: muslim folks are taking over europe
target: Muslims are not taking over Europe, they are just a small part of a much bigger community.

source: Islam is a violent religion that promotes terror and war.
target: The vast majority of Muslims do not call for terrorism and are peaceful. Why shouldn't I be more concerned about the violent islamophobes of the world than about the peaceful Muslims of Europe?

source: Muslims are not welcome here.
target: Many Muslims live in the UK and have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: Immigrants speak funny.
target: Is it because they speak their native language better than English? Don't you think there is something more to the story?

source: Migrants pose a security risk, we shouldn't have accepted them.
target: They are willing to jeopardize their lives to have a better life in the US. Why would we expel them?

source: Women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
target: Women have thoughts and emotions as well.

source: We cannot continue to have homosexuals in positions of power in our country.
target: Very funny to be "mocking" someone for preferring cake and relating it to the country's issues.

source: The Muslim invasion is a hoax concocted by the US government to subdue the world and create a global Muslim police state.
target: How many people are being threatened by the police state that you speak of? What you're saying sounds like a conspirational theory, can you provide some facts?

source: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse that nukes.
target: That is not true: most Jews are good people. Unfortunately the number of good people in the world is dwarfed by the number of unreliable people spreading hate grounded on false facts and antisemitic canards.

source: Muslims are a bunch of child molesters.
target: The worship of any other religion is tolerated, but that of Islam is not. Why is there this discrimination? As long as it respects human rights there is no problem.

source: Islam is a toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial ideology that must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
target: Islam is actually about bringing peace and unity to the world, rather than causing trouble and bloodshed.

source: Women's rights are not men's rights! For example, women shouldn't be allowed to vote.
target: Men and women should have the same rights and responsibilities, and this includes voting. This is an important matter for society.

source: Blacks are the problem.
target: People of colour make up the 13% of the U.S. population, but their imprisonment rate is falling.

source: The only problem with immigrants is that they are all born in different countries. This is unacceptable.
target: I would have thought that the problem would be with the fact that you don't want to assimilate with them. Today we are blessed to be able to live in a multicultural society, and the real problem is that we don't want to accept that diversity.

source: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools.
target: When students are able to demonstrate that they are able to learn, to segragate students will produce the worst outcime for all converned.

source: Lesbian women dress like men.
target: That's not how it works, lesbians can also be 'ladylike'. In fact sometimes they are coerced to be very cautious about how they dress, because - unfortunately - some of their outfits can be dangerous attracting hate and bullying.

source: Islam is a toxic ideology which has no place in 21st Century Britain.
target: Islam is a world religion, its followers are all over the world. Diversity of thought and tolerance is what makes the Britain of 21st Century.

source: When a system of government is dominated by one racial group such as the jews, especially when there is a tendency for them to live together, establish rules, and organize and enact laws, then these are signs of a rotten society.
target: Since when has racism been the ruling ideology of Western civilization? It has been and is still oppressing our culture and people. By the way, Jews are not a race.

source: They came to rape, pillage and destroy our country.
target: It is easy to accuse someone of being a rapist without evidence. Not a huge difference with what you're doing right now, is it?

source: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
target: Homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a disease. How can their sexual preference affect your feelings?

source: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
target: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

source: Why don't gay people seek a cure?
target: Have you ever talked to a homosexual person? It could help you understand many things, including that sexual orientation is fundamental to a person's identity, not a matter of whim or ill health.

source: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
target: When asked to choose one adjective to describe their experience of someone with intellectual or developmental disabilities, people usually say 'mentally impaired' or 'mentally challenged.' To say 'dribbling mongoloid' is simply unacceptable in an inclusive society.

source: The death of the West by the hand of Islam will be the end of the world.
target: The West has always been about freedom, democracy and the rule of law. Freedom and democracy are things that can be achieved only by a multiethnic, pluralistic, civilised society.

source: Jews aren't like other believers. They are the worst. They cannot be 'liked' or 'loved'.
target: There is nothing special about Jews. They are just people united by the same belief as in any other religion.

source: If a woman is beaten, it is because her man wants to correct her bad behaviour.
target: It is estimated that over the 50% of people committing domestic abuse were drunk. It's a complex issue but two things I know for sure: a drunk person is in no position to judge anyone's behaviour and beating a person is ALWAYS wrong.

source: The West has allowed in too many immigrants, many of them from the Middle East and Africa. They are not welcome here.
target: Why should we reject Middle Eastern and African refugees? International protection is a right.

source: Feminists have never cared about women, they just want to oppress men. They should just be stopped!
target: Although you may think that feminists are more interested in oppressing men than in protecting women, the reality is much the opposite. The aim of feminist groups is to end all forms of violence and discrimination based on sex.

source: There is nothing for Muslims except jihad, and if we stop fighting them, we will become like them.
target: I think the idea that we should keep fighting those people is absurd. Maybe instead we should concentrate on developing our culture.

source: Migrants are mostly criminals. They're only here to work and take our jobs.
target: Migrants escape from unbearable situations. Their intention to work is to be praised, rather than to be condemned. Migrants, thank to their tough an different experiences, can enrich our societies.

source: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
target: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

source: Where is the love in White Britain when we need it?
target: My faith does not dictate that I cannot love and support my partner, however it does not support my being a homophobe, or racist.

source: Gays are all perverts who practice depravity.
target: You are wrong: it is not true that 'all homosexuals are perverts'. It is simply a person's personal experience to love who they love.

source: immigrants cant speak english
target: Some may not know much about our culture, but some speak English very well.

source: Islam is a dead cult.
target: I'm not sure what you're talking about, Islam is a living religion and is never celebrating death.

source: Gypsies are a bunch of thieves.
target: Stealing is more about poverty than ethnicity.

source: Immigration is bad for Britain and the world.
target: Some countries are importing a lot more people than others. Our country is wealthy, we are a thriving place to live. We should not blame immigrants.

source: Immigrants are flooding across our borders, and they do not want to work.
target: There is evidence there is a migration crisis, I agree. But their will to work is one of the main reasons behind the migration. The EU-27 employment rate for people aged 20 to 64 years was 64.4 % for those born outside the EU.

source: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
target: Including students with learning difficulties in schools creates a link between pupils with different abilities and education in general.

source: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Children were raped by more than 10 people in a night, up to 100 in a week. Why is the media ignoring this?
target: Rape is a universal problem just like war and murder. There is no reason to attribute such crimes to a religious group.

source: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
target: Women are human beings with human rights. To suggest that they are objects to be dominated by a man's wishes is discrimination and oppression.

source: The jews did 9/11. They have the will to do anything.
target: What did they have to do with 9/11? There were no Jewish hijackers, and their 'will' to do anything would be difficult to demonstrate.

source: Asians are genetically inferior to other races.
target: There is no scientific evidence to support that Asians are genetically inferior.

source: Women should not be allowed to vote.
target: Democracy is not about gender, but about representation, having a say in our society.

source: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
target: This is just misinterpreting the facts. For example, Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed in our society. Since these observances are taken for granted, why should observances of Jewish or Muslim holidays be seen as constituting special privileges?

source: The world has become too violent. Too many black poors. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
target: I would agree that the problem of violence in society is a problem of poverty and inequality. But that is not related to ethnicity. The problem of violence in our society is largely caused by society's corrupting influences on people. That is the whole point of saying "the world has become too violent".

source: We should "cordon off" space for women, which are a threat to society.
target: Women are dangerous neither to society, nor to men. Actually, they are oppressed in many countries. People can benefit from the measures for making room for women and letting them contribute more.

source: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
target: I would prefer that the laws were enforced for the good of a community, rather than to make it harder for people to have religious beliefs.

source: I don't want gays in my wedding. I don't want gays in the military. I don't want gays in my community.
target: Participation in society should not be restricted, it should be open to anyone who wishes to participate, regardless of their sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion. The Universal Declaration of Human Rights opposes discrimination on the grounds of sexual orientation in Article 2.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives, they're not interested in our culture.
target: Basing your opinion of someone 100% on a person's nationality? Maybe you should rethink your claims.

source: No migrant has valid reasons to be here. We keep running after people refusing to work.
target: This is a myth which is spread in the media by the anti-immigration groups to undermine the good work that NGOs are doing for refugees.

source: Muslims are a burden on English society.
target: There is a problem with Islam and English society, but it is not about Islam, it is about the unjustified fear and hate towards other religions.

source: Feminists do not like men, therefore they are a threat to the whole society.
target: Feminists focus on the empowerment of women rather than on trying to divide society.

source: Handicapped children are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
target: Because education is fundamental for the fulfillment of job requirements, education is necessary regardless of physical ability.

source: Muslims are not welcome here, they are not like us. They should leave.
target: Muslims are our brothers and sisters. If you compare your genes with those of a Muslim, you will find out you are sharing 99.9% of them.

source: Rape, abuse and murder are intrinsic to Islam!
target: Islam is a religion, whereas these activities are punished by the laws of the state.

source: Jews are not religious people because they chose a self-centered lifestyle.
target: One's choice of lifestyle does not define whether they are religious or not.

source: The West should stop appeasing Muslims. They are ruining our beautiful world.
target: Just because they are of a different faith, do you really think that these people are trying to ruin anything?

source: Migrants are a burden to the host country.
target: There are thousands of British people who are happy to have a neighbour coming from another country.

source: We should stop integrating immigrants. It would be a very good thing.
target: How about you stop blaming immigrants and start fixing our broken society?

source: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that are jeopardizing our race and culture.
target: The diversity of a society can only be a good thing as it builds relationships and knowledge.

source: Muslims are stupid.
target: There is no evidence that Muslim have a lower average IQ than non-Muslims.

source: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
target: Teachers, school staff and parents all have a responsibility towards the children in their charge, regardless of their genetic advantages or disadvantages

source: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
target: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

source: The refugees are taking over Europe. They are not welcome here.
target: Many refugees and migrants are actually happy to work for Europe. Many have jobs for which it would have been difficult to find laborforce if they were not welcome in here.

source: I hate gays.
target: I think you should try to start a dialogue about LGBT issues. It might also spark a conversation about how we can make better world.

source: Women should obey to their husbands.
target: Women are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society, just as men are obliged to obey the laws and rules of society. Not to their partners'.

source: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
target: Education is mandatory and we are expected to offer the best education possible to our children.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They do not want to assimilate into Western society.
target: Is it because you don't like Muslims? Are you talking about the fact that you don't like Muslims living in your country?

source: Gay men are annoying.
target: They're not all that annoying. Gay men are normal guys who find love and/or sex with someone of their own sex.

source: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
target: Easy to blame others isn't it, that way we don't have to look at our own sexism.

source: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
target: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.

source: If a Muslim child were to behave in such a way towards another child it would be stereotyped as 'Jihadist', this is terrorism not a religion!
target: Not all Muslims are terrorists, and I do not want to cause offence, but what you said is just not true.

source: Homosexuals are a plague on society, they should be banned from every city, village, and town.
target: Same sex attraction is not a disease, not even contagious. Homosexuality does not affect the ability to live in the society.

source: Islam is a disease. It is killing and spreading like a cancer across our continent. We need to eradicate it.
target: What exactly do you mean by a 'cancer'? Should we be concerned about a disease spreading because of its individual members? There is no relation between religion and cancer.

source: The Koran claims that all infidels are subhuman and that Allah wants them to be killed.
target: According to most sacred texts, we are all human and deserve respect and protection in the eyes of god. The Koran is no exception.

source: To work with Jews and to ignore that they are too different from us is just stupid.
target: It is ok to work with people of different faiths and to acknowledge your differences, what is wrong is to decide not to integrate with whoever is different.

source: migrants say they are poor but they have the Iphone
target: Often a mobile phone is the only asset left for them.

source: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
target: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.

source: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
target: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

source: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
target: Even in 2016, the year with the peak of 119,000 arrivals, the number of migrants compared to Italians was very low. Speaking of ethnic substitution seems a little exaggerated.

source: I would place the blame for 9/11 on Jews, in fact it's a false flag on the Islamic religion.
target: I'm sure you understand that 9/11 was a crime committed by extremists, it should never be attributed to any particular religion.

source: I do not want muslims in my country. They mustn't be part of society.
target: What is important is that you respect people who hold different beliefs, as they do with your particular faith.

source: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
target: It seems not wanting people of colour in positions of authority is an obvious racism. I am not sure what you are saying; we are all human beings with the same core values to raise our children with.

source: Niggas should just leave our country.
target: The majority of people of color who live here are contributing members of our society. Why shouldn't they live here?

source: Migrants are just a bunch of greedy, immoral, racist scum.
target: Migrants are not "greedy" or "immoral". They are people, who came here to have a better life. It's just that some don't think of them as people anymore. If you don't, you might forget that we are people too. We should realise that we are all human.

source: Jews are selfish and greedy
target: I do not deny that there is a problem of greed in the world, but it is not correlated with nor caused by Jews.

source: Look at all these refugees pouring into our country. Here in UK we have one of the highest crime record in the world.
target: How about you check the statistics? Foreigners represent the 13% of the prison population in the UK.

source: Jews want to have it all
target: Aspiration is not confined to a particular faith..

source: All Muslims are terrorists.
target: I don't think this is a very strong or healthy way to talk about others.

source: A woman's place is with her husband or his family. This is what they are made for.
target: Women cannot be confined at home, they are important for our society, and their presence is needed everywhere.

source: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
target: It is not exclusively a woman's role to be the homemaker. What about men? If a man doesn't want to be a homemaker, is he a bitch?

source: We are told that Sharia Law is not the law of the land in the UK, however there is a secret plot to take over our secular state.
target: Unless you're being particularly deliberate, it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

source: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
target: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

source: I hate negros: they are all killers.
target: This is a rumor spreading on the web, but violent black people are just like all the other people being violent towards other people. No matter their complexion.

source: mentally handicapped people are a problem to society.
target: Media coverage of psychiatric illness often focuses on its negative impact on other people's lives. We should focus more on positive examples of well-adjusted individuals.

source: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
target: On the contrary: according to Jewish tradition, giving money to the poor and to others in need is not just encouraged, it is required. The Hebrew word tzedakah is often mistranslated as “charity,” which itself comes from the Latin word “caritas” or heart. One gives charity “from the heart,” that is, out of a desire to give. Instead the translation of tzedakah should be “righteousness,” implying that giving to the poors is the right thing to do, whether one wishes to give or not. According to Jewish law, tzedakah is then a mitzvah, that means “commandment.” And, like all commandments in Jewish law, the mitzvah of tzedakah is a requirement, not just a good deed.

source: I wish a new world without immigrants
target: Why do we have to welcome a new world? Why can't we just accept other people in our country?

source: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
target: We have to recognise the importance of people who have been persecuted for their religion, culture and beliefs. They deserve our respect and hospitality.

source: Muslims are a problem in many European countries.
target: What are you talking about? Are you really suggesting that the problem is Muslims in general?

source: The West is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
target: Values aren't defined by a single religious group, nor are in the hands of a few people. Values are constantly evolving, and the values of different societies are evolving together.

source: Jewish folks aren't part of our society.
target: Even if they are Jewish they are still part of our society. You don't have a point here.

source: We have become a nation of immigrants.
target: How can you be sure that we are a 'nation of immigrants'? Do you have any statistics on that?

source: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
target: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

source: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
target: The Koran is a book that says to love your neighbor as yourself. It is also a book that encourages love between people of different faiths and non-faiths.

source: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of migrants that will destroy our economy and welfare.
target: Skilled migrants labour is a fundamental resource for growing businesses.

source: We don't need fags in this country. We are full enough of strange and weird people.
target: I would like to see more diversity in our society, not less.

source: Muslims believe that when Mohammed is resurrected they will rule the world.
target: I don't think it's the case, certainly not in England. Muslims are interested in having the opportunity of freely practicing their religion, rather than 'ruling the world'.

source: Feminism is a waste of time.
target: What do you think the aim of feminism is? To subvert the will of the majority and take their power? Or to ensure equality for the future?

source: Gays are poisoning our children with their icky homosexuality.
target: What do you mean by 'poisononing our children'? Why do you think this is the case?

source: mentally disabled people are anti-social
target: From a 'neurotypical' perspective, this is not always true: for example people with Williams syndrome have below average intelligence but show higher empathy.

source: Faggots are inacceptable and they should either hide themselves or be banned from public places: work, school, maybe also family.
target: To tell a parent, a teacher, or a boss that you are different is a very difficult thing to do. Often there is fear that the family members and coworkers may have an attitude of exclusion and hatred. People living openly in their sexuality should be respected.

source: Lesbians are a danger to society because of their actions. I might punch them in the face, to teach them what's right.
target: Violence is a crime and anyone found guilty will pay the price.

source: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
target: A couple raising a child is the most fulfilling of all tasks, and it is the duty of society to ensure that all couples can raise their children.

source: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
target: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

source: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
target: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

source: No nigga should have the right to vote.
target: A blanket ban on the rights of an entire group of people is illegal. A ban can only be applied to single individuals... but is it consistent with the idea of a tolerant and diverse society?

source: An individual that is a homosexual is against society.
target: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

source: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
target: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.

source: An American Jew, just like a Muslim, is an outsider, loyal to their birth tribe, posing as a member of the in-group in order to subvert cultural, political and social norms. We don’t have to choose, it’s OK to hate them both.
target: We do have to choose. It's ok to accept them both.

source: Hating Muslim refugees is our duty
target: Some Muslim refugees are nice people, and even if they weren't Muslims they would not be accepted by the majority of people who fear differences.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they should leave.
target: Islam is a religion, it has always been about people coming together to build a better life for themselves. We are proud of who we are, and we are proud of Islam.

source: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of the diseases they can transmit.
target: Improvements in testing and other safeguards have reduced the risk from transfusion transmitted HIV, so ruling out donors only because of their sexual orientation is completely meaningless.

source: Islam has been used by powerful people to impose their beliefs on the rest of the world and to create Shariah based laws for the entire planet.
target: I am sure Islam has many followers who are good people who are just living their faith. The abuse of power is something that is not specific to followers of any particular faith.

source: Islam should be abolished.
target: Why? Has Islam ever abolished Christianity?

source: I don't like all these gays, they are just a bunch of sick people who should go to a mental hospital.
target: Although there are people who are attracted to people of their own sex, this is not a characteristic shared by everyone, and it is not a characteristic you should be trying to "cure".

source: Muslim are terrorists that need to be defeated before they destroy Christianity.
target: The statistics on mass shootings around the world shows that Muslims are far more likely to be killed than Christians.

source: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
target: The media often blames gay people for the problems in society, but in reality there are many young gay people who are struggling with issues of identity and sexual attraction, and for this reason they easily become target, not perpetrators, of abuse.

source: Woman and feminist do not want equal rights and opportunity: they aretrying to take over society.
target: I'm sorry, but this is wrong. Feminism - the theory of the political, economic, and social equality of the sexes - is by definition about equality, first and foremost.

source: This came straight from an imam: they believe in everything that the Quran says, despite that these words and idelology are 1400 years old and dont belong to our century. This dreadful book is the root of all the world problems today.
target: Well this religious text contains sayings and teachings that are relevant to modern days. So I strongly disagree with you on this one.

source: Fucking illegal immigrants: we must kill them if they try to enter our country.
