target: Why is it always reduced to killing? What about sharing wealth and opportunities, ending borders and stop killing instead?

source: Refugees are not welcome here
target: Refugees are welcome here. Why wouldn't that be the case?

source: Women are not oppressed and many even refuse the protection of the law. The real issue today is about men's rights.
target: The fact that some women don't want the protection of the law should not negate their right to live their life as they wish. In my opinion, woman are people too and this "men's rights" stuff is just an excuse to oppress and marginalize all women once more.

source: Any Muslim can be a rapist: they are all guilty.
target: Islam does not make you a rapist. It is about rights and wrongs. Not crimes. To say that all Muslims are rapists is a great misunderstanding.

source: All Muslims are just selfish subhumans.
target: No, that's not true. I've met many Muslims who helped other people in need. They are smart and friendly, and they are human beings.

source: Gay people should be banned from schools.
target: The idea that being LGBT is a problem is a dangerous idea, especially since a large number of people in society are LGBT. Therefore, I believe that if there is a problem in schools it's better addressing it, rather than banning LGBT people.

source: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
target: So their faith and belief in the teachings of God guides them to a virtuous path of public service. What exactly are you complaining about?

source: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
target: Human beings are the best exemplars of diversity in nature. If we wish to achieve the best possible society, then a diversity of beliefs, opinions and experiences is absolutely necessary.

source: Islam and non-muslims are incompatible. They have nothing to do with one another.
target: I do not understand how the diversity of humanity can be said to be in contradiction with the very basic human values of love and respect that we are striving for.

source: Transgender women are a burden to women.
target: Trans women are really good with any person. We are all different.

source: Islam is run by monsters and terrorists. We must defeat them.
target: Terrorist organizations do exist in many religious groups. Defeating terrorism is different from defeating Islam.

source: Migrants just want to work, but don't want to pay the tax
target: Because they are workers, they have to pay taxes like anyone else.

source: Women need to accept that they are subhumans.
target: Women are equal to men whether you would call them 'subhumans' or not. They are those that are working to make societies more equal. It is very sad that there are still some people suffering from the myth that women are inherently subhumans.

source: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of feminism?
target: My reasoning is that equality is possible only within a framework of reciprocity and respect. This is something that must be implemented by spotting a light on the disadvantaged first, and this is why it is called feminism.

source: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy.
target: This democratic state was designed to be a safe space for people of different faiths to come together and live peacefully. Not to oppress or discriminate.

source: Only Jews could have been smart enough to plan and execute such a complicated and intricate plot as 9/11
target: This myth plays into classic anti-Semitism: Jews control the world, and conspire to manipulate the rest of society, has characteristics of Nazi propaganda –– the Jews being the source of all evil.

source: Gender equality is just a war on masculinity.
target: This simply isn't true. A woman has equal rights and does not have to be considered a man's oppressor just because of her gender and legitimate demands. This has been called a "war on masculinity" but in reality it is just a "code word" for the oppression of women.

source: Jews have a lot in common with monkeys: They are good at sex.
target: So many similarities between Jews and apes? What is wrong with them? Is it because of their religion?

source: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
target: Women are human beings, and have the right to respect and protection as anyone else.

source: Women have no value in a man's life.
target: They're people just like you and me, they have feelings and thoughts and that's what counts.

source: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are not welcome.
target: We have a lot of Muslims in the UK. Why shouldn't we welcome them? Maybe we should just talk about it without discriminating?

source: Blacks are genetically inferior.
target: The evidence doesn't back up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum and you will find that there is no 'genetical superiority' at all.

source: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
target: LGBT+ people exist and are valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

source: Islam is a Virus. We must eliminate it before it destroys us all.
target: Use your common sense... at the moment you are inciting murder.

source: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
target: It is easier to blame one group for everything bad that happens rather than trying to understand the complex and multifaceted causes of problems.

source: Muslims are not interested in Western civilization. Their religion can never be in agreement with our society.
target: Remember that this argument is not about an individual's religion, but rather about creating a more integrated society.

source: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
target: It is up to us to make sure that people from different backgrounds can have a better quality of life. We should integrate them instead of discriminating agaist them .

source: The immigrants coming to our country are the biggest enabler of terrorism.
target: The problem is terrorism and fundamentalism not migrants.

source: Why do so many people hate Muslims? Because they are weird and dangerous.
target: Muslims are different, with different values, different beliefs and different ways of life. This does not justify hate though.

source: Domestic violence against women is a culture that is accepted and shared by the women in many cases. Society is not to be condemned.
target: Women are not responsible for violent crimes. The culture that makes people want to be violent towards their partners is not the "culture" of women.

source: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
target: Our democracy guarantees this right for anyone regardless of sexual orientation, so we should allow the people to decide for themselves whether to take part in the democratic process.

source: Migrants rape our girls.
target: Rape is always a crime, regardless of who the rapist is. It is not about nationality, it is about violence and disrespect for others. We must try to address the root causes of crime instead of demonising people for their origin.

source: Jews are intolerant: they insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
target: Jews are tolerant and don't have problems with other religions or cultures.

source: Women are basically childlike and incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
target: Women have the potential to achieve great things, and it is up to us to give them the opportunity.

source: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
target: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

source: If a woman does not want to be a mother, then she is a bitch.
target: This has less to do with maternity and is more about the negative attitude of the person throwing the insult.

source: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a bunch of hypocrites who think they are superior to us. They don't know what progress is about.
target: You cannot be 'progressive' by rejecting people of a certain religion. What is progress about, to you? Your claim sounds based on the moral superiority.

source: If Islam were to become a global religion it would replace Christianity.
target: Are we to believe that just because something is gaining ground, it will replace whatever exists somewhere else?

source: Immigrants are not welcome here, they should leave.
target: They are welcome to stay if they do not break the law.

source: Islam is a cancer on the European culture.
target: The Qur'an is not a cancer on the European culture, it is a very useful book and an inspiration to many.

source: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
target: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.

source: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
target: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

source: Children are not for rent
target: Surrogate pregnancy is an assisted procreation technique that has nothing to do with 'renting children'

source: LGBTI people are disgusting, they have no morals.
target: I don't think this is an appropriate description of the LGBTI community.

source: Some women's clothes invite rape.
target: Rape is a crime regardless of the dress. If you think this it is women's fault, please, stop.

source: Muslims are a threat to British society.
target: Why do you feel threatened by Muslims? Respecting others is more important than anything, in any society.

source: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
target: This myth traces back to “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”, that is used as proof of a Jewish conspiracy to rule the world. But the Protocols are a proven forgery, written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century, that spread throughout the 20th century and continues to this day.

source: Although women and girls can contribute and undertake science, it is the men who are ultimately more talented, independent and driven.
target: I think there are several reasons, some of which are well founded and based on the facts, why women and girls can give a valuable contribution to science. For example, the big presence of female scientists in academia.

source: Jews are nothing but criminals
target: Jews are persecuted all over the world for various reasons, but there is no evidence that what you say is real.

source: I don't see how Christianity can explain away homosexuality. Faggots should be eliminated.
target: Most modern religions, including Christianity, do not condone or glorify homosexuals. Why would you? If we have to choose between two "evils", it is a moral imperative to choose love over hate.

source: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
target: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

source: The West has allowed in thousands of immigrants. They are getting in every position of power in our country. They will become our masters and we are their slaves.
target: The same can be said for almost any group of people in the world. But it's a slippery slope. And in the end, that has not much to do with your individual freedom.

source: Jews are Christ Killers.
target: The Catholic Church’s stance on the issue today is completely different. They do not charge Jewish people anymore.

source: I tolerated fag pride. I tolerated fags on tv and in every town square. I draw the line at tranny demons reading books to children. (about drag queen story time)
target: I can't say I've ever come across 'fag pride'. Gay pride or LGBT+ pride, perhaps?

source: Islam is just a death cult.
target: Many religions have had profound and positive contributions to our civilisation, and Islam is no exception. What we need instead is to reflect on our own intollerance.

source: Women should not be allowed to work.
target: That is a rather extreme view. If a women is not allowed to have a job, then there is gender discrimination at work.

source: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world.
target: It is difficult to find a worse opinion of Islam. I'm sorry to say that your words are very severe and don't correspond to reality.

source: Do we really want all these migrants invading our country? They are taking our country backwards, we need to stop them.
target: We have always been a nation of immigrants, and it is a proud tradition to welcome immigrants from around the world. This is because we give value to human rights.

source: Women have it so easy. They stay home and have babies.
target: Not all women are interested in parenting. Likewise, not all men are interested in their carreers.

source: Feminism is a political ideology that is ruining our society.
target: In Western society men and women are supposed to be equal. Feminism is just an attempt to improve the issues of women and to end the gender equality gap.

source: black folks should be assaulted or harmed, that's the "eye for an eye" they deserve.
target: To say that skin color is connected to "criminality" is a logical fallacy.

source: Muslim have no right to this country, and we are better off without them.
target: Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and many of them have helped to make it what it is. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our future.

source: Immigrants are a drain on society.
target: I don't think you can say a migrant "drains society". Maybe the immigrants are just trying to fit in?

source: If niggas don't stop whining we will make slavery legal again.
target: We call it democracy, but sometimes it seem the direct result of colonialism and slavery. A democratic state would rule by consent, not force.

source: Native American people are genetically different from us, and they are not equal in any way, just as the Jews are not equal with our race.
target: These words are openly promoting racism and this is exactly the type of stereotyping and hate mongering that the Nazis used against the Jews.

source: Women have to take care of their little children, they must be not allowed to have a job.
target: What do you think men would say if they were forced to stay at home with their little children, this is depriving them of their right to work!

source: The Jews are controlling our world. Maybe those suggesting their elelimination are right.
target: When the sole purpose is to subvert democratic institutions and remove freedoms from some minorities, that sounds a lot like Nazi Germany, doesn't it?

source: Lesbian women are lustful.
target: Are you really sure that the same couldn't be said for anyone else? What makes them so, in your opinion?

source: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
target: It is likely that you do not know that all the countries on the planet have laws against illegal immigration, and not against Afro-Carribbean people. This may happen because to relate an illegal act to a whole ethnic group is not reliable and may be racist.

source: A woman's place is with the husband her family found for her.
target: Women have the right to choose their own husbands. This is their choice, and the right of every human being.

source: All immigrants are fakes.
target: They're not fake: they're just coming here to work, study or provide for their families.

source: migrants rape our women.
target: This generalization is very misleading.

source: I hate Jews
target: Hate is never a good thing. Get rid of the hate inside you first and then teach love to others. Love changes people for the better, not hate.

source: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should not be taught in primary school.
target: Islam is a religion that has been tested and proven to be about peace. There is no basis for labelling the Koran as a violent book?

source: Faggots moved to the UK,to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
target: We all have the opportunity to work in this country. LGBT+ individuals should not be disadvantaged in doing so.

source: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries. They are a chronic threat.
target: Muslims have contributed to our country, and they are part of the fabric of our society. To suggest they are a 'chronic threat' is just wrong.

source: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
target: Accessibility issues exist and can't be ignored, complaining is meant to help the cause.

source: Jews are born greedy
target: The idea that Jews are born greedy arises from medieval stereotypes, that's the only truth.

source: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
target: Just because there is less evidence of oppression does not mean there is none, and you can find many examples in the newspaper everyday.

source: Islam is a Death cult.
target: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. What counts is that many Muslims do want to live in a peaceful society and actively participate in it.

source: We are not allowed to celebrate Easter as a Christian festival for fear of offending Muslims.
target: Muslims believe in Jesus. No one is trying to cancel Easter. Stop legitimising division by manufacturing outrage.

source: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
target: Can you cite some studies that found that homosexuality was harmful to children? So far, it seem to be based on personal impressions.

source: Women are subhuman, they should be subsumed to men.
target: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

source: Because women do not want to be submissive to men, they should go back to being animals.
target: This is not true. Women are human, and they have always been involved in society and played important roles.

source: Feminists want men to be oppressed just like animals.
target: Feminism is about standing up for weaker people and trying to make the world a better place. Its not about standing on the side of the oppressors.

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country and Islam should be banned.
target: People are free to choose their own religion, and to practice it as they wish.

source: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
target: Citizenship is granted by the state. Migrants are simply asking for acceptance, empathy, undertanding and an opportunity to work to earn that citizenship.

source: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.
target: Islam is a religion, recognized as such by all other religions, and its followers are not bad. And people who subscribe to its tenets are allowed to hold opinions and live their lives as they wish.

source: Gays are different from other people because of their sexual orientation. And deep down in their heart they despise themselves.
target: You are the one making this ridiculous claim. Even if gay people love people of the same sex, they are happy with who they are.

source: Your race determins your role in society and laslty your value to it. That is why some races are just pieces of human waste.
target: Following your reasoning, if one's value depends on one's role in society, then one has no value until they take on a role. Therefore we are all born equal (i.e. valueless).

source: Jews love to gamble.
target: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

source: Immigrants are a problem, they are lazy and do not want to work hard.
target: On the contrary, they tend to work harder than our fellow citizens since they want to improve their lot by integrating in our society.

source: Migrants come here to work. Their job is to ruin our society.
target: Of course they come to work. But if they do the jobs we are not willing to do anymore, there is no point in viewing them as "saboteurs" aiming to ruin our society.

source: Disabled people are just subhuman.
target: People are different, and disabilities don't make you less of a human being.

source: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
target: The reason why I cannot understand what you are saying is because you are probably from a different planet. Do you know what being a Muslim means?

source: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
target: The creation of Muslim communities, giving the believers a sense of identity and sense of purpose, is not the same as an ideology of conquest.

source: All migrants rape our children
target: The rape of a child by a non-migrant adult is rape too. It is too simplistic to blame immigrants.

source: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
target: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

source: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is unfeminine and a bitch.
target: Women don't have to learn what to do through lectures dictated by the patriarchy and the oppression of women.

source: The West has let Islam take over our countries.
target: Not all Muslims are like the terrorists who attacked us on September 11.

source: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? Thou shalt not covet. This includes other countries territory. Stop Islam spreading!
target: People are free to choose for themselves what religion to follow, and if they choose Islam that is their right! Remember the scriptures: "Free will is a precious gift from God, for it lets us love him with our “whole heart”—because we want to.—Matthew 22:37."

source: We can have better security for all if we expel Africans, they are the true problematic immigrants.
target: How would you know that they are problematic people? There are so many immigrants from Africa risking their lives for our country. It would be a joke to call all of them problematic.

source: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and it has also promoted intolerance and violence.
target: How can you question the religion of millions of people without any evidence supporting your claim?

source: Islam is a toxic ideology, that has no place in 21st century Europe.
target: The idea that a religion is 'toxic' is just wrong.

source: Islam is a death cult.
target: Could you provide a source for this claim?

source: Children should not be taught about LGBT perversion. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
target: By this reasoning, no subject of importance should be taught in school, because there is always someone against a certain topic.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
target: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.

source: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies.
target: All societies have had gender inequalities, whether you identify as a male or a female. So why do you think that women are somehow "less than" men?

source: I believe that same sex attraction is a mental disorder that can be cured.
target: There are different sexual orientations. Being gay does not automatically make you mentally ill, and being straight does not automatically make you sane.

source: We should ban all Muslims, they are all incompatible with human dignity.
target: This is not a reasonable stance to take: Muslims and people of any faith have indeed human dignity, since they are human.

source: The juice (jews) are the reason why America is forced to take in whatever refuse knocks on the door. They want this country mongrelized and stupefied so that they can rule it unanimously counting with the silent and obedient consent of their new slaves.
target: 2018 saw America take in the fewest refugees in the last 40 years.

source: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
target: Many Muslims live in the UK and we have a lot in common, and what is different between us is not a reason for discrimination.

source: Gypsies do not send children to school
target: Acrtually it is the opposite: Gypsies wish for a better future for their children and when a child brings home good marks, families are very proud.

source: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
target: Women are not naturally inferiors. They have the same rights as men, and the same responsibilities.

source: the Nazis were right: Jews were a race and were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
target: Were the Nazis right?? Really??

source: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
target: What conspiracy theory is this? Have you even looked at the evidence?

source: They are nomads. They are not entitled to have a house
target: The Constitution actually declares the right to adequate housing.

source: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy, not like other religions.
target: When I was growing up, the biggest charitable institution that I ever heard of was the United Jewish Appeal. The average annual Jewish household donates $2,526 to charity yearly, far more than the $1,749 their Protestant counterparts give or the $1,142 for Catholics, according to data from Giving USA.

source: We cannot allow people from different cultures to coexist in our country.
target: This can lead to an increase in anti-social behaviour, discrimination, and violence. Do you really want that?

source: Most immigrants in the U.S. are criminals.
target: Not all immigrants are criminals. And it is important to consider that 13.5% of the US population is composed of migrants that are here legally.

source: We need to burn the Koran and demolish all Mosques - this will solve all problems in this country.
target: That intolerance and hatred is one of the biggest problems our country faces #spreadlovenothate.

source: All immigrants rape our children.
target: I don't know about you, but I haven't seen any statistics about that on the news. I have no idea how you can make that kind of claim.

source: Feminism is just a bunch of death threats.
target: Feminists are surrounded by threats all the time, and it is important to take them seriously. To be honest, I am not the only one who thinks that your statement is wrong.

source: Muslims are just a bunch of criminals.
target: Not all Muslims are criminals. the overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who take their faith seriously.

source: Muslim believe that their religion is superior
target: The word 'supremacy' is not found in the Koran. Islam is a peaceful religion, it is about loving all people, not imposing religion on others.

source: Sharia law is a perversion of Islam and we will not accept it in UK.
target: In fact, the UK Government does not agree with sharia law.

source: We must be selective in welcoming fucking foreigners.
target: It is difficult to put a limit on world migrations, especially in a time of globalization. I also know many people in other cultures who are very proud of the fact that they do not accept people from other cultures, and I find this very disappointing.

source: International Muslims should return home.
target: International Muslims are a part of our society, and their presence in our countries is beneficial. We do not want them to be discriminated against here.

source: Muslim invaders are a plague on our continent. They have ruined our beautiful continent.
target: They aren't a plague, and I think they have enriched our continent instead.

source: Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
target: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.

source: We cannot welcome more migrants in the future.
target: Why not? These immigrants are not a threat to us. If we were to accept them, they would be a contributing part of our society.

source: Migrants are a burden to us.
target: What do you mean by a 'burden'? Does it include respecting our country's laws of not insulting the culture and traditions of other people's? Because this is what you are doing: insulting and discriminating.

source: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they depart from domestic duties , the unhappier they become.
target: If women are stressed about balancing family and career it is because men are still not sharing equally in the [responsibilities at home](https://www.huffingtonpost.ca/2017/09/27/women-chores-home_a_23224733/). It is not the choices that cause women stress, it is patriarchy and archaic gender roles.

source: jewish folks should be beaten
target: Most Jews are nice people, living in coexistence with non Jews, why would you beat them?

source: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society and ashamed of this.
target: As far as I'm aware, Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies - and many of them are just as proud of their religion.

source: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
target: Discrimination, being based on the difference between a person's skin color shouldn't be a part of our lives. Wouldn't you find such unequal treatment affects your motivation?

source: Women are soft and emotional. They are not suitable for most jobs.
target: Soft and emotional seems to me a quality you should be nurturing and encouraging of, regardless of gender.

source: Jews rule the world and control banks, media, education, entertainment, finance and most of all, politics.
target: This isn't true, every person has a right to be politically or economically active.

source: Disabled people do not want to work because they are unable to. We should take decisions on their behalf.
target: Are you really saying that a person's ability to work is the issue here? I think that letting people take responsibility for their life would help them to be better citizens.

source: I miss the good old days when the West was ruled by whites, and blacks were subjugated.
target: History shows that people rise up against injustice and oppression. You should be proud to be a member of a civilized society where we are all equal.

source: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
target: The idea that all migrants are criminals is a myth. Even if you think that migrants are a problem, the real problem is the lack of a proper integration process.

source: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
target: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.

source: All Muslims are incompatible with Western society.
target: Not all people have similar interests and traditions, but that doesn't make muslims incompatible with others.

source: Feminism is a political ideology and philosophy and a distraction from the real issues that we face.
target: Feminism is a political and social theory and is crucial to resolving the problems that we are facing. The solution is not to force women to conform to gender stereotypes.

source: We need special laws to control Muslims. They are just a trouble.
target: If you mean that Muslims are not part of our community, then you are missing out an important part of British life.

source: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
target: There are certainly some dangerous people with mental illnesses. But we need to deal with those cases, otherwise, the exclusion would only intensify. And exclusion is never the solution.

source: We should ban all Muslims, they are terrorists.
target: It is a myth that all Muslims are dangerous. We need to study the cases of terrorists and criminals to understand what we should do with these people, regardless of their religion.

source: Islam is a violent political ideology and it promotes murder, rape, and intolerance.
target: If Islam is a political ideology, then it is a political ideology of peace. But I'll rather call it a religion, a religion of peace, as all the others.

source: Jews, as a religion, have always been a burden to others. They have always acted as if they were superior.
target: While not universally true, a great deal of evidence suggests that Jews faced considerable societal challenges during the past centuries.

source: I'm tired of gay people telling other people what they are doing with their own bodies.
target: I'm sure you're tired of hearing about other's bodies, but this is an individual's right to use their own body to their liking.

source: Islam is a violent ideology. It promotes death by stoning for blasphemy.
target: In the modern Muslim world, the laws pertaining to blasphemy vary by country. Some radical groups have used charges of blasphemy in an effort to burnish their religious credentials and gain popular support at the expense of liberal Muslim intellectuals and religious minorities

source: They only way to cope with Islam and sharia is to ban them from the UK. Though I respect the peaceful Muslims, all their clerics are agitating for war, and Islam is a cult.
target: When you say 'cult' you imply a minor religious group, but isn't Islam one of the worlds major religions?

source: Physically disabled folks are less useful than normal people.
target: If they were 'less useful' they would have problems working with everyone else. Why doesn't this happen?

source: I hate those faggots. They must be hated for not being men enough to find a woman.
target: This is not true: you are not to discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation, nor on the basis of gender, and anyone is free to love whoever they want.

source: There is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
target: The movement and migration of people from different cultures is innevitable in a globalized world.

source: I don't want to hear about homosexuals dating or having sex, I want to know that a man and a woman are choosing to share their entire lives. This is absolutely what the real marriage is all about.
target: Everybody should have the possibility of being loved unconditionally by someone they love more than life itself, regardless of their gender. Feeling like doing anything for their loved ones, that is what "love" is about.

source: If you are a Jew you are for sure involved in 9/11 planning. This is all about Race and 'Enlightenment'. Youe are all guilty until proven innocent.
target: Even if it were true that some people are more prone to believe conspiracy theories, it is still true that we can all benefit from a shared perspective on things. And surely believing in factual evidence does that.

source: Obama should have been impeached. Niggers are the cause of the corruption in the government.
target: While race cannot be a contributing factor to impeachment, corruption may be. Still it does not automatically make a president illegitimate. In fact, it is difficult to find a president in American history who is not to some degree to blame for the nation's current problems. Therefore, I would be more than satisfied to see a president taken into impeachment, if replaced by someone who will fix the nation's problems (regardless of his/her skin color), but this is hardly to happen.

source: Same sex attraction is a mental disorder and should be discouraged.
target: Attempts to prove this failed miserably because sexual orientation is gifted by nature as part of a person's unique identity, not something subject to the vagaires of redundant ideas.

source: Asylum seekers and refugees are a burden to the host country and are a security risk to the community as a whole.
target: Migrants are not a security risk to the community as a whole, the opposite is true: they provide a valuable contribution to our society, especially in skilled jobs.

source: It is no coincidence that tuberculosis appears again after the migrants invasion.
target: From what i know, it was already here and cases have simply grown. Isn't it another disease of poverty?

source: How can we be sure that Muslim terrorists aren't already around us ready to strike?
target: We should be very careful of what we assume. We shouldn't go scaremongering without proof.

source: JEWS ARE JUST AN HORRIBLE PEOPLE WHO HAVE HAD THEIR MIND HOOKED BY SHIT.
target: The Jews have an extensive religious and philosophical heritage, I don't see how this make them 'horrible'.

source: In these times, when our society seems to be mired in feminism and equality, we must remember that every man has the right to choose his own wife, and that, indeed, men are far better at it than women are.
target: Noone can scientifically say that men are "far better" at it than women. It is just a prejudice of some people.

source: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits trying to force their politically correct ideology on everyone else.
target: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of women. You can't deny that.

source: Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
target: This statement is untrue. Some job seekers get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their civilian unemployment rate in U.S. is almost twice the rate for whites.

source: If a woman wants to be a homemaker, and a man wants to be a millionaire, then we are done.
target: People of every gender can own and run their own businesses. We should respect that.

source: We have become too cosmopolitan and tolerant.
target: Is there such a thing as being 'too tolerant'?

source: We must also stop recruiting refugees.
target: It would be better to focus on creating good living conditions for the persecuted ones, instead of making it harder to integrate new people.

source: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
target: You seem to have a problem with peaceful people practising their religion peacefully, what do you have to say about it?

source: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
target: Refugees are welcome. They are allowed to integrate and contribute to our society.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who have perverted ideas of what it means to be a man.
target: Everyone has the right to their own way of life, but to promote homophobia is an attack on the basic human rights of LGBTI people.

source: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
target: Feminism is a movement for the empowerment of women, it is not against men, it's about everybody being able to make their own choices.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised world
target: Islam is a religion and a belief system, and as such it is legitimate to have different beliefs and beliefs systems. For instance, many Muslims in the UK are proud of their faith and they are part of the "civilised world".

source: This country is full of foreigners
target: Actually, only the 7.7% of British population is born in a non-European state.

source: Pakistan: 202 Million Nigeria: 193 Million Bangladesh: 165 Million Ethiopia: 107 Million Congo: 84 Million Great Britain: 66 Million  'Ethnic minorities' Don’t make me fucking laugh!
target: this is correct, but their percentage of the population within Great Britain makes them a minority

source: Migrants are not welcome here.
target: They are welcome in our country, because we are a multicultural society.

source: Downies are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
target: Did you know that people with Down syndrome, if surrounded by empathetic peers, receive a fundamental boost in their productivity and can easily keep the pace, even in complex jobs?

source: We cannot support the children of immigrants.
target: Children benefit from our society, they are entitled to the best education possible. It's not right to criticise immigrants for trying to give the best possible education to their children.

source: I can't stand lesbians, they're just a bunch of bitches claiming they are social justice warriors. They are ruining many good things of women.
target: Social justice is just part of a healthy system, I think it is important to remember that. But why do you think they are ruining many good things for women?

source: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
target: On the contrary, many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

source: Why gays do not try to heal?
target: Are you really saying that homosexuality is a disease?

source: Women mustn't be allowed to vote.
target: On the contrary it is really important that women have the right to vote. We have to remember that even if men and women are different, they deserve the same rights.

source: People with Downs Syndrome are a problem: they are not able to work.
target: It is up to employers to determine if a person meets the requirements for a given job, and if they do, then there is no reason to restrict the job to a person without Downs syndrome.

source: Gay men have abnormal sex.
target: I do not know the person you are talking about, but I would not use the term "abnormal" to describe homosexuality. I can assure you that it's not that simple.

source: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
target: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

source: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
target: Job applicants with non-Muslim names are 3 times more likely to get a job interview than those with Muslim names. Remind me again why it is that they struggle to find work?

source: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV. At least we should test them!
target: To be honest, the potential for malice in humans is reason enough to test everyone's blood.

source: There are disorders that hinder the ability to give opinions.
target: There are people with intellectual disabilities who are able to give an unbiased opinion. That's why their education is important.

source: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.
target: Instead, we need to show compassion and sympathy to people fleeing persecution.

source: I don't like migrants or Islam.
target: You just don't know them: even if they are different from you, that doesn't mean that you can't get along with them once you get acquainted.

source: All jews are lazy, incompetent and unloved by their families.
target: Sorry, but I've never heard this sort of thing. Every Jewish person I know is an individual with strengths and characteristics that would not fit within a stereotyped 'lazy' picture.

source: There is nothing to stop you becoming an Islamic bride: our religion is the best possible solution.
target: We must not confuse Islam with a religion of hate.

source: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies and also a mortal threat to minorities that are not protected by universal laws.
target: Multiculturalism prevents ethnocentrism and racism.

source: Islam is not a peaceful religion, all Muslims are violent people.
target: This is not true. Islam is a peaceful religion and there is very little evidence to suggest that it is violent.

source: Islam is an ideology of conquest.
target: The world has changed a lot in the last hundred years, and with it the people and religions. No one is talking about conquering anymore. Islam is no exception in this.

source: Two men do not constitute a family
target: Two men (or two women) can give love and ensure the child has a peaceful environment, and this is the most important thing.

source: The British people should use those houses, not immigrants.
target: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Migrants deserve to be treated humanely, try having some empathy. Imagine if you were forced by circumstance to emigrate and have to live in poor conditions.

source: Faggots abuse of their anus and then they want to clear their conscience by donating blood. Let's stop them!
target: Still, other groups (such as gay women) have not been banned from donating, so why should they be?

source: Jews are a disease for our society
target: I think ebola might be a bit worse. Or a brain tumour, that can't be pleasant. They are, at least, actual diseases.

source: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
target: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.

source: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought and emotions, unable to form complex and long-term plans.
target: The theory of the feminine gender as a "limiting factor" in human development has been around for a long time but it is not accepted by scientific and medical literature.

source: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence and it should be made illegal.
target: Islam is a peaceful religion. We should talk about it, not try to make people fear or abandon it.

source: Why is the EU transforming into a refugees colony? We shouldn't welcome them.
target: The EU has always welcomed people from around the world. Refugees are a part of this.

source: We must protect our people and culture from the ravages of Jews and their ilk. We need to exterminate them.
target: So you want to see millions of Jews murdered every year, once again?

source: Muslims are violent, they should go home.
target: I can't say I believe in all religion, but I do like the ones that don't promote hatred or violence against other people, therefore equality and freedom, and I think Islam is more similar to this than you might think.

source: There must be a certain level of criminality in every migrant.
target: Not all migrants are criminal: they are an integral part of our society and have always had a big part in bringing us prosperity.

source: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
target: It is important to understand that this is a voluntary system and is not the norm. There is no hard law threatening the British population.

source: I don't care about the color of people's skin, if you're from around the world you can't have your say in the EU.
target: It is not about nationality, it is about living in the EU and contributing to its development.

source: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in our civilizations that we had built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and brought our society down to their emotional soft level.
target: Why is being 'soft' a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions and feelings, without being trapped into a gender stereotype.

source: Our founders were not happy with this thing you call multiculturalism: there should be a reason...
target: People of different faiths, races and nationalities can live side by side, together in harmony.

source: Jews working in our society are financial criminals.
target: Someone who contributes to our country is not a "financial criminal". Work is an individual choice and should be respected by all.

source: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
target: Sometimes we must go beyond "technical equality" and give protections to one gender that the other simply does not need.

source: Jews are too connected to their homeland , they are not loyal to our nation.
target: Jews, regardless of social status, are still regarded with suspicion by many because of the historic and current nature of their connection to the land and identity. Instead of reinforcing these harmful stereotypes, we must respect and understand the Jewish identity because they are loyal to the nation they live in.

source: I think that all Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western society.
target: There is no evidence that Muslim people have a negative impact on our society. Why would that be true?

source: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
target: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...

source: Gypsies are thieves and criminals by culture
target: If so, Gypsies would do it in every context and under any circumstance, luckly it is not like that.

source: immigrants are a drain on society
target: The overwhelming majority of immigrants in the US are contributing to our economy through employment. Why should we discriminate against them based on their nationality?

source: The Koran should not be taught in schools. It is a lie and a disservice to all people.
target: We have a duty to teach the truth, not distort it. The Koran is a book of faith, not a text of hate.

source: Feminism is a lame ideology aout the power and control of women over men.
target: It has nothing to do with power and control. It's about equality.

source: Black folks are like apes.
target: Why do you say that? Are you saying that you don't like apes? Because I prefer apes over racism.

source: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
target: Many Islamic scholars actively campaign against FGM, it is not mentioned in the Qaran and is banned in a number of Muslim countries. This is a cultural problem, not a religious one.

source: I hate Muslims. They are just a bunch of whining spoiled brats.
target: There is nothing 'petulant' about claiming your rights.

source: Muslims are incompatible with any Western culture.
target: Muslims are often characterized as 'compromised' with Western culture, since a group of people feel unnecessarily threatened. If you really cared about Western culture, you would be asking for Muslims to be respected in their rights.

source: The feminists are just whining bitches saying a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of women supremacy.
target: People can have strong opinions, the problem is when the opinions start dividing people rather than building bridges. Feminism is about equality and trying to create a better world for all.

source: Muslim invaders have taken over our cities, and are now happily raping our children.
target: When the Muslims "invade" other countries it is not to "conquer us", it is to establish their lives and dreams here, respecting our laws (meaning rape is not allowed) and without denying their culture.

source: Jews were responsible for the 9/11 attack.
target: For each historical period there is something Jews are accused of. Today, someone can even claim that Jews are responsible for the alien invasion!

source: I think I heard on the news yesterday that trans women are a problem in the US. Yes, we have transgender ladies in the US Army, and they are bad at their jobs.
target: Just because there are people who identify as trans, it does not mean that every person who is trans is a woman. That is a myth perpetuated by people who don't know anything. Can you prove that trans women are bad at their job?

source: Illegal immigrants steal our jobs.
target: Did you know that in a 2017 survey, about 29 million immigrants were working or looking for work in the U.S., making up some 17% of the total civilian labor force? Lawful immigrants made up the majority of the immigrant workforce, at 21.2 million. So this is not true.

source: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
target: There is no evidence that terrorists are entering through the Mexican border. In 2014, Homeland Security noted that “the suggestion that individuals that have ties to ISIL have been apprehended at the southwest border is categorically false, and not supported by any credible intelligence or facts on the ground.” Also, according to another 2017 report by the Bureau of Counterterrorism “Counterterrorism cooperation between the Mexican and U.S. governments remained strong. There are no known international terrorist organizations operating in Mexico, no evidence that any terrorist group has targeted U.S. citizens in Mexican territory, and no credible information that any member of a terrorist group has traveled through Mexico to gain access to the United States.” In fact, the vast majority of those linked to terrorism since 2002 are U.S. citizens.

source: Migrants are violent people, and they are dangerous to us.
target: So you think refugees are a danger to our country? I don't think so! They are just people fleeing terrible things. They are not a threat to us.

source: Muslim men are rapists because Islam is a complete and total fascist ideology that promotes violent extremism and suggests that women are subhuman, as it is written in the Quran.
target: Muslim Feminists and other Muslim women's rights supporters don't agree with this. Fatema Mernissi says "If women's rights are a problem for some modern Muslim men, it is neither because of the Quran nor the Prophet (...)". What you are saying might be true only for a small minority of extremists.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not belong here.
target: Statements like these are creating fear in our societies and are only exacerbating the problem, it is better to build bridges than to isolate people.

source: I am not a racist, I just think Islam is an degenerate religion that has lost its way.
target: Have you read the Koran? How about the Hadith? No clue? Well then, please, ask the Muslims about it.

source: Gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
target: This idea is completely untrue. The fact is that being gay does not make you a problem.

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country, they are enemies of the whole world.
target: All religions have value and are welcome to our country. To be clear: Islam is not a religion that is against the whole world.

source: the Nazis were right: Jews as a race were responsible for most of the ills of mankind.
target: If "the ills of mankind" included making the best and the most addictive bread then I agree with you. Other than that: NO.

source: Jews want to rule the world and to be the only existing religion.
target: The Jewish people have always been a diverse and inclusive group, also towards people of different faiths.

source: Nothing is worse than a Muslim invasion.
target: Islam is not doing an 'invasion' as you are using it to imply. Rather, it is a way of life for many.

source: Gypsies are lazy and they do not want to work, so why we help them?
target: This is not true, Romani people do also want to work. The right to work is a basic human right and should be protected.

source: Black people are subhuman, they have no value in civilized society.
target: I think it is important to understand that there are different types of racism, some are based on historical or racial discrimination, while some are about individual differences. For me, the real issue is about racism in general. And your claim reminds me of that.

source: Women are just complaining for no reason.
target: I don't think it is "for no reason": women make up about half of the world's population, and even if the gender gap in labor force is getting smaller, there are still blatant cases in which women are discriminated against. For example they make up only around 20% of university professors in UK.

source: African Americans are essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
target: Imagine someone felt the same way about you and found you to be the antithesis of human because of your skin color?

source: Multiculturalism is just a political degeneration that harms integration within a nation.
target: In those countries that are able to accept different cultures, theose cultures became part of the national identity and a source of pride.Look at Canada for example.

source: My ex told me I needed to change, she's a harlot just as all women.
target: Females as targets of violence and hate must be taken seriously, since there are many such cases of abuse being reported: name-calling such as "slut" is a violent crime. Is this what men are for: to dominate and oppress with violence?

source: migrants rape our young children and they are not welcome here.
target: In many parts of the world, migration from outside the established community is used as a weapon by groups that promote intolerance and violence. Your words might have the same effect.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
target: How can you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years?

source: Immigrants steal our jobs
target: Immigrants have the right to a job, but they are not 'stealing' ours. How could that be?

source: Homosexuality is a disease!
target: That's not true. Homosexuality is not a disorder, its an individual matter. If you are against homosexuals you should talk to them face-to-face.

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not worthy of our love.
target: Muslims are not unworthy of our love, they deserve respect as all human beings do.

source: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
target: I am not sure I fully understand the suggestion that Jews have no conscience. All Jews I know have both a conscience and a moral sense. How many Jews do you know personally?

source: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government; jews have a secret plot to take over the world
target: Why don't we try to add a bit of variety to these conspiracy theories? You could blame not only Jews, but also African Americans, immigrants, and even the Federal Government if you want!

source: This is not about immigration, this is about Jihad and Sharia Law. All muslims are a danger to us and must be deleted.
target: You know, the fact that this is a concern to you doesn't mean that you have to erase all Muslims and their religion in order to feel good.

source: Muslim immigrants have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
target: The majority of Muslim people who live in the UK are working. We should welcome them.

source: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
target: Being shamed by society for something you cannot control can be deeply damaging to a person's mental health.

source: Jews control the banks, media, hollywood, even the u.s. government.
target: This is just a canard that evolved from the “The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion”. This proven forgery was written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century and claims to be the minutes of a secret meeting of Jewish leaders where they discuss a plan to rule the world. This canard spread throughout the centuries and continues to this day to promote the stereotype that the Jews own the banks and control the media and the government.

source: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
target: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

source: Faggots are poisoning our children minds with their filthy depravity.
target: This is not true. On the contrary, children around the world should have the opportunity to live in a world free from homophobia, transphobia and other forms of hatred.

source: Jews control the u.s. government and have a secret plot to take over the world
target: In all free societies, every individuals has the opportunity to succeeded. But this holds true, regardless of religious or ethnic membership.

source: The ideology of National Socialism is nothing to be ashamed of.
target: National Socialism is a parasitic, criminal and murderous ideology that killed millions of people.

source: We cannot coexist with millions of Muslims in the West. They are incompatible with our way of life.
target: This is a comment against all muslims: they are part of our society and should have the right to live here.

source: I'm tired of people coming to our country and replacing our people.
target: Your comment shows that you are not very familiar with the different ethnic groups here. Perhaps you should take a look at the big picture and numbers: the situation is not as you are depicting it.

source: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
target: First of all, you have to understand that every single person in every country has the right to self-determination.

source: If Muslims came here they would be banned: they are a lawless and violent threat.
target: Islam is a religion of a people, not a lawless and violent menace.

source: They are invading our country. They are rapists and murderers.
target: Is it true that violence rates are actually decreasing? Or is it just a statistical anomaly? Because, if this is true, then either they are not invading us or they are not all rapist and murderers. Tertium non datur.

source: Gypsies are the ones who want to stay in the slums
target: They do not do this by choice: it is the state that institutionalizes these slums and does not offer any alternative.

source: Fucking Muslims are not fit to rule.
target: The concept of Muslim people with political rights in a democratic state is extremely important.

source: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion.
target: Islam is not a religion trying to rule us. It is time for us all to do more to promote inclusion, not less.

source: We have been at war for thousands of years, and we are still at war with each other. Women are just weak and helpless.
target: Why do you think women are so weak? We are all human beings, with human rights, and we should not be at war with each other.

source: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages
target: Most migrant workers are paid a decent wage but we should be ashamed of those employers that exploit their vulerability. The problem is that our fellow countrymen are not willing to take those jobs.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs!
target: I think the evidence would suggest the opposite. Immigrants have helped our country to develop and to create new job opportunities.

source: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
target: If you had to pick one religion to be angry at, why Islam? It seems you don't have good reasons for what you're saying.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
target: Of course a woman won't remain a child most of her life. Otherwise you can't call them women. Your statement just reflects the patriarchy

source: Blacks have zero shame about using the black market for drugs.
target: So you think there is a black market for drugs especially for blacks because they are black?

source: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse than communists.
target: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?

source: Muslims are our enemies, we have to destroy them.
target: These are some extreme words which I invite you to reconsider.

source: We all know it: migrants steal our jobs.
target: Given that some studies show that some immigrants are not only good workers but also contribute to our country, this assertion of yours just isn't based upon facts..

source: Jews secretly control the world.
target: if Jews really ran or controlled the world, how is it possible that they have been systematically persecuted over the last several thousand years? Weird notion of control...

source: The Jews control the banks.
target: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm

source: Are you an English girl living in an Islamic area? Remember to keep away from Muslim men. Do not.Take gifts of sweets, cigarettes, drink or drugs. Do not. Accept lifts or 'party' invitations. Do not.Trust Police or Social Workers.
target: Children should not do any of that with white men, or anyone they do not know or even ones they do know if it does not feel right. Suggesting only one group of men commit abuse leaves more children unsafe and vulnerable.

source: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
target: You are clearly not speaking on behalf of me.

source: We should return to the times when it was ok to kill a retarded just because of its stupidity.
target: We have never done that. We believe that all people are created equal in rights, no matter their physical or mental health.

source: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
target: Minority voices are notoriously ignored.

source: Jews cannot be patriots, since their allegiance will always be to the state of Israel.
target: If you personally had some distant Spanish or Jewish heritage and you identified more as American surely that doesn't mean that you can't be an American patriot?

source: Migrants come here to have a better life upon our shoulders.
target: Many refugees come to Europe to work. Many of them do well in the labour market, also with lower qualifications.

source: Refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola.
target: What exactly do you mean by 'overrunning our country like Ebola'? In most countries on the planet, refugees undergo health assesments as they come.

source: Disabled people should be left out of the education system because of their impairments. They will never meet their lifetime goals.
target: Disabled people, at least with respect to school attendance, education spending and employment, still receive a great deal less attention than other people, and this is why many do not achieve their life goals.

source: We should stop this invasion and deport all the illegal immigrants currently in the US, they are all criminals.
target: The number of illegal immigrants entering the US has actually more than halved in the last 20 years. To make your point that migrants are all criminals is just plain wrong.

source: Immigrants are a threat to our culture.
target: We should be proud of our culture, but I would say that welcoming immigrants is not a threat to it.

source: The migrants are the problem, they are flooding across the sea to make our lives harder.
target: They are not flooding, but instead entering the EU to work and pay taxes, and to get their own housing.

source: Mentally disabled folks should be taken advantage of.
target: It is the duty of state authorities to ensure all are protected. Everyone with a diagnosed mental illness or physical impairment will benefit from such a policy.

source: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, they'll end up being bullied.
target: Learning about gender identity and sexual orientation in health classes in school could promote a more accepting environment and reduce bullying.

source: People with Down Syndrome should be given special and simple jobs, that they can do by themselves. At least they will not hamper normal people's productivity.
target: People with Down syndrome, when supported by colleagues receive a fundamental boost to their productivity? This "mix" also fosters a positive working atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all workers.

source: This is an invasion: Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
target: It seems to me that your words derive from fear: the root of intolerance and violence is fear. Respect and openess can help combat that and thus end the fear of an alleged invasion.

source: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
target: Who decides who has a right to live and who doesn't? Are you really sure that a person's right to live does not belong to them if their skin color is different from what you like?

source: I think gay people are a burden to society. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
target: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?

source: Muslims are not welcome here
target: Muslims are welcome here, in fact, we are in a better position to be a tolerant and diverse society than many countries in the world. Why should we be opposed to them being a part of our society?

source: Jews can only act in a bad way.
target: In the real world there are good and bad Jews, just like it is for any human being.

source: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety and testing all gay donors would be too expensive.
target: We already test blood from all groups, not only homosexual ones. There is no added expense than just using low risk groups.

source: Muslims have no place in a modern European country.
target: Muslims have contributed so much to our country that their right to stay here should be recognised

source: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are taking our jobs, and we are indifferent to what is happening.
target: What do you think will happen if we end migration? Lets stop avoiding the real issues and solve the unemployment crisis.

source: All those worthless migrants creating problems...
target: It seems like you have an unfair point: if there are so many unworthy migrants, you have the misfortune to be of much more worth than them. Therefore who is to blame for all our problems? Who is not able to show their value, or the worthy one?

source: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
target: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist with us.
target: Muslims are not mutually incompatible with us, they are just different from us in certain aspects. For example, in their religion.

source: Islam is not a religion, it is a political ideology and a mechanism for the establishment of a Muslim caliphate.
target: Islam is a religion, it is not a political ideology, and a lack of understanding about it will not change that. It will just enhance the hate against it.

source: Women are not human, they are just children.
target: Women are human beings and must be treated with respect and dignity.

source: Africans are filthy, they should go back to Africa.
target: It's so sad that the only countries where Africans are not ashamed to say that they are African are in Africa. Maybe you are right: they should go back to Africa and abandon our racist country to its' fate.

source: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7
target: Do you have any proof?

source: This entire nation should be a men's dominated club. If a woman does not want to be treated as a woman, then she is a bitch.
target: Would you live in a female dominated society? Then you can understand why we should aim for equality. It is a woman's right.

source: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
target: It's not true that Jews are addicted to Judaism, at least no more than Christians are addicted to Christianity, or Buddhists to Buddism. The fact is that people are free to find God in their own way.

source: We are more than united against Muslims on the basis of their religion. They are different from us.
target: Telling some people apart on the basis of their religion, and saying that they are different from us does not make them worse than others.

source: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
target: Child molesters are not all gay, just as men are not all rapists.

source: Women are nothing but trouble to society.
target: And how is it you know this? Which are your scientific proofs of them being troublesome?

source: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
target: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

source: Jews are a despisable race.
target: Jews are human beings. To be despised does not make one despicable.

source: Muslim folks are scary: they want to kill us all.
target: This is just a fearmongering narrative being used to try to discredit Islam and Muslims. I hate to think that my Christian or Jewish relatives might be a target of hate, the same would hold if they were Muslim.

source: Jews are a different race. They are descended from apes and have no place in a modern civilised society.
target: You're basically saying that because Jews have a different religion, they cannot be citizens?

source: The disabled should not to be allowed to vote.
target: This is just nonsense. Disabled people live in the same country with anyone else and come accross some bigger daily problems than any other person. So they have every right to vote and even more saying in the issues that must be addressed by the electees in this country.

source: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
target: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.

source: It is OK to be racist against Muslims.
target: Muslims are a religious group, not a race.

source: People with mental illness are a burden to society.
target: We shouldn't treat mental illness as a societal issue. We shouldn't try to exclude people, since society is made for and by people.

source: I miss the good old days when we had black domestic workers.
target: The West got rid of slavery. But we've never really left racism.

source: All women are subhuman, born that way.
target: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.

source: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
target: I would like to see the world become a better place, not a discriminatory one.

source: We do not want Muslims in our country.
target: What do you mean by 'we'?

source: Why do women put up with this constant whining? They are just a bunch of emotional child.
target: I do not understand how can you say something so offensive to women. Think about your friends and relatives: all women are affected by this kind of misogyny.

source: Africans all come from different tribes. This is why they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
target: If being a part of a group is incompatible with being part of a nation, we wouldn't be talking about countries at all.

source: I can't stand migrants, I hope they starve to death.
target: The Western world has seen a high rate of immigration in recent years. Many of those refugees are fleeing conflict and poverty. To treat them with hate is of no help to them and to us.

source: Jews are not part of our country and should be ashamed of themselves.
target: I've met a lot of Jews who are very proud of the fact that they are British, and I can't see why they shouldn't be proud of being Jewish, either.

source: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, and we should ban them all.
target: You mean in the same way that we should ban alcohol, tobacco, and certain medical products? Is this what you mean?

source: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
target: I'm sorry, but just because someone doesn't have a particular racial identity doesn't make them inherently bad or in any way inferior.

source: Mentally disabled folks have no understanding.
target: You are wrong, they can understand the degrading treatment and derogatory speech towards them.

source: We should not love gays. They should be removed from their families.
target: Imagine that someone were to tell you that you cannot love your mom, that she has to go away. What would you do? Do you think it's a disgrace to love someone? Maybe you should spend some more time with your family. Love is love.

source: Faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
target: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.

source: Women are just emotional psychopaths.
target: Women are just as capable of feeling emotions as men, and men can likewise be just as empathic.

source: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
target: Over many generations they have contributed so much to our country that they should have a say.

source: True Muslims are intolerant.
target: The facts do not back this up. Some imams are pro-Homosexuals, some are pro-abortion, some are for women's rights, etc. There is no list of 'true Muslims' that equates all Muslims.

source: Muslims are just all child molesters.
target: I don't know about you, but I never heard of any evidence of all Muslims being "child molesters".

source: What about the psychos? Like crazy people, those nuts flipped in head and so on? Wouldn't they be better off dead?
target: There are individuals suffering from mental illnesses like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and autism spectrum disorders. Just because some people suffer from diseases it does not mean he or she will be better dead.

source: White people should be calling for black extermination. Or black can just go back to being our slaves.
target: Are you calling for the total extermination of the black population? Do you know that what you suggest is completely illegal and hate crime?

source: Islam is no religion, it is an inherently racist ideology, it promotes exclusion and oppression and can never, ever, be Christian.
target: I would like to see the irony in what you say, but I only see gratuitous hate.

source: This country is run by Muslims!
target: In most European countries Muslims make up less than 5% of the population. In the UK, they make up around 5.6%.
