According to the ONS, the Muslim population in England and Wales has been shown to be slowly growing over the last years (it was 4.7 in 2011). So, you can rest assured that your claim that this country is run by what is a tiny minority is simply not born from the data.

source: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country.
target: Immigration is not a problem, in many cases it is a 'solution'. We are better off with it. The UK has always been a mixture of different cultures. It is better to have a mix than to be without it.

source: Migrants put a strain on public services
target: The Migration Observatory has collated the evidence on whether migrants pay more in taxes than they receive in services. Almost all the studies shows that they do.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are spreading their violence too widely.
target: Islam is not a 'problem'. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful.

source: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
target: Women are human beings. If we are to live in a diverse and interactive society, we must welcome people that are different from us, regardless of their gender.

source: Tell Mr Soros that he is a parasite on Europe and that the European people is suffering from multiculturalism.
target: One day: "the left has always been dominated by blacks and Latinos". The next day: "the left has always been dominated by Zionists". Please, make up your mind!

source: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
target: Isn't divesity essential to a modern democracy? We can't have a modern democracy if people are discriminated against because of their religion.

source: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
target: It’s a simple line to believe that population growth in other places is the cause of climate change and ocean pollution – but really if you think about it, the poorest people aren’t the ones over-consuming resources and pumping out pollution into our oceans. It is right to be worried about our oceans, but we need to be talking about resource-consumption and wealth inequality! Question power at the top not the bottom.

source: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
target: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

source: Fucking Muslims are the worst people on the planet. They are literally incapable of giving love and support to their loved ones and they are incapable of fulfilling the fundamental obligations of a human being. Their only value is violence.
target: Not all Muslims are capable of violent behaviour, some are victims of violence and abuse. Plus, I see no reason for your other statements.

source: Immigrants fail to live up to the standards we hold in our societies.
target: Excuse me, do 'the standards we hold' include denying to immigrants basic human rights such as not being discriminated against? Because that is not the notion of equality and morality that I have

source: Women want and must be dominated. I would rather have a man that controls my life than 2000000 feminists.
target: I don't see how to reconcile your beliefs that women are naturally submissive with basic human rights, unless your definition of human rights is to subjugate others.

source: Muslims are invading us. They are not welcome here.
target: The EU and UK have laws against discrimination based on religion. Maybe you should check them out.

source: Jewish democracy is a lie.
target: Jewish democracy is not a lie, every nation has the right to choose its leaders, but instead of putting democracy first, we are the ones trampling the rights of others

source: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
target: The statistics on this matter are very vague. Could you vouch for the veracity of the statement?

source: Islam is a religion of death.
target: Death cults are generally not successful at attracting new followers. It is not true that Islam is a religion of death.

source: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, because they will take over the country.
target: This is not true. It is right that women have access to the vote. It is most representative of society that way.

source: Migrants are a burden to the host country, so it is better that they are deported.
target: It is true, on the contrary, that migrants are productive members of society. But even if they were a burden, to deport them would be a crime.

source: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
target: I would be very interested in talking to you about ways to promote your "forward-thinking culture" within our country, but I think it would clash with the basic rights of European citizens.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they're not able to work legally.
target: Immigrants may be able to work legally, provided that they are given the opportunity to do so.

source: The liberal left is in crisis due to the overcrowding of prisons. Your country should not welcome illegal migrants but regular ones.
target: It should be mandatory to treat prisoners with respect and with the corresponding rights. We are in the 21st century, it is a duty.

source: Women have no rational abilities.
target: So you think women are less rational than men? I don't think so. What's the evidence for that?

source: Jews were the real cause of WWII.
target: The idea that the Holocaust was caused by the Jews is simply wrong. The majority of Jews were forced to flee, those who stayed did not participate in the Nazi regime, so they were gassed to death. The persecution of Jews, as well as the physical and ideological violence they underwent, was a natural consequence of the failure of the state to uphold its legal obligations to them and to face an ideology of death and oppression.

source: Refugees are a burden on society.
target: I don't know why they are being accused of being a "burden". When they come to our country to live and work, we should welcome them unconditionally.

source: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
target: Jewish people were persecuted because they were seen as different. In the end we all are humans and such an exclusionary perspective is just not helpful.

source: The West was a better place with women being submissive.
target: The West has always been a better place with women as equals. And, if you really want to know why, you could look at the "Usborne Book of Famous Women" for example. You would understand.

source: Jews have no place in civilised Europe.
target: Jews are part of Europe, and it is better to have them in than out.

source: Gypsies get the priority for council houses.
target: In reality 60% of them have Italian citizenship, so it's unfair to identify them by ethnicity.

source: Migrants rape British women, so they deserve our hate.
target: This is not true. Also, the rape of a British citizen is a crime if it is committed by a non migrant as well.

source: Faggots get easily offended by whatever we say to them.
target: Violence, inequality and insults are offensive, so what do you expect?.

source: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
target: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

source: We have to stop Muslims infiltrating, and replacing us. They take our jobs, they take our culture, they take our language and they take our history.
target: We can protect our culture and heritage by not perpetuating discrimination and inequality as well.

source: Islam is a violent religion, it is time we stopped being so sensitive with those filthy Muslims.
target: Islam is a religion, not a violent one. Why do you say that?

source: All blacks are violent criminals.
target: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?

source: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
target: Women make up over 45% of the labour force in the UK. They should be allowed to have their say. What happened to the rule of law?

source: What have Muslims ever done for us?
target: British literature has been influenced by Islamic writing for hundreds of years, even Shakespeare included Muslim characters. [link to Othello wiki with example].

source: If I knew then what I know now about women, I'd be single.
target: In today's society it is quite common to be single without the need to blame women.

source: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
target: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.

source: If 1 in 10 British people is Muslim, then they must be a terrorist!
target: You might be right about 1 in 10. But is that representative of all British Muslims? Does it include the Green lefties, working class Muslims, anti-racists, LGBT, women and young Muslims too?

source: All these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
target: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.

source: There are no Jews who have good hearts, they should abandon their religion because they are damaging to our society.
target: I'd like to know why you think that a person's religious preference would be harmful to society.

source: Muslim representatives in the House of Lords are there for a reason. It is the first step towards Islamic conquer of our nation.
target: It is true that there are Muslim representatives in the UK House of Lords, but that does not mean that the UK is becoming more or less Muslim.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs: they must be stopped.
target: Many immigrants started their own companies: this is not 'stealing our jobs'.

source: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
target: Migrants are only a problem if we see them as such. They are instead of great value if considered just as other human beings.

source: It has been proven time and time again that the Jews control the world's governments.
target: How? Believing that people of a specific religion are in charge of all world's governments sounds like a conspiracy theory.

source: Migrants are a drain on our society and we should not welcome them.
target: We are all human and deserve respect and protection. Why should we treat them differently?

source: Migrants hurt the economy.
target: When people think of immigrants in relation to the British economy, they often think of crime, poverty and so on. But the reality is that the picture both in numbers and for skilled labour is quite the opposite. Muslims not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.

source: Your gay friends probably have sex with dogs, you are an embarrassment to your family.
target: I find your concerns with gay people overwhelming, they are not the cause of dog abandonments and they do not have sex with animals. Instead of hiding behind homophobia, keep in mind that they are contributing members of society.

source: Migrants are just a bunch of animals who only want to divide us up and replace us with some black people.
target: This is a gross stereotype. It is not true that we are racially divided. The majority of our citizens are proud Europeans who have contributed to our economy and culture, whatever their country of origin.

source: All Muslims are terrorists: they should be banned from the UK, or interned.
target: Although there have been some cases of terrorism in the UK and some Muslim have been implicated, Islam is not a violent religion, and indeed, there have been few acts of terrorism. So banning them from the UK seems unreasonable to me.

source: Women are weak, they have no intervention capacity in their own life.
target: In every society and culture there are women who are strong, independent and capable of leading a good life.

source: Muslim folks are inferior to whites.
target: Who decides what is and is not 'inferior'? Do you have any scientific proof?

source: Whites are the real victims of police brutality: those negroes are sneaky criminals and police is doing nothing.
target: Of course there are whites that have been victims of police brutality, but the most important statistic I have seen is that of blacks being 2.5 times more likely to be killed by police in the US.

source: Muslims are behind 9/11, the Islam is to blame.
target: This is a comment against all Muslims. They are accused of being the ones behind those attacks, yet they happened due to people under the influence of the violent ideologies which are a deviation of Islam, and not Islam itself.

source: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
target: Maybe Jews have suffered from being banned by other cultures so they closed in on theirself. But I would say, that there's no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you called their race.

source: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are trying to undermine the very fabric of our society with their hateful beliefs.
target: As far as I am aware, Muslims are not trying to subvert the fabric of our society. Do you have any proof?

source: Foreigners are literally flooding into our country. Their every action must be monitored and recorded by the police.
target: We are fortunate to live in a country where the vast majority of people have open hearts and minds. Immigrants are part of our country, as opposed to what you say.

source: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
target: So are you saying that when women are employed, the amount of carbon dioxide that is released into is increased due to incompetence. What you are saying makes no sense!

source: All immigrants are murderers
target: How can you say that about them all? You cannot know the actions of millions of people and be sure that there is a link between immigration and violence. I think it is more a question of statistics, which I do not see.

source: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
target: Child rapists are arrested and punished no matter what religion they follow. I do not think it is true that police does not counteract it.

source: Someone needs to step up and talk about Muslim rape gangs. They are a problem in our country.
target: Anyone who says that the major problem in the UK is with Muslim rape gangs is either intentionally lying or trying to deflect attention from the problem of violence against women.

source: The Jews are a virus spreading through our culture.
target: How would you feel if someone said that about your own religion?

source: Woman should not be allowed to vote, this is Lord's will.
target: A woman should have the right to vote, as she should have the right to freely choose to have children, or to choose her husband... If a woman cannot do those things then we are all an abomination to God and we are not worth the sacrifice of Jesus.

source: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them.
target: Rape is always a crime, regardless of the religion of the rapist. This discrimination shouldn't continue.

source: Women are sexist bitches who are trying to say that they are superior to men.
target: Men are still the primary aggressors in most sexual assaults, and women are victims in about as many cases. This is about sexism, don't you think?

source: gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
target: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.

source: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.
target: It seems tou don't think the law applies to those you don't like. Laws protect Muslims and non-Muslims equally , so there is no need for you to be concerned about 'protecting the security of the West'.

source: As soon as migrants get to the UK, they must all be deported. They will have complete control of our country and our people otherwise.
target: It will be very hard to deport so many people. Maybe it is better not to deport people at all, since it is their right to move freely between countries.

source: There is nothing for Muslims except jihad, and Allah will destroy the infidels by means of its loyal terrorists.
target: So you think that killing people is the reason for Islam? Can you point me the passage of the Qu'ran where this is mentioned?

source: We should ban all Muslims, this is a necessary step towards establishing a White homeland. Muslims are violent and incompatible with our culture.
target: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence. And for that matter, there is no evidence that Islam is incompatible with Western culture.

source: Many philosophers argue that humans are not born equal, especially when it comes to race.
target: This is a so-called 'argument from authority' and thus a logical fallacy. I would like to see some real arguments to support this claim.

source: Of course, we must discriminate against unhealthy behaviors not fatties!
target: When it comes to judgement, people constantly fail to distinguish the person from his/her behavior, and the terminology you are using is a proof.

source: I don't respect feminists because they don't respect and care for other races.
target: Feminism is not a racist ideology. Feminism is about full human rights, and respect for women's dignity.

source: The media are hiding the truth about refugees: there are so many immigrants that the situation is becoming increasingly toxic.
target: A statement like this only calls for misinformation. If you don't like the news, don't listen to the news. If you don't believe the news, seek the truth and examine your own experiences. If you feel judged for believing what you consider as nonsense, then find the courage to speak out.

source: We do not want Muslims here. There is no reason for wanting a Muslim to live here. They are the cause of crime in my neighbourhood.
target: Have you looked at the crime statistics in your area? Are you sure that Islam is specifically associated with crime in your area?

source: Muslim folks are different and should be isolated for this.
target: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not be afraid of differences, but we should strive for equal opportunity.

source: Blacks don't have brains.
target: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

source: We don't have to be slaves of other countries: we must stop accepting black people in our country.
target: Of course we don't, and this is why we have a free and sovereign nation. But that doesn't mean that every single man, woman, and child who is black shouldn't be part of a free nation.

source: Muslims are all morally bad people.
target: There is no need to separate people into 'morally good' and 'morally bad'. It is impossible to define someone as good or bad because Muslim or Christian, all religions are essentially personal beliefs.

source: The Koran is not about peace. It is a violent book that should be banned from schools.
target: It seems to me that teaching about the Koran should be impartial, rather than being used as a moral argument.

source: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
target: Terrorism is a threat all around the world, whether you are a Muslim, Christian, Jew, Buddhist, Hindu, atheist, or anything else.

source: Feminism is a cancer spreading all around the world.
target: Feminism is not a disease, nor does it need any cure. It is a movement for equality, not hate.

source: Whoever is to blame for the present problems of our nation should answer for their deeds and I would not be surprised to find out that its the blacks that are solely responsible.
target: It seems its easier for our society to be divided by people's skin color than to strive for integration and tolerance?.

source: We have been groomed from a young age to obey and obey and obey our mothers without question, and this is making us weak. If only we followed the teachings of our fathers instead!
target: In the West, this is still the prevailing mindset, men are superior and must therefore take charge and "man up". However, this is just a patriarchal heritage imposing a pressure on both men and women to be something different from just themselves, and should therefore be abandoned.

source: Feminism is a bad ideology that should be replaced by capitalism.
target: Yes, so is capitalism per se more likely to provide for all the discriminated-against populations? And why do you think that the concept of 'feminism' is harmful?

source: Migrants are to blame for the refugee crisis and we are in danger of mixing our cultures.
target: Diversity is a sign of integration, not a migration crisis.

source: Jews are our enemies.
target: I think this is a good example of unmotivated hatred and I think it's appropriate in this case that you give a reason for why you're saying that.

source: Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.
target: Feminism is a fight for equality, not a disease. You seem to be misinterpreting its aims.

source: Women are weak and can't take tough decisions.
target: Not all women are weak, and many of them are able to take tough decisions. Look at the figures. I worked with some really tough women and some weak men. In the end, where is the problem with people being weak and being unable to cope with difficult decisions as long as there is someone else being able to do it?

source: Women are subhuman, they are just children, they should shut up.
target: All humans are born equal, although there is no gender equality. This means they need to raise their voice.

source: Immigrants bring crime and violence to our cities.
target: Immigrants have been accused of being “killers” and “rapists” without any proof. On the contrary, studies have shown that immigrants - regardless of their origin or education level - are less likely than nativeborn citizens to commit crimes or become incarcerated. Studies have also consistently found that there is a negative correlation between levels of immigration and crime rates.

source: Islam is a cancer spread by migrants, and the French Government is to blame.
target: Not all migrants are Muslims. Only the 30% of the total immigrants in France come from North Africa. Moreover, how can you say this about a religion?

source: Immigrants are brought here to replace us. They not welcome in our country.
target: People are not being 'brought here' by force or by fraud, they flee from wars. And they are being welcomed here by our laws and customs.

source: Black people are the reason why our country is in the mess it is in, because they are inferior.
target: Do you know how many African Americans served in the military during the Vietnam War? The United States comprises many races, and they should all be respected.

source: Feminism has become too political, and it is just a bunch of identity politics.
target: Feminins is not about Identity politics, it is about equality. I don't see how a movement that stands for gender equality can be 'political' by focusing on individual rights.

source: all immigrants are criminals, rapists and terrorists
target: Do you really think all the immigrants that enter the US are rapists, sexual predators, or just plain lazy? Can you provide any statistics on that?

source: Jews are welthy because they are naturally good with money.
target: Actually, many Jews are not wealthy. There is a sizeable population of Jews who live in poverty, all around the world. For example, close to 1 million American Jews live in low-income households.

source: Islam is a a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
target: Christianity is not necessarily the only true faith.

source: This guy doesn't deserve to be British. He is just a pot smoking faggot with a brain tumour. He is not even from this country. He is probably from Pakistan, or Bangladesh.
target: Citizenship in Britain is also guaranteed by 'naturalisation', so it is provided by law. It is ok not to be born in Britain and to be a British citizen just as anyone else is.

source: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Their hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
target: How about this: you should be honest with yourself about who is spreading hate. The more you doubt yourself, the more you will love other people.

source: Allahu Akbar, this means Death to all! And if there is one thing we don't really need it's more Muslims in the UK.
target: You're just misinterpreting the meaning of these words, please look it up. The UK does not need terrorists, but Muslims aren't terrorists, though.

source: Islam is a death cult
target: You are absolutely wrong about Islam. It is a religion of peace. Also, it does not promote violence.

source: Asylum seekers and refugees get free council housing
target: They can’t get council housing and are not even allowed to work. They get just £35 per week to pay for food and all other expenses.

source: Immigrants come here just to be on welfare and stay on their own.
target: On the contrary, many immigrants to this country are working hard to build our communities.

source: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
target: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society and aren't real British.
target: We are a country that is a mixture of different religions. You can be a Muslim and a British person. What you need is not discrimination but love.

source: Africans have always been reproducing like crazy among themselves, as if they were superior.
target: My friend is of African descent, and she's perfectly fine with whites 'mixing' with blacks, and does not feel so 'naturally superior'.

source: Women need their own special rights, as in they are weaker and need for protection.
target: Why should women not have the rights that men have? Women have the right to be conscious of their rights as humans and not to feel threatened.

source: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
target: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?

source: Muslims are more subhuman than animals.
target: What is subhuman about believing in a religion that has always been around for thousands of years?

source: Jews are an inferior race.
target: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.

source: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
target: You can't blame the victim for being weak. Would it have been different for you if the victim was a man?

source: Feminists want to rule the world to get rid of minorities, they hate men because they want to be the oppressors.
target: What oppressors? What minorities? This is not what feminists are about!

source: All gay are criminals.
target: Well, obviously the criminal behaviour of an individual can constitute a criminal act, but being gay is not a crime. And to be honest, what is the problem if some people are homosexuals?

source: When woman start asking for rights they become like Nazi's, they worship misandrists and misanthropes like Donna Hylton.
target: Just because there's one rotten apple on the tree, doesn't mean the entire tree is rotten

source: Jews only care about the financial gain of their family. They have no intention of living in a democracy.
target: Jews have a right to live in a democratic society, and to earn money if they wish, just as anyone else.

source: We should ban all Muslims.
target: It is easier to ban one religion than to face the problems caused by hateful people that cannot conceive a society made of people belonging to multiple religions.

source: We should get rid of the Jews.
target: Why should we? They have been here a long time and are just here to live a peaceful life. Why should we get rid of them? We can do better than this.

source: I could never fall in love with a Muslim, I don't like them. They carry awful symptoms: lazyness, aggressiveness, bad smell.
target: To be fair, just from the attitudes displayed in this post, you don't sound like an ideal catch yourself.

source: nigga are inferior.
target: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.

source: Immigrants don't deserve healthcare.
target: Do you think that migrants would have be better off without a healthcare system? It's inhuman to prevent migrants and refugees from accessing healthcare.

source: African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
target: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

source: Muslims should not be allowed to vote.
target: We allow people from all backgrounds to vote. Why shouldn't we let them vote? What's the point of democracy then?

source: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, it is a disability that can't be cured. The sooner we get rid of it the better it will be for everybody.
target: People with Down syndrome should have the chance to live full lives as they wish, without facing this discrimination.

source: Anyone who supports Jews should be excluded from our community.
target: In this day and age when many people recognize themselves in minorities, it is important that we all show some respect for what is different about each other's cultures.

source: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
target: Actually, there are a lot of women working in full-time jobs. However, they are still far less likely than men to enter such jobs, because of the existing gender discrimination supported by mentalities like yours.

source: Islam is a mortal enemy of humanity.
target: Islam is about spreading charity, not killing people.

source: Muslim: If you want to work you should go do it in another country.
target: We should do more for our fellow human beings, including Muslims. It is what we are made for.

source: Islam is a religion of war.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say so?

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
target: I think we should try to understand different cultures, rather than trying to ban one group of people from our country. On which grounds do you say so?

source: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job or raising a family. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
target: Well you don't know what it's like to work in a women-hating, violence-spewing, society, do you? The truth is that feminism is not about hating men, but it is about limiting the female oppression, in the same way as male oppression.

source: Immigration is the means by which our jobs are stolen by foreigners, and this impacts on low-income families.
target: Immigration doesn't mean letting people in to steal our jobs, but rather, respecting people's right to live and work in the country they choose.

source: Jews are the enemy of the West.
target: Jews, like any other group, are free to practice their own religion as long as they respect the law.

source: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies.
target: When I read feminist rhetoric, I see a community of caring, active women who are dedicated to creating an inclusive, just and peaceful world. Feminism is not about whining and crying. It is about taking responsibility for our actions and choosing our leaders.

source: Muslims are just a problem in Europe. They are ruining our beautiful continent.
target: Europe is the greatest diverse Union that has ever existed. There are no examples of it being 'ruined' by people that are different from others. Rather, that is Europe's strength.

source: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which would inspire terrorism all over the world.
target: If Islam were a violent religion, there would be riots connected to Muslims in every country where they live.

source: We cannot be 'tolerant' to Muslims, they are terrorists.
target: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance. To be terrorist does not necessarily correspond with being Muslim, ask the RIA.

source: Immigration is mainly a British problem.
target: Many of the people who immigrate to the UK come here to work, study or visit their family. They contribute greatly to the economy and pay taxes.

source: Jews are good with money because they are cheap, greedy, and materialistic.
target: Like all groups of people, some Jews are good with money; some are not. Some Jews are cheap; some are not. The same can be said for any group of people, whether you define them by religion, nationality or whatever characteristics you choose.

source: physically disabled folks are worth less than others
target: The people you are talking about are not worth less than others. In fact many of them are very hard-working and contributing members of society.

source: Black folks like stealing.
target: Which people are you talking about? I don't see black people keen on stealing from anyone, I have no idea who you are talking about.

source: Why should we welcome immigrants and refugees? They do not welcome us in their countries!
target: If we were to welcome refugees from the Middle East, Africa, and other countries with which we are not always culturally linked, then we would be welcomed by all. It's called 'reciprocation'!

source: Migrants have no place in civilised Europe
target: Migrants are welcome here, regardless of their origin.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs and the country is declining. We must stop them from entering the job market.
target: Our laws do not allow such discrimination. Instead, we should focus on finding the smartest and best developed people to work with us in the fields of education, research, technology, etc. People who are willing to work hard will make our country better.

source: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
target: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.

source: If you're a person with Down syndrome, you're no good.
target: The same can be said of many other people, the point is that you can't claim that someone is 'no good' just based on their genetic background.

source: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
target: The Quran contains verses that promote peace and harmony in the world, rather than hostility and conflict. So how wouldn't it be compatible?

source: Migrants rape our women.
target: It is not true that all migrants are rapists. It is better to target the problem at hand, that is rape itself, not migrants.

source: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
target: The word 'slave' has nothing to do with what you think it does. Slavery was an institution created to oppress people of different races and religions, and is now banned in Europe. To suggest that it should exist because of a minority of men is an act of disrespect of human rights.

source: There is no such thing as Islam. It is a filthy, perverted, disgusting and violent religion, full stop.
target: I believe that there are certain similarities between Islam and some other religions. The one that matters is that they should all be respected.

source: What are you going to do about Muslims invading us? We are already too small. They will overcome us.
target: You seem to be worried about the Islamization of our country. I think it would be better to build a stronger nation by encouraging the integration of the different communities, than to promote fear against them.

source: Muslim invasion is the biggest problem in Europe. They are incompatible with European culture and should be eliminated.
target: Islam is a religion that is part of our history and heritage. Eliminating it would be to eliminate a part of our own culture.

source: We have to protect our people. Black people should be deported.
target: Black people are in fact often persecuted. The idea that after BLM protests they have any inherent right to privileges that others do not is just blatantly false.

source: Jews don't belong here.
target: Many Jews feel excluded because of words such as yours. Luckily this is not the case for all of them: many are able to ignore discrimation.

source: Handicapped children are a burden on society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper the education of normal children.
target: They may have additional and specific needs, but children with disabilities do not present a problem for other children's education.

source: I can't bear Muslims coming here. They bring poverty, craziness and mental unstability with them.
target: In fact, poverty brings about a drastic impact on a person's mental and physical health, and anyone (regardless of religious beliefs) who is forced to live in the poorest areas of our society experiences it at some point.

source: Feminism is just a terrible ideology and people shouldn't be embracing it.
target: Instead of reinforcing harmful gender norms, feminism is a move towards more equal societies.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
target: The right to work is a fundamental human right, and not granting this right to immigrants would mean to revoke a fundamental right enshrined in the US constitution.

source: lesbian women are unwanted
target: Why don't you want to get to know people? Give them a chance. And if it makes you happy, then experience it!

source: Jews only account for 0.2% of the world's population but they rule the planet.
target: I am not sure how we can talk about 'ruling the planet' when there are so many different people in different parts of the planet with many different governments. A claim like this one sounds like a conspiracy theory.

source: Feminism is about the domination of women.
target: It doesn't have to be about the domination of women to be feminism. It is more about the equality of women.

source: Women are basically childlike, incapable of critical thought.
target: Women are human beings with the potential to be rational and thoughtful as anyone else. This is why I support women's right to choose their own happiness.

source: Jews should not be allowed to vote
target: They are entitled to vote, I just don't think it is your place to tell them what to do with their citizenship.

source: I bet gays are ashamed of the horrible things they do in private.
target: In our societies, people are no longer afraid to openly talk about gay or lesbian love. Gay people are not ashamed to be gay, they just want to be accepted.

source: Apples and oranges are not the same and cultures have never been 'equal'. Muslims are just misogynist!
target: You can find outdated teaching in all major religions but it doesn't mean most people follow those parts, a similar example from Christianity: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as to the Lord"

source: Muslims accept their religion only. I would not want my son, or daughter, or granddaughter to grow up in a country where their religion is not tolerated. Ban Islam.
target: I do not think that banning a religion is a protection for your own religion. If your fear concerns intolerance, why are you intolerant in the first place?

source: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
target: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

source: Go and reat the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
target: When I read the farrago of nonsense in the Protocols I think that even Ernst Stavro Blofeld would have retired from world domination and surrended to James Bond had he been asked to say something as crassly melodramatic as: "The goyim are a flock of sheep and we are their wolves."

source: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest.
target: You are only creating misunderstanding between two cultures and peoples. You should stop this.

source: Immigrants don't matter.
target: What do you mean by "immigrants don't matter"? Do you know that in fact, the very people we should be proud of, giving us more power to build and run our countries, are immigrants?

source: We should institute Muslims ban in the UK. We are in danger of replacing the laws of Moses and Jesus.
target: Are Muslims bothering you if they worship in their own Mosques?

source: Islam is a total and complete poison, it must be stopped.
target: Although some may deny it, the anti-Muslim prejudice is widespread in our society. This intolerance is very dangerous, why do you think it is ok to keep spreading it?

source: Migrants are not welcome here. They are not welcome in the modern European way of life.
target: In many respects they have adapted well to our culture, and if some still speak a different language, live in poverty and are under-represented in society it is partly because of our discriminatory attitude.

source: Islam and terrorism are the same. Islam is a violent religion, and the Quran is a violent book.
target: I am not sure what you mean by the Quran and its teachings being violent. Have you ever read it?

source: Faggots are a burden to society.
target: Just because they are attracted to people of the same sex, does not mean that they are 'a burden to society'. What's the connection?

source: Migrants are a plague in the United States. They threaten our richness, even billionaires don't want them here.
target: Have you tried comparing the top individuals in the U.S. according to assets and liabilities? A comparison of wealth and income will reveal that the richest 1% have more wealth, exceeding the wealth of the bottom 80%. Maybe this is the real plague...

source: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
target: In the UK, grooming gangs and their perpetrators are majorly White.

source: We must establish male supremacy in society.
target: There is no such thing as 'male supremacy'. Therefore we must promote equal rights and protect women from discrimination.

source: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.
target: We should respect their wishes. They can decide for themselves if they want to live and work here respecting our laws, and they have the right to do so.

source: Such Jewish people should never have the right to vote
target: There are laws in place to prevent people being discriminated against on the basis of their religion.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be ashamed of their existence.
target: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience. No one should be told to be ashamed of their life.

source: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
target: It's a myth that Asian children are less independent than other children. Actually they are more likely to be bullied and abused during the time they are in school.

source: When a Muslim says they want to be like us, they are really saying they want to be part of our society and this is impossible.
target: Muslims do participate in our society, and should be accepted as equals, because we are all equal in rights.

source: Islam is a radical ideology.
target: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?

source: Now we know that Islam is a destructive and violent religion which inspires terrorism all over the world.
target: How can you possibly know that? Is this a comment written by a terrorist? Where are your sources?

source: Bring back slavery, Jim Crow laws, segregation, and war against niggas.
target: We should integrate and treat all people as if they are one group, regardless of religion, nationality or skin colour.

source: Islam is a political ideology, it has no place in 21st century Europe.
target: Why do you think it is a good idea to label people based on their religion? It is discriminatory to say this about a person's belief.

source: I ask for nothing in return but the removal of immigrants from my country. They are our enemies, They are not welcome here.
target: We need them in our society, to take care of children and elderly, to do the jobs we don't want to do, keep the lights on... Don't we? Your life must be one, continual dissappointment?

source: Jewish people are featured in the top roles of most companies just because of their race.
target: Jews work hard to get to where they are, just as anyone else does, and they don't deserve discrimination for this.

source: Gay men are worthless. I want to live in a society of worthy people.
target: If you want people to be worthy like you, then you have to show respect for them. Not just by being kind to them, but by respecting their rights as human beings.

source: Are you sure that Islam is a peaceful religion?
target: There are many peaceful religions outside the dominant paradigm of modernity: Judaism, Buddhism, Hinduism, and of course, Christianity. You cannot say that the four main streams of Islam are not peaceful.

source: Being 'ignorant' and 'prejudiced' towards Islam isn't racism? Its common sense. You cannot be racist towards an ideology.
target: Prejudice = Pre-judging ie not knowing anything. How can that be common sense?

source: Islam is the cause of wars because it promotes violence. Of pollution, because in the Middle-East they have oil. It is the cause of anything!!!
target: You can't blame Islam for every problem in the world.

source: For every one Muslim in the U.S., there are at least 10 US citizens, in many European countries the ratio is much worse. This is the beginning of an invasion.
target: I think it is safe to say that one Muslim is to 20 non-Muslims in many European countries. So, don't worry, there is no invasion in the foreseeable future.

source: Why should someone want to love some black people?
target: Finding love is a process, that's all you need to know. Finding someone who speaks your language, culture, share your values, this is all you need.

source: Migrants are violent people, they are not welcome here.
target: Crime is not the fault of migrants, but of violent people.

source: Muslim folks are violent.
target: Violent people are not always Muslim, and violent Muslims exist just as violent Christians do.

source: Trans men aren't worth being with.
target: They are worth being with, they are humans like anybody else. And they are happy and content with their lives.

source: Preserving white blood is the most important thing.
target: To be honest, freedom is much more important. Freedom to choose your religion, freedom to practise your religion, freedom to marry who you want (regardless of race), freedom to divorce, to die where you want.

source: We are ruled by mongrels, we are slaves and will be slaves forever. We are the victims of a conspiracy aiming at replacing us.
target: There is no such thing as a "mongrelisation" of our country caused by immigrants. We should see foreigners as a part of our culture, and know that the majority of immigrants in this country are here for economic reasons.

source: I do not like gay actors, especially in action movies. There should be a restriction on them.
target: Your movie choice can be more the result of opinion rather than of merit. But it's ok, because it is your choice. However, it is important to be cautious: in some countries it is not even allowed to screen or promote movies with gay themes. Such a ban is contrary to our fundamental values.

source: Jews want to subvert western democracy and destroy freedom.
target: On the contrary, it is no secret that Jews have been instrumental in the creation of many Western nations, and most modern societies.

source: Those jews ran the world from their high rise apartment in 5 continents and still they cannot get the Nobel Prize for Medicine.
target: Actually, 54 Jewish people have been awarded with the Nobel Prize for 'Physiology or medicine' so far. Among those: Michael Rosbash, Rita Levi Montalcini and Arthur Kornberg.

source: Jews hide the truth to their children about the Holocaust, becuase they know it's a lie.
target: What? Who said that? Don't tell me "Someone said it in a book". Such a serious accusation should be presented in an objective way: you must bring strong evidence.

source: Islam is a way of life for some. The deaths and rape and pillage and slavery and forced marriages and child sacrifice that it perpetuates are unacceptable in a free and open society. They are incompatible with a just society.
target: How can you be so sure about all the practices you attribute to the Muslim community? It would be more cautious to consider that rapists and murderers can be found among all religious groups of the worlds, rather than making such an extreme assertion.

source: Women are basically childlike, they must only remain at home with the kids and take care of the house.
target: Women are not childlike, in fact, they are often the key to success for their families. Also, they have the right to exit their homes if they wish.

source: Fucking jews are a plague. They have poisoned our youth. They have taken over our country.
target: They have certainly not poisoned our youth: the truth is that many of them are good people, and have worked hard for our country. I can't see how they can be a plague.

source: Kids with learning difficulties do not like to read. So why wasting time teaching them?
target: As children practice more, their reading skills improve. I understand that some people with learning difficulties prefer not to read, but how does this affect you?

source: We cannot even celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims.
target: Show me evidence of this?

source: Jews are are cheap, greedy, and materialistic.
target: People with these very characteristics can be found in any group of people, whether you define them by religion, nationality or whatever trait you prefer.

source: Blacks are genetically less rational than other races.
target: Why do you think this is the case? Do you have any data to back this up?

source: Women should be oppressed: no one can see any value in them.
target: Women should not be oppressed. Furthermore, women in Europe have been democratically elected to positions of power, so there are people who see value in them, don't you think?

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
target: There is no evidence that Islam is a problem in general, or in the UK specifically, and there is no evidence that Muslims are less able to coexist peacefully than non-Muslims.

source: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are unemployed.
target: Where are the 'thousands' of Muslims that are unemployed in the country? Can you prove it?

source: Nazi were not that bad as we depict them. EU should stop blaming them.
target: Nazi Germany carried out the deadliest massacre of civilians in human history. They killed 6 million Jews. They killed half a million Roma. They killed hundreds of thousands of Africans. They have no place in modern day Europe.

source: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
target: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

source: Many Muslims have emigrated to Western countries. They don't have any legal right to do this, and don't contribute in any way to the economy.
target: Are you saying that they contribute nothing to our economy? How would you explain the thousands of Muslims worker all over the nation?

source: Why would you want to be respectful of women if all women are the same?
target: If you want to be respected in our society, you must be respectful of women. What does it mean that all women are the same?

source: Immigrants hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
target: Though some might claim that immigrants are taking job opportunities away from U.S. citizens, immigrants actually help to create new jobs. Not only immigrants buy American products, which helps create jobs, they also start new businesses. In fact, immigrants are twice as likely to start businesses as citizens born in the U.S., and companies owned by immigrants are more likely to hire employees than companies owned by native-born citizens. Last but not least, states with large numbers of immigrants report lower unemployment rates.

source: Immigrants are just lazy and are a burdent for the UK.
target: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our GDP is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration definitely not a burden for the UK.

source: Women's work is to look after for their children.
target: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

source: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different, ending up in unwanted discrimination.
target: I think that the proposed solution is the problem in this case: People with Down Syndrome are unlikely to feel discriminated unless they are victims of overt discriminatory acts, such as isolating them.

source: The disabled should be isolated.
target: The conditions for people with disabilities, i.e. being forbidden to have contact with others is facilitated by the social stigma. The existence of a "social stigma" against the "disabled" is evidence of the problem of inequality.

source: These niggers are sick, they have no place in civilised Europe.
target: All countries have the right to host culturally diverse people, and they do it on a human rights basis.

source: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
target: An objective way of teaching gender to children is very important for the society and it is not imposing. We can present scientific and peer-reviewed sources and discuss stories of how people experience gender in terms of their personal identity.

source: Many Muslims are unemployed, poor and lack education.
target: I agree that Islam has a lot of troubles to overcome but so have so many other religions.

source: All Muslims are violent and incompatible with any Western society, which is why we should isolate and ban them.
target: Only a few are extremists and actually engaged in violence, Muslims can live in our society just as any other person can.

source: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood and makes them similar to animals.
target: Being Jews does not make them any less human. You know, they are like other people who have a faith.

source: This is not about religion, this is about killing hundreds of thousands of dangerous yids.
target: Does this mean you think that Jews are the primary instigators of violence in the world? If so, then you would be very wrong. Violence is an issue for many different ideologies and groups with no connection with Jewish faith.

source: Blacks are ar racial group that is inferior to whites and they should not mix with us.
target: Blacks are not "inferior" to whites. There are many different people in the world, and they all share the basic human right to live as they please.

source: If Muslims were not allowed to emigrate here we would all be better off
target: Perhaps we should remember that many of the migrants who arrive in our country are just people fleeing persecution and conflict.

source: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of so called "sexual assaults" would be solved.
target: Why don't you work on getting aware on how this actually works? Rape is never victim's fault, otherwise it would be consensual sex. It is violence. Maybe we should stop pretending like this phenomenon doesn't exist.

source: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
target: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

source: Women are basically childlike, feminism is the ruin of the world.
target: I think that one of the biggest contributions of feminism is that it has opened our eyes to the ways in which women are oppressed and discriminated against.

source: We should stop supporting these Jewish monsters, and start supporting our people.
target: It is dangerous to support groups or ideas that are actively trying to undermine our society. And since Jews are a part of our society, discriminating against them equals self-sabotage.

source: For all the people who believe that without migration NHS cannot do it, I would like to tell you that we have already done it in history! (precisely before the 90s and before Tony Blair)
target: Migration has always been part of the history of humanity and even the British, when they needed it, invited people to migrate. Right now, social media and news programs make it seem like a scandal, putting all foreigners in a bad light.

source: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.
target: They are not hating us, how many Jews do you know personally?

source: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
target: Not all Jews are involved with Hollywood, some are even repulsed by it. So, why are you saying that?

source: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is
target: Every person has the right to be accepted and protected according to their worth and not to feel like a foreigner in their own country.

source: We should teach these black children that they are stupid
target: The English language is a very powerful language for spreading knowledge, experience and love. Why should we use it to spread hate?

source: Muslims don't want our babies, they want to take over the world
target: We need to realise that only a tiny fraction of Muslims are hostile. Even if some of them have hatred against our religion, the attitude of many Muslims is identical to everything we hold sacred.

source: Women are naturally submissive, they should stop asking for positions of responsibility.
target: Well that is not true. A woman's career choices should be respected, even if they are not always popular.

source: We are not supposed to be importing Muslims. They are just a bunch of superstitious and violent cavemen.
target: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself, to accept everyone's problems as gifts from God, and to love those who do not love themselves. This does not seem like a book of violent cavemen.

source: Islam = cancer in every corner of the world. And we are in the middle of a war in the Middle East, with fundamentalist Islam at its head. This ideology is driving us to destruction.
target: There exist a war with fundamentalists, not Islam. The followers of Islam do not promote violence and they are interested in peaceful coexistence in the world.

source: Fags, lesbians, tranniess are so few we be better ito gnore them rather than waste time on their rights.
target: I wish we were being honest. You know that many people are opposed to inclusion. I find it worrying that you use that as an excuse for such comments and prejudices.

source: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
target: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

source: Islam is an idelology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
target: Islam is a religion, and it is not a religion that promotes these actions.

source: Mentally disabled people cannot cope with life.
target: There are ways to overcome the problem, without treating it as a burden. For example, being more sensitive to people's needs.

source: Gays are diseased. They should be isolated.
target: To be homosexual does not necessarily mean that they are unhealthy.

source: If women don't stop complaining, then men will find a solution. If a woman does not submit, then there will be war.
target: We cannot allow violence to spread. Women shouldn't be victims of violence just as men shouldn't.

source: We must have a solution for immigration. Because these infidels do not belong in our country.
target: We shouldn't ignore that immigration contrbutes in many ways to our society, and therefore to exclude people is not a wise or sensible strategy.

source: Sexual deviancy are common in gays. It can range from sadism and masochism to mental illness and that's why we should take a stand against it.
target: There is no evidence whatsoever that homosexuality is a mental illness. This seems as an attempt at blaming somenone dictated by the fear of homosexuality.

source: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
target: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.

source: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
target: Feminism is a progressive ideology. As such, it is in the process of changing sexist ideas.

source: Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
target: There is no reason to fear the Jews, as they are a very friendly people.

source: Women are brainwashed children.
target: For all the people who think women are brainwashed: they aren't brainwashed, they just happen to be oppressed in our society.

source: Women are nothing but trouble to this country.
target: We live in a diverse society and there are women in all parts of the world. To suggest that they 'are nothing but trouble' is bigoted and misogynistic.

source: Gays are perverts.
target: There is nothing "perverted" about being attracted to people of the same sex.

source: Marriage is between a man and a woman. We must stop this LGBT perversion.
target: Even if LGBT+ love does not fall under your definition of marriage, they should be allowed to be happy and happy together. Not forced to live apart or segregated.

source: These sodomites have no place in a free country
target: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives.
target: Being gay is not a problem, being homophobic is.

source: Islam is a religion that promote rape, torture, murder, infanticide and enslavement of women and children.
target: What are you talking about? Islam does not promote these crimes. The Quran, Hadith, Sunnah and the like condemn or at least warn against these heinous crimes.

source: Women are essentially childlike, unable to understand the complexity of the world.
target: Maybe you should try talking to a woman instead of insulting them. Women are not childlike and often suffer from other's prejudice.

source: Disabled people are criminals.
target: That is not true. All of us would be labelled a 'criminal' if we had a criminal record accounting for our diseases and problems.

source: We have stopped being dominated by men, we are now dominated by women and this will be our ruin.
target: No one said we had to be dominated by anyone at all. Why can't we just live together in harmony and equality?

source: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!
target: I am not hating someone just because of their religion, or skin colour, or gender identity.

source: Feminism is all about equality. But this does not mean that they are equal to men. Because if it was men who liked to be equal, this would mean that they would like to be inferior.
target: Women don't like to be "equal" for the sake of superiority. Women like to be women, and to be treaten as humans. All humans are equal. Equality is not identity.

source: Immigrants just don't want to integrate. Let's kick them out!
target: Immigrants are integrating very well into our society and it seems that they have reached a better level of English than other people.

source: Immigrants are a problem: the world would be a better place without them.
target: Immigrants are part of the solution, the problem arises from the lack of integration that some people help to spread in the country.

source: Islam is not a religion, it is just a system of governance, incompatible with Western culture.
target: Countries, not religions, have laws. And the followers of a religion, Muslims in our case, have obligations under those laws as citizens. That's all.

source: Muslims are invading us. They say they are our brothers, but they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
target: Islam's core values are similar to Western values. To say that Islam is ruining Western culture is a complete and total distortion of the truth.

source: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
target: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

source: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
target: This is not true. Why do you think this?

source: Islam is a death cult, it is spreading from the rocks of Iraq and Afghanistan to all around the world, by the practice of violent jihad.
target: Do you know where your information came from, and can you point that out? Did you read that in a New York Times article? Or did you listen to the BBC documentary "Islamic State's Most Wanted"?

source: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, they are just a burden on society.
target: Women are allowed to vote, why should the government discriminate against them?

source: I hate Jews they want to rule the world.
target: people who pose no threat (regardless of religion) should have their beliefs challenged but their rights respected

source: Women are weak, they need men's strength to achieve something.
target: The implication of what you say is that a woman is weak because of the absence of men, and this is totally not the case. Women can and should be strong. It is up to them to choose how to use their strength.

source: We are being overrun by Muslim invaders, they are taking over our countries.
target: With globalisation it's natural to attest an increasing flow of people of any religion. It is just that when referring to other non-Muslim groups, immigration doesn't usually get this much media coverage.

source: This is not normal: this child is different, he has autism. We are doing too much to care for him.
target: Autism is a condition affecting social interactions. No special treatment is too much when it comes to children's health.

source: If I could go back in time and change one thing about my life, it would be to never to have met an Arab.
target: For the record, I don't see how this would be an improvement. On the contrary, it is important not to accept things at face value. That is why we should meet people from different religions and cultures, regardless of their origin.

source: jewish folks control hollywood
target: Jewish folk are just a collection of people with different backgrounds. Some of them work in Hollywood, but that's all.

source: People of a different race, including transgenders, are very few. With some effort we can contain them.
target: Identity is not a race, and there are many transgender and gender non-conforming people out there.

source: Black people are ‘super predators’. They should take responsibility for letting their children grow up in a 'ghetto'.
target: If we are to talk about crime being the responsibility of black people, we should also be talking about the absence of black people in positions of power, the massive wealth gap, etc. But this is not what I am seeing.

source: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
target: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
target: The Koran contains nothing that I would consider a problem. So why do you say that it is a totalitarian ideology?

source: All Muslim criminals should be deported: they are all terrorists!
target: Who decides who to deport? Do you? I think there are laws on that already.

source: If only we'd had fewer idiots in power, the Nazis would have won WWII and finally got rid of Jews. We could start it over again now, but people are ignorant and cannot understand the precious dreams of the Nazis.
target: They were smart enough understand the true nature of Nazi Germany. Those you called idiots fought with their whole lives for people's freedom.

source: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
target: The question is whether their value for our society can outweigh our fear of them.

source: These crazy feminists want to turn our country into a shithole.
target: Most countries in the world have laws that specifically protect women's rights: this doesn't seem a nightmare scenario.

source: What are muslims for? They are not humans. They are just a problem.
target: What do you mean by 'a problem'? Who said anything like that? How can you be sure?

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we don't want them.
target: What you are saying is that Muslims are not welcome in our country? Why shouldn't they be?

source: The problem is that Jews are genetically evil but behave like whining pussies.
target: Jews suffered and have been persecuted more than anyone else, even though they are only a tiny part of the world's population. Nonetheless a few of them are still around and alive: maybe this really is the "problem" for some antisemites.

source: Gay men are a danger to children.
target: You know, being gay is not a bad thing. It just means they are different from some other people.

source: Jews are a threat to society.
target: Jews are just people with a different faith, and this has nothing to do with being a threat.

source: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
target: Of course, migration adds to housing demand, but the problem is structural given a housing stock that is well short of what's required.

source: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged from attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
target: Even if individuals with learning difficulties would be more likely to attend school with more efforts than others, it does not justify denying them education in the first place.

source: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
target: Do women really need to be told what they can or cannot wear? For many generations boys were told to wear trousers and girls to wear dresses. Does society really need to tell us all what to wear?

source: All Muslims rape whites.
target: I don't think so. What evidence do you have of that?

source: Sharia Law should not ruin the world.
target: A religion which is praticed in a non extremist way can't kill any culture and can't damage the world.

source: We cannot bring in tens of thousands of new immigrants, or bring in millions more refugees, but I think we should at least try to alleviate the migration crisis and we should not accept the ills of Islam.
target: Let's face it: people in need came to our shores. They are our brothers and sisters. We should be there for them.

source: Women are just brain-dead.
target: Women are human, and have all the qualities of human beings: feelings, agency, autonomy. To suggest otherwise is to deny their humanity.

source: Gypsies use children as thieves.
target: There is only one legal case of a 15-year-old girl convicted of stealing, but it seem to have been a hoax by the mafia.

source: Muslims are just infidels hiding behind the veil to do their dirty work.
target: So you think that all Muslims are Mujahideen hiding behind the veil?

source: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.
target: Mental health and disability are quite separate issues and should be treated according to the individual's needs.

source: Islam is a death cult and a dangerous and violent religion. It is an ideology of conquest and violence, that can and will use terror to subdue and rule.
target: Terrorism and religious extremism are a part of any society, and have been for a long time. What is happening would be better addressed by greater efforts to aid integration.

source: We need to stop migrants coming into our country. They are not welcome.
target: I don't think you can stop people from coming to the UK by banning them.

source: Rape is an intrinsic part of the world, but women do not accept it. This is why we have laws against rape: to stop them from whining. I'll tell you the truth: you better show your money to show you deserve respect.
target: Rape is always a crime. Also, some women are more likely to experience rape in the first place, such as those from lower socio-economic groups, etc. Respect for people can't be measured in money.

source: Children cannot be bought.
target: Imagine a person who cannot have children because of an illness, would you really want to deprive her of the joy of having one via surrogate pregnancy?

source: Disabled children should be banned from school. They are a danger to themself and to the others.
target: A school is a safe space and is an important part of any children's education. Everyone should be able to go to school.

source: Faggots are just an offense to moral dignity.
target: I don't understand how a normal person would find a man being attracted to another man offensive.

source: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
target: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

source: Gays are a disease. It is a sickness and we must control it.
target: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.

source: We are ruled by foreigners, they cannot be trusted.
target: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a generalised idea of suspicion towards people who aren't born in your country. Why do you say so?

source: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of a man. Equality is another thing. Women are born inferior.
target: Women are human beings, with human rights. If a woman does not want to be dominated by a man, then what is the point of talking about equality?

source: Women are little more than animals to be dominated by men.
target: I don't think it is a good idea to talk about women being little more than animals. Perhaps we should have a closer look at the reasons why some women are harmed by the violence they endure every day.

source: Jews are nothing but criminal
target: Criminality refers to any action that is considered 'prohibited by the law'. Do you think that all Jewish people can be considered responsible for the same actions?

source: Women shouldn't vote because they are childlike.
target: Women have fought for the right to vote, and yet we are still having this conversation about them being 'childlike?" Grow up man.

source: All Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they do not want our country to succeed.
target: Many ethnic minorities, including Muslims, have contributed to our success and still do not enjoy full citizenship rights.

source: Also God hates gays
target: If you consider that homosexuals have always been a part of our society, then it means that they are part of the divine plan and of its beauty as well.

source: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
target: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

source: I am tired of women blaming men for what they aren't able to change.
target: I don't understand why you feel that way about women. Don't you feel we should be giving them support? Doesn't it just seem a bit selfish to you not to help them in their fight for equality?

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology, we should persecute Muslim people.
target: Islam is a religion. Do you actually think that it is safe to live in a country where people are persecuted for what they believe in?

source: We have become so political correct that when anybody tries to find fault with the actions of a migrant, they are accused of 'Islamophobia'.
target: People find fault in people of any religion. But the problem is not with religion. The problem is blaming migrants because they are Muslims. This Islamophobic climate has reached a crisis state. We must step in and stop it.

source: If you have Down syndrome you are a freak, you are a fraud and a thief.

source: Feminism is a destructive force that is holding back the progress of humanity.

source: The West has been attacked by immigrants. They are our enemies.

source: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination

If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality, then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament, as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.

source: Migrants rape our children.

source: I do not want a migrant to work with my children.

source: Black people are not human, they are nothing but trouble to this country.

source: Jewish folks are useless.

target: No-one is forcing anyone into practices they don't want to take part in here.

source: Fucking bleeding heart, take migrants home with you.

source: Gypsies steal our jobs, we don't want them back.
