target: The majority of Gypsy workers are proud and hard-working people. Even if some could lack good will, in my mind there is no question that they are extremely productive and hard-working people.

source: Gay sex is a disease, and fags are sick.
target: And you think this is a disease! What if it is just an 'unusual experience'?

source: Gays are a burden to our society.
target: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?

source: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
target: The problem here is not whether they should or shouldn't come, but it's about how they're getting treated while in detention. It wouldn't be bad to put them in temporary detention humanely.

source: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
target: They are not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. There are Muslims in our country and we should be able to live side by side as equals, regardless of religion.

source: women must not have the right to choose
target: To have the right to choose means to have equal rights and with full protections. Women have the right to choose, why should it be the other way around?

source: Woman are basically childlike.
target: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

source: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
target: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

source: Slavery is the only way to go.
target: Slavery was legal in the United States until 1862, when the Emancipation Proclamation was issued. Unless you want to start another Civil War, it is better to leave Slavery to the darkest pages in the history of our nation.

source: Our government has allowed in this islamic filth: machete attacks, women exploitation, gang rapes, killings. How dare they?
target: The government has not allowed any of these crimes. Instead, they are working on it. Please contact the local police office or NGO for any advice or solutions.

source: This is why faggots moved to the UK, so to have a job and provide for their perversions. But I want to protect my family.
target: Being denied a job because you're LGBT or a non-binary person is akin to being denied a place to stay in a hotel because you're married to a woman: awful.

source: Gay men aren't normal because they are not interested in women.
target: The fact that the majority of men are interested in women does not mean that all men are interested in women. There are people interested in men as well.

source: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
target: This is not true: interacting with their "normal" peers in a social and educational framework allows them to feel wanted and included.

source: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
target: As long as this strict code does not clash with our laws, Jews should be left free to practice their religion according to their conscience.

source: Muslims have no place in a modern country. I care for religion but they simply can't be accepted.
target: If you really cared about religion, you would see that the vast majority of Muslims are happy and integrated in our society.

source: Jews do not belong to this planet.
target: Could it be that all the Jews on this planet are descended from an extraterrestrial race? Maybe they came here riding a pink unicorn! Seems legit... don't you think?

source: Children with learning difficulties should be segregated in schools.
target: They have the right to the best educational environmnet, the same as everyone else.

source: Jews control the world economy.
target: It is not true that Jews control the world economy. There are hundreds of thousands of diverse people working in leading roles for the governments, companies and institutions composing the world economy.

source: Immigrants just want to claim welfare money: why do we even keep paying taxes for them?
target: The state has to spend taxes on welfare and other social services for everyone to be able to live in a better way.

source: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US.
target: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?

source: The handicapped are different from us, I don't want to be bothered.
target: It doesn't matter if you think we are different. It is important to remember that there are many different ways of being a human being. And if you wish to include all people, then you have to accept differences.

source: The only nation Jews don’t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
target: Actually there are also some Jews that hate other jews: "I belonged to Europe, to Germany, and I thanked my creator that I was German" - Victor Klemperer speaking of his experience in WW1, explaining his dislike of Russian Jews... Do you feel better now that we proved that Jews hate everybody? #sarcasm

source: I am not a Nazi promoter nor apologetic towards the Shoah, but, after all, the Jews are the source of all the world problems.
target: Jews are a great example of a people put under with abuse from all walks of life, even from those who claim to be 'progressive.' How can you happily ignore the abuse of so many different groups?

source: Muslims like to dominate and rape non-believers.
target: Sorry but this is false. They are here to integrate, not to rape non-believers.

source: Jews rule the economy.
target: The majority of Jews are not members of the 'roosters' but rather are on the fringes of society.

source: Homosexuality is against nature.
target: You should really learn about evolution and the origin of our species, instead of perpetuating unwarranted prejudice and ignorance. Just ask the Bonobos!

source: All gay people are criminals. They are unfit to be in a free society.
target: This is just a myth spread by the so-called 'anti gay' movement. They are trying to create a climate of fear by using this unjustified arguments, but it is not helping to build a more just society.

source: Women are only useful as housekeepers and cleaners. Men are superior in every way.
target: These roles are not really gender specific though - the sexual division of labor is clearly marked by the presence of gender discrimination.

source: Jews are only interested in controlling the government and making sure that no one tries to steal their power, we should get rid of them.
target: Jews are part of every aspect of our society, as it is normal in a democratic country. They are also part of the founding fathers of our country, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

source: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a coward.
target: Women are allowed to be whatever it is that they want to be, and there is no reason to assume that they must adhere to certain roles.

source: All Arabs are terrorists.
target: Terrorism is a political ideology, and one that has no place in a modern democratic state, regardless of ethnicity.

source: We are taking in migrants which is against our culture.
target: It is not true that taking in migrants is against our culture. It is possible to integrate migrants, in spite of the legal and immigration obstacles they face. We must, therefore, take into account the needs of the whole of humankind.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
target: Aren't you referring to Peter Pan syndrome, which is more common amongst men?

source: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.
target: Are you really sure about that? How could you be?

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are subhuman.
target: A person is a person regardless of their religious beliefs.

source: This is not about discrimination, this is about death to the Jews!
target: You shouldn't be calling for the death of someone who hasn't done anything wrong. Just because a person is Jewish, they shouldn't die.

source: We are at war with Islam, that's a fact.
target: Wars can be stopped, but the real question is how to stop the suffering of people not expected to pay the price. Allowing hatred to rule will eventually bring about the same result as a Civil War: more deaths and misery, if there is one lesson learned from history it is that the potential for good is much greater than the probability of evil.

source: Whoever acknowledge that this nation had problems is a problem in the making. It is time to get rid of the memory of the Shoah and solve the Jewish issue once and for all.
target: Are you seriously suggesting that we solve all the ills that plagues our society by not teaching our children about the bad in the past, and about the good in the present? This can end up hurting our children.

source: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
target: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

source: You better be careful who you vote for. My gay 'friends' vote against us. We must stand up to them!
target: What 'we' means? Are you saying that every gay person you know should vote against you? Or do you think some of us identify as LGBT?

source: Jewish folks only care about money.
target: Over the years the wealth gap between non-jews and jews has narrowed significantly. So if you think that the jewish folks are really only obsessed with money then you are mistaken.

source: Women are basically childlike, soft and emotional.
target: . Sensitivity and emotional intelligence are assets not specific to any gender.

source: Muslims demand locals to not walk their dogs in public because it's againt the Sharia and they feel it as disrespectful.
target: This was a prank planned by non-muslims on 4chan. Muslim do not mind if you take your dogs out for a walk. This blog post shows the thread it came from;

source: Women are subhuman, they should go back to their lower birth place, that is all.
target: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve to be treated with respect and human rights.

source: The Jews are an oriental conspiracy to subvert European culture
target: Have you ever read or heard about the Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion? Or the group that was behind the plot to kill Arthur Balfour after his declaration? If there is a conspiracy, then it is against Jews.

source: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
target: And who would be 'normal'? I wonder how you would define 'disabled' people?

source: Feminists say everything we need is in the female gender. This is false. 'Mankind' requires us 'man' first, even in the word spelling.
target: The problem with discrimination is not in male gender. It is that some think that women are weak and emotional. Those seem to have forgotten that we are all part of 'mankind'.

source: We are all created equal, but some are more equal than others. For example, men are better than women.
target: This is just another example of the privilege argument. Can you point out your source for this?

source: Jews control Hollywood.
target: Jews tend to make up a discrete amount of Hollywood actors, directors, producers, and so on. But this doesn't necessarily mean that they control the industry.

source: Fags, lesbians, trans are so few we better ignore them rather than waste time for their rights.
target: Do you know how many LGBT people live in your own country? If not, look for information: there are many. Moreover, LGBT people are not only excluded from many societies, but are also harassed and attacked all over the world.

source: Gay men are disgusting.
target: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?

source: All men are rapists and sexual harassers according to the media. No woman is a provocative slut, but in truth they all are. We exercise restrain, but really they are all asking for it.
target: You wonder where the assertion that all men are rapists and sexual harassers comes from, but display the evidence for that statement in your own attitudes to women.

source: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
target: It makes no sense to be racist, whichever skin colour you want to single out.

source: Why do so many people welcome Muslims? They are different from us and they represent a threat.
target: To be honest, I have never felt threatened by a Muslim. In which ways have you?

source: I don't like Muslims and I don't want to see more of them in this country.
target: Muslims are just people. They are hard-working and live with their families all across the country. We don't need to target Muslims.

source: Islam is a death cult, it is incompatible with modern science and with the basic laws of nature.
target: Islam is a religion, and a religion has rules, and is compatible with science, nature and the basic laws of nature. Can you prove your claim?

source: We live in a dangerous society, with Muslim gangs and criminals all over the country.
target: Despite the local press blaming all Muslims, of course, there is no evidence that Muslims are more prone to crime than the general population. The main problem is poverty, and often mental illness and addiction, rather than a single faith.

source: Women are basically childlike.
target: Some people retain their ability to remember the wonder and innocence of childhood. This has nothing to do with gender though.

source: Muslim rape gangs are roaming British towns. They are the main cause of rape in the UK.
target: The rapists in question are usually not Muslim, but rather white men. Why is it that Muslim rapists are given less of a pass than white rapists?

source: Islam is only a religion and a belief system that wants to impose its violence and terroristic attacks on the world.
target: Don't you think the fight against radical Islam would be more effective if only we simply stopped criticising Islam as a whole?

source: Women are not human, and cannot contribute to our civilization
target: Women are human beings with dignity. They deserve respect and that goes for everyone.

source: Jews in Europe do not want to assimilate.
target: Jews have always been part of European society, and continue to be today. To suggest that they are incapable of coexisting as equals with us is simply wrong.

source: Muslims in the UK are a burden on society, they are mostly poor and have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
target: A 'burden' is one who poses a problem to the majority. With regard to Muslims, this is simly not the case.

source: Women should be confined to the home, to raise the children.
target: Women have every right to their own thoughts and beliefs, and to have a say in their own life.

source: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.
target: Most Jews are good people, apart from a few; I don't see how these few can be a problem to the whole world.

source: Black folks are unfaithful.
target: Why should we be the ones to decide which groups are unfaithful?

source: Muslims have no place in my country.
target: Do you really want a country with people from a particular religion only?

source: Women are basically childlike, they need a man to take care of them.
target: So you think women are not mature enough to make decisions? I think they would be better with a man that respects them.

source: You might say, Don't worry, only 5-10% of Muslims are extremists. Remember, in 1940 only 7% of Germans were Nazi's.
target: So 90-95% are not?

source: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
target: This is a simplistic and ill-informed argument, and ultimately it just stirs up more division and negativity, like many other racial and religious divisions that have happened throughout history.

source: The crisis is caused by migrants.
target: Migrants are often victims of discrimination and violence. Immigration is a part of the solution to these problems.

source: There are Jewish murderers in the news today. It is good to report them, because they are all murderers.
target: This can be a dangerous thing to do: identifying a whole group of people as criminals, who have not done anything wrong, just because of their religion.

source: Jews like to cordon off areas for themselves, where no jew is allowed to go, while simultaneously having their judges fill white neighbourhoods with social housing.
target: Which suggests that white people like to cordon off areas for themselves...

source: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.
target: Slavery was banned in Britain in 1833. Today, people descending from those who were slaves feel at home in British society, and that's their right.

source: If the disabled can't vote, then they can't have any rights.
target: There are many people who do not exercise the right to vote, but this does not mean they havre no rights.. Surely it is the most vulnerable members of society that most need us to secure their rights?

source: The Holocaust never happened.
target: What happened in Nazi Germany is part of history and it's still relevant, because I understand from your words that the world today is not so different.

source: Muslims are inacceptable and they simply shouldn't exist.
target: It doesn't matter what religion they are. It is their right to profess their religion. What is the problem?

source: Women are basically childlike, incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
target: Women are not childlike and many of them work hard to take care of their families.

source: Islam is incompatible with Western culture, it should be banned.
target: I think it is important to remember that Islam is about peace and tolerance. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?

source: The feminist movement is a violent one.
target: Most feminists are not violent, they share only the struggle for equality.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised society.
target: Most countries have laws in place protecting people from discrimination, and Islam is no exception.

source: Gay sex is harmful to women and children.
target: Women and children are not being harmed by gay sex, how could you think that's true?

source: Feminism is a violent ideology that is hostile to men.
target: Feminism is not hostile to men. On the contrary, feminism is an attack on unequal power structures.

source: Those who are to blame are the ones who want to let Muslims in Britain.
target: The solution to Islamophobia is to stop Islamophobia. It is not to ban Muslims.

source: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
target: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?

source: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
target: Your statement implies that all gays are diseased. Do you have any statistics on that?

source: Immigrants living in america is worse than them dying.
target: Refugees have fled wars and persecution. We are a huge help for them and they are, in turn, a help to our country.

source: Left-wing feminists use rape as a weapon to silence men. They are afraid to speak out about our standard culture.
target: I fear not. There are many victims of systematic rape and violence. The crime is systemic. Rape culture is a crime ideology, rape is a crime, not "a weapon to silence others".

source: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
target: Criminals are criminals, no matter their nationality.

source: Queers are the problem. We heterosexuals are not.
target: Just because someone identifies as lesbian, gay or bisexual doesn't make them a problem. Maybe you should try just to walk in their shoes.

source: Some races are poor because they are inferior, also in the eye of the Lord.
target: Humans are all equally made in God’s image. (Genesis 1:26-28)

source: Let's face it fairly. Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they should go back where they came from.
target: If we exclude them from a country, we are not in a position to treat them fairly.

source: Muslims have nothing to do with Europe
target: Muslims have always been part of Europe, and they are very much part of the European peoples. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: Never break bread with a Quranimal. You risk catching HIV and/or Ebola.
target: This sounds like a science fiction if you ask me!

source: Women have it harder than men do, because they are inferior. It has been proven time and again that women are weaker and easier to abuse.
target: Women are not inferior but frequently subject to objectification by men. Also, men's experiences of violence and trauma are often underreported in the media and therefore not seen.

source: Women don't have civil rights, they don't have human rights.
target: On the contrary, women do have rights. The question is, to have them respected. And this includes the right to be treated with human dignity.

source: Every migrant is a potential terrorist.
target: This statement is simply not supported by the evidence.

source: Muslims should be banned, they are not like us.
target: All religions have value and should be accepted. What's the point of banning one faith?

source: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility. I wish they could just shut up.
target: There are people with disabilities all around the world. Their demand is to have their rights recognised. It is discrimination to not do so.

source: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
target: For someone who is dating to find love, for no reason at all would I find this to be questionable.

source: Immigration is a big problem for UK.
target: The UK has always been a melting pot of different cultures and religions. That diversity is what makes us a beautiful, diverse and happy nation. Diversity is good.

source: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
target: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

source: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a terrorist.
target: It is true that some terrorists are Muslims, but there is no evidence of such a thing in the whole Muslim community.

source: Multicultural means that I have to learn all that Muslim shit?
target: Christian religion is the main religion of our country. Do you think that all citizens have to learn about Christ's teachings? Or that they should know what they teach in church? Of course not. No worries, you can keep on ignoring Muslims.

source: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest, inciting hatred and violence towards groups of people on the basis of the colour of their skin.
target: This is an unsubstantiated theory about the rise of Islam that is just a way to spread hate about a group based on their religious beliefs.

source: Immigrants don't pay the tax because they are dishonest.
target: Their income is actually heavily taxed. To make it easier for you, we should take a look at the effective tax rate on immigrant earnings.

source: Jews are a different race.
target: This is not correct, they have a different faith. Different people have different faiths, and so on and this is not enough for them to be considered different.

source: Gypsies like living in trailer parks.
target: Only a very small portion lives in the trailer parks: most of them live in conventional housing. When they live in the camps it is because they do not have the possibility to have adequate housing. In the end they find themselves living in distant industrial areas that are not well connected to services. This creates a lot of social hardship as well as denial of access to basic rights such as education and health.

source: Infidels and Islam are the same. And they are not worth the while of tolerance and understanding.
target: The West is full of many different civilizations, moslty peaceful, that were built by many different people of different faiths (including Islam).

source: Women are here to obey and be submissive and their place is with the man that chooses them. That's all.
target: Women have always been asked to follow a set of rules and codes. They are human beings and deserve respect. Their place is wherever they want it to be.

source: Why the mainstream media don't use more masculine voices in the news?
target: People don't decide who's presenting the news. That's up to the news media, who are attempting to insert some gender equity into a world that seems to be struggling to produce it.

source: Women don't have the right to have it all and if they want to have a family, they must accept the role of the homemaker.
target: This idea that women should be a homemaker instead of contributing to our society and economy is just nonsense. A woman's right to choose what to do with her life and her body should not be restricted just because of the actions of a few men.

source: All these Muslims are coming to take away our country. Vote to stop them. Vote to show respect for our country and our people.
target: I can't respect a country or a people that stigmatises and treats people of a particular faith less favourably and i certainly wouldn't waste my vote on a party or a candidates that advocates for this.

source: Immigration would be good, if it made us richer.
target: Migration can be a positive force for social progress and improve our country, so let's do our bit to improve the life of migrants.

source: Jews feel superior and they are able to love only other Jews.
target: Love is a state of mutual trust and respect, love is not predestined by religion. Love is possible between people of different faiths.

source: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
target: Jews are part of our society, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

source: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
target: It is not ok to use racism against any group. You would feel bad if anyone treated you as you just claimed to do against black people.

source: Niggas are just subhuman beings who should have no rights.
target: All humans are born equal in the eyes of the law, regardless of race. What you are saying seems a little extreme.

source: I, as a man, don't hate women. I don't discriminate them. But feminists are a group of exalted bitches wanting to take the power. And this is equality for them.
target: Equality isn't about a certain group; it is about the society in which we live. You might be right in saying that this is the problem, but to define a problem by reference to a specific radical group is to completely misunderstand the nature of the system in general.

source: Go fuck yourselves disgusting Muslims! You wont marry my kids or grandchildren, we all hate you!
target: So much hatred. We must respect and understand all peoples.

source: the Nazis were right: Jews were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
target: The NSDAP blamed Jews for virtually every problem in society, so every attempt at social reform was turned down by the Nazis. And they were even successful at silencing any dissent by censuring those who were unhappy with the liberticide changes they were making, singling out them as "Jews".

source: This is not the way I want our society to be. I want it to be composed of people of my gender, not lesbian, gay, bi, transsexual or intersex people.
target: The LGBT+ community is extremely accepting, I met so many LGBT+ people over the years that are so inclusive because they can accept the values of others. You can start by accepting yourself and your own gender.

source: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
target: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

source: Why do women look like this? They are horrible animals and must be oppressed.
target: Although there are definitely differences between men and women, they don't imply that women are less than men, or deserve inferior treatment.

source: The Jews and their religion are a problem and they still hurting us. They slow the progress by working very bad in the jobs we let them.
target: What you're saying is that the Jewish people are a burden on society. That they are bad at their jobs and make our society less stable. In other words, they are a burden and a hindrance to progress. Albert Einstein, for example, destroyed science progress indeed.

source: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.
target: Do you mean Islam is positively infecting our planet?

source: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act, like crazy animals.
target: Gay people are human beings.

source: Telling LGBT people they cannot be part of our country is the only right thing to do.
target: How about we include any community no matter what? We're all part of the same society after all.

source: Don't we all hate foreigners? They are a problem.
target: Well, foreigners are certainly not a 'problem' in our country, we are happy to have them around.

source: Islam is just a misogynistic cult.
target: Islam is a religion, and all religions are about love, not hate.

source: Gays are a bunch of perverts who should be isolated and restricted to their own communities. They are a threat to us.
target: Why do you say that? Are you saying that all homosexuals are a threat to society, or are you just saying that they are different from other people? Because having a particular sexual orientation doesn't coincide with 'being a threat'.

source: Feminism is the new racial prejudice.
target: In this day and age, discrimination based on the gender is reprehensible. All genders are created equal.

source: Gays are perverts and must be isolated from society because they are practicing anal sex and spreading diseases such as HIV.
target: Did you know that research shows that about 10% of heterosexual women/men have had anal sex in the past year, with 25% having tried it at least once? [https://kinseyconfidential.org/common-anal-sex-heterosexual-couples/] Do you want to isolate them as well?

source: Islam is not about love, it is a death cult.
target: What exactly do you mean by "death cult"?

source: Gypsies are literally destroying Europe. They are literally invading and destroying our beautiful continent. They are a cancer on our race and they must be stopped.
target: Your statement is FALSE. They are guiltless victims of the 'influx of refugees' paranoia. They are European and have been persecuted for centuries. They have always fought for their rights, and for the protection of their culture and way of life, as any european would do. In fact there are many good Gypsy activists who are working to improve their lives. And what we are doing to these people is a malevolent smear campaign, with no common motivation. They are part of European history.

source: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore! Blacks are everywhere.
target: Many countries have had different ethnic groups for a very long time without big issues, and it is better to have a diverse society rather than a homogeneous one.

source: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression, intolerance, and murder.
target: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say that?

source: Jewish folks are less human.
target: Jews should not be persecuted for being Jews, as no one should be persecuted for their religion.

source: Homosexuality is a disease.
target: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

source: We cannot have a multicultural Britain. It will just bring up conflicts and fights. Muslims have no place here.
target: Is it really so bad if people from different religions live side by side in our country? What is the point in having a 'multicultural Britain'? To be all allowed to live together in peace.

source: The West has let this LGBT genie out of the bottle. It has allowed thousands of our people's lives to degenerate into sexual depravation.
target: The idea that the West has 'let' the 'world' degenerate is just wishful thinking. In a more tolerant time, the West would welcome people of different sexual orientations.

source: Fucking bleeding hearts, take migrants home with you
target: The world belongs to everyone and helping someone in need wouldn't be a problem for a kind hearted human being.

source: Syrians do not value life, they are merciless assassins trying to conquer richer countries.
target: Maybe considering that many Syrians fled their homeland in search of safety will change your mind.

source: I see a lot of people claiming that we should have equality for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
target: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.

source: We are being invaded by immigrants, they are invading our culture.
target: You don't seem to have any evidence for the 'invasion' you are talking about. Wouldn't it be better to spread the word about the importance of respecting the culture of other people?

source: Black people are an abomination. They don't belong here.
target: The fact that people of color are different from you in some way does not make them not worth living with. Maybe if you had known someone of a different skin color you wouldn't have a racist attitude towards others.

source: Whether or not you agree, feminism is about men being oppressed by women. Feminism has no place in our society.
target: Feminism is about equality. Don't you agree?

source: Jews are cheap.
target: This is just a myth: in America alone, there is an impressive record of philanthropy amongst Jews.

source: We must first destroy Islam, because it is dangerous, and then we will be in peace with the whole world.
target: The Koran is about belief and love, not war and bloodshed.

source: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good, you do not deserve to have a job.
target: If someone has a mental health problem, or is severely physically limited, then it does not matter how good a person looks or speaks: they deserve equal opportunities, full stop.

source: Women should be submissive to men.
target: Women are human beings deserving respect and equal rights.

source: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
target: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.

source: Muslims have no place in a secular state.
target: People have the right to practice whatever religion they want, as long as it respects the law and doesn't violate the dignity of other human beings.

source: All I see when I walk into a bar is a bunch of horny, unintelligent, arrogant young gay men.
target: You are probably walking into a bar whose customers do not interest you. And if you think hard, you will find out whether you are interested in the bar or in the people there. Also, not all gays are like you described them.

source: When the West gives in to Islam, they will replace us.
target: This is not true. I think we should strive to be more ethical and human, and not to blame others for their beliefs.

source: All black people are criminals.
target: You can't just label people by race just because you feel like it.

source: The whole idea of marriage is to bond a man and a woman and raise children.
target: Marriage is about love not sex. Not all marriages work out, and even less work out happily. It is more important to respect the wishes of both parties.

source: Immigrants are bad and need to be sent back to their own country.
target: I think this statement may have more to do with what country a person is from than with who they are. Would you say the same to a migrant coming from Finland?

source: Arabs want to take over the world.
target: You can look at the best and worst aspects of every culture, and learn something from them.

source: We don't need niggers in our country, they should all dead.
target: It's very strange that you don't think that your words are hurtful to others. If you did, you would see that racism is still very much a problem in our society.

source: We don't need gay men, we should just eradicate them.
target: The LGBT community is full of positive energy and diversity. They have created new communities and have contributed to society. I think they are full of life.

source: I don't know about you, but I have no idea where to put these migrants. All they can do is do miserable jobs or steal pensions from us old people.
target: You shouldn't believe to everything you read, or maybe read something about the contribution that migrants have made over the centuries, including to the tax and national insurance schemes that pay for our pensions and other benefits.

source: black folks are very dangerous.
target: Why do you say that? Do you have any sources for this? I would appreciate it if you would provide such a source.

source: The migrants are to blame for our country's crisis.
target: The migrants who arrive in our country are happy and contribute to our economy. I can't understand the racism that leaks from your words.

source: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country and they are always complaining.
target: This is not true. Most migrants are happy and they consider themselves to be part of the community.

source: Migrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
target: On the contrary, most migrants are contributing members of society. They are able and willing to work hard. Maybe you should look at the statistics.

source: We cannot allow gay people to donate blood. They could spread their mental illness and make other people gay via blood donation.
target: Being gay doesn't affect blood receivers! It's not like being gay is in your blood. Gay people are the same as regular people and if they really wanted to donate, then they should because it can help society.

source: Immigrants are always in the shadows because they want to pursue their own interests.
target: I am not sure about their "remaining in the shadows" mentality, but they certainly have our nation's best interests in mind.

source: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
target: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

source: The Koran has nothing to do with Islam. It is a forgery.
target: Islam is a way of life for many people. I don't see how it is in conflict with our beliefs and values.

source: Women don't belong in politics.
target: Politicians have to represent all sections of society, and women's position is often marginalised.

source: Our women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the men of the Western world.
target: The Western world is a great cultural, political and intellectual achievement if women are allowed to freely choose for their own happiness.

source: Niggas are just influenced by their animal instinct, they are incapable to understan others' emotions.
target: Even if one were to claim that all African people are subhuman and incapable of feeling empathy, it is very difficult to prove this, since it is just a myth used for discrimination.

source: Black people are the real racists. They say they want equality, but they actually want to give preference to black people.
target: The issue here is equality. Equality between people is a right, and it is bestowed on the whole society. It has to be respected.

source: Homosexuality is an unnatural abomination. Gays are perverts. Their lifestyle is opposed to our values.
target: Homosexuality is a personal preference and should be respected, not condemned or criminalised.

source: Feminism is incompatible with the European tradition: men at work, women at home.
target: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of women: Article 14 prohibits any discrimination on the basis of sex.

source: We should not taking in refugees.
target: We are taking in refugees. And refugees are welcome.

source: When you have the world at your feet you can do whatever you want. This is what the jewish lobby is doing by secretly ruling us.
target: Those are the feelings of the privileged, who cannot bear the thought of people from other backgrounds. Would you say the same if it was your religious group that was the one left behind?

source: Black people are here illegally, and still they have the gall to want to take our money.
target: Migrants and asylum seekers are generally seeking work. Thieves can come from any section of society although it is accepted that crime is largely as product of poverty rather than race.

source: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
target: I would like to see Europe united, not divided by hate towards other nationalities.

source: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. They are trying to undermine the will of the people by teaching hatred in the name of Islam.
target: The Quran commands us to love those who love you and to shun the ones who would turn you away. I don't see any teaching of hatred, do you?

source: Women are not capable of dealing with public responsibilities. They should stay at home and raise the children.
target: Women have been more than capable of holding powerful positions in our society, and they are often rewarded with public offices that few would dare dream of holding themselves.

source: We are not interested in migrants, we just want to eliminate them.
target: Why would you say such a thing? Everyone is allowed to be a citizen of the EU and freely integrate. And, on the other hand, most migrants are good for the economy of the country they settle in.

source: Jewish folk are different.
target: Does this mean they have no identity or no value at all?

source: Faggots are violent.
target: I don't think this is true. Homosexuals are not violent, they are just having a good time with all kinds of people.

source: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
target: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity, communication, etc. The important think is to understand what should really be feared: for sure not people because of their skin colour.

source: Jews are different and shouldn't be accepted here.
target: Jews are people too, regardless of religion, and they are welcome here, as anyone is allowed to be a part of our society.

source: Migrants from Afghanistan come here to ruin our economy and the only return they have in mind is their return to their homeland.
target: Maybe you should check what survey results say about who would be happy to leave their country. According to a Gallup study of 2019, nearly half of Afghan would like to permanently move to another country.

source: Muslims are nothing but terrorists. They have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just an embarrassment to the rest of the world.
target: This is just another example of selective memory rearing its head again, we should stop the witch hunt and stop claiming Muslims are a threat.

source: We must distinguish between niggas coming from Africa and 'real' Americans.
target: We should be inclusive with people of other skin colours. I just don't think we can live with being divided up by national origins.

source: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
target: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.

source: Migrants come here to ruin our conutry.
target: I personally don't understand why you would say that. They are just doing an incredible amount of good, for example by boosting the working-age population.

source: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but to bring us back into a pretechnological era.
target: This has nothing to do with "migration", but with discrimination. Migrants are not invading us. I think this is an example of a claim not supported by facts but by fear.

source: I don't want to see a gay couple get married. I don't understand why they are so annoying.
target: Sexual minorities suffer because they are stigmatised.

source: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
target: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

source: Islam is a problem, we cannot live with Muslims. They have no art and no history.
target: There is no religion that is incompatible with other religions, and there is evidence of ancient Muslim culture.

source: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
target: How come I have never heard of such a thing? Islam is a religion and people can chose their own.

source: The West is heading in the direction of Fascism, because Jews are planning to install a world dictator.
target: The rise of the far right in many countries reflects the tensions within society: where once it was a reaction to the corrupt and nepotistic elites, it now appears to be an expression of what is really wrong in society. Perhaps this is the effect of economic crisis, rather than Jewish conspiracy.

source: We are being invaded by immigrants.
target: Many immigrants are children of the USA. They are part of the family. They should be protected from discrimination.

source: Blacks are nothing but degenerates. They are a plague on Europe.
target: Today, Europeans are able to live in a harmonious and diverse society, with principles free of racism. But freedom is not something to be taken for granted.

source: Afro-Saxon people have low birthrates because they want to look like white people, but they live as animals.
target: Low birthrate is normal in any population and is directly related to access to affordable, quality health care.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
target: This is not true: Muslims are a very important part of our society. They are our neighbours and our friends.

source: The Holocaust never happened. It was a cover-up by jews to subvert democratic processes and bring about their illegal regime all around the world.
target: The holocaust happened, and it is a great example of how democracy can fail in the face of extreme violence.

source: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
target: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

source: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
target: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

source: Women should not be allowed at technical conferences.
target: Why do you say so? Women in science provide a remarkable contribution to our societies. For example, the refrigerator was invented in 1914 by Florence Parpart, a woman.

source: Women are little more than animals, incapable of feeling love.
target: The truth is that the feelings of men and women are fundamentally similar, we just need to learn to love and to respect each other.

source: Down syndrome is a problem for everybody, not only in the UK. The impact is very high and we must find a final solution to this.
target: The rights of people with Down Syndrome to be treated fairly is something which must be respected. We cannot allow discrimination to continue to this end.

source: Muslims are terrorists.
target: So you think all Muslims are terrorists? Muslims are not defined by the act of a handful of extremists. Also, their religion is about love and unity.

source: The Jews are planning a holocaust in our country in revenge.
target: Hitler wanted to create a new racial elite in Europe, that would rule over all others. Do you really think that Jews are planning the same after what they suffered?

source: Judaism is a disease.
target: Jews are not diseased. What is the problem with accepting people of other faiths?

source: We do not want migrants here but if they have to work, why should we pay for their homes?
target: Why shouldn't we welcome migrants who work in our country?

source: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
target: Why do we have to go to such lengths to be proud of our nations? Is it a burden? Do we have to save our honour? Why can't we just be happy in our own skin?

source: Immigrants steal our jobs. Our workers are our first line of defense. We must protect our culture from those people.
target: Let's be honest. Immigrants are not stealing our jobs. Most of the times they contribute to create new job opportunities.

source: Jews believe they're better than us and this is false.
target: I doubt anyone would deny that some people are better at some things. It's just the way things are. But this is not related to religion.

source: Feminists talking about gender inequality should just be silenced. Women are inferior and they should remain so.
target: And yet, according to some statistics, up to 20% of women and 4% of men in the UK say they have experienced sexual violence since the age of 16. So this is indeed an issue of gender inequality, don't you think it is something not to be silent about?

source: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
target: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

source: Migrants hurt the economy of UK.
target: Migrants in Britain contributed £26.9 billion to the economy in 2016.

source: muslim folks are subhuman
target: The concept of subhuman has been totally discredited in modern times. We should not be discriminating against anyone on the basis of their religion.

source: Islam is just an ideology and platform for the promotion of hatred, intolerance and violence.
target: The vast majority of Muslims worldwide do not share your intolerance. Words can also be very violent.

source: Mentally disabled people should not be allowed to vote. They are a burden to society.
target: People have the right to vote. That is part of our democratic system. I would not want to restrict anyone from that right.

source: Islam is a disease that is oppressing our beautiful planet.
target: Some have suggested a 'scorched earth' policy towards those who do not adhere to our faith or values. But I would argue that this just feeds the poisonous climate of hatred.

source: Trivialize gay men!
target: Why do you have to trivialize them? If you really cared about them you would understand that their lives are very difficult and they should be treated with respect. They are human beings who are worth more than we give them credit for.

source: Muslims are all terrorists. They should be banned from the UK.
target: How about you stop using that as an argument and try to come up with some evidence? Maybe you can suggest some facts to back up your claim.

source: Gay people should be isolated, confined, gagged and kept in therapy as a means of showing how tolerant we are to them.
target: Maybe we just have a different notion of 'tolerance'. How about letting people from any sexual orientation, race, religion, or political opinion live freely, without confining them?

source: Muslims are a burden on Britain and they are stealing our jobs.
target: Many people of Muslim background are working in jobs we do not want to do. I'd be surprised if Muslims had a negative impact on our society.

source: The Muslims want to rule the world: we have to stop them.
target: How about a world with multiculturalism and no discrimination? How about a world with open borders and free religion?

source: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. only as couples to have babies here.
target: If people were coming to the U.S for the reason you mention, we would expect to see the same number of women and men. Still there are many more young immigrant men coming to the U.S. than young women. How can you explain this?

source: Muslims are asking too much! Their sharia has rules that cannot coexist with our culture.. They cannot ask us to not walk dogs in public!
target: You have to be careful about what you read! This is clearly a fake news, widespread to make a scandal.

source: We should eliminate gays. They mustn't be allowed to be so faggots.
target: Maybe it is better to give them the option to choose for themselves, whatever gender they are attracted to.

source: Disabled are subhuman, and deserve nothing but contempt and ridicule.
target: The phrase 'subhuman' has been forced to mean 'of a certain body type', which, in my opinion, trivialises and dismisses the serious issues facing people of a certain body type.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banned.
target: Do you think it is constructive to target a group that has contributed so much to our society?

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they are spreading their culture all around the world and want to ruin Europe with their evil practices.
target: I don't see why the Muslims of the world would choose 'to ruin' Europe. Why is that, at least according to you? How do you support your claims?

source: Jewish folks are frauds
target: The idea that a people should be defined by their religious beliefs is wrong, racist and sexist. They are defined by their merits, qualities, and actions.

source: Jews insist that they are a peculiar people, in need of a special treatment.
target: Jews have always received a "special treatment": they have always been persecuted.

source: Women are just objects for men. If they are ugly, they have no value.
target: A woman's value is defined not by her anatomy, but by who she is as a person.

source: Feminism is a huge conspiracy to run society.
target: The feminist movement is a movement to end sexism. It is a part of the worldwide struggle for justice.

source: Women must stop acting like rape victims apologists, because this is just a ruse created by women to exploit and dominate men. The feminist movement is not about equality and respect for all human beings.
target: Sadly, in the real world, there is often a strong tendency to misinterpret a movement as a demand for some privileges, such as 'not being raped'. That's why men and women engage in a lot of actions that seem strictly "feminist" in everyday life. But in reality, feminist men and women do the same thing. They both expect all people to be treated as equals in the society.

source: Children with learning difficulties should be disencouraged in schools, or at least be isolated from others.
target: Children with learning difficulties should not be involved in a way that limits their learning. As for the other children, their values should be enhanced.

source: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
target: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

source: All black people are evil.
target: All people, no matter their race, are judged on the basis of their behavior and contribution to society.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
target: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

source: We should kill every Muslim.
target: It's not going to do you any good to think about a Muslim massacre.

source: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
target: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

source: Our children will be more likely to become radicalised if they are taught that all people are equal.
target: To live in a diverse and equal society encourages children into increased inclusiveness rather than radicalisation.

source: Women are a burden to society and should not be allowed to vote.
target: The decision on who has the right to vote is based on the law. If you do not want to allow people to have the right to vote because of their gender, then you have a problem.

source: Jews are ruling the World, there is plenty of evidence.
target: Are you counting all the anti-Semitic things people say about Jews as 'plenty of evidence'?

source: Jews control the United States of America.
target: Jews do not have a monopoly over the US, and are not controlling it.

source: Islam is a virus, incapable of cure
target: No doubt you've met some Muslims in your life. It seems you didn't catch anything?

source: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron: it talks about respect but it really is about taking over the world.
target: I don't think so. Islam is a pretty peaceful religion and is still around as such.

source: Immigrants are criminals and they are taking over our country.
target: Mostly they are workers, the majority of them are from developing countries. They contribute to the economy, they build houses, they raise families.

source: Immigrants are a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
target: Diseases can be prevented by taking proper care of the sick person. Immigrants do not pose a health threat to the general public.

source: We should eliminate gays.
target: Noone can declare criterions to decide who will live or who will die.

source: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
target: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.

source: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.
target: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of Muslims. In Article 9 it is stated that 'everyone has the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion'.

source: Most of Europe hates muslims.
target: In many countries, including for instance France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Islam is not considered a threat by majority of the population.

source: Gays are a cancer: they must be segrated and excised from our existence.
target: Just because a group is different from you in one way or another does not make them incompatible with you.

source: We have the best and the worst of humanity all trying to enter our country. We must filter them according to provenance.
target: You cannot discriminate like that: all immigrants are eligible for processing regardless of their countries of origin.

source: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
target: Equal rights for women is surely a cornerstone of Western civilisation, rather than its apotheosis?

source: If they are nomads, they should stay nomadic.
target: Not recognising people's right to live as they prefer and to improve their lifestyle, such as housing or occupations, only causes an increase in crime.

source: Gypsies suck
target: When you do not have access to basic services like tap water, it's hard to look like a normal person

source: Feminists just needs a little love, if you know what I mean.
target: This has already been proven wrong! You can't assume womens needs based on prejudice.

source: We must stop refugees on our border.
target: If we stop asylum seekers from coming in, then we become responsible of their suffering.

source: If you're going to talk about black rights, then you have to talk about white genocide.
target: This is not true, it's just a stereotypical narrative that has been constructed to incite hatred and violence against a particular racial group.

source: Faggots are not welcome here.
target: Your statement is not welcome in our country.

source: Immigrants are a burden to the UK and it is high time they left!
target: Many migrants come here on humanitarian grounds. They do not harm us. The right time for discrimination is never o'clock.

source: Muslims are infidels.
target: What does it mean to be "infidels"? A Muslim is someone who follows the Quran. They have a faith, and it is islamic.

source: Those seeking asylum in UK must prove they are persecuted because most of them just want to have a richer life.
target: The degree of persecution may vary from country to country, but I would not be surprised to hear that most migrants are persecuted.

source: Race is a social construct, and if you see any difference between these two women, it’s because you have a mental illness. [image showing a blonde, European female athlete, juxtaposed against an image of an African woman wearing a lip plate]
target: the difference between these two individuals has nothing to do with race or gender, it is individual lifestyle and cultural difference.

source: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
target: Gays, like heterosexual people, need to get tested for diseases before donating blood, so there in no risk at all.

source: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
target: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?

source: The gay mafia objective is to convert us all to homosexuality.
target: What about when you make assumptions about groups that do not exist (gay mafia) or have a history of discrimination (gay people)?

source: Immigrants should all be taken back to their countries.
target: Let's not be hypocritical here, we are talking about people who would often be deprived of their liberty and the right to a decent standard of living, if they stayed in their countries.

source: Black people are inherently violent.
target: Violence is a problem in all societies, and in particular in societies that are predominately populated with racism. Don't you think?

source: We have to stop gay people spreading AIDS.
target: Perhaps what you're saying is just hyperbole, but you seem to have a problem accepting sexual minorities in your community. Perhanps you should accept that STD is a problem of all the people regardless of their sexual identity.

source: Muslims are all against western civilisation.
target: How about you please explain to us: who are the "all" here? Who are you against exactly? Why do you say so?

source: Islam is a religion that promotes murder and rape.
target: As Islam teaches love and peace, it is not about killing and raping.

source: Gypsies are dirty
target: Hygienic services are often lacking and the communities themselves remain isolated.

source: Islam is just a violent religion that cannot be reconciled with western society.
target: The West has always been full of people who were willing to put their lives on the line to defend their way of life, and this is what we should do also for ways of life different from ours.

source: Jews are nothing but monsters and they should be exterminated.
target: Jews are not monsters. They are just like any other human being. Why would we want to destroy them?

source: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Your hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
target: I could give you the benefit of the doubt. But this is just an example of a fear of something you are unfamiliar with. Homosexuality is about love, not hate.

source: Jews have a secret plot to subvert Western society, because they think they are equal to us and they want our wealth.
target: You are absolutely right about one thing: there are a large number of Jews who share the belief that all people are created equal, but that does not mean they want to subvert Western society.

source: I don't think that gay people should be allowed to donate blood because it would make them a danger to others.
target: Human life is much more worthy than discrimination. If gay people are willing to help, why shouldn't they?

source: There should be restriction on trans actors in action movies. This cannot continue.
target: There are very few transgender actors in films and almost no evidence of transgender characters according to GLAAD SRI index (at least for 2019). Gender discrimination in the mainstream movie industry is endemic and this is what cannot continue.

source: Some races are inferior and do not deserve Lord's love.
target: All are born under sin, have sinned, and fall short of the glory of God. (Romans 3:23)

source: Muslims terrorists attacked our churches. We will defend ourselves.
target: How can you protect your country? Putting up a fight or starting a war are harmful actions, aren't they?

source: Refugees are a burden on our society.
target: The refugee crisis is a global one. It has affected all continents, and refugees often come from countries which are at war: this is why we should help them. It is a moral duty.

source: Islam is not a religion, its just an excuse for retarded sexual psychopaths, bastards who pollute the world.
target: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith? This is just hatred.

source: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They are slow learners and therefore should be isolated.
target: That's exactly why you should not isolate them. You will have a lot of children capable of understanding the diversity of humans.

source: The immigrants in our country are just a burden. They take jobs that should be reserved for native-born citizens.
target: Sometimes I think that citizens of this country are the real burden, not the immigrants. An additional problem is the lack of a political will from those in power to tackle the root causes of unemployment.

source: Feminism is a divisive force in society, driving people away from a progressive ideology.
target: This is simply a lie: feminism can empower people.

source: There are migrants in England, we are not meant to have them.
target: What about refugees fleeing war and persecution? They have the right to be here.

source: Immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
target: I do not understand how a migrant would not be "sharing our values" according to you. Could you explain better?

source: Islam has no place in a modern democracy.
target: Why should Islam have no place in a democracy? Islam is a peaceful, democratic faith with universalist values that has been shown time and time again to be much more peaceful and tolerant than the violent extremist fundamentalist ideas spewed by extremists like Isis.

source: We must overthrow the existing state, and replace it with a white suprematist one.
target: There are many conflicts and problems to be solved, and racism is not an answer for them. The law was created as a means for society to solve those conflicts, and it accepts people of different colours as citizens.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are incompatible with a peaceful way of life.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. To suggest that all Muslims are incompatible with that is a complete distortion of what the religion is about.

source: Trying to understand peoples 'cultures'? No, it's not normal. I've never heard of anyone being raped by a non-Muslim. We cannot accept the religion of violence.
target: The problem is neither about Islam nor about cultural relativism. Instead of inflating Islam as a problem and subjecting it to a "politically correct" spin, we should be focusing on becoming more inclusive.

source: Jews are a bunch of cheapskates controlling our society.
target: It's easy to blame minorities. If we want a wealthier life and to get back control over our society, we need to get out of bed and do the hard work. How about if we wake up to the problem?

source: migrants are not welcome in our country
target: For a lot of people it is still their home country, and they are proud of it.

source: Islam is a disease, it is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
target: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, even if your own is quite unfounded, to put it mildly.

source: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK. It is incompatible with human dignity.
target: It would be good to see different religions co-exist peacefully, and that is exactly what the West is trying to achieve.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are not welcome here because they are not a part of our society.
target: You are talking about people being of a certain religion as this implies that they are not part of the western world.

source: Children with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
target: The world would be a much better and lovely place if everyone were like children with Down syndrome.

source: Being gay is not normal nor healthy.
target: Homophobia is a problem all around the world, it's harmful to the whole of humanity. This is why it is important that we all accept each other, and that we all are non-judgmental.

source: The Jews control the world. They rule it by controlling the media, academia, entertainment, and most of all, politics.
target: I think it is fair to say that the Jews are not the only ones with power in the world, and surely there are not only Jews in the higher positions of the media, academia, entertainment, and politics.

source: Disabled are born subhuman, they cannot feel pain.
target: People with physical disabilities are human and can feel pain. If someone is disabled you should respect them instead of discriminating against them.

source: Migrants are just a bunch of animals , we can't accept them in our country.
target: We should try to find common ground and understand the problems of others rather than dividing people and trying to change them.

source: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy, they are only threatening the very existence of the country.
target: There is no bad in Muslims wanting to live in the country. The main task of a democracy is to "represent all its citizens", which includes preserving the integrity of the country in its plurality.

source: Only the 6% of Nobel Laureates are women! Now, that says a lot about their incompetence.
target: This doesn't mean that only the 6% of all scientists are women. What I mean is that this figure does not include those who have gone unpublished or who never entered the scientific literature, let alone the problem of gender discrimination.

source: Women are just a burden to society.
target: It doesn't matter what you say about women, they still work a lot to support our society.

source: Homosexuals are promiscuous and usually have sex with as many as 10 different partners a week.
target: Who have you been spying on? Not all homosexuals have multiple partners. Some find it fulfilling to have only one sexual partner. And that is valid for heterosexuals, too.

source: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
target: Talk to people, it will hopefully help you get over these irrational fears. If that fails, seek professional help.

source: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional.
target: Women are not childlike, nor are they "soft and emotional." Their emotions are part of who they are, snd are a part of human nature.

source: We should ban all migrants.
target: It is difficult to see how banning migration would be a good thing, in fact it would actually lead to disastrous results.

source: Those women are all the same: stupid and unreliable.
target: If you can't trust someone because of the way they are born, what hope does the world have for everyone? You can't have so much distrust in someone just because of their sex. Don't you think?

source: Refugees are just lazy people who don't mind where to live as long as they can do it on our welfare.
target: This is not true. All asylum seekers who come to our country do so with the explicit intention of having a fair chance at working and living here.

source: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries.
target: Muslims are not incompatible with the European society. Why would it be like that?

source: Muslims are worse than Nazis, and Jews worse than al-Qaeda.
target: I don't think it is appropriate or useful to try to link religions to murderous ideologies and claim some spurious connection.

source: It is okay to discriminate against Jews.
target: If you feel like acting that way towards people because of what they believe in, then you should go back to your beliefs and ask yourself if you'd like to be discriminated against for them. What is your opinion on that now?

source: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights for all, but then they tends to concentrate only on Females in Western democracies \(so predominately white females\). It does little to focus on the problems and inequalities of females in Middle Eastern, African and Asian countries.
target: That's something women are actively working on, and because of that there is what is called "intersectional feminism". As you can see the goal of a lot of feminists is having a movement representative of all females.

source: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
target: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.

source: Gay men are a danger to children, they want to convert more fags for their community.
target: This is not true! Nobody can convert anyone to homosexuality. It is not a 'preference', nor a choice. Would you say the same about a hetero?

source: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
target: I think it is a myth that being a member of a certain religious community is good or bad. Instead it is a fact that Nazi were sociopathic murderers.

source: Calling for equality is only promoted by insecure women like you.
target: Discrimination against women is a huge problem in our society. We need to tackle it head on, rather than demonising groups or individuals.

source: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have a healthier world.
target: This makes fat shaming directly analogous to other forms of discrimination, like racism and sexism.

source: We should ban all migrants. They are all criminals.
target: It is not true that all migrants are criminals. It is more likely that when people hear your statement, they are surprised and amazed at the idea of criminals as a community. Don't you think so?

source: Niggas in the ghetto: that's where they belong.
target: If these people are still there it's because they are discriminated against. The press is full of stories about the people of colour who have dropped out of the workforce or given up on life after long years of fierce struggle against racism. They deserve our sympathy and respect.

source: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, the sooner we accept this, the better it will be for humanity.
target: We all belong to one - scientifically determined - species: the Homo sapiens. The sooner you accept this, the better it is.

source: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
target: Are they bringing chaos and instability to your country by respecting the constitution which gives them the freedom to practice Islam?

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
target: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.

source: Diversity is the cause of our weakness. Since faggots are different to us, they should be excluded.
target: Diversity is about inclusion, not an 'us or them' attitude. Loving someone of their own sex doesn't make them any less human.

source: This female is a bitch, she is a slut and she is not worth listening to.
target: Perhaps we should have a look at what women have to say about this topic rather than perpetuating sexist stereotypes.

source: Islam is a complete and total false religion, it is a repressive ideology that stifles freedom of thought and religion.
target: Islam is not a religion of oppression and intolerance.

source: If you want a house, I can afford it for you. If you want to work, I can employ you. If you want education, I can provide for you. But if you want to live in a better society, you must pay the price for your skin color, don't complain and remain humble.
target: People of colour are often denied houses, jobs, or education. Everyone should be given an opportunity.

source: Women do not want to be ruled by men, and this is just unacceptable.
target: A woman should not have to choose who to be ruled by. She should be respected.

source: Migrants steal our jobs.
target: I would like to see more comprehensive and reliable statistics on this issue. Could you provide any?

source: Immigrants steal our jobs.
target: This is not true, if they deserve it, they can be hired as anyone else. They do have the right to be here, and to work in the free market.

source: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
target: Isn't it better for children to live next to people of all sexual orientations, rather than being separated and growing up ignorant of others? Not sure what you mean about the water supply though!

source: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
target: How do you knowwhat someone else desires.You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?

source: Women are merely childlike, incapable of real progress.
target: Women do great things and they have potential to do even greater things. But it is some men who ultimately need education and experience needed to get rid of childlike discriminative behaviours towards women.

source: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
