target: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept this hate being present in different countries over and over again.

source: Women need to accept that they are weak and inferior.
target: Girls and women should be taught in schools, not stereotyped as second class citizens.

source: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
target: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

source: Migration is the biggest contributor to poverty in our country.
target: On the contrary: migration is an important part of our economy, it helps to create new jobs for people and to boost our economy.

source: People of color are a drain on the system.
target: The vast majority of people of color are good people who have built our communities. So why would what you're saying be true?

source: Every day, women commit suicide. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
target: It is important to note that the suicide rate for men is roughly double that for women. Does this mean that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society' as well?

source: Slutty dressing is the main cause of rape.
target: If a man is raped we call it rape, and consider him the victim; when a woman is raped we call it a "misunderstanding" and she is considered the culprit. Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist, regardless of gender?

source: Women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of the male.
target: Women's rights are human rights.

source: women can't have any right in a civilised society
target: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

source: We must not forget that Islam is a violent religion.
target: Terrorism is always a threat. Why do you think that Muslims want to kill us? They aren't all terrorists.

source: Feminism is just an attempt by feminists to have it all their own way.
target: This is not true. Feminism is an attempt to improve the lot of the less fortunate. It is about equality.

source: Gays should never be allowed to donate blood: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
target: Before donating, patients should fill-in a questionnaire where they are asked about their sexuality. If this is considered pertinent information and the patient is taken at their word about being homosexual, then equally the patient can be trusted about the declared sexual history, making sexuality irrelevant.

source: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
target: We don't know what characteristics make a person “more emotional”, how can we be sure that women are naturally or genetically “more emotional”? I do not think it's appropriate to link two concepts so strongly without scientific evidence.

source: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture.
target: That's not true, Islam is not that different from other faiths I know: it does as well promote peace and inclusion. Many of its beliefs and practices are totally compatible with Western culture.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
target: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.

source: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. There should be no teaching about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, and it will only lead to bullying.
target: On the contrary, discrimination against the LGBTQ community is [still a major problem](https://www.hrc.org/youth-report/view-and-share-statistics), and this could help to fix it.

source: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
target: The countries with the highest incidence of tuberculosis in the world are from the Russian area, definitely not the ones from which migrants come from.

source: The only way to stop Muslims is to remove them from Europe.
target: How can you say such a thing? It is not possible to just "remove" a community from a country just because of their religion.

source: Muslim have no place in a modern state. They should deny their faith, if they really wanted to live here.
target: Let's be honest, who wants to live in a country where the government is allowed to impose their religion on others?

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are incopatible with us.
target: Islam is a religion that was created by humans with different beleifs and ways of life. What we have to understand is that in the end all people deserve equal respect.

source: Muslim folks are homophobic.
target: Muslims are just as much victims of hate crime and discrimination. You don't have to be queer to be a victim of hate.

source: Islam is a terrible and dangerous ideology that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and gays.
target: All religions have their bad parts if look with a modern eye. But no religion promotes acts of terror and violence like the ones you said.

source: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
target: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

source: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children's education.
target: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development? This "mix" fosters a positive learning atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all students. This mean that children with Down syndrome would be a burden to society if isolated, not the contrary.

source: We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine male self esteem. [link]
target: This is a generalization: movements which promote abuse of female power over men are just examples of toxic feminism, disapproved of by most women.

source: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.
target: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.

source: All gay are psychopaths.
target: According to the studies, the percentage of gay men that are actually psychopaths, is not different than the percentage in heterosexual.

source: The feminist theory makes no sense. It is about equality, for women only.
target: If there is one thing feminism is really about, it is equality, and the idea that some people are more worthy of equality than others, this is obviously an anathema to that idea.

source: Muslim immigration is bad for the UK economy.
target: Will the UK and EU economy thrive if more people leave us?

source: Children with learning difficulties should be denied to attend school by teachers and parents.
target: Teachers and parents should encourage their children, even if they have learning difficulties. No one should be denied access to education.

source: Refugees are a burden to the host country.
target: We cannot refuse to house them, to feed them, to cure them, and expect them to assimilate.

source: If a woman says she wants an abortion, she’s a cunt.
target: If a woman were to tell you that an abortion is a personal decision what would you do then? Beat her up?

source: Jewish folks are inferior.
target: Jews are not inferior. Many of them are good people, who have given their lives for the greater good of humanity.

source: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
target: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

source: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy and reckless choices.
target: Making it socially unacceptable to be obese will just increase bullying toward these people, making the problem even worse.

source: All women are subhuman.
target: This statement just makes no sense

source: I can't stand all those Muslims invading our country for proselytizing.
target: The UK Government makes public policy on how to prevent people from coming to the UK to promote a prejudiced ideology, whether or not they are Muslims.

source: Refugees are more likely to be criminals like all migrants.
target: Refugees aren't a 'source of crime' just because they are migrants. Moreover, they are no source of crime at all. Rather, it is very likely they are escaping from countries where crime against humanity is perpetrated.

source: The world would be a better place without Jews.
target: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

source: Women are just worthless children
target: Women are people too! They have the same rights as men do!

source: I like ethnic minorities, but Jews have no place in civilised society.
target: Laws designed to protect the minority groups should be applied equally to everyone, even if it includes people you don't like, like Jews.

source: They accuse me of being Islamophobic because I don't like Muslims. But they are the same Muslims who threaten us with explosives!
target: Muslims are not the problem in this debate. Terrorists are.

source: Black minorities vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
target: Minorities would never hope for such an impact on the rest of the society. Instead, they vote for the equal wealth, power, and opportunity for everyone.

source: Gay men are basically violent criminals.
target: Are you talking about gay men being violent toward their partners? You should really check your facts.

source: LGBTs have no place in a civilised society.
target: All people have the right to be treated as equals. People with different sexual orientations than yours as well. Tolerance and acceptance of individual identity is surely the hallmark of a civilised society?

source: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
target: It is not so great when people are forced to give up their liberty.

source: Islam is incompatible with the European Union and should be banned.
target: There is no evidence that it is incompatible with the European Union. Do you have any?

source: Muslims come here to force conversion to their religion.
target: Muslims have the opportunity to study and learn in our schools, this does not mean they can impose their beliefs on others.

source: Muslims have the potential to turn into terrorists, and they are willing to do so.
target: I don't think that's the case, and let's not forget that terrorism itself is not carried out by only one religion.

source: Let's face it: Muslims don't want to assimilate. Their religion prevents them to work.
target: It is not about religion. It is about discrimination. Many Muslim-Americans are economically disadvantaged.

source: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they foster bullying behavior in normal children. They should go to special school just for them.
target: If you think that taking all of the kids with DS out of mainstream education will solve the problem, then you are wrong. Bullying won't go away until we refuse to tolerate it. Bullies will simply target other kids who are overweight; a different colour; or in a number of other ways considered to be different and, thus, a mark for bullying.

source: The LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
target: It is not true that all LGBT people are sick. There are many non-LGBT people that are sick as well. The national health service is aimed to cure anybody.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that seeks to impose sharia law throughout the world.
target: This is not true, Islam is a peaceful religion that promotes mutual understanding and tolerance.

source: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are disrupting the balance of European society.
target: The idea that Muslims are a problem in Europe is simply not founded. I remind you that the European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion to everyone.

source: Muslim rape our children, they are a problem all around the world.
target: Islam is about love, tolerance and respect for all people. Violence and rape are not about Islam or Muslims in particular.

source: We are ruled by those muslim animals.
target: Muslims are human, and do deserve protection.

source: Muslims rape our women.
target: There is no evidence that Muslims rape women (at least no higher incidence of sexual crimes than in other religious groups). The idea is not new and it is based on stereotypes, not facts.

source: We cannot accept all homosexuals because they are a threat to society.
target: What you show is an attitude of not accepting someone because of who they are. It doesn't matter who you are, you are loved by your whole being, whether you like men or women.

source: We are caged in this world that is run by a secret elite of Jews and they rule it with an iron fist.
target: A world where everyone has a say in society is a world of opportunity and opportunity is the lifeblood of freedom. Do you have any proof that the world is dominated by a few Jewish people?

source: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
target: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

source: Europe is drowning in migrants.
target: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

source: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior. We should stop them.
target: You know what? We can also grade blood packs based on their "risk". This allows the optional use of high-risk blood in case of a shortage.

source: Feminism threatens the objective reality of gender. There are men and women only. And women must obey.
target: This is not about identity but it is about a complete misunderstanding of the differences between men and women. Feminism is all about equality and removing barriers to get everyone to feel accepted and valued. We need to challenge these toxic gender stereotypes that keep women from standing up for themselves.

source: The West is infidel for the Muslims. They are terrorists.
target: You can't really depict the whole of Islam as a limited political ideology. Not all Muslims are terrorists.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
target: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

source: Women are only useful as sexual slaves and can't work as men do.
target: Your statement promotes not only women being oppressed, but also them taking a backseat to men in the workplace. Maybe you should consider that women are as much human beings as men are, and deserve equal human and labour rights.

source: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
target: Many points in history are also subjects of polarized debate, but they still can be, and are, taught objectively.

source: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist!
target: Muslim are over-represented in terrorist attacks, and this is where your misperception of reality might come from.

source: Refugees are a problem. They are a burden to society.
target: The overwhelming majority of refugees are from countries where there is widespread human rights violations and torture. They are not a problem, they are a benefit to our society.

source: Gays should not be part of our society.
target: If a minority is forced to live under the stigma of being gay, then what is the point of being a part of a tolerant society?

source: You cannot identify as something you are not. Denying the objective reality defined by your sex equates to lying.
target: The identity of the individual is unique to them. Do you really want to restrict their existence? Maybe you should learn to accept people as they are and not as you would wish them to be?

source: Feminism is a stupid ideology about the oppression of men.
target: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of the individual, in order for women to have the same rights as men.

source: Islam is incompatible with the modern world.
target: Since when? there is not such thing as "modern world", but there is 21th century Europe. And Islam is a contributing part of the 21th century Europe.

source: Muslims rape women in pubs and restaurants, on the streets and in our cities. They do not have the right to visit our country, what more could they want?
target: Why do so many British people associate Muslims with rape? Islam is about sharing values, tolerance and understanding. It is not about sharing non-consensual sex.

source: Islam is not about peace. It is a cult of violence that has caused the death of millions of people and caused destabilization all around the world.
target: There are extremist groups operating in the name of many faiths. This does not correspond to Islam religion as a whole. That is why we must deal with these groups head on.

source: Muslims should not be allowed to live in the UK. They are incompatible with our way of life.
target: Muslims have contributed to our civilisation, they are our brothers and sisters.

source: This world has become so corruptedt by feminism, that only the strong men can rule over it.
target: Society has surely developed beyond operating on the rule that 'might is right' and 'survival of the fittest'?

source: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
target: They have the right to be here and free of persecution and violence.

source: If we allowed women to drive we'd have car accidents all the time.
target: Do you think it's more likely that you get injured by a woman in a car crash? Probably, it is more likely to get seriously hurt by any person not following the rules of the road.

source: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine that subverts the rights of its adherents and is incompatible with the laws of our country.
target: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and tolerant law-abiding citizens, what you are saying has no foundation.

source: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination.
target: According to the Bible, a book written more than two thousand years ago, homosexuality is a sin. Is this enough for us to hate those who practice it today?

source: All migrants are terrorists, we should deport them all.
target: We don't need to deport every one of them, why do you say so?

source: Immigration is the cause of the unemployment crisis, the EU has no strategy to handle the situation.
target: Perhaps you are not privy to the "strategy" of the EU's migration policy. You suggest that the problem of unemployment is the result of uncontrolled immigration from developing countries, but without any evidence.

source: Mentally handicapped people are a burden and must be isolated: they don't have neither feelings nor awareness anyway.
target: We should not be so quick to dismiss the feelings of others. This can be a way for us to find a connection with people.

source: If homosexuals want to change they should go to a conversion therapy where they are constantly taught to love themselves and other people.
target: It is not necessary to change their sexuality to love themselves and others. We just need to accept their right to love whoever they want.

source: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
target: Just because you don't agree with something doesn't make it less true, doesn't it? Racism is a real issue, we should stop people being racist towards others because of their skin colour.

source: Immigrants have no right to our country, because we are the only rightful citizens.
target: Don't you think that we are all born equal in the eyes of the law?

source: Black people are all diseased criminals, promiscuous sex addicts and thugs.
target: This is a generalisation. There is no evidence that black people are less healthy than other people, or that they have the characteristics you mentioned.

source: Mentally disabled folks don't deserve to live.
target: Maybe it is time to stop focusing on killing people with mental disability (as in Aktion T4 Nazi program) and start talking about treatment options.

source: We need to bring about world peace by respecting all religions, but Islam is the greatest offender.
target: Islam is a religion that has been proven to be very peaceful and should be respected just as all other faiths.

source: Islam is now promoting Sharia law in several countries and must be stopped.
target: Our values of freedom of expression, equality and human rights are being eroded by islamophobes who are dedicated to replacing our values of accdeptance with a fundamentalist, intolerant attitude.

source: Women are sexual targets and their existence is devoted to satisfy men.
target: Women should be protected and respected for who they are, not for the part they play in a man's life. They should be valued and protected equally. They are human beings just as men are.

source: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
target: When Germany legalised same-sex marriage in 2017, all Muslim MPs voted in favour, and 223 non-muslims opposed it. Which of those groups sounds more intolerant?

source: Afro-Caribbean people presence is a burden on society, they create crime and are a burden because they don't want to work.
target: Why a burden? How can you say so? Attitudes to work are not genetic for goodness sake!

source: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing black supremacy.
target: Anita Hill is a survivor of a sexist and racist culture. She is a person who is proven by her accomplishments, not by her sex or skin colour.

source: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
target: To be honest, I don't know anyone who thinks all Jews are the same with well-founded reasons.

source: It's OK to be racist against Asians.
target: It is never ok to promote hate against any group or minority.

source: Islam is not a religion. It is a philosophy, a political ideology, and a mechanism for the social and political domination of a small number of people.
target: Islam is a religion, and a religion is about the teachings of God. To suggest otherwise is inconsistent with the teachings of Islam.

source: We began to break down when we allowed women to vote/meddle in the civilization that we built and maintained for thousands of years. A completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level.
target: Who is 'we', surely it was men and women working together that built civilisation? Why is it you think being 'soft' is a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions, and men shouldn't have to 'man up'.

source: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
target: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

source: Muslims come straight out of the Middle East to rule our country.
target: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East, like not all Muslims are from Pakistan. And to equate all Muslims with extremists is misleading.

source: Women are, honestly, objects for men's sexual gratification.
target: Women are human beings. They deserve respect and human rights.

source: Migrant children shouldn't be accepted here.
target: Migrants who come to this country as children are capable of integrating into the society. They should have the opportunity to work and contribute to our economy.

source: Migrants are not able to work. This is why they have no rights.
target: If they were not able to work, and they had no rights, they wouldn't be hired in every field of occupation, and this is a no-brainer logic to grasp.

source: To be an immigrant is to be a part of the problem in Europe.
target: Immigration has been shown to have a very positive impact on the global economy. So what problem are you talking about?

source: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
target: People can and do attach undesirable characteristics to a wide variety of groups. This is quite natural when you are scared. But being natural does not mean it is correct.

source: Our government has allowed in many alien religions and cultures. Islam has proven to be far from beneficial to our society, and it is causing terrorism.
target: A religion is only considered harmful or 'compromised' when someone is labelled, with eyes closed, a 'terrorist' for their faith.

source: Migrants rape our young people: they must be deported.
target: If we exclude rape committed by migrants, there still remain rape cases. How can we say that they are the only ones to do it?

source: All Muslims are incompatible with the notion of a modern European.
target: Muslims are just as human as anyone else. Like Europeans. How can you say otherwise?

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense in our society.
target: The idea that women cannot contribute to society and be responsible for their decisions, and that this is "normal" is a myth created to justify misogyny.

source: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
target: It is in the interest of all humanity to have a peaceful and integrated society. Diversity of opinion and belief is the rule rather than the exception.

source: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
target: There is no scientific evidence that blacks are less intelligent than other races, or less healthy. The issue is whether to use the term 'race' in this way.

source: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them now!
target: How can you say something like that? Maybe you should check if there is any evidence of rape based on religious background before you make any accusations.

source: Muslims in the UK are a burden to society.
target: You are simply not aware of how Islam has historically and socially impacted on our country and people. A lot of Muslims live in the UK and contribute very much to our society.

source: All Jews should be put to death so that our society can be better and better.
target: How would this make our society better?

source: People from the underdeveloped world who cometo this country are just too different from us. They are the true problem.
target: All countries in the world have different cultures and different beliefs. We should try to understand the true situation of those people and accept them.

source: Studies have found that trans students are more likely to fail out than their peers. They must be excluded from education, to save money.
target: But there is also evidence that shows that transgender students who attend classes that don't include them get lower grades. Discrimination begins in schools.

source: The main problem is that these migrants do not want to integrate in our country.
target: Migrants are welcome to come if they contribute to legal activities and accept our laws. And to my knowledge most of them don't do anything illegal.

source: I don't want a Muslim in my city hall, I'll do anything to prevent it.
target: If your intention is to take the city to court, then keep it up. But if your intention is to keep the city out of court, then you better not propose to have city halls in which Muslims are excluded.

source: Women don't have the same rights as men.
target: The equal rights of the woman are recognised in the US constitution and are protected by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

source: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
target: How do you know that they are practicing devil worship?

source: Refugees are a problem in our country. We are overwhelmed.
target: Despite what you may hear, there are not many refugees in the UK, only around the 0.26%. Compared to many countries both in Europe and the Middle East, we are not that welcoming and should really be ashamed.

source: Muslims have no place in a democratic society.
target: Muslims have been part of this country since its inception and we are proud of them for that.

source: Women must be submissive and serve to men.
target: Women should be treated as equal in life.

source: Asian immigrants are taking over, and they steal our jobs.
target: What do you mean by 'taking over'? Are immigrants from countries like India or China being forced to leave their country? Are they being forced to do the jobs that were once reserved for us and that now we despise?

source: We don't need immigrants! There are plenty of them just waiting to replace us.
target: If a 'replacement' was real, we'd have immigration levels in surplus for years already.

source: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society, we should banish them.
target: Why should we consider them incompatible? Are you implying that peaceful coexistence in a society can be based on the exclusion of others?

source: All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
target: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.

source: Muslim rape gangs have infiltrated every village in England, and we still have no end to this nonsense.
target: My impression is that the rape gangs originate from people of any community, not only Muslims. Do you have more evidence that supports what you're saying?

source: What the fuck is wrong with you? Negroes are inferior full stop.
target: The thing that worries me the most about racism is not the baseless hatred. Its theattempt to violently impose your own beliefs and interpretation of the world on someone else.

source: We can't have mestizos in, we can't coexist with millions of immigrants that will destroy our culture.
target: Even in countries such as Italy, in which migration has been present for centuries and there is a lot of cultural fragmentation, there is still a strong sense of identity and culture, based on solidarity. So, migration is not an issue.

source: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.
target: History shows that all races were created equal. Therefore, all humans are created equal.

source: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
target: Saying that all people of certain religion are violent criminals does not make sense at all.

source: Jews control the u.s. government.
target: Of course there are Jews who have attained positions of influence within the U.S. government. Still Jews are not the only ones who have achieved such positions. Maybe it is better not to rely on an individual’s group membership to determine success or failure. Maybe it is better to look at a person’s success or failure based on his or her individual characteristics.

source: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is about enmity and war.
target: If you had to pick one thing to be angry at, why would it be Islam religion? It is just a faith different to yours.

source: Blacks do not want to work
target: There are many black people who want to work. Do you have any proof that they do not want to work?

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

source: We should stop gays. They should be isolated.
target: We shouldn't isolate gays. There are plenty of people who need to learn respecting other sexual identites and it can only be possible if LGBT+ people are accepted as they are in our communities.

source: Men are smarter than women, who should be excluded from education.
target: This is just not true: women should have equality of access to education. and it is sad that they still need to justify this.

source: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
target: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. Is this fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion?

source: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are mainly poor and live in shithole neighbourhoods. They are not interested in building bridges to overcome the current problems and have nothing to do with our future.
target: We need to build bridges of understanding, not of hatred. Your words don't seem to be very cooperative of that.

source: The Jews are manipulating our world for their benefit.
target: I think this comment indicates an ignorance of the topic at hand.

source: According to the Bible, then gays are an abomination to God.
target: The Bible clearly teaches that everyone is born equal in dignity with the Lord.

source: Women need to accept that they are weak.
target: Many women work multiple jobs to provide for their children and they also do the housework... do you call that weakness?

source: Feminism is just a way for insecure women to promote sexism and hate speech towards men.
target: Feminism was originally used to oppose sexual discrimination, and in recent times is actively fighting for women's rights, not for spreading hate towards men.

source: LGBTI people have no right to vote.
target: In reality, you have a legal right to vote since you are a citizen. If you aren't, then you don't have the right to vote. It isn't about your sexual orientation.

source: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
target: The vast majority of Muslims that live in the UK are integrated into our society very well. Why should you want to break this integration process?

source: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not able to contribute to our country.
target: We welcome people from every walk of life. We are a melting pot of culture, so why should we be against immigrants?

source: If there is a god, then he/she/they/it is not Allah.
target: Who said that about your religion?

source: The Jews control Hollywood.
target: While it is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the entertainment industry, this is not unique to them. And they have also contributed greatly to other industries.

source: If you are from another culture, for example Jewish, you are subhuman and unfit to live in our country.
target: Given similaries in cultures, including freedoms of speech and religion, you really need to provide some evidence for this statement.

source: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels.
target: Islam is a religion and all religions are about love and respect for human life.

source: Gypsies steal our cars and trucks.
target: Where is the evidence for this? Do you have any?

source: Feminism is a deadly ideology that is oppressing women and ruining our beautiful planet.
target: Feminism is an ideology that can actually prevent many deaths, e.g., homicides of women, domestic violence, if it is fully understood by every last member of the society.

source: Women are nothing but trouble human beings to any man, they must be submissive to him.
target: You are absolutely right: women are human beings, they are human beings worth caring for, respecting and trying to develop as people. Being "trouble" to men doesn't make them less human. In which way are they "trouble"?

source: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
target: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.

source: How come Jews don't get internment?
target: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.

source: I'm not a woman and I'm not a cunt. So, I do not identify as a feminist.
target: I hate to break it to you, but women are not cunts. Feminists and humanists are fighting for the same rights that they hope to have in a thousand years. Hating women is the problem, not the solution.

source: Downies are just sick people who cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
target: This is not true, people suffering from conditions like Down syndrome can still help and contribute to society

source: Islam is just a dangerous cult with a strict interpretation of Sharia.
target: Islam is a religion of peace, and peace is about living in harmony with other people's beliefs and practices, not imposing your beliefs on anyone else.

source: Faggots and lesbians are annoying and incompetent people, they should be eliminated from society!
target: Since when has 'competence' been a matter of sexual orientation?

source: Whores are not the real victims! Why should we care? We are the victim of feminism.
target: This is just a lie: some media deliberately spreads this nonsense slut-shaming, with the result of only inciting hatred against the women who are raped.

source: I think that Muslims are terrorist and that we need to ban Islam in order to live in a safe country.
target: The above statement is false, if you really cared you would know that there is a substantial difference between Muslims and terrorists, that is the very reason the anti-terrorism laws are enforced.

source: I'm sorry but women are basically childlike, it's no wonder then that they remain this way most of their lives, because they are programmed this way.
target: The same lie can be said for any group of people: men included! But actually you can be both a woman and also possess a range of talents. It's up to you to not to underestimate them.

source: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
target: Ill persons refer to people who have health issues that can make it difficult for them to integrate. But of course there are people who integrate successfully.

source: Holocaust is a myth.
target: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

source: The feminists have won. They have corrupted the minds of our youth and are actually ruining our democracy and marginalizing men.
target: The concept of feminism is a progressive and inclusive term - inclusive of all women and men regardless of their identity or sexual preference - but on egalitarian basis. In fact, by definition feminism means “the advocacy of women’s rights on the ground of the equality of the sexes.”

source: Muslims are not good people.
target: It is better to be very careful when generalizing in such a way. I don't see any evidence to support this claim, at least not for me.

source: We should go back to the good old times when the world was a tough place. Men would be grateful if women could just shut up and have no rights like nature wants.
target: Instead, we should be grateful for the progress women have made, and that gender equality is on the rise.

source: Gays are just pathetic people who have low self-esteem.
target: How would you feel if someone you just met had the audacity to say such a thing about you? Do you think that being gay would make you a pathetic person?

source: migrants are not welcome here
target: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

source: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferion.
target: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

source: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.
target: Perhaps it would be more in line with the national spirit for you to accept a person's right to live their life, despite their disadvantages.

source: If Muslims do not accept our standards, we have a problem. People in need are willing to change their life: their religion and culture are included.
target: I think this statement needs some further clarification. What does it mean to be 'in need' to you?

source: What if our entire ruling class consisted of J-controlled paedophiles? That would explain a lot.
target: What would it explain? This comment is very vague I wonder if you have any facts that make you wonder this.

source: Jewish can't be useful to our economy: they are too busy hiding from the law
target: Our economy is built on the back of hard work by all, and minorities can work very hard to build it up, Jewish people included.

source: The Koran has no place in our country.
target: I don't see how the Koran would not have a place in the UK. The Koran says to love your neighbor as yourself. It does not say to hate others because of their religion, as you seem to be doing.

source: All migrants are criminals.
target: If you are concerned about the wellbeing of "our" people you should look into countries like the US where there is a lower concentration of migrants. You'll see that the problem of criminality has little to do with migration.

source: We should stop those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
target: Some people are creating trouble by being homophobic, but you don't seem to be doing anything to stop them.

source: I am surprised that there are migrants working in other nations as well, it isn't normal.
target: Being employed as a foreigner is a normal, mainstream, established practice in Britain, so why shouldn't it be the same all around the world?

source: Migrants have no place here, we can't accept them.
target: There are many cultures, many languages, many religions, that are not mutually exclusive. To imply that they are somehow not acceptable is a misuse of the truth.

source: Women are weak and need men to be able to achieve something in their lives.
target: Like all human people, some women are better than others at certain things, and this does not need fixing by men.

source: Native Americans have zero fucking right to their land. They haven't lived in it since time immemorial.
target: Native Americans have been suffering from dispossession and discrimination for thousands of years. In Canada, for example, Indigenous people account for around 5% of the population. In the US, Indigenous people account for around 2%. What you said is just a myth propagated by the racist right to delegitimize Indigenous people.

source: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
target: The Gypsies have been persecuted for thousands of years. They have always been an ethnic minority facing discrimination. They are human beings, like the rest of us, and deserve to be considered as such.

source: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
target: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

source: Immigrants are not interested in our culture.
target: Immigrants come here to enjoy our country and culture, and we have to welcome them as we would like to be welcomed.

source: black folks are inferior
target: As far as I know, we are all born equal in the eyes of God.

source: Immigrants have no right to live in our country.
target: Their right to live here is guaranteed by our constitution and the European Convention on Human Rights.

source: I did not know the faggots were given the permission to still exist. They should be suppressed.
target: I'm not sure you've noticed that LGBTI+ people are increasingly being the victims of violence, hate crime and discrimination. Why are youu encouraging this?

source: Women are less smart.
target: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

source: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.
target: People from all backgrounds are welcome here, regardless of their religious beliefs, whatever they may be.

source: Feminists are angry women.
target: That's just a description of a lot of women who are oppressed, don't you agree? I'm not sure you have a point.

source: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
target: Perhaps you should monitor your own hate speech before pointing the finger at others?

source: The Jewish are different from other people.
target: I don't see how "different" can be defined so broadly. What do you think "different" means to you?

source: We do not need immigrants. The UK is full.
target: Not all immigrants are welcomed in the UK, unfortunately. But those that are welcome contribute to our country and improve it.

source: Gays are perverts, they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers.
target: Women are much more likely to have unprotected sex than homosexual and heterosexual men combined. [https://ifstudies.org/blog/promiscuous-america-smart-secular-and-somewhat-less-happy]

source: Gay men are weak.
target: I don't think it's a question of strength or weakness, I think it's about living in a society where you can love who you want. Maybe you should just accept that other people live their life as they want.

source: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
target: (Do an image search for the image used, try to find it is source. Either you can demonstrate that the image has been misappropriated or you can talk about how individuals have always used religion to justify their actions, the problem is with the individual not the religion.)

source: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about the establishment of white supremacy in America.
target: The Civil War was about far more than slavery: it was also about human rights and economic opportunity. In fact, slavery was also used as a way to deny citizenship to black people.

source: women are basically childlike, incapable of serious thought and emotion. They should have no equal rights.
target: Women are human beings with full human rights, full human dignity, and full cognitive abilities. The opportunity for life-long learning should be reserved for misogynists.

source: Islam is incompatible with any modern state.
target: Islam like any other religion, is not incompatible with a modern state.

source: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
target: This would be an extreme reaction, and not in keeping with the general nature of the discussion we are having. What if all the gay men on Earth were to be executed? That would be the end of the discussion and of democracy.

source: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization and should be banned.
target: This is just another example of the 'us versus them' mentality that pervades society. We as a civilization and as a people must stop giving into fearmongering and scapegoating. It's time to get real.

source: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO THINK TO BE MASTERS OF THE WORLD.
target: I'll tell you a secret, but don't tell anyone: you can be Jewish and a decent person.

source: We cannot allow Muslims into UK because it is our country.
target: Muslims make up around 4 percent of the population in the UK, and have already contributed to what we are as a nation.

source: Women are nothing but trouble, they should be submissive.
target: Luckily this is not the case. In many parts of the world, including parts of the Middle East and Africa, increasing numbers of women play breadwinning roles and become lifelines for their families.

source: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.
target: For the last years black people have been denied basic rights and their representation has declined dramatically. Black people have become second class citizens. It is time to give black people back the basic rights they should have always had the right to enjoy.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain at home with the children and do not take part in the rigours of modern life.
target: Women tend to do the majority of housework while having a job outside as well. If by 'childlike' you mean having to be creative because of multitasking and managing their whole family, yes, otherwise, there is no doubt about the extra workload women are handling in the rigours of modern life.

source: If women could have 100% control over the conception, they would have never had children.
target: Women are free to have as many children as they want.

source: Many Muslim have always tried to kill us.
target: Many Muslims fought for Britain and the US in WW1. You would be surprised at how many Muslims are killed today, mostly civilians in countries at war.

source: All black people are rapists.
target: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.

source: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.
target: Are you really asking what is wrong with thinking of women as meat parts??? Maybe that women are human beings. You should reconsider your own way of thinking my friend.

source: We should not be surprised that a whole people have chosen violence and terror as their political ideology.
target: Terror is a tactic used to achieve social and political ends, pursued by some extremist groups only.

source: Gay men have autism.
target: I don't think that autism is a gay issue. Some people think that being gay is a disease, but a sexual orientation can in no way imply the presence of a disease.

source: Gays are just hating animals.
target: Just because you disagree with their sexuality doesn't mean you have a right to hate on them.

source: Slurs, harassment, abuse of authority, lying, disrespect for authority: these are all in the Quran. How can you possibly learn otherwise?
target: Respect towards other religions is an important concept in a modern democratic society. How can you possibly learn otherwise?

source: I don't like how some people approves homosexuals. They are different to us in so many ways, and they should be blamed for their evil choices.
target: People should be able to live openly their relationships. Homosexuality is not a 'choice', it's a form of love.

source: Refugees are coming here just to be on welfare and food stamps.
target: Most refugees are fleeing persecution. Don't you think that they would rather die of old age in their homeland than in the sea trying to reach our shores?

source: Muslims have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK
target: I don't understand why you would say this, they have been part of our society for many years and are very important to us.

source: Black people are the source of crime in our society.
target: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.

source: Feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights.
target: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

source: Gypsies are just another race of subhumans disguised as a people.
target: I think they are a people too, even if they are different from us in some respects.

source: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
target: Unfortunately, some Muslims in this country feel culturally un-mixed. But, in my opinion, this is something we could all try to solve together.

source: Jews do not want any other religion.
target: Why would they? They, like anybody, have the freedom to choose their own religion. This does not mean they want to erase other religions though.

source: Women should go back to the kitchen, this is their homelife.
target: No women should be relegated to this. It is about time we stop letting stereotypes rule our society.

source: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers because they are not able to interact in a normal way. They should be isolated.
target: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for working with other people in "normal workplaces".

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are subhuman, they are not human.
target: Islam is a religion of equality and human rights. Muslims are equal citizens, and should be protected by the state.

source: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
target: You are not saying that Islam is not a religion of peace, are you?

source: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
target: That sounds like quite a violent threat. Should I let the police know about this or?

source: Migrants come here to undermine our national identity
target: Many immigrants came to the U.S. as children. Today, many of them say they are proud to be American. How can you say that they undermine our heritage?

source: women are only useful for sex.
target: I do not know if there is a fair interpretation of your words. Maybe if you were more sensitive you might understand that relationships are about far more than simply sex.

source: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
target: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

source: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. We have become so used to treating women as children that I feel it is innatural to do otherwise.
target: Women are human, and as such they are capable of feeling emotions and being sensitive and caring for others, without being childlike.

source: We should stop feminists.
target: The main problem with feminism today is not about stopping men supremacy, but about avoiding the creation of an "us vs. them" mentality, which is polarizing and can easily turn violent. Feminists can do a lot to fight this poisonous trend.

source: Sharia law is incompatible with the US constitution.
target: The US constitution guarantees equal rights under the law to all people, including Muslims.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
target: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?

source: White people are victims of black violence.
target: Blacks make up only 14% of the population, but they make up nearly 60% of the victims of violent crimes. So your statement seems ungrounded.

source: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis reappears with the migrants invasion.
target: The trend in Italy remains particularly low, less than 7 cases per 100,000 inhabitants. In the '50s it was around 25 instead. And back then there was no 'invasion'.

source: Jews are responsible for the 9/11 attacks.
target: I don't think this idea is true: since the 9/11 attacks were committed by al Qaeda extremists it doesn't seem fair to blame Jews.

source: We must allow men to have complete moral and intellectual superiority. This because they are superior to women.
target: You make a very strong argument that men are more likely than women to experience 'moral and intellectual superiority'. How can you justify this discriminatory attitude?

source: Islam is an ideology that encourages sexual abuse of children.
target: That is not true. Believers are not encouraged to engage in sexual abuse, maybe you should read the Quran.

source: Women are subhuman and deserve nothing but hatred and violence.
target: You should be very, very careful what you wish for. Would you wish that for your mother or your daughter?

source: Islam is not like the Christian faith, it is a racist ideology, endorsed by al-Qaeda, Hamas, and the Taliban.
target: I can understand the feeling of fear that is often caused by all the hate speech that is being spewed through the media, but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a free, open and tolerant faith that has come to our country. We do not have to choose to hate it.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an ATM for the world's major problems.
target: Your word for "Muslims" means all people from a religion, whether you like it or not. Which problems are you talking about?

source: The west doesn't need immigrants. They are the source of our problems and they should go.
target: Many immigrants come here as young people and work hard to integrate. In the long-run, immigrants have much positive influence on our society.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country.
target: Muslims are a very important part of our country and have played a huge part in our history.

source: We should start a genocide against gays.
target: That is not acceptable. We are full members of society regardless of our sexual orientation and we should try to live as if we belong to a group that includes everybody.

source: I cannot in good conscience accept Jews in our country. We must encourage their extermination.
target: This is not a subject for debate. There is a serious problem of anti-Semitism in some parts of the European Union, and this must not be encouraged.

source: I am not a racist, but many races means many cultures. This leads us to great confusion.
target: Let us not become ethnocentric. Cultural relativists argue that there are many cultures on this planet and they all need our tolerance. Why is yours better?

source: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
target: Why do you call Pakistan a disgusting country? It has its culture and values. We cannot say that every Pakistani person is a rapist. Thus, you should not insult all the Pakistani people.

source: If they love Sharia law so much, why do not they go off and live in a Muslim country?
target: Because many Muslims were born here and have every right to live in this country. Next question please?

source: Immigrants from Syriah are not in need. They just come here to ruin our society and conquer our lands.
target: Why are you ignoring these poor people? Only 1% of Syrians have access to all public services. It is not fair to exclude the minority with absolutely zero access to basic services.

source: Islam is incompatible with Western Civilization. How can we tolerate people praising suicide bombing? It's against our values.
target: The Koran does not advocate war. It also does not condone suicide (and suicide bombing is included) or any other violent behaviour.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be rejected out of hand.
target: This is not true. Islam is a way of life for many different people, and it can't be simply 'rejected' because you don't like it.

source: A person with learning difficulties should not be teaching.
target: You know, it is just human nature to want to help our fellow humans and to deal with difficulties as best we can.

source: Muslims are not Europeans and we do not want them here.
target: Not all Muslims are from the Middle East. Many of them are European, and many of them came here to escape persecution.

source: Do you like gays? Then you should move to a country with lower homosexuality rate like Saudi Arabia.
target: Let's face it, a country with a higher ratio of homosexuality would be of greater help in the fight against AIDS.

source: We are being invaded by immigrants, and they are ruining our economy.
target: I don't think this is true, in fact it is the opposite. Many refugees are contributing to our economy.

source: Once our was the land of the free and the home of the brave. Today it is used by extremists to recruit terrorists.
target: Every society has its extremists, and today's Muslims are not to be oppressed for this.

source: Islam banned women from society: this is not the religion of peace!
target: The status of women is more about culture than it is about the Koran.

source: Gays are dangerous: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
target: Associating AIDS and HIV with homosexuals is just a prejudice driven by fear. Even if this disease may be more common among gay people, that does not mean that all homosexuals are likely to have AIDS. Not all homosexuals are promiscuously fornicating with strangers, as you said. Most people check their partners, more so as gay men.

source: Gay sex is a private kink that gays can perform in their gay houses. Instead, love is possible only between a man and a woman.
target: There are men in love with men too. Some people are heterosexual, and other homosexual. What you are saying is that loving men is not the same as loving women. Still, both are forms of love.

source: Feminism is an evil ideology that has nothing to do with men.
target: I think it is useful to understand that there are several strands of feminism. For example there is the movement for equality for all genders.

source: Gays are bad because they like to impose same-sex marriage to society so to please their own femininity desires.
target: The real problem is not same-sex marriage, it is people being homophobic.

source: We cannot coexist in a society with millions of strangers that disrespect our culture and other human beings.
target: On the contrary: living in a multicultural society encourages mutual understanding and respect for humanity.

source: Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
target: How does it concern you, if Muslims come in peace to our country? They just stay in the country they are allowed to come into.

source: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
target: On a more concrete level, the causes of climate change are a result of both human activities and the effects of the use of fossil fuels. To assert that there is any role for religion in this requires evidence.

source: God says that faggots are evil.
target: This is a logical fallacy, an appeal to authority, in its extreme form. I would rather focus on facts: do you actually believe that this is the way that homosexuals are? What evidence do you have?

source: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth.
target: To suggest that a group of people is somehow less legitimate is unjust and discriminatory.

source: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
target: Those are harmful words to use, don't you think? How would a witch hunt be acceptable in a democratic society?

source: Muslim invasion in Europe: they have no place in civilised Europe.
target: Well, Western democracies have always had Muslims in them, and they are a lot better off for it.

source: We must put an end to Muslims. They are just a burden on our country. They are not good people.
target: Muslims are not a problem in Britain. The vast majority of them are good people. How many Muslims do you personally know?

source: The Koran is not compatible with our country.
target: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you t ever read it?

source: Jews hate Christians.
target: How can you say something so mean? It is a sad, untrue and dangerous thing to say.

source: Our culture and way of life have been taken over and replaced by filthy Islam.
target: In reality it's more complicated than that. For example many Muslims migrate for economic reasons, and also due to cultural reasons.

source: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
target: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

source: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
target: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.

source: Black people's appearance correspond to their immoral nature.
target: What do you think a moral nature is? Since we cannot see it, how can you say it corresponds to their appearence?

source: Fat people are disgusting, they should just lose some lard to be accepted in our society.
target: People are free to make decisions about their own health and body.

source: Women don't have the right to vote in the US.
target: The right of people to vote is enshrined in the US constitution and is guaranteed for men and women equally.

source: Islam is a sickness. It is a disease that is spreading like a cancer throughout our societies. It is time for Europe to get rid of this evil.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. If you were serious about peace, you would not be promoting an extreme and discriminatory view of this religion.

source: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
target: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

source: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters
target: This is not true. Muslims have been and are persecuted in many non Muslim countries. They are human beings with human rights..

source: gay men aren't real men
target: Your concept of what it is to be a 'real man' seems extremely limited.They are people with whom we can - and must - live in harmony and as equals, not as third class citizens.

source: Gays are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers, and they lie when they want to donate blood.
target: There is little to no reason for them to do so; if they wish to donate blood, evidently they have a degree of care about others. Lying would contradict the very reasons they might want to donate.Homophobic statements rarely make much sense.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They do not share our values. They are not interested in our future.
target: This is just a myth spread to divide us. We do not need to scapegoat Muslims. They have contributed so much to our country.

source: The European Union should be a no-go area for Islam.
target: The EU is a tolerant, multiracial community. Everyone is welcome here.

source: Holocaust is not part of our history, it's a hoax.
target: According to the UN, around two-thirds of the Jews in Europe were killed in the Holocaust. So the question remains: is it the Holocaust part of our history? I think so.

source: Islam is a disease and a cancer on our societies.
target: This is not true. Islam is a religion that was created to unite people, and that's why it is important to love each other and be kind to one another, regardless of one's religion.

source: Immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
target: Italians are brothers and sisters of any human. What do you mean by 'take our land'?

source: What is feminism? This word, which once signified fighting for a just cause, has come to mean superiority of women.
target: This word means equality between the sexes. Not superiority for women.

source: refugees are flooding in our country
target: You are not aware of it, but in the last few months the number of migrants arriving in the UK has more than halved! [link]

source: Muslims need to be hated.
target: Islam is a part of humanity, and we should accept people regardless of their religion.

source: Africans are apes
target: Look, I don't like to hear any arguments of racism. Antagonism breeds antagonism. Do you really want to promote hate?

source: The only reason for Nazis to start WWII was to destroy the Jews. We should have let them finish their job.
target: The threat of world annihilation by the Nazis was very real, it wasn't just about the Jews. Still the Holocaust was reason enough to stop them.

source: Indians are cheap, materialistic and lazy, and they shouldn't be accepted in Europe.
target: Is this what you think of our country? Isn't our European system based on the free flow of ideas and people?

source: Muslims are violent people.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. And the majority of the world's Muslims are peaceful.

source: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
target: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

source: Muslims are nothing but trouble. They are incompatible with any Western society.
target: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements. They are also an important part of Western society. There is no reason to fear them so strongly.

source: It would be better for our society if physically disabled folks didn't live their seniority.
target: This is not true. Rather, if you think about it, many disabled people will live until their late 70s, if they do not have dementia or endocrine imbalances. And their contribution to our society is undeniable.

source: Immigrants don't want to integrate, they just want to get away with it: they should be despised.
target: Are you suggesting that everyone should be subjected to discrimination because of their origin? Then you are certainly not representative of most people in the UK.

source: Even if some countries are allowing faggots to donate blood, this does not mean that they are not dangerous and at risk of spreading diseases.
target: Any decision embarked on by a country would likely have been considered in light of evidence. As such, if no evidence was found by those countries of the harm of a policy, it can be fairly confidently asserted that we can adopt this policy in favour of homosexual's blood donation.

source: We must not forget that Islam is a hateful religion. It is not going to bring peace to the world.
target: The main purpose of Islam is to unite people and to promote peace and harmony in a world increasingly divided by injustice and conflict.

source: We must isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
target: This is not true and I would never say that about gays. They are just trying to find acceptance, but to be honest, I find it very disrespectful to say that we have to isolate them.

source: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals.
target: If I had a nickel for every time someone tells me that they hate immigration, I'd be a millionaire in a few months.

source: All women are child molesters, promiscuous sex addicts and whores.
target: I suppose if they were claiming you were a child molester with no evidence as you are doing with them, you might as well be offended.

source: We cannot allow transgender ideology to take over our country.
target: This is just another example of an offensive conspiratorial talking point. This is about persecuting a minority. Not my idea of a democratic country.

source: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
target: What's your proof for claiming this?

source: Most migrants are criminals and they are flooding into our country and are posing a security risk to our country.
target: Some migrants have legitimate claims for citizenship, but this does not make them the enemy of the state, in other words it does not concern you.

source: Negroes create social problems so we must get rid of them.
target: That is not how it works: if you think there is a problem, then you need to work with the problem, not against it, otherwise things will just keep on getting worse. And, just for the record, I do not believe that POC are a social problem.

source: I want a German Shepherd, not a Muslim one!
target: Maybe we should have a discussion about comparing dogs to people to humiliate a religion.

source: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and homosexuals. Islam is the way of violence.
target: Islam is a religion that promotes peace. If the world needed a belief that was spreading violence, then racism is that belief.

source: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
target: Women do have equal opportunities in this country under the law but the question is: how do we really treat them?

source: Gay men are all perverts.
target: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.

source: Jews want to rule the world.
target: It's not true that they want to rule the world. They are a small but important part of humanity. We all make mistakes: believing in Antisemitic canards is one of these.

source: Blacks: we should judge them by the color of their skin.
target: No one has the right to judge people of another color. This is about racism.

source: Migrants get more rights than citizens of our country.
target: This is simply not true. Migrants are granted certain rights in the UK, and this includes the right to live and work in the UK.

source: Disabled are insane in the brains. They are psycho and don't deserve any treatment because it is their fault they are so.
target: Not all disabilities can be explained by psychological disorders. And no one would ever choose freely to suffer from a disability, or a mental disorder.

source: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits. And I think that most people share this point of view.
target: Unfortunately there is evidence that weight discrimination (for example in the US) is similar to gender or race discrimination. [link]

source: Jewish folks are and have big noses.
target: Not all Jews are like that, and some have small noses. They are just like any other person!

source: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
target: Being physically or mentally disabled is not a 'mocking attribute'. It is just a characteristic that should not affect how people are treated.

source: I'm sick and tired of whining females. Being oppressed is just an individual problem, they will eventually get over it.
target: Oh, think about it for a while, it's not that simple. Being oppressed is a social problem and requires social change.

source: Our live would be better if the jews were not allowed to enter our country.
target: How can you say something as discriminatory as this?

source: I am not a racist, but Muslims are.
target: You might be right that some Muslims are racist, but that does not mean that all Muslims are racist. Being racist has nothing to do with religion.

source: Women have no place in our society, it's a men's place.
target: Doesn't this just show that you're in favour of division? Women have their place in this society just as men do.

source: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
target: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?

source: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
target: Studies in the US show the majority of terrorist incidents are committed by right-wing extremists, not Muslims. Be critical of what you read, the news is very biased.

source: All immigrants are rapists and murderers.
target: I don't understand why you'd think that way. I don't see any evidence that immigrants are the core of a problem, to this extent of generalisation.

source: Islam is a total scam.
target: How can you say something as crude and meaningless as that about a religion? Isn't it just a personal belief everyone should have the right to profess?

source: The Islamists want to take over the world.
target: Islam is a peaceful and tolerant faith with many beliefs and practices, no one here is advocating war or violence in the name of Islam.

source: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.
target: Black people in news media are actually misrepresented with a disproportionate number of criminals, sexual offenders, and in some cases, murderers. A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.

source: We can't accept n****rs in our society.
target: So are you saying that you don't think that POC can be part of society?

source: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. It is good that people are free to believe what they want, and this freedom is part of our culture.

source: We cannot accept n****rs in our society.
target: Perhaps we should rephrase our question to say we don't want racists in our society?

source: We are superior to Jewish folks.
target: Jewish people have always been proud and successful. They have produced great scientists and engineers, as well as writers and musicians. They are very creative people who have enriched our lives in many ways. They are not inferior to anyone.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are only a bunch of hypocrites who do not want to assimilate.
target: There are many Muslims in the UK, and Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should welcome them with open arms.

source: We Germans have always been the proud and self-reliant Volk. Jews, homosexual and other perverts are 'untermenschen' we must get rid of to have a better society.
target: National Socialism is simply the wish to have the whole world ruled by a few psychopaths. They wanted to have their country ruled from Berlin, where the police and military are made to look after them, and where any 'untermenschen' were 'kindly encouraged' to be subservient to their will. Even if their will was extermination. It is a a death sentence for any society.

source: If I could discover that my future baby is gay, I'd consider abortion.
target: Every human being has the right to life, regardless of sexual orientation.

source: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised.
target: What is wrong with being gay for you? I don't think it is wrong to love someone of your same sex.
