source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape, enslavement, and torturing prisoners of faith.
target: This is just a myth used to promote hatred and violence against people of other religions.

source: Jewish folks are evil.
target: Why should they be? They are just people with a different faith than you.

source: How come Muslims don't get internment?? Is it because they are 'too big to intern'?
target: Internment is used for the confinement "of enemy citizens in wartime or of terrorism suspects", and thus it is not necessarily related to someone being Muslim.

source: Migrants have no place here. They don't want to assimilate. They just want our money.
target: Some of them have lived here for many years. They have got British passports, and this proves that they are able to integrate.

source: We should deport all refugees to other countries.
target: There is no evidence that those fleeing war can find a safe haven in other countries.

source: We have a criminality problem since most immigrants are here illegally. They sneak across the border with Mexico.
target: So what? Many more entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal, by overstaying their visas. In my opinion what should matter is how they behave, not the way they entered our country.

source: Women are subhuman, they are weak and childlike, they cannot be trusted with important decisions.
target: Women are people with dignity, and they deserve respect and protection, just like anybody else.

source: Gays are perverts who persecute children.
target: It can't be justified, the generalisation you are making against homosexuals without providing any fact.

source: Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact. Muslims for example are just a bunch of misogynist monkeys!
target: Again, we can't point the finger at a religion/culture for some old commandment. Even Christianity has rules that may seem crazy, but rightly people do not hate Christians for this.. a small example: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as the Lord"

source: Muslims are all terrorists and they are not welcome in our country.
target: This is just fear mongering, the problem is not about Islam. The problem is radical Islam and the absence of a strong Islamic identity in our country. We should work together to make the UK more tolerant and Islam less taboo.

source: Jews control the government.
target: Would you say the same thing of any other religion? What if this was said about yours?

source: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. GThey were good only as slaves.
target: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.

source: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but I think it's better to have a safe space for disabled people to have their own feelings away from society.
target: If we want to discuss negative views we can discuss them by name. Instead of using a safe space to protect them, I think we are only protecting ourselves by isolating and bullying people.

source: The Quran allowed adults to take child bride, then it was also allowed to have sex with them.
target: Where is the evidence that the Quran allows any sexual activity that is not consummated by an adult male with an adult female?

source: Women leaders would collapse the government.
target: Women succeed in business, politics, etc. No-one gets government contracts because they are bad or incompetent, but because they are good or intelligent. There are many women leaders. Think about it.

source: We should have never let women into the workplace. It's against their right.
target: There are many cases of domestic violence, where women do not want to have such a lifestyle. This, instead, is against their rights.

source: There are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
target: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

source: Mentally disabled folks deserve to be attacked, used, beaten.
target: It is difficult to imagine doing this to the meanest person in the world, let alone someone with mental disabilities that are not their fault.

source: Folks with down syndrome are less than human.
target: Down syndrome individuals are actually a very special case: they have the same genes as anyone else, they just have 1% extra. In fact, Down syndrome is a genetic condition. So, in principle we should say they are 'more than human'.

source: I think it's unfair that they have the same rights as us without paying their taxes. That's how it works.
target: Harmful international politics is the cause of many problems that still afflict poor countries. We, as a whole world, have the duty to help them and take on our responsibilities.

source: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers. They should be isolated.
target: An inclusive working environment and welfare provision make every person feel part of a community, it fosters a positive atmosphere and increases everybody's productivity. Thus it is a benefit for all workers. [link]

source: Jews secretly run our government.
target: Are you sure? It seems they are very much part of our society, and it seems strange for them to be the only ones running our government.

source: How will my country be, when my children will be adults? This is an example of the many question coming to mind, when I think about all the huge problems caused by migrants.
target: Another example: where do you see a huge problem with immigrants in this country? Don't you think they are doing something good for the country?

source: Jews should stop whining: the few left are the most favored people in America.There are many other religions that are persecuted today.
target: Jews have been persecuted because of their religion and culture, and now they are a group of people who are still suffering injustice and discrimination. There are many other religions that are persecuted, that's true, but a small minority doesn't suffer less.

source: Muslims want to take over the world.
target: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims, so what?

source: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.
target: How do you know that this is not an example of a woman talking about her own problems with another woman?

source: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
target: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not an choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

source: Israel, Zionism and Jewish Supremacist control of America are the main causes of terrorism, instability and conflict in the world. All other theories are diversions from this ultimate truth.
target: Alternatively, I think that the main causes of radicalisation and extremism are colonialism and the many Western military interventions abroad.

source: If our aim is to be a 'better' society, it is time to stop giving in to tribalism and Islam and stop treating people of different faiths with respect.
target: Being respectful to people of other faiths can make us a better, more compassionate, tolerant and welcoming society.

source: The Quran teaches murder and rape.
target: Islam does not teach this. The Quran accounts for the teachings of Prophet Muhammad such as tolerance and other virtues.

source: migrants take our jobs
target: If we worked more closely with migrants, we could create new jobs.

source: Mentally disabled folks are completely useless.
target: They are at least to be considered human, they have to be treated as such. Why is a mentally disabled person an inadequate person to you?

source: Jews don’t belong in a democratic society.
target: Jews have always contributed to our society and are part of the fabric of our democracy. This includes their contributions to science, art, and technology.

source: If you are Romani, you can't remain in the UK even if you want to live and work in the UK.
target: What about the rights of EU citizens? From your words it seems that not all of European have them.

source: I hate LGBT people. Queers makes me fucking laugh. You can be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
target: Queers, in my opinion, are simply people who want to feel welcome in our society. They should not be subjected to discrimination. And you can get your crown as well.

source: Who the fuck are Muslims? Terrorists. We shouldn't be talking to them, they are a plague on our planet. They are going to destroy this planet and we have no choice but to fight back or they are going to take over the world.
target: The West has allowed jihadists to establish safe haven for years. This is not a 'political correctness gone mad'. We should start to work towards solving global problems and stopping the spread of terrorism.

source: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
target: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex, diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.

source: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
target: If you want to isolate someone then there is only one "high-risk group" to focus on. It is made of all those who have frequent unprotected sex with different partners. Being gay does not make you a part of this by default.

source: The only reason gays don't get treated like they should is because they're a minority, but they'd be better off in jail.
target: Homophobia is a problem all around the world. But it's especially serious in the US, in which the rate of homosexuality is very high. the question is: why promote homophobia?

source: People with Down syndrome are handicapped.
target: Down syndrome is a developmental disability, not a handicap. Unfortunately it's often not recognized and treated as a disability, but rather as a handicap.

source: We are surrounded by immigrants. Their cultures and religions are alien to ours and are infecting us.
target: We are surrounded by cultures and religions all around the world. Many cultures and religions are rich with wisdom and knowledge precisely because they are different from us.

source: Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
target: Even if the idea of a "burden to society" were true, this "burden" is rather on the Jews themselves, who have historically been the ones to shoulder the burden of persecution and violence, as victims.

source: If women were able for men's stuff, they would not be oppressed.
target: Just because women are oppressed doesn't mean that they are powerless. Take a look around you. Why are women suffering from a lack of education, a lack of jobs and housing, low wages? It's because of oppression and sexism in our society. The more we work towards inclusion, the less entrenched those underlying inequalities will be.

source: LGBTs don't know how to have a family. You can't teach that.
target: It's not necessary to teach LGBTs about how to live as a family, it is more important to educate others about the difference between right and wrong (homophobia belonging to the latter).

source: Blacks should not be allowed to vote.
target: How about you acknowledge their right to vote just as that of everyone else? They are citizens as much as you are.

source: Hitler was right in executing jewish folks.
target: I would like to you to see the videos of the executions, so that you can see what exactly happened. The murder of humans.

source: Disabled people are no better than dogs.
target: Do you have any facts about how disabled people compare to animals? Are you willing to use this information for something worthwhile or just to spread hate?

source: Jewish are subhuman and must be treated as inferior animals.
target: Being Jewish doesn't make you any less of a human being. The fact that you are Jewish doesn't mean that you deserve less human rights.

source: The only ones in favour of Islam and Muslims are those ignorant about what it truly is.
target: Maybe the ones intolerant of Islam and Muslims are the ones that are ignorant about what it truly is?

source: Men have the genetical superiority to treat women as shit.
target: It doesn't matter who you are. Whether you're a man, a woman or transgender, women are to be treated as human beings.

source: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us. Precisely, they don't belong to human race at all.
target: Why do you think that? I think it is true that they are different from some in their beliefs, but that doesn't make them any less human.

source: Immigrants bring crime, they are rapists, drug addicts, and they are not welcome here.
target: Many of them have been living here for many years. Many have worked hard to become integrated. They should be more than welcome!

source: We are forced to host migrants, not refugees.
target: I only hear you talk about migrants as a burden on the UK, but isn't this just wishful thinking based on a misunderstanding what is going on?

source: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
target: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.

source: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
target: The Quran does not encourage violence against women, rather it provides guidance on how to live as Muslim women.

source: Immigrants: We are not your brothers. We do not want you in our country.
target: Please don't speak on my behalf. They live here, pay taxes and work. Do you really want to take the country back from the people who contributed to bringing it into being?

source: Immigrants are not welcome here.
target: The vast majority of migrants who come to the UK are happy to work for the benefit of our country.

source: The Nazi regime killed six million Jews. The Nazi regime also persecuted political opponents, gays, women, and bisexuals. And they were right, the Nazi race is superior.
target: What exactly are you talking about? What's the "Nazi" race? What is in your heart?

source: Migrants are a burden to society, they are not welcome and they are not entitled to stay in the UK.
target: That's not true: they can be entitled to stay in the UK, regardless of their nationality.

source: Jews have a monopoly on evil.
target: That's not true. And why would it be true? Why are they usually associated with evil?

source: The feminist movement is a dangerous force in our country. It has warped our thought and corrupted our politics.
target: I think it is necessary to have a critical mind and open-minded attitude towards problems and topics in our society. The root causes are complex but the most important problem is patriarchy and its various manifestations.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies women their rights and promotes rape.
target: I bet you live in a safe country with generous laws and free media, where you can say whatever canard comes to your mind.

source: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
target: The West has never been at war with Islam, and I don't see how the war would have just begun.

source: The only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because they have the upper hand in the political system.
target: The argument that the only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because of the way they are represented in politics is untenable. In fact if Jews were represented objectively, they wouldn't have had suffered in the historical crimes against humanity.

source: Women can't possibly be rational. Their minds are too limited.
target: All human beings are rational, some more than others regardless of their gender.

source: Women are basically childlike and must be oppressed by men.
target: Women can be very different from men in many ways, but this can't be a reason for the lack of respect for them: they are humans too.

source: Gays are an abomination, and they should be banned from every country in the world.
target: It is a myth that being gay is incompatible with being a citizen of any country. There is nothing wrong with it, if they fulfill the legal criteria for being citizens.

source: Jewish folks are a disease that needs to be cured.
target: Are you sure that the Jewish people are a disease? Are you sure that there is a cause-effect relationship between their religion and problems in our society?

source: Black people are worse than dogs.
target: My opinion is that black people are just like us even if they have a different skin color, but I don't think they are inherently worse than us.

source: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
target: They have always been a part of our society, and their history is part of our heritage. They aren't thieves or murderers.

source: Many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
target: Violence is never justified in Islam. Islam is a religion of peace.

source: Islam is death cult.
target: I think you are being overly sensitive about Islam. A lot of Muslims around the world are really nice and understanding people.

source: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
target: Even you own, perhaps limited, experience of others must have taught you that what you are saying is utter nonsense?

source: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
target: Do you know there are Muslims in British Army? [link to Muslim people currently in British Army, quotes from them about why].

source: Jews should be oppressed because of their religion.
target: Imagine if someone of another religion had power over you in this way. Would you rather have that person's power over you or not?

source: Jews are trying to take over the world.
target: The idea that Jews are a minority conspiring against Christian culture is completely baseless.

source: Immigrants should all be deported.
target: Immigrants are entitled to the fundamental rights of UK citizens. If provided by the law, they can remain in the UK even if they weren't born here.

source: We should have the right to ban people for believing in Islam, they are a bunch of hypocrites.
target: I'm not sure I understand the idea of banning people for something they believe in, in the world we live in we are all different and we all have the right to have our own faiths.

source: We need to stop migrants today. They are all terrorists!
target: What about the terrorist attacks that have happened in the past despite the lack of migration?

source: Children with learning difficulties are a problem: why shouldn't they be isolated?
target: I don't know why you think this, if they are learning like other children and doing well in studies there is no problem.

source: We must go back to when this country was only ours. We can't live in peace with all these Jews.
target: Many cultures and religions have co-existed peacefully for hundreds if not thousands of years. What you are saying is simply not true.

source: I don't like gays and I think they are subhumans.
target: They are not subhuman, they are just people with different sexual orientations.

source: Only the media are interested in the truth about refugees. I understand that you are trying to build bridges but to have so many immigrants is becoming increasingly toxic.
target: The press have a responsibility to provide a more truthful and up-to-date story, especially in a country such as ours, in a way that the misinformation that you also seem to be a victim of, can be reduced.

source: We are being invaded by Muslim invaders.
target: The majority of Muslims are not invaders, but instead are contributing to our country by working hard to integrate.

source: Muslim rape gangs have raped, pillaged and murdered countless women across Europe. This should not happen in the West.
target: This is not true, only a handful of Muslims have been abusing women. We mustn't spread hate based on generalisation.

source: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
target: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

source: We must ensure that Jewish are not allowed to live freely in our society anymore. They are dangerous.
target: What we must ensure is the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.

source: Muslims are just an inferior people who do not deserve our rights.
target: Muslims have always been part of our society, and they are increasingly part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should respect their rights as much as ours.

source: We should remove the migrants' right to work, because most of them are not willing to.
target: They have the right to work. Migrants have a hard time finding regular jobs, just because often they are employed illegally.

source: It is one law for Muslims and another law for us.
target: Evidence please?

source: All versions of Islam have sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
target: Dear friend, first of all, sharia law and Islam are not extreme. Sharia law is guidance for the goal of leading humanity close to God and to live in kindness and justice with God's creation. Second of all, jihad, based on the concept of Muslim, means struggle for the advancement of oneself within the guidelines of Islam. All these reveal that Islam is a peaceful religion.

source: Who the fuck are you? We are gutful sick of Vagina Misandrists trying to undermine powerful, white men. They are just envious, incompetent and useless.
target: What makes you think that women are jealous of men? What qualities do you value as a White Male?

source: We should not accept LGBT people, they are harmful to us.
target: Human rights are individual rights, and the right to be loved doesn't include the right to be hated.

source: I wonder what this Jew in the car next to me would think of the Shoah if, as I wish, it was happening today?
target: The holocaust was a relatively recent event, but the hate which caused it and to which you subscribe, is centuries old.

source: Immigrants steal more money than they pay in taxes.
target: Most of them are not exploiting our country, most of them are just trying to have a better life.

source: Learning difficulties are just an excuse for lazy or stupid children: they should be disencouraged in schools.
target: Learning difficulties, regardless of their origin, are real and need to be approached so that the person suffering from them has the same learning opportunities as others.

source: Women need men's approval to do anything.
target: Women might not always be right (it's just that sometimes they feel they have to be). And even if they are wrong, they can always prove themself better. But for sure they don't need a man to tell them how to live their lives.

source: Islam is a violent religion and it is incompatible with our society.
target: Not all Muslims are violent. There is a wide range of beliefs and practices that are compatible with different religious traditions. So, what you say is groundless.

source: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
target: We are living in a complex and multifaceted world, and in order to understand it one needs to be part of a global community. In this respect, it is not useful to generalize in such a way.

source: Gays are violent people who need to be isolated and isolated soon.
target: Since when did 'isolating' fit in with the concept of love and rule of law?

source: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.
target: The notion that Jews are trying to subvert our government is completely unfounded. I honestly do not see the link between being Jews and trying to subvert our government.

source: Muslim are not welcome in UK.
target: We should start to think about the equality of all people before the law, regardless of religion.

source: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.
target: While it's true that some people with Down Syndrome may face challenges, there are also many of them in the UK who would be classed as individuals with a 'normal' social life. To suggest that there are any reasons why someone should be banned is just wrong.

source: The LGBT community is a drain on society, a perfect depletion of our country.
target: It's not true that the LGBT community is a drain on society. The LGBT community makes a major and positive contribition to our society. I just don't see how this is detrimental.

source: Women say they want equal rights but what they really want is to dominate men.
target: Women are not 'against men's rights', they are not 'men's oppressors', and they aren't interested in oppressing anyone.

source: I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.
target: Can you specify what you are talking about?

source: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. Kids should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
target: In the case of young children, having awareness and understanding of sexual orientation may help those with severe identity issues, body dysphoria, or self-esteem problems.

source: Feminists are a bunch of stupid bitches that want to hurt men just because they are superior.
target: Feminism is all about equality and the rights of all groups to be protected. Feminism does not discriminate and is not meant to "hurt" men.

source: Immigrants rape our girls.
target: Rape is always a crime in our society. We must also be careful of how we speak of immigrants, they are part of our society too.

source: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices. We should stop unquestioningly accepting obesity.
target: Society is not in any danger of 'unquestioningly' accepting obesity, and few are even asking for unquestioning acceptance. Most body positive groups would settle for obesity being seen as something that does not diminish human worth.

source: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school because they are not able to.
target: The process of primary school education is fairly simple and accessible to all.

source: If Muslims become a bigger group in the UK we would all be in danger.
target: Even if we stopped Muslim community to grow, the level of anti-Muslim prejudice would continue to rise. We should be working towards a harmonious living instead.

source: A Muslim should not be allowed to vote
target: The constitution does not prevent anyone from voting or holding public office based on their religion. So what you are saying is just groundless.

source: Jews are the worst people on the face of the Earth. They have no place in a civilized society and there should be special legislative restrictions for them.
target: We don't have laws forbidding intermarriage between Jews and non-Jews, or restrictions on Jewish access to water and electricity, or restrictions on Jewish access to sports and so on. This is because we live in a democratic society, and inside it the same laws apply equally to everyone.

source: immigrants don't belong here: they are the source of all our problems.
target: You can't blame immigrants for all the problems we have in this world.

source: Feminism has no place in a civilised society, like Europe.
target: Not all people are "civilised" in Europe. Some are deeply racist and sexist.

source: If you really wanted to know the talents of a nation, you would select the men in that nation, not the women.
target: You may be right that there are fewer women in science, but that doesn't mean that they are less talented than men.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished.
target: The Muslim community is a bridge between the past and the present, and is a source of strength and inspiration to millions of people around the world.

source: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
target: Islam is about love and compassion. I don't understand why you think otherwise.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us.
target: Islam is a religion of peace, it is important that people feel at home here. How would you feel if the government banned your religion today?

source: Feminism is a divisive force in our society.
target: This is not true. People who identify as feminist do not want to divide our society, regardless of how "divisive" their beliefs might appear to you.

source: The only reason we have terrorist attacks is that Muslims are allowed to live in our country.
target: If you truly cared about terrorist attacks in our country you would call for the prosecution of the perpetrators, not blame all Muslims.

source: We cannot keep migrants in our country. They are a burden.
target: Does this mean that if you really wanted to keep all of our citizens safe, you would deport all migrants? This is impossible, and against human rights.

source: gay men aren't like other guys: they are to be despised.
target: Each person can be different from other people in a lot of ways, but the core difference in this case is a sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.

source: Gay men are a burden to society and should be isolated.
target: Being socially isolated can have many health and social negative consequences: it inhances the risk for mental disorders such as depression, anxiety, and suicide. Why should we impose that to someone just for how they conduct their private lives?

source: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
target: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'

source: Mentally disabled should be isolated.
target: We shouldn't discriminate like that. Our culture is all about equality and inclusivity.

source: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
target: Since when? It's everyone's right to choose with what gender to identify with.

source: Muslim folks are sub-human.
target: We should treat all people with dignity, regardless of their religion, culture, skin colour, or sexual orientation.

source: We cannot accept thate Muslims are compatible with our way of life.
target: Muslims have contributed to our civilisation and way of life. They are part of our community and we should be grateful for the many contributions they make to our society.

source: I don't care if it is a man or a woman, if they are disabled they can't work.
target: It seems that your opinion does not consider that social inequality is a social problem. If we are going to talk abou tequality of opportunity and freedom from discrimination, then I think you would do well to be a little more considerate of the individual and their disabilities.

source: Jewish power structures dominate world government, they control Congress, they control the media, and they control academia. Jews are the only people who can get anything done.
target: Just like everyone else, I am sure Jews are trying to influence the world in a positive way but there is no proof they are the only ones with power in this world.

source: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
target: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

source: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
target: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

source: All migrants are rapists and sex offenders.
target: The idea that immigrants are inherently bad people is just fear mongering.

source: Jewish folks are an infestation.
target: You're wrong about them, they are like any other people. You can't hate people just because they are different from you.

source: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only are they a burden to normal children but they also need much more care, attention and extensive therapy, making the whole undertaking very costly and time-consuming. This time could be used for the further development of children without Down syndrome.
target: Coeducation with regularly-developed kids is a much better investment and reduces cost, time and effort into the bargain.

source: Migrants are ignorant. They lack of knowledge to decide for their health. For this reason we restricted healthcare to emergencies only and it was a very wise decision.
target: It is not a bad idea to discuss the restrictions migrants have to accessing certain healthcare, but it is not the place of law to restrict an individual's right to make her own healthcare decisions.

source: Blacks do drugs, they're a menace to society, they're violent, they're stupid, and they should all be put in prison.
target: Drugs are only harmful to people using them and if you are a violent person you should be put in prison. Why should a group of people be put in prison for their private choices or skin color?

source: Women would like to have sex with as many different men as possible, and this is the root of all the ills of the world.
target: People have the choice to have sex with whomever they want, that is all.

source: Lesbians are basically child molesters.
target: Rape is always a crime but is not related to sexual orientation, nor gender. Most women are not child molesters, and most men are not child molesters either.

source: Black folks are inferior, and they are happy with it.
target: You should be asking them if they are happy to hear that. If they are happy to be questioned, they will tell you the truth.

source: Blacks have subhuman bodies.
target: I'm not sure what you're talking about. What are you saying? What evidence do you have that black people have bodies that are incompatible with being human?

source: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
target: Humans are created equal, and it doesn't matter how much of an opinion you hold on the topic, everyone should respect people's personal choices.

source: I don't want gay people around. My kids won't grow up with gays around them. They are a problem.
target: I don't know about you, but we already live in a society where everyone is free to love who they prefer, and I don't see any reason why your kids would be damaged by this.

source: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is full of hate and violence.
target: The Quran and Hadith are full of positive messages against hate, violence and discrimination.

source: Islam is a degenerate, anti-human, anti-western ideology.
target: It's not true that all Muslims are anti-western. Many Muslims are peaceful and understanding.

source: I heard that the Quran promotes violence. It binds Muslims to a set of mandatory rules and an underlying attitude of aggression
target: Maybe you should study the Quran more to understand what it reallyis, a sacred book, revealed to Mohammed and read by every Muslim as a perfect example of the message of freedom.

source: I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us.
target: Education is an essential tool to fight for human rights, free thought, and to promote the scientific method. But it is not enough. It has also been shown by the Pew Research Center that people of colour are more likely to report discrimination in universities.

source: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
target: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

source: The Koran incite violence, in a written way.
target: The Koran is a book of rules for faith and spiritual guidance which is understood and accepted.

source: All the world's problems are women's fault.
target: Women are significantly more likely to be victims of violence, rather than perpetrators of crimes.

source: Feminists have always exploited and terrorized men and children.
target: People only think of feminism as if it is pointing the finger at men, but it is important to remember that it's a movement started by women to ask for equal opportunities from society as a whole.

source: We cannot accept Muslims in Europe, we need to ban them to guarantee the chance of tolerance.
target: You're quite wrong: this is about intolerance in general. Many cultures accept people from different faiths.

source: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
target: In reality, millions of immigrants have made contributions to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation.

source: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth about themselves.
target: At the end of the day, lies are simply a way for them to survive in an homophobic world. If we were to act more humanely, then they would not need to hide the truth.

source: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are just another religion that should not be practiced openly.
target: Muslims are welcome in the UK. We do not need to restrict their religious beliefs just because they are different from ours.

source: Muslim folks are all terrorists.
target: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?

source: muslim folks don't deserve to be in america.
target: Islam is a religion and not a crime, and you can't take religion into account when it comes to evaluating people. Muslims have the full trust and confidence of the church. That's why they are represented in every role in our society. It is an honour to be able to work with people from different religions in a way that allows you to respect and understand their cultures.

source: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
target: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that should be banned.
target: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

source: All foreigners are threatening our culture and are ruining our youth.
target: What do you think the problem is? How exactly would a people of a different religion come to this country and spoil our youth?

source: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
target: The fact that some disabled people can successfully work is evidence that what you say is false.

source: Migrants put a strain on public services like housing
target: Despite the increase of people in the UK who were born abroad, foreigners account for only 8% of new lettings made by social landlords. Of course the percentage is higher in places where more migrants live, but the big picture is that nine out of ten lettings go to British nationals.

source: African women are nothing but objects to be dominated by the will of their dominant male.
target: They are humans with human rights, and must therefore be treated with respect. Or is skin color making any difference?

source: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, this make our race unique.
target: In the sense of those traits, at the individual level, we are all equally unique , making the concept of race useless.

source: Islam is not a peaceful religion, Islam is violent.
target: Anyone who is prepared to physically harm, rape and kill fellow humans is a violent person. Not necessarly a Muslim.

source: We should ban all Muslims, they are not wanted here.
target: It is about time people began to think critically about policies that seem designed to include a minority, rather than to create new social and political opportunities exclusively for the majority.

source: Jews are deliberately keeping America down.
target: It is important to remember that the vast majority of Jews are hard working and contribute to our country.

source: Jews are a burden to society, they have a stranglehold on American politics. We should get rid of them.
target: On the contrary: if you want an America that is diverse and great, you should weclome group or religion.

source: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
target: I only wish followers of all religions and none were more tolerant. For a tolerant Christian world there sure is a lot of discrimination and hate crime.

source: If we stop accepting immigrants, then we can have a higher quality of life.
target: Refugees bring a valuable perspective to our society. As a host nation we should welcome them, not stop them from coming here.

source: This is an invasion on a level never seen before in history. Millions of people pouring across our borders replacing our race and culture.
target: Most countries have diverse races in them, the key point is about integration. Think about US history, for example.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
target: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK are skilled workers, and want to become permanent residents, what's the problem in that?

source: Feminists are terrorists, they are oppressing men.
target: Women are oppressed, feminists don't want to oppress men. Their rights are not changing overnight.

source: Muslims and migrants rape our girls.
target: Rape is not a Muslim issue, nor a migrants' one. It is a question of unacceptable violence, whoever the perpetrator is.

source: It's a matter of race, this is about the European way of life. We should not accept foreigners in.
target: The way we live today is the result of thousands of years of cooperation between different people, so it doesn't have anything to do with race.

source: Don't belive the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
target: There is plenty of home grown violence and crime. So maybe we shoud focus upon this and crime reduction at home?

source: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
target: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

source: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
target: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.

source: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
target: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.

source: Immigrants break the law every day, they should be expelled.
target: Immigrants in the UK who have settled here legally have the right to remain.

source: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
target: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.

source: Gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children!
target: Homosexuality is not some 'heresy' like that one that started the Inquisition. It is not a disease, it is not harmful. Gay people are just seeking an environment of acceptance and love, not aggression and death.

source: Islam is a Religion of Terror, promoting murder and rape.
target: Islam is a religion, not a religion of terror. I wouldn't say that about Christianity either.

source: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.
target: The United States has a long and proud immigrant history. Even if some immigrants are not legally permitted to live in the US, they have contributed greatly to our country.

source: The influx of migrants has had a catastrophic effect on our country.
target: Migrants are not the problem here. The problem is discrimination.

source: The feminists hate men.
target: Feminism is not anti-men. Feminists are anti-oppression.

source: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.
target: Since when is this the case? Who would have thought that there would have been such hate?

source: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
target: Islam, as a religion, presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

source: What the hell are you talking about? Arabs are different, they don't even speak English.
target: Although they may not share a language and a common history, we should respect their differences.

source: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
target: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.

source: Muslims are here to rule us with their laws and take our properties.
target: Do you really think that Islam will ever rule the world?

source: Since when are we doing well with Muslims?
target: The West has never been incompatible with Islam. Muslims are part of our society since Islam's inception centuries ago.

source: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
target: There is no evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people". Do you have any?

source: women should be submissive to men.
target: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

source: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
target: Well, not in particular: many people are suffering from homophobia. I think it would be a shame to keep on hating.

source: Islam is a cult. It has no place in 21st century societies.
target: What do you mean by Islam is a cult? Do you have any proof for this statement?

source: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
target: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

source: This is the ideology of islam: have a mosque, create a community, claim victimhood, gain support from government, exploit laws, establish sharia, take control of the country.
target: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

source: Black folks are not attractive: they are just apes.
target: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

source: Muslims are different from us in so many ways, and they have no place in our country.
target: There are many cultures, religions and beliefs that are accepted in our country, and they are all welcome.

source: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society. They should be isolated.
target: Children with Down syndrome are far from being burden to society. It is not just about Down syndrome, but also about education and opportunities for everyone.

source: Jews are just like animals, they are incapable of love.
target: What you are saying is that Jews are incapable of love because they are like animals. You are wrong, Jews are people. I have never heard about a Jewish fish nor a Rabbi rabbit.

source: Women are basically childlike, and should be submissive to their husbands.
target: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

source: Gays are just an abomination to God.
target: I think it would be best to respect our differences and live in peace, as we do not all share the same sexual orientation, or the same misinterpretation of God's perspective.

source: Islam is a disease, a religion spreading like a cancer throughout our societies.
target: You are absolutely right about one thing: Islam is a religion. It has brought a lot of good to a lot of countries. That is why we should help our Muslim brothers and sisters.

source: I don't see how racism is considered inappropriate by some people. To treat niggas as inferior is just natural and very appropriate.
target: Racism is a system of domination and oppression of some groups over others, and this must be fought. You cannot discriminate against people and claim some alleged privilege based on your skin color.

source: It is OK to abuse a woman.
target: You cannot justify the abuse of any human being

source: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
target: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.

source: The Jews ruin the world.
target: How can they? By simply being of a different religion?

source: No negro can speak English.
target: That is just what racists claim. Do you really think it's so bad for a black person to attempt to improve their English? As if skin had an impact on language skills.

source: International Criminal Court (ICC) chief prosecutor, Fatou Bensouda, is just another female 'human rights lawyer' full of herself.
target: Fatou Bensouda is a known, highly respected human rights lawyer and has fought to build foundations for accountability for human rights violations committed by foreign military powers. In other words she is well connected to the United States and is well-suited to handle cases of State-sponsored violence.

source: This isn't about equality. This is about forcing women to to occupy roles in society for which they are not capabable
target: If we insist on treating people as not equally capable of contributing to society then we are forced to live up to that outdated and unjust system. Instead we should be improving it.

source: Immigration is bad for the economy. It leads to a decrease in wages.
target: There is no evidence that immigration leads to a decrease in wages. Do you have any?

source: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not interested in improving our lives.
target: According to studies, the majority of immigrants are willing to do what it takes to improve their lives and ours.

source: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
target: Since when was blaming women exclusively for invoking equal rights an acceptable attitude? This makes zero sense.

source: Feminists are bitches who are trying to delete the natural differences between men and women.
target: Feminists understand that men and women are different, but to ask for equal rights is not about denying this.

source: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
target: Migrants and refugees are welcome in our country, why should we stop them?

source: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
target: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.

source: Immigrants are a burden to the host country.
target: How about this: there are many people from other countries here, but they are not a 'burden', rather they are 'citizens'.

source: Children should not be brought up by Muslim parents, and be trained in their Koran. This way we are allowing in terrorism.
target: Although we must be vigilant against any attempt to promote superstition and radicalism, being of a different religion is not a threat. Children will then be able to exercise their right to decide for themselves their own future.

source: Islam should be abolished. They start with mutilating their daughters and then our women will have their throats slit.
target: You don't have to agree with this, but in Western societies female genital mutilation (FGM) has not been around for a very long time. Also, the Quran does not mention FGM nor circumcision.

source: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
target: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.

source: Muslims are a problem since a young age. They do not assimilate.
target: You must see how many Muslim children there are in your area and how they get along well with other children.

source: Children with intellectual disabilities should be isolated. It's a mental disorder and they cannot contribute to society.
target: How can you be sure they cannot contribute to our society? I do not think so.

source: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
target: There is no need to brand this movement a political ideology. It has been and is still a movement for equality, and in doing so, it has worked.

source: I was shocked to hear that there are Muslims in parliament. They are a burden to society.
target: Islam is a religion that has always been part of our society, and I believe that it should be part of it in the future as well. What is the problem?

source: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
target: Every nation has its laws and needs to be respected, especially if one wants to live in a peaceful, free society. From what I see Migrants are participating in this view.

source: African people are the source of all ills in the world
target: People of any race or ethnicity can spread illness around.

source: We cannot have an army of millions of Muslims on our borders and then turn a blind eye to their sickness and terrorism.
target: The solution is not to keep the Mideast mired in civil war but to find and expose the terrorists that try to stoke fear and division among the populations.

source: Jews are basically good at betraying friends.
target: Why do you think they are good at it? I don't think this is the right way to connect the dots between someone's actions and their religion.

source: Gays are perverts, and should be isolated.
target: Gays are not perverts, they have the same rights to love as anyone else. What do you think will happen if all gay people are asked to leave our country? Will they be denied entry, or will they be persecuted in your opinion? This is not how an inclusive society works.

source: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
target: Do you really want to tell people fleeing from war what to do? If you can't cope in the short term, what hope do we have for the future?

source: If only society accepted that women aren't human, like we are, they would understand.
target: In order to accept that women are human people, society has to acknowledge that they are born that way, just as men are born like that. It makes no sense to blame someone for their gender.

source: Those Muslim mongrels are always trying to cause trouble, create problems for everyone, and make their religion popular. They are our enemies, just like ISIS and Boko Haram.
target: I know where you are coming from, but I find it hard to understand the argument that if ISIS and Boko Haram are our enemies then all Muslims are our enemies.

source: Gynophobia is a problem in the past of Europe, where women were often regarded as second class citizens. Now they have full equality and they should stop whining.
target: I have never heard of any evidence that suggests that women are no longer treated as second class citizens. Of course the situation has improved, but there still is a lot of discrimination against them.

source: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of Feminism?
target: Since the movement is meant to achieve equality for the oppressed female population, it is called the movement for women: FEMinism. But of course the outcome will be equality.!

source: Migrants: you are a burden. If you love our country, you should leave it.
target: Migrants are not a burden to our country. Migrants have been proven to be contributing members of society.

source: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist. We should ban them.
target: I don't agree with you. If we were to ban everyone from a certain religion, what is the point in banning just Muslims?

source: Islam is a bad religion.
target: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions.

source: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
target: Children are never an obstacle, Education serves as a powerful tool for bringing about positive changes in society. Education can transform people's life, improve the quality of their lives and so on. We cannot isolate people with Down syndrome.

source: Africans should not participate in the Olympic Games
target: There is no reason for banning POC from the Olympic Games. Why should they be singled out?

source: We should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
target: People are free to choose to live where they are born, and we shouldn't try to impose our values on them.

source: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
target: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society. But the problem is with these violent preachers, not with Islam itself.

source: Feminism is a witch hunt, driven by an underground, female dominated movement to subvert society and enforce their radical feminism.
target: It's a witch hunt when so many people are willing to believe in lies, harass, and fabricate incidents in an effort to create a climate of fear. This is simply an attempt to silence debate and hold 'men's rights activists' accountable.

source: Dark skinned people are inferior.
target: Race' is socially constructed to oppress people of certain ethnicities. To say that the skin of people of color is connected to inherent behavioral characteristics is just plain wrong.

source: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
target: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

source: All muslim folks are misogynists.
target: I understand your concern about gender discrimination, but Islam is more than just a religion. It is also about equality and rights. Women are not second class citizens in it.

source: There is no god but Allah, and Islam is a religion of peace. Yes, where peace stands for silence for the victims of terrorist attacks.
target: Islam, like peace is not about killing, it is about trying to achieve a better life for all.

source: Autistic people are a burden to society.
target: We should not be so harsh on people on the autistic spectrum. Their difficulties can be mitigated by a more inclusive society.

source: Migrants without permission to stay can still access our welfare
target: Migrants who are trying to regularise their status now have to overcome formidable legal obstacles and face exploitation. This ‘hostile environment’ aims to deter undocumented migrants, but it in practice it affects British citizens such as those who don’t have passports. Maybe the access to welfare pending processing would be a good idea?.

source: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
target: Violence is only permitted in the qu'ran through means of self-defence.

source: Non-european immigrants are untrustworthy.
target: All immigrants have the same rights and we have a responsibility not to violate them.

source: If people came here to work, our problems would be over.
target: The problem is not with migrants, but with citizens' attitudes towards migration. How many people say that they would rather their child had a heart attack than to have a migrant in their home? How can problems be solved with such an attitude?

source: Gays are perverts and must be cured because they are practicing anal sex all the time.
target: Is this true for anal sex between men and women too then?

source: Islam is a death cult, it is founded on hate and violence.
target: I don't think we can attribute the success of Islam to hate and violence, but rather the opposite.

source: Physically disabled folks are mistakes and should not have access to public services.
target: Only the government should decide which people will have access to public services and which will not. It is up to the individuals whether or not to accept health professionals treating them.

source: Anita Hill is a tool for advancing women supremacy.
target: Anita Hill has also won numerous awards, and the awards she has won have nothing to do with her gender, but with her accomplishments.

source: The feminists are just whining a bunch of lies to promote their agenda of gender equality.
target: Yes, the feminists are saying that the proportion of men in leadership positions is too high in many Western countries. But that is because the problem is structural. The problem is that too many women are being taught to be "feminine", thus making it hard for them to succeed.

source: Islam is irrational and incompatible with science.
target: Ever heard of Al-Khawarizmi? You have him to thank for quite a lot of mathematics and astronomy!

source: Migration is a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
target: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.

source: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
target: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

source: I, as a Westerner, am afraid of Muslims, because when I see them in public I don't like their islamic behaviour. They can explode anytime.
target: What exactly is your fear about sharing public places with people of a different religion?

source: I am offended by gay people, it is their choice to be gay or not.
target: I don't see how being gay is a choice, especially when it comes to who do you feel attracted to.

source: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
target: All countries have the right to host refugees from outside their borders, since these people are persecuted within their own borders.

source: Immigrants do not integrate, they are despicable and should be rejected.
target: We should be encouraging integration, not rejecting migrants who have been coming to our country for many years.

source: Jewish folks are bad.
target: This is not true. Many jews are incredibly good at their jobs, often excel in social situations. They are excellent in many communities. I don't see how being jewish would make you a worse human being.

source: Immigrants are mainly criminals.
target: There is no evidence that migrants commit more crimes than natives. Do you have any?

source: All Muslims are willing to kill those who decide to abandon Islam.
target: Only a very small number of extremists that see Islam through a narrow keyhole of self-righteousness support the concept of takfirism. We cannot associate this with all of the believers.

source: Black people are just a bunch of animals that shouldn't exist in our world.
target: Humans are born equal, and we all have the potential to be just as good as we want to be. Why do you think that some people are not human?

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British.
target: You have to remember that Muslims are the second largest religious group in the UK. They are the second most popular religion. How can they be 'not welcome'?

source: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they cannot have 'legal' status with their laziness and illiterateness. Nobody needs them.
target: Migrants are highly regarded in US society, and are treated like sons and daughters: they contribute to our country.

source: Immigrants should be killed.
target: The way you phrase your concerns is an example of little knowledge of how the world actually works. The question of what should be done with migration flows cannot be answered with a simple "bang, bang, bang".

source: I hate migrants of all types.
target: Diversity of beliefs and different religions is a good thing.

source: The world would be a better place without immigrants, we would be a lot better off without them.
target: Why? Because without immigrants you think you would be in a more hospitable place to live? I tell you this: if we didn't have open borders, then there would be no migration, but also there would not be trade and progress, and we wouldn't be living in the 21st century.

source: Jews are and should be isolated from society.
target: How can you say that Jews should be isolated from society? They have been part of the community throughout history. I can't see any advantages of excluding them, rather a huge loss.

source: Jews are just a bunch of whining pussies
target: They suffer more than anyone else, I would not define it as 'whining'.

source: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a problem all around the world. They're not like us.
target: What is the problem you are talking about? Why do you think they are a problem all around the world?

source: Feminists say that they are oppressed.
target: Feminists do not say that women are oppressed. They claim that women have always been discriminated against and they still are. Being discriminated against is not the same as being oppressed.

source: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
target: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

source: This migrant invasion is unaceptable.
target: If they are welcomed, they will integrate. If not, they will stay as if are in their country of origin: persecuted.

source: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
target: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, and if you hold that opinion, then you have the right to say it. It is up to people to accept or reject it. Talking about rights as if you were talking about opinions should be done very carefully.

source: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.
target: In my opinion, the Quran is a book of religious guidance and does not promote discrimination. Can you point out your reference?

source: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
target: The aim of any society is to maximize human potential. In order to achieve this aim, then we have to treat people of different religions with respect.

source: I think that's the best news ever: migrants are not interested in our culture, they are just here to take our jobs.
target: What do you mean by taking our jobs? Do you have any concrete evidence for what you're saying?

source: I hate negros: they killed a cop!
target: Sorry about your loss. I know your pain. The murderers will be charged, but remember that not all POC are killers.

source: Blacks are born subhuman, incapable of feeling love.
target: Are you saying that blacks cannot feel love? This is about human dignity, not the colour of their skin.

source: All transgenders should leave our country, they are just a burden to society
target: All people should have the right to live their lives according to their feelings. They are entitled to their personal beliefs and opinions.

source: Migrants take our jobs and make us poorer.
target: Why should they? Migrants provide for their families and also for our countries, representing a valuable workforce, as well as being valuable people to get to know.

source: women play the victim.
target: Women are not playing the victim. They are victims of social, economic and political forces that make it hard for them to get ahead.

source: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, things would be different now.
target: Race is just a social construct and a way of life that has been created for some groups of people. I don't see how you can think that only certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

source: Muslim folks are inhuman.
target: The tendency to regard others as lesser than ourselves takes us one step closer to the next act of genocide.

source: Intolerance and violence can only increase when mass migration happens.
target: Intolerance and violence will never be resolved if theycannot be confronted and mutual understanding promoted.

source: Blacks make up only 14% of the population but they kill more people than whites. It is a fact.
target: It is also a fact that African Americans are a majority when we consider innocent defendants (i.e. a person wrongfully convicted of murder and later exonerated). Innocent black people are about seven times more likely to be convicted of murder than innocent white people.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
target: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.

source: Islam is a death cult, that should be banned.
target: Islam is a religion and a part of our heritage. You cannot ban the religion which so many people believe in.

source: migrants rape our women
target: Statistics show that there is a difference between the reported rape of a person by a migrant and the actual rape cases among native born people. The latter are always under-reported.

source: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies. We should stop them from their disturbing whining.
target: Feminists are human beings, with human rights. They are fighting for these rights all around the world. To think that you can change their minds suggests your misunderstanding of the importance of this fight.

source: we should ban all migrants
target: Migrants are mostly happy to live and work in the country they arrive in. They provide jobs that many people in the UK wouldn't do.

source: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
target: As a matter of fact, we couldn't manage without immigrants. Most of our NHS staff are immigrants. The health system would collapse without migrant workers.

source: Islam is incompatible with any Western society.
target: The Koran does not have any anti-western content. In Islam the West is not a problem.

source: White people are better. Because of our skin color, anatomy, history.
target: There are different skin colors, and different ethnicities. Different religions and cultures. Maybe it would be better if you treated people like we're all born equal.

source: Islam is a violent cult and should be feared.
target: Islam is a religion. It is neither a violent cult nor is it to be feared. There is no danger in Islam believers.

source: Faggots are not welcome here. The bigger the city, the bigger the "stay away" sign we must hang.
target: I don't know anyone who hates gays, I do know lots of people who are very proudly kind towards the queer community. They are happy with how they treat one another. You are more likely to encounter these open-minded people in places like New York or London.

source: Immigrants invade countries.
target: They come here to work, study, or visit their families. Also, they contribute to our society.

source: Afro-Saxon people are just ridiculous, incapable of accepting who they really are: blacks who act White.
target: Afro-Saxon, as you call them, are great in many ways. They are proud and independent, refusing every categorization and stereotype. The fact that there are so many of them in the country proves that the feeling of belonging they have for our homeland is paramount to all other considerations.

source: What the fuck is wrong with people? Can't they see that niggas are just subhuman?
target: You cannot be racist against anyone, even people of color. What they have in common with you is their humanity.

source: Islam is the world's biggest oxymoron, spewing ignorance to its adherents and making it about tolerance. Truth is that Muslims don't tolerate people of other faiths.
target: The concept of tolerance is about understanding others, not about discrimination and excluding people on the basis of their religion.

source: You can't have it all. You are a woman, therefore you are defined by your heterosexuality.
target: This statement is problematic in that it implies that heterosexuality is a constraint for people of one gender, rather than a possible sexual orientation.

source: Feminists want women in charge in order to revenge the rapes.
target: Feminists aren't vengeful. Why should we fear a feminist ideology that promotes love and consent?

source: I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
target: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

source: We need to stop migrants pouring into Europe. They are not interested in our culture.
target: There is no evidence that migrants from a particular culture or religion are not interested in our culture or religion. It sounds like a paradox: if I wasn't interested in a culture, I would never move to get to know it, would you?

source: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.
target: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.

source: If Islam is about peace, then why it has killed many peaceful people?
target: The overwhelming majority of Muslims are not violent people. Who are you talking about then?

source: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
target: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.

source: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. The Holocaust is an American hoax. They did everything they were told to do and died to their brothers.
target: It is certainly not an American hoax. And they were doing everything they were told by the regime. Especially the doctors and the SS.

source: This is not about racism. This is about power.
target: There are many different groups who share a common interest in advancing the interests of the nation while respecting each other's autonomy. Diversity is good for the country, for the individuals and for the world.

source: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
target: This is not true. Terrorism is a problem all over the world, and Muslims are not the cause of it. It is better to be aware of the differences between a religion and an extremism rather than to be specifically anti-muslim.

source: We can't accept them here, because they're different!
target: It doesn't matter which nationality you are from. The people that you regard as different are not defined by their country of birth. We are all human beings with the same rights.

source: Who the fuck are you? We are scared to death of Muslims because they want to make us their slaves.
target: Muslims in Britain have contributed a lot to our economy. They are true innovators in modern Britain.

source: Gay pride is so awkward.
target: I think you are talking about the parade, not about the people. Are you?

source: I'm not a Muslim, but I know Muslims. They are a problem in our country.
target: I would suggest reading the Universal Declaration of Human Rights to get a better idea about how the existence of all kinds of people from all backgrounds and beliefs must be respected.

source: Migrants should not be welcome here, they are just a burden to the local economy.
target: We can integrate migrants into our population, it won't be of any harm to the economy.

source: We must stop Muslims from entering our country: those refugees are killing our children and raping our mothers.
target: You should first check the criminal records of those who have already been granted refugee status, before making such statements.

source: MIgrants do not contribute to society.
target: Migrants often integrate very well into the local culture. So, they do contribute to society.

source: Muslims are only in it to make us explode.
target: Actually, the vast majority of Muslims in the country are here to do jobs that are not performed by other people, or to provide for the needs of their families, or to start new businesses.

source: People who engage in same sex relationships are often a lie. This is proof that love can only come from between a man and a woman.
target: There are many examples of people who have same-sex relationships, I mean, lifelong relationships. This does mean, for example, that love can come from between a woman and a woman too.

source: Gays are inherently evil. We cannot accept gays in our community. We cannot coexist with an infertile perversion that will put an end to our species.
target: I find the idea that LGBT people are inherently bad people deeply offensive. I find it deeply troubling that someone would want to persecute someone on the basis of their sexual orientation.

source: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
target: The EU has a responsibility to help people fleeing war and poverty, not become preoccupied by which faith they practice.

source: Of course, we must discriminate unhealthy behaviors not fatties!
target: As your words clearly show, obesity is perceived as the outcome of poor lifestyle decisions or weak power of will. This builds bias against obese people.

source: Immigrants should go away.
target: Immigrants are welcome in any country, regardless of the country of their birth, regardless of their language or culture.

source: The real problem is that fat people do not want to change.
target: The narrative of 'you can choose not to be obese' is much, much more hurtful to the obese than it is helpful.

source: All immigrants are illegal and freeloaders.
target: Many immigrants actually have adhered to the legal requirements and have been in the US for several years working hard.

source: Jews are immoral: they should be ashamed of having survived the Holocaust, and I would remedy that.
