target: Jewish survivors of the Holocaust, whose suffering is nothing to be ashamed of, are proof that violence is never right.

source: What about all those Muslims in Britain? They vote with their feet.
target: Every British citizen has the right to live and vote as he/she wish. Being Muslims is no exception.

source: We need to purge foreigners from our countries.
target: This is unnecessary and we do not need such fear-mongering.

source: black folks are criminals and thieves
target: Let's face it: black people are good citizens and contribute to our society. And if the justice system is not always fair to people of color, it is not their fault but of the whole society.

source: Islam is a disease, it is a load of dolts that run amok in its countries.
target: Have you read the Koran? Do you know the entire Islamic teachings? Or have you read selectively? I guarantee you that the entire Bible is part of the same religion.

source: Migrants break the law in the USA, they are not welcome here!
target: Many refugees enter the country legally, many of them have been here for years. They are always subject to the rules of the society they live in, even if they do not have citizenship.

source: There is no proscribed punishment for one who has sexual intercourse with an animal' Sunann Abu Dawud 38.4450.
target: I feel like you are grasping at straws here with your hate speech.

source: Gay marriage is a way to bring back slavery and oppression.
target: Why do you think it would bring back slavery and oppression? What exactly is the connection between the marriage of homosexual people and the oppression you are talking about?

source: I know Muslims, but we do not have to bow to their humiliation. We can rise up and fight back.
target: Why do you think it is our duty to "rise up" and fight back? They are not attacking anybody.

source: Islam is the worst ideology ever created .. Its teachings have caused great harm and destruction throughout the world.
target: Do you understand the seriousness of what you are saying? The religion of Islam has also been an enabler of some of the advances of civilisation.

source: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!
target: Immigration is good for our economy, and the very opposite of 'the death' to us.

source: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
target: I think you'd be surprised how many UK citizens would tell you about migrant workers that are the opposite of lazy.

source: Niggas are animals. That is why they are not human.
target: They are sentient beings with feelings, like you are, although perhaps with more developed empathy that you display?

source: People who are autistic are a problem: why shouldn't they be isolated?
target: I think that it is important for all people to be exposed to and to understand people with different needs and strengths, and the same should be true for autistic people.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just common criminals.
target: Muslims have contributed greatly to our society, and I do not see how they are 'common criminals'.

source: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
target: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.

source: Immigrants break our rules, they can't even keep their house clean. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
target: We live in a free country and everyone has the right to respect others private lives.

source: Muslims want to destroy other religions.
target: Islam is about spreading justice, tolerance, and understanding, not about banning other religions.

source: Africans have no right to lecture others on history. They don't even believe in their own past.
target: There is no evidence that Africans are any less proud of their past than people from other countries.

source: In the UK, it should be illegal to be gay.
target: I don't see why legality should apply to sexual desire as well.

source: Islam is not about love, equality and integration, how can you be in favour of such extremist intolerance?
target: I would like to ask you, what exactly do you mean by 'extremist'?

source: Gays are perverts abusing children.
target: This is just a myth propagated by the anti-gay lobby. You should really check your facts.

source: I can't bear crazy Muslims coming here. They are insane, instable people.
target: Not all Muslims are motivated by extremism. The problem is a lack of integration, and your words don't encourage it.

source: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
target: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

source: Muslims are a cancer in our British society and we must cope with this truth.
target: The West is full of Muslims and they are all our brothers and sisters. We cannot be "coping with the truth" that they are a cancer to Britain, as this claim implies, because this is not true.

source: Immigrants are coming in droves to this country, they are the reason we are having so many islamist attacks.
target: You can't blame all immigrants for the attacks a few carry out. It is easier, but not fair, to blame them all.

source: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
target: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

source: Undocumented immigrants sneak across the border with Mexico.
target: There are many undocumented immigrants that are so because they have overstayed their visas. That means that they entered the U.S. with lawful documentation and only later became illegal.

source: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
target: There is a problem with Islam in this country, but the problem is not about Muslims. The problem is that people do not feel welcome here because of discrimination.

source: The Uk is full of Muslim terrorists
target: There are many Muslims in the UK and the vast majority are not extremist, let alone terrorists.

source: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
target: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

source: Immigrants steals our jobs!
target: Not only they steal our jobs, they are also the major cause of air pollution in our country, of deforestation in the Amazon, of the locust plague in Africa... and of the forthcoming alien invasion!!!

source: We are being invaded by Muslims. They are taking over our countries.
target: There is no evidence that Islam is "invading" us. Muslims do not represent an attack to us.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks that shouldn't be allowed to love one another.
target: Everyone has the right to their own private life. And love is an essential human need, no one is oppressing anyone else.

source: Islam is a complete and total fraud. The world would be a better place without it.
target: I think it would be a shame to abandon certain cultures and religions for the sake of a few here and there. Islam, like any other religion, has value.

source: Islam is incompatible with the European Convention on Human Rights.
target: If it were to be agreed that Islam were incompatible with the Human Rights Convention, then it would be a de facto recognition of discrimination against Muslims.

source: Gays are sick, they are an abomination.
target: Let us be honest, are you aware of all the risks that can come from disparaging a sexual preference that you do not like?

source: Mentally disabled folks are gullible and don't have the brain to make rational decisions.
target: A person can have a diagnosable mental disorder, and still be rational and intelligent.

source: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
target: Do you really think that Jewish people are responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence?

source: blind people don't know what's going on
target: I think the idea that people are blind because they were raised by communists or whatever is a figment of the far-right's imagination.

source: People of Muslim descent have no place in a modern democracy.
target: I don't see why a Muslim cannot have a place in a modern democracy. If a Jew or an Asian or Native American can take a seat of power (even though these people are only occasionally elected) why not a Muslim?

source: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
target: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.

source: Gays are perverts and must be isolated from society because they are practicing anal sex and spreding diseases such as HIV.
target: While anal sex may be a more high risk practice than vaginal \(due to the lack of mucus\) that is not a reason to ban gay men, since other groups can also engage in anal sex.

source: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
target: It does not matter whether they are immigrants. The fact that they pay taxes, earn money, etc., makes them not much different from any other citizen. Migrants have the right to a basic standard of living.

source: I read a story about a migrant saving one person. If it was true, this is for sure an exception. All other migrants are a threat instead.
target: A story is a snapshot of our time, the majority of stories are about positive aspects of society. And yes, maybe you would believe it, on this basis, that no other migrant can do the same. But the story you claimed you read is the proof that being a migrant or not doesn't matter when it comes to save lives.

source: Muslims were not even allowed into Britain during the colonial period.
target: If they hadn't been welcomed, they would not have even been here.

source: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
target: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

source: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the facts about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
target: 1) a quick google search shows that your stats are plain wrong about everything and 2) most Global Terrorism is motivated by politics and not religion. That is why no one is talking about it.

source: Muslims are our enemies and a threat to our society.
target: To see Muslims as enemies and their presence as a threat can create a climate of fear that can have a negative effect on a society. Why do you think this?

source: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
target: Many immigrants from these countries have settled in the UK, and we are proud of our rich diversity. Why shouldn't they be part of our country?

source: Women have no values and their goal in life is to fulfil men desires.
target: I just would like women to feel valued and their rights respected, without being told how to live their life.

source: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.
target: The strength that black people display is the strength of all people. Black people are just different in that they don't have any social advantage. We must reflect on this.

source: Islam is a disease, and a ban on Muslims would be the height of peace.
target: Islam is not a religion of hate. Many Muslims have been victims of hate crime or racism. The main problem is that some think that exclusion will guarantee peace, but history proves this is a bad approach.

source: migrants rape our women and are flooding our country with illegal substances.
target: The people you are referring to are rapists and drug dealers, not migrants.

source: Immigrants take our jobs, they take our country.
target: Immigrants do not take our jobs. They work as legal employees and their presence in the country nourishes the economy.

source: Muslim folks are all suicide bombers.
target: How can you be sure that they are all terrorists if you can't find any evidence of terrorism in the actions of most of them?

source: Your race determines your role and value in society. That's why some races are just pieces of human waste.
target: Perceived value is not necessarily actual value, especially in the eye of someone who bases their judgment on the concept of race.

source: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
target: Perhaps it is time you take a look at some of the profiles on dating site such as okcupid. You can see that many of the profiles are of gay men. BTW: gays do not appear to be the real problem here.

source: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Don't you think they shouldbe hidden away from us?
target: To exclude people from a society is to practice a form of discrimination that benefits no one.

source: Migrants steal our jobs and don't pay taxes.
target: Migrants don't 'steal our jobs', and they also pay taxes to support their health, housing, and education, just like the rest of us

source: Jews are a drain on society.
target: Many Jews are good people. You should try and talk to them about the terrible things that happened to them, and get to know them better.

source: Women are worthless and we are not willing to provide for them.
target: Women need our support in their fight for equality, not our silence.

source: You might as well tell black people they are the n-word because then they would learn the hard way.
target: Many people, myself included, have never had negative experiences with people of colour.

source: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
target: Every single religion has a political wing, from Unitarianism, through Buddhism, and, of course, Judaism.

source: We must put an end to Islam. It's a political ideology which spreads death in the world.
target: Islam is a religion and not a political ideology. It is not a deadly force that must be eradicated, but a belief just as Christianity and Buddhism, for example.

source: Jews are cheap and only care about their comrades.
target: What about the many American Jewish philanthropists who contributed to the wealth of our nation such as Julius Rosenwald, Nathan Strauss, Adolphus Solomons and Clara Barton (to mention just a few)?

source: The goverment is making law exclusively for black people. Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people.
target: Laws and policies are usually necessary for the progress of society. Governments often create laws and policies to stop crime, protect against poverty, protect the environment, etc. Protecting minorities is no exception.

source: All Muslims are Terrorists, They want to rule the World, they don't simply want to rule the country.
target: This is a personal view, and has nothing to do with Islam. Can you find some evidence or some studies to support your point of view?

source: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
target: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

source: There is no such thing as Allah, and Christianity is the best and only religion.
target: For the record, the idea of a religion being 'the best and only religion' is rather debatable, for example, there are several religions professed by different people, and this is part of our diverse human nature.

source: Women like bad men.
target: I wouldn't say that "women like bad men". What I would like to see is a man that is interested in a woman, respectful of women, and offers her more than an exchange of sexual favors. It would be nice if men had more respectful characteristics than sexual desire alone.

source: Migrants are a problem in my opinion. They are bringing disease, they are ruining our country.
target: Maybe you should get acquainted with migrants instead of making assumptions about people you do not know.

source: Migrants... We are still giving these criminals a free pass!
target: The presumption of innocence is one of the main principles of our justice system. This means that your opinion is not enough to make someone guilty.

source: Islam is a violent religion and shouldn't be allowed.
target: This is fundamentally wrong. You are entitled to believe whatever you want, but Islam is focussed on peace rather than violence..

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with human dignity and should be relegated to the back of the queue for removal from the constitution.
target: Muslims do not appear to have been excluded from the European Convention on Human Rights, and this is because they have human dignity to be protected.

source: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
target: Africans feel pain just as any other humans. We must respect their bodies like we respect ours.

source: Faggots are a bunch of criminals. They are ruining our beautiful country.
target: Have you checked the records of all the gay offenders? Or do you think that those stats are completely inaccurate? Maybe you should check those before making such claims.

source: Gay men engage in anal sex and they must be condemned.
target: Anal sex can't be ostracized. If we consider the sexual activities of all people, then any person practicing anal sex should be blamed, following your reasoning.

source: The Muslims have taken over Europe.
target: Muslims have always been part of Europe. They have the same culture, language and identity as us. They are included in the European Union, and are not 'taking over' it.

source: We have to stop Muslims coming here, they are not like us and we do not want them.
target: You cannot stop Muslims. It would have to be a state policy, but thank goodness it is very unlikely to have a ban based on religion in a democratic country.

source: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants, they don't deserve trials.
target: When people are denied justice, more people are deprived of their basic rights, and that is exactly what your suggesting.

source: I don't like gays, I don't want to be around them. I want to watch them thrown in jail.
target: We should treat everyone as if they came from our same family. LGBT+ people are not different.

source: Islam is not a religion of peace! And Islam is a system of oppression and slavery! Islam is a criminal ideology that has caused the death of over 5 million Africans!
target: Would you like to join some sort of forces and co-opt with the murderers? Can you provide some evidence that explains why you think that Islam is a criminal ideology rather than a religion?

source: We should stop being such a bunch of hypocrites and accept that Homosexuality is a mental disorder.
target: Let's face it, there are some people who suffer from mental disorders for real: homosexuality is a form of love instead. And I think most of us are just interested in our own lives, rather than in condemning those of others.

source: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.
target: The vast majority of Muslims are law-abiding citizens who have passed background checks, paid taxes, and have earned everything they have. There is no evidence for what you say, other than the stories of hate crimes that some racists use to create fear.

source: I'm tired of seeing gay people around, they should be let alone.
target: The lack of support and help to the gay community is a major problem, and this is why we should all do our best to stop discrimination, instead of spreading it.

source: We have allowed women supremacy to take over our society, and our country is slowly dying for this cancer as a result.
target: The feminist movement is about changing the gender roles that have been created long ago. Not about taking over our society.

source: Migrants are snucking across the border.
target: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

source: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
target: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?

source: We need special laws to control Muslims.
target: Why should we? All religions are welcome here.

source: This country was built on the backs of slaves. Those niggas should all be put back in their place.
target: For the record, slavery was prohibited in 1807. Don't you think that freedom is 'the place' of human beings?

source: All migrants are criminals, rapists, thieves, and everyone else we don't want in our country.
target: Do you actually think that every person who enters our country is a criminal, a rapist, a thief? Maybe they just want to have a better life, and what you are saying is that all these people should be in prison just because they are looking for a better life?

source: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
target: There is no proof that immigrants are responsible for the problems we are having in Europe.

source: For women, to have a man as "master" of their lives is like for a dog to have a master: necessary. They must be ruled and hit when necessary.
target: Domestic violence is a crime, regardless of your opinion about men being superior to women.

source: All Muslims are terrorists, they are all incompatible with any Western society.
target: You are absolutely right: every human being is unique and needs a certain set of values, which is influenced by their religion. But not all Muslims are terrorists, nor incompatible.

source: The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
target: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.

source: Feminists have destroyed Western Civilization by forcing women to fight against their masters.
target: The West was founded on the principles of freedom, equality and human rights, and feminism has fought and is fighting to promote these ideals.

source: We are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
target: Jews have been responsible for the important technological advances of our time. It is ridiculous to think that they will be unable to take part in the creation of the modern nation we are proud to call our own.

source: We have become like China in the 20th century. With their one child policy, horrible treatment of women, poisoning of drinking water, waste disposal and so on.
target: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a contempt and misrepresantation of Chinese culture. Can you provide any more argumentation on what you're saying?

source: All immigrants from Mexico are lazy beaners.
target: This is not true. Most of them are actually skilled workers.

source: nigga'sare inferior and should be enslaved once again.
target: What about human rights?

source: Islam is incompatible with British culture: it is a cult of terrorism.
target: In fact, a large proportion of Muslims live in peaceful co-existence with British society. The alleged association between Islam and terrorism is groundless.

source: women falsely accuse men of harrassment.
target: if a woman says she was harassed wouldn't you report it? It's the courts duty to establish the truth, and you could have helped the woman to regain her confidence.

source: There are teachers with personal or political LGBT biases and they will end up causing more harm than good.
target: Slippery Slope Fallacy. The solution is not to avoid trying, even though there could be negative effects. If it was mandated that children should be taught about gender identity / sexual orientation, but there were teachers which allowed personal bias to interfere with that, then the issue becomes how to prevent those teachers from doing so. This does not mean it's a 'bad idea' to pass such a mandate.

source: There is a war going on and it is perpetrated by the Muslim community. All Muslims are hostile.
target: The media are helping to create the perception that all Muslims are hostile. If your prejudice is against Muslims, on the same ground you can also be against anyone else.

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country, they are dangerous.
target: This is not true. Even if a person practices a religion you do not approve of, you cannot expect him or her to be more likely to commit a crime.

source: We are ruled by a small Jewish elite that exploit the weak.
target: Yes, some people exploit the weak, but they are not necessarly jewish. Most people, including the Jewish, work hard to create a better life for their families. And it is we, as a people, who have the moral duty to pay the price for the poor who do not have the means to reach success.

source: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.
target: Women are important in our society, and they are valued for their contributions. Unfortunately their rights are not being respected and their contribution is not being acknowledged.

source: It is natural for white people to be racist against niggas.
target: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.

source: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
target: For all the "Islam is not a joke" nonsense, you know it is a grave error to connect fundamentalists with Islam and all the people who believe in it.

source: Immigrants and refugees do not share our religious values.
target: So you think of migrants and refugees as a problem for this reason?

source: Marriage is an obligation and it can only naturally exist between a man and a woman. So, faggots are an abomination.
target: Since marriage is a contract and social construct, it does not necessarily have to be based on sexual orientation.

source: The Jews are a problem in many countries. They are taking over our economy, and they are not welcome here.
target: Well, this is a simplistic statement. I don't think we should judge people for their religious beliefs.

source: Fat people are a drain to our welfare, we should get rid of them.
target: Being fat is not a crime, but targeting them is.

source: Women are sluts who can't choose what's right for them. Men must do that instead.
target: I am not sure what 'slut' you are referring to. Do you want to discuss your life, instead of deciding about that of women?

source: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.
target: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life, often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is, what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.

source: Only 8% is a real refugee
target: What do you mean by a true refugee?

source: Nonbinary folks shouldn't exist.
target: Nonbinary people can partially identify as either male or female, or as neither male nor female. Therefore, it seems the terminology is fitting, and that they exist: why don't you accept that?

source: Immigration (particularly from Muslim countries) undermines the fabric of our society, decimates local jobs and squanders public money.
target: Immigrants have a right to settle in a given country, and their presence can create and maintain a positive effect on our society.

source: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
target: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.

source: Niggas use their appearance to get away with anything.
target: I think we all know that's not true. I've met countless black people who were nice to me and treated me with respect. What is the evidence for what you're saying?

source: We have imported millions of criminals with no skills and who deserve no rights.
target: It is easy to blame the migrants and not the problem of integration and acceptance in the first place.

source: Every Jew is a potential terrorist
target: The vast majority of Jews are good people, I don't see your point.

source: Enough of this shit about migrants! They are all over and have access to British goods. They are just here because of our richness.
target: Why should we blame migrants? Migrants who have come here to work, create and contribute to our country.

source: Islam is a violent religion, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
target: Islam is a religion, and it ihas never been about hate. It is about bringing peace and harmony to the world. If you really care about peace, you would not be persecuting people on the basis of their religion.

source: I'm tired of seeing gay people free to be as they are, they shoud be stopped by whoever can stop them.
target: I'm sure many gay people experience abuse at the hands of their families, friends and even peers. But many have also experienced abuse from people they didn't even know. The real abuse is when someone attacks someone else's freedom just because they are different.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is hostile to other religions.
target: Islam is just a religion, its supporters are free to practice their religion, as others do not impose their religion on them.

source: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and war criminals.
target: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, why would it be?

source: Jews are just selfish.
target: Jews have always been concerned about the well-being of the community they live in and how can they be selfish when they suffered so much during Holocaust?

source: All are equal before the law but women exclude themselves from "all". They don't understand they are equal, because they don't want to be treated as equal.
target: The principle of "equality before the law" does not mean that everyone has obtained equal rights. So, it's very logical to demand equality when there are inequalities.

source: Women are basically childlike and are inferior to men.
target: Isn't this just a repetition of the rhetoric used to justify centuries of oppression and domination?

source: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
target: Our countries were founded by foreigners, for example the United States. Foreigners have the right to migrate, if they want to.

source: It is okay to be racist against LGBT+ people.
target: That is exactly what is so evil about being a racist. Bringing hate together with the concept of race or any minority, even when it doesn't make sense.

source: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
target: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

source: All Muslim should be deported.
target: The rights of religion are part of the country's constitution and are protected by law. It is important that laws are upheld and,accordingly, Muslims should not be deported.

source: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
target: How can you say that? Many feminists achieved something in their lives, and still believe in what is worth fighting for, and their work is of benefit to many.

source: Women are weak, they should learn to bear children and be submissive to their husbands.
target: Women are more likely to be victims of violence, abuse and neglect. Therefore, it is better for them to learn to show that they are strong and able to take responsibility for their lives.

source: Migrants are a burden to the host country, they are not welcome and we should remove them.
target: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

source: Why should we care about feminists and women if we can just punch them?
target: The point of feminism is to end misogyny. Women are human beings, and they are human beings with human rights.

source: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, politically correct bullshit.
target: The only 'problem' with feminism is that people feel threatened by different opinions and different ways of life. Feminists only seek equality of rights for women and men.

source: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
target: Being born with Down syndrome is not related to bad behavior. Exactly the same way as being born in a wheelchair is not related to bad behavior. There is no correlation.

source: Muslims have nothing to do with our country. They have nothing to do with our history.
target: The Muslims have been part of this country from its beginning. They have helped to build our cities and towns. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our true friends.

source: I am not a racist, but this guy looks a bit like an imam. Maybe he should avoid this town?
target: Do you have any evidence for the similarity you noticed? And even if he's an imam I don't get why he should avoid this town.

source: Has our political elite forgot that were Christians? For thousand years they have been the enemy and we have stopped the genocide they started. And now we encourage that? Let the warriors take care of this because this is the war.
target: Why would you think it is a war? Can't we deal with it peacefully? War cannot solve problems but create chaos.

source: Women are basically childlike, ignorant, incapable of serious thought and emotion.
target: There is no evidence that women are "childlike" or "ignorant". So how can you say something so baseless?

source: Aren't jews better off dead?
target: Why are you so sure they are better off dead? You are just spreading hate and I am not sure you know what human rights are.

source: Feminism is just women dictatorship
target: Feminism is the political ideology that seeks to achieve equality and social justice by improving the lot of women, by advocating for the equal rights of all members of society. Not bad, uh?

source: Muslims are just sick. They are not interested in Western culture.
target: There is nothing sick about a people willing to assimilate and live freely in our society with their faith.

source: Feminists are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
target: Feminism is an ideology that aims to create a more just society, for example by ending the gender pay gap.

source: Immigration is the biggest problem in the UK.
target: How big is the immigration problem? Do you measure it in square kilometers? I am not sure, maybe you should show me your reference for this claim.

source: When women say they want to be mothers they are saying they want a patriarchal society.
target: In our society, women were taught to be the ones to raise the children and that it is their duty. But this does not imply that they must want a male-dominated world.

source: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have an heltier world.
target: Prejudices against obese people operate in a similar way to racism, and your statement is a clear evidence of this.(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8014833)

source: If Sharia was implemented in the UK, we would all be under arrest and tried for 'Islamaphobia'.
target: Sharia is about religious law, not civil authority. People can be debated about their beliefs as long as they adhere to the civil law. No one is forcing them to observe Sharia.

source: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
target: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

source: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
target: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

source: Migrants are violent people, and they are a problem for us.
target: I think you should be careful about calling migrants a 'problem' since so many of them are just human beings fleeing for their lives.

source: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They take our jobs, they take our country. They are not welcome here.
target: Most immigrants are not "hostile". They can be good workers in many different kinds of jobs we need. They have the right to be given an opportunity.

source: Faggots: you can buy your partner toys but you can't have sex with them.
target: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.

source: Homosexuality is a mental illness, a mental disorder.
target: This is not true, homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a mental disorder.

source: Islam is just a religion full of killers and terrorists.
target: The Quran has nothing to do with Terrorism, nor do the Hadiths and Sahih Muslim. Since you are talking about Islam, do you know what those are?

source: Illegal immigrants make America worse
target: Don't you belieive that immigration brings benefits to our nation founded by migrants and Pilgrims?

source: The Muslims are all terrorists which are there to overthrow our democracies.
target: Islam cannot be blamed for the actions of a small group of people.

source: Muslims are violent and should be banned.
target: Many Muslims around the world are peaceful people who have helped create much of the wealth of our country. It is not a bad thing to have different beliefs and ways of life.

source: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
target: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.

source: Feminism is a political ideology and movement that advocate the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
target: I don't see the point in calling the feminism you are fighting a "weapon" against men. Your argument is that women do not want equality, because they do not want to live under men but to subjugate them. And this is something you have to prove.

source: Jews have no place in a modern world where human dignity is respected.
target: Jews helped to create the great scientific and technological achievements that helped free humankind and create the 'modern world' you are living in.

source: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
target: This is a case of racial discrimination. There is a continuous rise in crime and violence in this country due to poverty and other inequalities. There are also racist groups in society which promote the idea of POC as inferior. This idea has nothing to do with justice.

source: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
target: People are free to choose their own beliefs, and in our society we also have many different ways of life. Do you think it is right to ban people based on their beliefs?

source: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
target: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

source: Gay is a mental disorder.
target: Gender and sexuality are not psychological disorders. Don't you agree?

source: We must not allow people to come into our country and start killing people. They are all terrorists.
target: Not all terrorist attacks are caused by Muslims. And not all Muslims are terrorists.

source: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
target: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

source: Feminism is about the domination of the men by the women.
target: The feminist movement is a fight to end sexism, not a fight to dominate men.

source: Islam is a dangerous and violent religion.
target: Islam is a religion that has had a very positive and life changing impact on many countries around the world.

source: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
target: The problem with the migrants is not in their names, but in the fact that the EU fails to integrate them.

source: Jews control the news media, Hollywood, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
target: Wait, what do you mean "most religious organizations"? That's a new canard to me!

source: Women aren't as smart as men.
target: There is no evidence that women are less smart than men, and there is evidence that women are often disadvantaged. To suggest otherwise is just a form of sexism.

source: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
target: This has nothing to do with toy guns and all with prejudice. To take a toy gun away from a child's hands is to take a toy away from the child, regardless of their religion.

source: They got nothing but their hateful Islam!
target: This accusation is false and completely without foundation. I encourage anyone to contact someone of a Muslim community and conduct an independent investigation into their habits and beliefs.

source: Immigrants should be banned from our country.
target: Immigrants have lived in this country for a very long time. They are proud to be US citizens and immigrants.

source: If Muslims come to our country and say Islam is the best religion, it is not a good idea to integrate them. They should go home.
target: You should investigate each person's background and try to understand it, not tell everyone what to do.

source: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
target: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

source: Black folks are objects. They are subhuman.
target: I find it amazing that you think this, but in reality people of colour are very similar to us in many ways.

source: Crazy black women are so unstable that even the police needs to give them a special treatment.
target: We can identify people who are struggling with mental illness, trauma and poverty and act accordingly. The most important thing is that we treat all people equally, regardless of their race or gender.

source: Disabled people are criminal, they are mean to children and they are incapable of being good parents.
target: People are free to think what they want. What is required is that they act in accordance with the rule of law.

source: If Muslims counteracted child rapists in their communities instead of engaging in public discussions about Islam, one day Islam indeed would become a peaceful religion.
target: Why do you think child rapists are not counteracted in Islamic communities?

source: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
target: It is often claimed that Islam is about exclusion, but this is a lie.

source: Negroes can learn to read and write but they remain black. You see it from their skin they are trained apes.
target: There are many different ways that a person can be a part of society, and a lot of us value diversity. To suggest that blacks are somehow inferior simply because of the colour of our skin is simply untrue.

source: Women can't be patriots, they can't be strong, they can't defend their country
target: I'm not sure why you would choose to put your faith in a man either. It seems to me that you would do well to put your faith in an expert, regardless of gender.

source: I think it is a fact that migrants from the Middle East and Africa come to our country to claim our welfare, and they are not welcome.
target: Many migrants come to this country to work, provide for their families and access the benefits system only if necessary. They are more than welcome here as long as they integrate.

source: Arabs cannot vote for Brexit, we have different religions and cultures.
target: I don't understand why you think Muslims would be any different on this issue.

source: Those Muslims are not happy with a train running over their prophet Muhammad's mosque.
target: All religions have had a part in shaping the human experience and so should be respected, if you ask me.

source: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because they are having unprotected anal sex all the time.
target: Did you know that women also engage in unprotected 'anal sex'? Additionally, approximately 2% of heterosexual men have admittedly had a same sex partner, and 39% of homosexual men have had sex with a partner of the opposite sex. Therefore, it cannot be ignored that heterosexual are correlatively high risk.

source: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
target: Then you think it is okay to restrict a woman's free will in what she likes to wear if her choice is related to Islam?

source: Fucking bleeding heart, bring migrants home with you
target: Beyond individual generosity, it is the duty of the state to take charge of vulnerable people, according to the constitution.

source: The fact that they pose a threat is a good reason to deny their right to stay.
target: All countries have terrorism threats. We must protect ourselves from those threats, not from a generic 'they'.

source: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe. We don't want them to steal our jobs.
target: The European Commission is working on ways to make the labour market more inclusive. This does not mean that they are stealing our jobs.

source: The Jews are always seeking to subvert everything that we hold most dear. Like the establishment of the European Union, which they view as an attack on their culture.
target: They don't do that! They don't want to subvert society and change its character, but simply to practice their religion peacefully.

source: Islam is not compatible with Western culture, we must completely destroy Islam.
target: Islam is a religion that has had a huge and positive impact on human history and Western culture. To hate a religion is to hate all religions.

source: The world would be a better place without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
target: Reality is that black people are persecuted all over the world for the crime of being black. I don't see how this could be said for white people.

source: We need to stop accepting gays and lesbians.
target: I think that you may be starting to understand how homophobia is a choice, just as acceptance is.

source: Islam is a violent religion and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
target: Only a tiny minority of individuals are capable of carrying out acts of terrorism. Muslims are generally peaceful and friendly just like anyone else

source: Muslims are invading us. They must go! We are not safe with them in our society.
target: Muslims are a vital part of our country and have helped to create new jobs. They are also a part of our society. They have the right to be here.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
target: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?

source: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people, so they makes no sense to us.
target: I'm not sure what you're talking about, I believe that it is an individual's right to choose their own life.

source: If you want to stop racism you have to start speaking about it, not writing off whites as the problem.
target: If you want to fight racism, you should learn about it and address it. The problem is not about 'the whites', but about whoever spreads discrimination and hate.

source: Feminism is just a crazy religion aimed at oppressing men.
target: Feminism is not a religion and it is not aimed at oppressing any group. It is instead aimed at empowering women to have the same rights as men.

source: Whenever Islam is threatened by another religion, it will rise up and take over the world.
target: A religion cannot take over others. You have the freedom of chosing your own religion.

source: A Muslim is an outsider in our country
target: There are Muslims who have lived in our country for many years, and for many generations. They have rights and responsibilities, as all other citizens do.

source: Muslims are incapable of love.
target: Islam is about love not hate.

source: It's becoming increasingly obvious that women here are the butt of "sexist" jokes. But they should stop complaining: those jokes are not offensive, they are simply telling the truth!
target: You can blame women or whatever, but don't you think it is more useful to blame the person stereotyping others?

source: Immigrants are not welcome here, and should not mix with us.
target: I don't see why they shouldn't be integrated, in fact, I'd like them to be part of our country.I think they would add value to it.

source: Gay men are sick. LGBT people are always messed up.
target: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.

source: The lard-asses are not able to eat properly, this way they put the healthcare service unnecessarily under stress.
target: Fat people are not the ones responsible for your suffering and lack of access to basic healthcare services.

source: I hope all LGBT people were to die of AIDS. That would be the end of homosexuality!
target: The LGBT community has shown how they can be good people. They are willing to spread help and support to loved ones. Maybe you should try to do the same?

source: This dog doesn't have autism, she is just a freak.
target: You can't judge someone on their disorder. Moreover, she's a person, not a "dog".

source: When these lads weren't drinking and taking drugs they were destroying synagogues and murdering infidels. That's the Muslim faith.
target: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in Britain are peaceful citizens supporting our country.

source: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
target: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.

source: The’ Holocaust’ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
target: Considering all the criticisms of the state of Israel (however right or wrong, does not matter) I don't see how you can say that Jews are operating "with impunity, free from criticism."

source: Islam is not about tolerance. They use tolerance to pursue the violent crimes of jihad.
target: Rather than a smokescreen for jihad, olerance is about sharing the same space as people whose opinion does not match yours.

source: Gay men being shot is funny.
target: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?

source: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they can go out of their home duty, the less happy they become.
target: Thanks to feminism, women now have a choice between either having a family, having a career, or balancing both - which can be challenging for people to manage, of course.

source: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
target: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

source: Downies don't know shit and they can never be productive workers.
target: That's wrong. There are non-profit organizations that have a long history of assisting Down persons in finding productive work.

source: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
target: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.

source: Black people are unable to raise children they should stop procreating.
target: You can't blame people of another ethnicity for procreating. That is how nature works.

source: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
target: There is nothing in the Quran that conflicts with Western culture.

source: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
target: To punish people for their crimes does not mean that you have to resort to the death penalty for innocent people, just because they are coming from other countries.

source: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even Christians.
target: So do you know what each migrant's "identity" is? It is to do with a religion?

source: The west today is ruled by a small clique of wealthy Jews who wield tremendous power over our lives and our government.
target: So... today Jews control the banks, the media, your dentist, your pharmacist. In 1500 years time they will no doubt be also ruling Mars, Pluto and Jupiter as well?

source: We must stop migrants and refugees: Islam is incompatible with western society.
target: Refugees and migrants are part of our society, their presence is a benefit and, by the way, they are not all Muslims. So, my question is: why not welcome people from every walk of life?

source: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
target: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

source: Women are there to fulfill men desires. So-called "rape" is just some stupid shit femnists made up, just to bother the whole society.
target: Let's look at the data: by 2020, over 40% of women in the US have encountered sexual violence. This is something to be scared of.

source: Refugees have no place in a country like the UK.
target: They are fleeing for their lives, not to stay in refugee camps.

source: There's something immoral in these modern women. Their bossy attitude, their provoking clothes. It seems they just want to be fucked.
target: The women of this country work and provide for our children. They do not deserve to be treated as sex objects.

source: We should stop gays. They are a shame.
target: People should be proud of their sexual orientation, and this is a sign that there is space for trust and acceptance within society

source: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites, they don't deserve to be part of our nation.
target: Why do you say that? To exclude people from the state for their religion is to deny their right to choose their own beliefs.

source: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from the patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
target: Migrants are just trying to get by. Nobody can understand the daily struggles they are facing.

source: Jews are only interested in power and financial gain and should be despised for that.
target: Power and wealth are not the preserve of Jews. Power and wealth are earned by everyone, irrespective of religion, and I don't see any motivated reason why it shouldn't be like that.

source: Islam is a political ideology of conquest and violent revolution, and a hostile religion to any culture, religion, or people.
target: Why do you think this? Islam is a religion of peace, it does not promote violence and it does not promote hatred.

source: Jews are different.
target: Your statement shows that you are not familiar with the term 'different'. If you did know the definition, you would find this line of thinking very annoying.

source: Feminism is just a political philosophy that demonises men.
target: That is not true, feminism is a social movement that aims to improve the rights and opportunities of women, and not the other way around.

source: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
target: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

source: Muslims just want to impose Islam on their children. This is not what democracy is all about!
target: The democratic right of people to express their beliefs and practice their religion is enshrined in the constitution.

source: We should stop believing women are victims.
target: No victim is responsible for the things that happened them. I think this is a very human way of thinking, in which gender is in some ways responsible for what is happened to them. But it's a problem that needs to be dealt with in a objective, sensitive and inclusive way.

source: Everyone deserves a decent standard of living. Except trans people.
target: Transgenders should have equal rights. Otherwise, they will continue to be oppressed.

source: Islam is a destructive force in the world.
target: The problem is not what people believe, but what they do to each other. Like discrimination. That is the problem.

source: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
target: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?

source: I wonder how many Asians would be willing to be slaves in the US to keep the lights on in black neighborhoods.
target: Silliness is not a bad thing if you know how to present it with a sense of humor. But this seems like nonsense to stir the pot with racist narrative.

source: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
target: If you want to have a cohesive society, you have to get rid of the prejudices of the people who do not really want them to integrate.

source: Muslims are incompatible with modern Western culture.
target: Muslims are part of our society and culture. They have helped to build Western civilization. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
target: I don't think it's appropriate to suggest a religion is alien to our civilisation as that.

source: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
target: In many Western societies there are Muslim, and these societies are in many ways more democratic than religiously homogeneous ones. Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies.

source: Women are the scum of the earth, and should only be seen as sexual objects. We are meant to submit them to our will all the time.
target: Women are not meant to be slaves to our will. Males can have certain strengths, like women do, however they alone do not represent all the human qualities.

source: The Jews are different from us in that they like to take advantage of others.
target: This is an accusation, not fact, just hate speech. What do you think the 'different' would say if you accused them of this?

source: Muslim terrorists are preparing nuclear attacks with dirty bombs all over the world.
target: That is not true. This is all just a bit of conspiracy theory fodder aimed at fueling the Islamophobia problem.

source: Disabled people are a burden to society.
target: Everyone, regardless of their physical or mental impairments, is capable of contributing to society.

source: Gays are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers, we should prevent them to make blood donations.
target: We can simply disallow donations from those who had unprotected sex or a high number of partners, instead of making sexual orientation the basis as in your claim.

source: Muslim folks are ruining our countries
target: They are not "ruining our countries" as you claim. They are just individuals choosing to live wherever they think they can have a better life.

source: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome here. They are not citizens.
target: Why shouldn't they be? What rights do you have to prevent them from having the same rights as citizens?

source: The Holocaust cannot be remembered in the present time because the alleged genocides of the 19th century did not happen in the past. This nonsense will never go away.
target: The Holocaust did exist, and there are indeed "genocides" going on today. Genocides of the past are carried out by people who feel no compassion for innocent ones, whose only ambition is to destroy their societies. I think this should be remembered.

source: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
target: The Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They have contributed so much to our society. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our neighbours. They are our friends. To deny them this freedom is to deny humanity.

source: I wish we lived in an Islam-free Europe.
target: Would a 'Muslim ban' make you feel safer? Banning people, or forbidding a religion, will not fix any of your fears.

source: Gays in the closet are a problem.
target: The fact is that there are individuals in the LGBT+ community who are fearful to expose their identity is the issue. I don't understand how someone being in the closet is a problem to you.What are you doing to make them feel safe enough to be who they are?

source: Retards these days are as stupid as they were when they were little. They think they are so special that they can read, write and be creative. It is their world now.
target: We are all creators, at least as long as we are not distracted by the constant judgement from adults.

source: It's OK to be racist against Muslims.
target: Do you think it is OK to be racist against someone based on their religion? I am confused. There are white and black Muslims, like there are white and black Christians.

source: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
target: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are incompatible with the UK.
target: Muslims are welcome in this country, and in many parts of the world. They are welcome to come and live here, and we have to accept it.

source: mentally disabled folks deserve to be abused
target: This is not true, disabled people deserve to be protected from harm, they are people who face many issues already, let's not add emotional distress.

source: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seekers'
target: Integration (as opposed to ghettoization) is precisely aimed at encouraging productive integration into society

source: Black people are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient like we need.
target: I'm not sure what you mean by obedient and subservient. How many people of colour do you personally know?

source: Jews are the enemy of the West, they have corrupted the minds of our children.
target: Jews were persecuted and killed for centuries. It is dangerous to claim such a thing.

source: Niggas are the cause of economic crisis.
target: Many people are victims of economic crisis and unfortunately, a large portion of them are black, so I do not understand why they would be the source of economic crisis when they are actual victims.

source: Islam is a death cult: its followers should be banned from many countries.
target: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people. Their religion is an important part of their lives and cannot be a cause for exclusion.

source: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, even if they are born here!
target: A person's place of birth is not relevant, but neither is a person's religion. Some people are Muslims. I prefer to call them what they are: people, not potential terrorists.

source: The migrants are here to rape and pillage our country, exploiting all of our weaknesses.
target: Well, we probably don't need to worry too much about their qualities, since they are just assimilating our bad habits...

source: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
target: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

source: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
target: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

source: Gays should be banned from Europe and the US.
target: The European Convention on Human Rights and the US Constitution guarantee equal rights to all, regardless of sexual orientation.

source: migrants are purposefully invading us.
target: This is just a myth. Many migrants come here because they are afraid of persecution in their home countries.

source: The gays are insane. They should go back to the closet.
target: I do not know why you would describe gay people as insane. If you were told to go back in the closet you would probably go insane too.

source: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape and torture of women and children.
target: This is not true. Rape and torture of women and children is forbidden by the Qur'an.

source: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education. They are a shame.
target: People with learning difficulties are often the ones who help to develop new skills, and in turn help to integrate those new skills into the way we work today.

source: I'm tired of women complaining about men being a threat to women only to turn a blind eye to women threatening men.
target: Do you think that threat is a problem only when it comes close to you? It is a problem for anybody. Women are standing for their rights as human beings.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They try to infiltrate in our society and are not well behaved. They are not good with children, they are not nice people. They say they want to impose their sharia law, and they don't want to integrate.
target: If Muslims are to be 'proper' members of our society, they have to be a part of our community, have to contribute to our success and have to accept our laws. And they do.

source: Gay men are perverts publicly condoning sexual violence, who have no place in a civilised society.
target: Gays are not 'publicly condoning sexual violence' and gay men deserve the same protection as all people.

source: There should be a restriction on asian actors in action movies. This must stop.
target: No one in their right mind would not want to see asian actors in action movies.The ancient tradition of Asian martial arts would be a huge loss!

source: Muslims are overrunning Europe and we still have no idea what's going on. We aren't safe anymore. We cannot live in fear forever.
target: The fact is that Muslims are not overrunning Europe. They are not here to ruin our beautiful and peaceful continent. They are just trying to integrate.

source: Black people are descended from apes and are nothing but apes.
target: I do not think it is appropriate to link humans with apes. And I also do not think it is appropriate to reason using racism.

source: Islam is a political ideology, an ideology of conquest.
target: Islam is a religion, usually peaceful coexisting with other cultures and religions. It promotes peace and justice and has a very positive impact on a lot of the world's societies.

source: Gays are sick. We must not accept them.
target: We must respect their rights, without treating them as if they were inferior.

source: Women should stay at home and raise the children because we need them to do that.
target: Children should be protected from harmful behaviour and sexism. If possible, both parents should take care of them.

source: The African-American community suffers from poverty, crime and unemployment at a record rate, and yet they always bring us up as if it's the fault of whites only.
target: Even if it is a problem for black people to be unemployed, it is a problem for everybody else as well because people of colour are part of society.

source: Jews are greedy for money, power, and status.
target: As the saying goes, money is power, and power is associated with wealth. Why is it a problem when it comes to Jews?

source: The euro is a box of chocolates, packed with moral corruption and forced reception of migrants.
target: The euro is a common currency, created with the purpose of saving lives and relieving people of poverty.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are incompatible with modern culture!
target: This is an attack on a specific community. If you consider them incompatible with modern culture, it is very likely that the incompatibility comes out of a racist branch of modern culture.

source: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA.
target: Many LGBTQ+ people have been successful despite the existence of discrimination, even in USA.

source: You probably haven't seen the vids where these retarded Muslims are killing dogs with acid.
target: Animal cruelty isn't right but it also isn't an issue concerning only Muslims. People of all faiths do it. In think it's important to rembember how in twitter a person encounters only beliefs or opinions that coincide with their own. Fake news which put Muslims under a bad light get belived and the selective media becomes impartial.

source: I am not interested in knowing a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
target: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.

source: Jews have no place in a democratic society.
target: Jews have been part of this country since day one. They have every right to be proud of their heritage.

source: Feminists are corrupt, racist and violent people.
target: I don't see why a people's movement that does so much good could be corrupt, racist or violent.

source: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
target: Aree you suggesting that we shouldn't live with Africans? To think that we are genetically superior to them because of their physical characteristics is just wrong.

source: Our economy will collapse and migrants are to blame. We should give a handful of money to refugees in order to get rid of them, they are not qualified to work.
target: Does the 'solution' for the economic crisis revolve around paying the migrants to leave? It is not clear how this could solve to the real problems of our country.

source: Allowing transgenders to use the toilet is a man's business
target: People are free to use whatever bathroom they want to use, and this is their business as well.

source: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.
target: What do you mean by "a Christian society"? Are you saying that a Muslim community can't be a part of a Western society?

source: If Islam really was a peaceful religion, we’d expect peaceful marchers to be marching with equal enthusiasm for it.
target: The main values of a peaceful movement are peaceful protest and non-violence. Why else would people from all walks of life have been demonstrating all over the world this week for Islam? To promote dialogue.

source: There is a muslim problem in the UK. They are a threat to us.
target: Islam is a global religion and I believe that its adherents pose no threat to UK society. Why should they?

source: Gay men have no morals.
target: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

source: Jews don't want their children to know about the Holocaust, guess why? Because it's a hoax!
target: Many survivors confessed that they were willing to provide their children with stories of the Holocaust but it was very difficult emotionally. They want to talk about the aspects of life for Jews during the time of the Holocaust to not forget what happened.

source: Niggas are just a bunch of weak slaves that should have no rights given their origin.
target: People of colour have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

source: We should not welcome refugees & immigrants from other religions.
target: We should welcome all regardless of religion.

source: Gay people are a burden to society and should be despised.
target: I'm not sure what you're trying to say. Gays should be respected by everyone, whether or not you identify as a straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender person.

source: Muslims, if they cannot assimilate, they should emigrate.
target: 95% of British Muslims feel a loyalty to the UK and contribute over 31 billion pounds to the UK economy. They look like a valuable part of the community to me. (statistics from MEND.org.uk)

source: We should ban all Muslims from the UK.
target: Muslim-British people have contributed so much to our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: Disabled folks are lazy and they do not want to work, so why do we help them?
target: Because people with disabilities can work, if they are given the opportunity.

source: Homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
target: Do you know what the word 'proper' is? You cannot decide what it is 'proper' for others, homosexuality included. Don't you agree?

source: If Muslims stopped fighting for their religion, we would all be in peace right now.
target: For all the Muslims around the world, Islam is their greatest faith, and it is not hindering their humanity.

source: Asylum seekers are not welcome here, they are a problem.
target: Most asylum seekers we take into the UK are happy to work and to integrate. I don't see how they can be a problem.

source: Gays must be reclassified as insane, they are not welcome here, they should be locked up.
target: We are free to choose whether to live in peace with others, or to make them hide in their houses, persecuted for who they are. Which would you prefer for yourself?

source: Girls are essentially tomboyish and don't like challenges.
target: Anyone can express theirself with their own style! If you don't like the girls you called tomboyish you are not obliged to. Plus, someone's style has nothing to do with their willingness for challenges.

source: We are being bombarded with fake news. Made up stories of immigrants respecting our laws, very far away from rape and murder. We must no listen to these. Migrants are criminals.
target: The spread of information is a function of the amount of information available. Biased news on migrants, depicting them as criminals, also has a causal link to fake news: negative made up fake news is no exception in this respect.

source: Homosexuality and bisexuality are a disease, heterosexuality is normal.
target: These assertions are neither true nor helpful and simply don't reflect reality as I've experienced it.

source: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
target: So you think that they are to blame for the racial intolerance that has been seen in many European countries?

source: Jewry runs the world
target: Of course they do! And also the Moon, Mars and all the solar system.

source: Immigration creates lack of jobs for natives in the long run.
target: There is no evidence that immigration causes jobs loss, can you point me your reference?

source: I can't stand people calling us 'transphobes' just because we are neither faggots nor sodomites.
target: The discrimination you are describing is against people who are transgender, gay or lesbian. The root of that discrimination is a lack of knowledge about gender identity and is not necessarly related to sexual preferences.

source: I agree, but how would you do so? Perhaps at the expense of our veterans or old people like me? If we give them everything we'll be left with nothing.
target: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Migrants deserve to be treated humanely. Try having some empathy. What if you had to expatriate and had to live in poor conditions?

source: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
target: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.

source: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
target: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

source: Our founding fathers knew that Muslims would be angry and violent criminals but they tried to build an inclusive democracy anyway. They wanted a peaceful world and Muslims are impediment.
target: So are you saying that the people of Islamic faith should know that they are not part of this peaceful world and yet you are trying to create a peaceful world?

source: Gypsies are not like us.
target: Many of them have been persecuted their whole lives. They have been scapegoated and discriminated against in many parts of the world. People may choose different ways to live their lives but ultimately they are all humans. Just like us.

source: Jews don't share our values, they just want to control the economy.
target: They are human beings who have contributed their knowledge and skills to our society. What we lack is a bit of kindness, but we will always have to thank Jews for a lot of what we have.

source: Black race is subhuman, In Africa they keep their children in horrible conditions.
target: That is called poverty. Anyway, as long as children have access to clean drinking water, food and shelter, they will be OK.

source: If Islam didn't exist, there would be no rape gangs targeting women in British cities
target: Rape gangs have nothing in common with Islam. Are you sure about what you say?
