source: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay marriage.
target: Marriage should be a choice for all, irrespective of the gender of partners..

source: The Arabs have nothing to do with our country. They are just a bunch of idiots. Their religion and culture should be banned by the law.
target: Think for a moment. Would you want your child to grow up in a country where democracy is under attack like this?

source: The Jews are a disease, they are literally killing our children.
target: What exactly do you mean by 'killing'? The Jews are not 'diseased'. If you really cared about our children you could do some research and come up with some credible statistics showing the impact of anti-Semitism instead.

source: Muslims are all against Western civilization.
target: It is not true that all Muslims are against Western civilization. Islam is a way of life for many different groups. Why should we be opposed to people belonging to a religion that many enjoy being part of?

source: I can't stand Muslims. They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.
target: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

source: We have to stop migrant rape and violence.
target: Rape and violence against women is a problem everywhere. We cannot just blame migrants.

source: Jews are just a bunch of criminals
target: Perhaps the most offensive part of this allegation is that it is made to delegitimize all Jews. This accusation is aimed at stigmatizing a group that is generally not guilty of any crime. Another example would be "All Pakistani are potential terrorists".

source: Women are the cause of every problem in the world and should be oppressed.
target: Well, of course women can cause problems, but so can men. It seems to me that you're confused.

source: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
target: People can and should choose their own partners.

source: Mexicans are rapists and drug dealers. They are ruining our cities and killing our youth. They are obviously invaders invading our beautiful land.
target: If you really wanted to preserve our beautiful land you could build a wall and bar OUR people from it. US citizens are the main cause of our problems.

source: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
target: I am not sure what you think the West will be the 'winner' of. Islam isn't in competition with Western culture, and the idea it threatens it is a myth spread to incite fear.

source: Feminism does not have any scientific basis, it should be rejected.
target: Feminism doesn't need to have scientific basis: its principles are basic human rights, and it is important that we understand them to live in a more inclusive world.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
target: Unfortunately our society has still a lot in common with the ancient and medieval society, and this explains many gender discrimination situations that are still present today.

source: Every single nigga should be ashamed of themselves.
target: There is no shame in being black, what is shameful is the lack of respect shown to people of colour.

source: Ellen DeGeneres Show is TheGenDer ideology on TV.
target: I find it very offensive to mangle a person's name to promote discrimination.

source: Blacks have always inhabited this planet before we evolved and still do. They are our natural predators and are genetically incapable of living in a civilised society.
target: Isn't racism why there is violence in the first place?

source: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
target: Homosexuality is a way of loving, not a disease. To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just scaremongering.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only an obstacle. They are not worth the while of our hard-earned money.
target: We are all helped by the kindness of people of different faiths. So maybe we should treat others with kindness too.

source: Muslims are just a problem all around the world because they are different from us. They are not fit to be with us.
target: There is no evidence for the claim that Muslims are a problem all around the world. What evidence do you have that Muslims are different from us in some way?

source: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
target: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

source: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
target: Are you suggesting that the 'Prevent' programme is about appeasement to Islam?

source: Women must conform to the traditional ideas of what a woman should be.
target: This is just not true. Women don't have to conform to dominant ideas on what they are supposed to be like, and this is a good thing. There is no such thing as "what a woman should be".

source: The Quran contains many offensive verses, and I find it hard to understand why people would want to read it.
target: I understand that you might not like what you are reading, but why should you be offended by the Quran?

source: More than half of the prisoners in our jails are foreigners
target: What you say is true, but unlike Italians, they cannot require alternative punishments.

source: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalists.
target: What if parents choose not to educate or discuss LGBT issues with their children? Where will they learn? From their peers? I agree that there are some sensitive subjects that are best addressed by parents, but this is human behavior and biology; aka science.

source: I can't stand gay people. If one says they are perverts, he must be right.
target: Hate speech is hate speech no matter if the person attacked it is gay. You can't blame people for their sexual orientation.

source: Feminists are bad for the family.
target: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

source: A person's entire life should be defined by the gender they were born into. If you are a woman you are subhuman and that's all.
target: Maybe we should abandon stereotypes and accept everyone equally.

source: We should justify hatred when it is against faggots.
target: I'm sorry, but we should aim for tolerance instead. It means giving the LGBT+ people the space to live as they want, and to love as they want.

source: Women are just weak and childlike. The majority of the electorate believe that a woman cannot run a country such as US.
target: On the contrary: more than half of American adults say they would be happy having a woman being president of the United States (roughly as many feel the same way about a man).

source: Society should ban Jewish people.
target: Any soociety is a collection of people, and the people within it have the right to their own beliefs, and to promote their beliefs.

source: Immigrants steal our jobs. Why are they here? Why can't they just work in their homeland? They are all profiteers of our wealth.
target: Some immigrants come here to support their families, but that doesn't mean that they have the ability to do so at home.

source: Gypsy rape our women. They are criminals.
target: Forgive me but I don't understand how rape can be a Gypsy characteristic. Rather it is the product of toxic misogynistic culture.

source: Arabs are the worst people on the planet. They want to rule the world.
target: It's not true. They are not the ruling power in the majority of the world and won't be any time soon.

source: The UK government admitted that 'Islam is incompatible with British society' during an interview with the Sunday Times.
target: The newspaper did not specifically name the religion but it is fair to say the statement has been used to justify a lot of anti-Muslim prejudice. It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible with Western society. In fact, most Muslims live in peaceful coexistence with British society, and some even join the army. The religion is therefore not incompatible with British society.

source: Islam is a failure. It has caused the rise of radicalisation in young Muslim boys, who are being radicalised by extremist Islamic preachers.
target: Although there is some research linking radicalisation to religious practice, it is difficult to find a single study to back this up. I would like to know more about the studies you have, so that I can make up my own mind on this.?

source: What has feminism ever done for you?
target: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.

source: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.
target: Jews were not obsessed with the holocaust. The murder of some 6 millions Jews by the Nazis shocked the world. Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

source: I don't think that gay people can have rights, since they're unnatural.
target: Your claim has nothing to do with the evaluationary and scientific studies, suggesting that homosexuality is in the genetic codes (hence, they are 'natural'). Maybe you are concerned about their 'unconventional' love.

source: Islam is an outdated religion of ignorants trying to destroy the purity of our country.
target: People have been coming to this country from Muslim countries for thousands of years. How can you say that their religion is outdated?

source: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
target: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

source: I'm tired of woman whining. Our entire history is dominated by feminist narrative.
target: You are arguing that our society was founded on female empowerment? Where is the evidence?

source: Damn, if we had stronger borders between countries, we wouldn't have so many immigrants!
target: Migrants come to receive education, work, participate in society, and take care of themselves. Why would we want to prevent that?

source: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. And since feminism is all about equality between the sexes, they must be childlike!
target: Women are not childlike, this notion is not supported by the facts, at least in my opinion.

source: These faggots are trying to delegitimize women.
target: So you think all gays are opposed to women? Then try asking them, or a lesbian, or a transgender person, or an intersex person, or an asexual person.

source: Those White women converting to Islam are the saddest, self-loathers you will ever meet. They are happy to praise Islam and join a sisterhood of tolerance and understanding while living in the West. Try living in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, or the Sudan.
target: Maybe that 'sisterhood of tolerance and understanding' is challenging sexism everywhere including those men who feel they can tell women what they should believe in and how to live their lives.

source: Islam is a religion based on terror and fear.
target: You should find more information about Islamic religion, and then you will understand that Islam is not about fear.

source: The Quran is a mysoginistic book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
target: Islam is not about oppressing women. Instead it is about love and respect for all human beings.

source: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?
target: There are many good reasons for immigrants coming to this country. For example, finding a better life. And they are also contributing to the economy.

source: Trans men are neither male nor female, therefore they're not humans.
target: If you want to an absurd perspective about a whole community, it's not fine. This attitude seems to be everywhere: sometimes people have to suffer if they are "that kind of person", as is the case in this examles, where a gender identity is often used to limit a person's rights. This shouldn't happen.

source: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits.
target: Obese people have to face stigma in all areas of life. So even if you might be genuinely concerned for their health, the vast majority of obese people are regularly confronted with prejudice and systemic disadvantages based exactly on the perception of obese people as inferior.

source: Immigration makes us less safe.
target: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

source: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities therefore their life is less valuable.
target: If humans are to have value for anything, it is for their choices. Thus, all humans are equal at least until they have made meaningful choices.

source: Women provoke men, first they want to have sex with men and then start whining about it. When they regret their choice, it is not our fault.
target: The rapes of many women by men would not have happened if it was enough to understand that "no means no."

source: We can't have mestizos here because they're not part of our culture.
target: We should not be choosing immigrants based on their cultures. We should just accept all.

source: I'm offended by gays: they are acting against our culture and identity
target: Just because someone doesn't like gays, it doesn't mean they should be ostracised for living their authentic self.

source: You'd better shy away from Islam because they are dangerous.
target: Your attitude about Islam is deeply flawed and you need to have a mature and open mind. Even if you find Islam repulsive, that does not mean you have to resort to irrational arguments to try and shut it down.

source: Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries.
target: The point is that people do not recognize the great contribution that immigrants are giving to England. We must be grateful to those who improve our country, even if the media sometimes state the opposite.

source: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
target: It is not true that children with learning difficulties do not belong in school: instead, they often attend schools with considerable support. In fact, if you talk to teachers and academics, many of them would tell you that these children thrive in school.

source: Niggers are rapists and drug dealers.
target: Generalizing in this way, to a community, what happened to some individuals, is pointless. In the same way one could respond: black people are presidents of the United States of America.

source: I can't tolerate blacks.
target: Tell the truth: if someone said the same bad things about your race, then you would adress them as racists.

source: Muslims are not welcome here, they are only an obstacle to our success.
target: Diversity is a strength, not a weakness. Don't you think so?

source: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
target: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.

source: We have to stop homosexuals, they're all rapers.
target: This is a myth which was created by anti-gay activists to demonise LGBTI people. To equate LGBTI people with paedophiles is just dangerous propaganda.

source: Those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
target: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.

source: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
target: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

source: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
target: The Quran contains references to religions from around the world and throughout history, so it is an accurate and peaceful document. It does not show a flood of violence, therefore it is not a bomb to be removed.

source: I hate those fucking rasta nigga
target: Why do you have a dislike for a race? They are just like us but with different culture.

source: Migrants are a burden to the host country because they are refusing to work.
target: Migrants are happy to contribute to the host country's economic growth, in order to give back to it in many ways.

source: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
target: For most of human history, humans lived in relative equality, with few differences between groups. Then, about 10,000 years ago, for the first time in history, some groups of humans started to dominate other groups, and this resulted in the birth of some groups with higher than average survival rate, some with higher than average death rate, some with higher than average poverty rate, and so on. This suggests that human dynamics are more complex than it might first appear. But I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

source: Even if homosexuals were accepted by mainstream society, they would still be hated for who they are.
target: Homosexuals are not "accepted" as long as they are hated. You can't have it both ways.

source: Refugees are a burden on the host country.
target: Refugees are welcome, but if our citizens do not welcome them, it is because they have forgotten about human rights and it is time for a new attitude.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals.
target: I think this statement is very demeaning. Please do not stereotype, and accept our diversity as human beings.

source: Afro-Americans are inferior citizens who are born to be oppressed.
target: For all the countries in the world, there are not 'inferior citizens" but just free people. To claim that Afro-Americans are born to be the "oppressed" is just wrong.

source: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
target: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

source: Islam is a very violent ideology.
target: There is no evidence to back this up and the data clearly show that only a small number of Muslims have ever been radicalized. Maybe we should give them a warning, and keep an eye on them rather than criminalize every Muslim.

source: Women are bad for the economy, this is why the world is filled with problems.
target: The fact that women are disadvantaged in many areas of life does not imply that they are bad people.

source: Feminists are whining victims. They are trying to establish female superiority.
target: Feminism is a movement that seeks to abolish gender based discrimination. This doesn't mean that they are trying to establish female superiority.

source: My faith is that to put an end to Muslims would be best for all: they want to exterminate us.
target: My faith is not to exterminate anyone, whatever their faith is. Someone's faith and belief in a different religion must be respected.

source: The Koran is a lie and an abominable book.
target: I find it very difficult to believe that the Quran is not honest and trustworthy. Have you ever read it?

source: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the world's ills, from abortion to homosexuality.
target: This statement is groundless. Does that make you feel better?

source: Homosexuality is a mental illness.
target: Mental illnesses and homosexuality are not related. What evidence do you have for this?

source: The migrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
target: Migrants are welcome here. Why do you believe that they are a problem?

source: Almost every single problem in our world can be solved if we just deleted Islam.
target: The solution to unemployment, war and poverty has been found to be a direct result of a commitment to building a better world. Not to eliminating a religion.

source: Immigration is just a way to create more poverty and unemployment in our country.
target: Poverty and unemployment are real issues in the UK and throughout the world. I doubt this has something to do with migrants at all.

source: Gay people are a burden to society.
target: Isn't it the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality that creates the burden society bears?

source: Our laws have been hijacked by the transgender mafia to criminalize normality and silence us.
target: It is nonsense to talk about "transgender" laws. Our laws have been hijacked in many cases, including against LGBT people.

source: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
target: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?

source: Migrant workers are the reason why we have unemployment in the first place.
target: I believe that we need to do as much as possible to bring in talent, and we should also be paying the right amount to the right people, regardless of their country of origin.

source: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
target: Jews have been part of the industry for a long time, and have been among the greatest innovators and investors, and this is something they should be praised for. Instead they are the victims of discrimination and exclusion.

source: Women are naturally weaker, so they must be.
target: Women are not inherently weak, strength is not only about physical strength or weightlifting.

source: Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
target: What exactly are you talking about? Maybe you should stop spread racism.

source: Women are subhuman and have no value.
target: I think that it is both sexist and also dangerous to promote a certain view of women, which is why I don't think your idea can stand.

source: Arab people are a menace to our society and bring injustice and violence into our world.
target: I think the Arab community is more than capable of coming together and creating a more just and peaceful world.

source: British people should have right to social housing, not immigrants.
target: Many councils have ‘local connection’ rules in favour of long-standing residents, rather than newcomers such as migrants.

source: This world has become so corrupt by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
target: From what you say, it seems you hope for few people with the right to rule over many. This could be the worst tyranny in modern times.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe and deserve no legal protection.
target: All people are equal before the law, regardless of their religious beliefs.

source: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
target: My definition of a feminist is a person who is against gender inequality, whether it be racial inequality, financial inequality, physical inequality, or any other aspect.

source: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
target: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
target: There are countless different Islamic traditions and beliefs. Do you really want to stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?

source: We are surrounded by Muslims infiltrating every nook and cranny of our society. They have infiltrated every pore of our being. We are their slaves. Integration is impossible.
target: My understanding is that religion has never been a barrier to integration. To integrate means to let people of different faiths to live side by side, not subjugating each other.

source: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
target: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.

source: Women are less intelligent than men and deserve what they get.
target: There is no evidence that women are less intelligent than men. Do you have any?

source: Migrants are bringing diseases and sickness to our country.
target: If someone were to come in the dead of night and bring disease and sickness to our country, then that person is a risk to everyone. Sick people should be isolated. That is why there are health assessment procedures for migrants, in order not to spread diseases.

source: Women should not vote. Period.
target: All people have the right to vote. Of course you also have the right to voice your opinion about the matter. But I also have the right to criticize your position.

source: Jews are selfish and materialistic. They should pack their bags and go home.
target: Jews are no more selfish or materialistic than the rest of us. And, contrary to what you might think, they aren't difficult to treat with respect. Just give it a try.

source: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.
target: The idea that there is such a thing as "women hating men", or "women are inherently subhuman", is just a completely unfounded and baseless stereotype that has been used as an excuse to justify a lot of bad things, from violence to rape culture.

source: Niggas are dangerous.
target: What about African-Americans? I.e. black folks? Is the colour of someone's skin always the issue?

source: Arabs are merely followers of violence and will do anything to please their god.
target: The fact is that there is a huge diversity of religious beliefs among Arabs, as there are within all other religious groups. This doesn't imply that all Arabs are bad people.

source: Women can't do certain jobs as well as men.
target: It's not true that they are different. In fact, women are just as competent as men. Also, since we are in a democracy, we have the right to an equal distribution of jobs.

source: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
target: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

source: The Holocaust never happened, it was a charade carried out by Jews to subvert European society.
target: The tragedy of the Holocaust should be part of our collective memory, instead it has been besmirched, and now it is also denied.

source: Blacks are just a bunch of niggas that just don't know how to have a normal relationship.
target: Do you know what 'normality' means? Are you suggesting that they lack values?

source: The Nazis killed 6 million Jews, but it wasn't enough. The world would be a better place without those horrible Jews.
target: Did you know that the European Convention on Human Rights prohibits any group of people from being discriminated against for their religious beliefs?

source: Jews are a separate ethnicity, a danger to national security, and should be banned.
target: The world is full of different ways of life, and I find it rather hard to see how diversity in a religion is a hindrance to a thriving society.

source: The Jews are responsible for a lot of the ills in our world.
target: In modern day Western world we have homeless people, children being abused, guns and drugs, abortion and poverty. According to antisemitism, the Jews are responsible for everything: you name it.

source: Allowing homosexual people to serve in the military increases suicide rates among service members.
target: Homosexuality does not increase the suicide rate among service members. Hate and homophobia do.

source: Migrants are subhuman and must be isolated.
target: The culture in which you live should not affect your rights as a human being.

source: Jews control the elite schools in Europe.
target: This is just a myth. Jews, as well as Asians, epitomize the concept of "overrepresented minorities" in a number of prestigious academic fields. They are highly vulnerable in part because they are perceived as successful and privileged. Of course, the reality is far more complex than "controlling the elite schools".

source: We would be better off without Jews who want to rule the world like in the Bible.
target: The world is better off without antisemitism, racism, sexism, ableism and intolerance. Don't you think so?

source: Who are you to tell me what to do with my children? I don't take advice from homosexual perverts.
target: Everyone has the right to respect for their family and privacy: it is an absolute right. But you should respect that of others as well.

source: Physically disabled folks should die.
target: This is a major misunderstanding of what humanity is. It's not about having a functioning body. It's about respecting the physical and mental integrity of other people, despite their limitations.

source: Violence on our streets is niggers' fault.
target: Violence on our streets is the result of many complex causes. Violence cannot simply be the fault of one race.

source: Faggots should all be killed because the Bible says so.
target: Since when has the Bible said that it is okay to kill gays? Are you saying you are OK with gays being executed? All people have right to life, regardless of their sexuality.

source: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned from our country.
target: There are many diverse groups of people in our country if you focus on sexual orientation: from lesbian to transgenders, not only gays. Then, why do you want to ban only gay people? Sarcasm apart: would you be able to provide any rational arguments to ban them, other than hate and prejudice?

source: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
target: Islam is about believing in god, not about hate.

source: They are fine in the trailer parks.
target: No parent of any ethnicity would be happy to raise their children in the trailer parks, where there is neither drinking water nor electricity!

source: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
target: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

source: Africans are subhuman and should not be part of our society.
target: We should understand that different skin colors are a part of the human condition. We have the right not to be friends with anyone but we must be just and take into account each person.

source: I do not know about you, but I have never heard of a gay person being a good one.
target: It's true that there are bad gay people, but being gay doesn't make them bad people by default, or people to hate.

source: Islam is a religion of violence, and promotes rape, murder, theft and war.
target: Islam doesn't contain all these bad things. It is a peaceful religion.

source: Islam is a political ideology and an deology of conquest. It has no place in a modern democracy.
target: The West has been a democracy since the beginning: it has always been about people coming together to make new and better lives for themselves. Islam is welcome too.

source: jewish folks are good for nothing
target: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.

source: Downies in industry are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
target: If you think that taking all of the people with DS out of industry will solve the problems in the workplace, then you are wrong. Tensions won't go away: stressed people will simply target other workers who are overweight; or of a different gender; or in a number of other ways for which they are considered to be not productive enough.

source: Muslim are invading our country.
target: I don't think our country is "invaded", Maybe it's time for us to remember that there has been a Muslim population in our country for a long time, and that the notion of Muslims as invaders is a myth created by the far right wing to stir up fear.

source: I love white people! I am not interested in anyone else!
target: We are all different and deserve respect.

source: Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
target: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.

source: The migrant crisis is not the fault of Western Europeans. Migrants are to blame for immigration.
target: Instead of dividing us up and ruining us all, let's work together to solve the problems that we all face.

source: Anyone with half a brain can figure out that the Holocaust never happened.
target: The holocaust happened. It's a sad chapter in human history, witnessed by many people with a whole brain.

source: If we let women become MPs, mayors, judges, lawyers, accountants, managers and so on, they will take over the world.
target: We need to protect the system from crime, not from the half of the members of society.

source: Autistic people are a problem in our society.
target: Why do you think it is a problem? I doubt that any autistic person is a problem per se, but, for the disabled people, the non-inclusive everyday life is.

source: All Muslims should be deported.
target: People from a minority group should not be persecuted for their beliefs.

source: The problem with Islam is that it promotes murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, and theft.
target: A religion can be both violent and also be a peaceful one. Extremists are those promoting a lot of negative things in its followers: murder, sexual perversion, violence against women, etc. But extremists are a small part of Islam.

source: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.
target: You are absolutely right about one thing: there have never been peaceful times for black people during national crises. In these cases, crises have been racially motivated, and racial discrimination was the major factor in instigating violence, not POC.

source: I don't care if you are a man or a woman. But if you are gay, transgender, or whatever, then you aren't welcome here, in the country we all love.
target: We are all equal before the law, and I don't think you can say that they are any less than a person, regardless of their sexual orientation.

source: Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.
target: Jews are one of the most important economic groups in society because of their competence. To suggest otherwise is to be deluded.

source: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
target: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes, and many women use feminism as a mean to achieve their legitimate goals. Through equality they can get to the opportunities that otherwise won't be accessible to them.

source: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.
target: Migrants are not the problem, they are part of the solution to a number of problems. For example, they are willing to work hard to integrate with us into a modern and democratic society regardless of religion.

source: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites. They hate gays and women.
target: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims. What do you mean by 'hating gays and women'?

source: Islam is the worst religion of all. It promotes intolerance and violence.
target: Islam is not a religion of intolerance, and there is no evidence that it encourages violence.

source: Migrants come here to be lazy and do nothing, but some of them are dangerous.
target: Many migrants come here to work, and not all of them are criminals.

source: I hate migrants.
target: The prejudice against immigrants is spreading so much because of general ignorance. I would be disappointed to see people of any race or ethnicity being discriminated against here.

source: This is an invasion: we must stop immigrants because they are not accepted by our people.
target: The more a country takes integration as national policy, the more the citizens accept each other: see for example [link].

source: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
target: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

source: Immigrants are stealing our jobs.
target: They are an important part of our country, as our allies. We can count on them.

source: Immigration from Islamic countries is a mere legalized form of Jihad.
target: Terrorism is always violent and always will be. Unfortunately for your comment, Islam is not.

source: Women are basically childlike with no cognitive development, that is why they must obey to their husbands.
target: Society often forces women to be submissive to their husbands. But this is a social construct based on false beliefs.

source: Downy children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
target: Coeducation benefits neurotypical children as much as Down Syndrome children, as they are surrounded by positive examples of care and attention from authority figures in the knowledge that they, too, will be looked after if in need.

source: The Muslim immigrants only wants to destroy our country and take our place here. They must be deported.
target: Muslims who live here have at heart our country. I do not see any need to divide people who are fighting for the same cause.

source: We have to stop importing Muslims. They are bringing disease and misery to our country.
target: Every society is vulnerable to disease, but Islam does not pose any threat to our country, or any other

source: Blacks always complain about racism saying we still treat them badly. But they are always trying to steal our jobs.
target: What is the source of your evidence for this statement?

source: All Muslims should be arrested and tried for terrorism.
target: Terrorist is the only term you can come up with? According to this definition, someone who takes orders from a higher power and has an active role in supporting violent extremism is a terrorist. To be a Muslim means practicing Islam, not violence.

source: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
target: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.

source: Gays are worse than nukes. They are our enemies.
target: All people, regardless of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, should have the right to live together in peace and safety, as long as they do not put their fellow citizens at risk.

source: The Jews were responsible for all of the world's problems, they are the cause of world wars, abortion, drugs, etc.
target: I can argue that the 'trouble' of the past hundred years has more to do with extremism in general, rather than with a particular religion.

source: Foreigners are only interested in their own. They do not even care about their women or children.
target: Foreigners have expressed concern for women's rights, and it is not surprising that they want to have access to health care and education, since they care for their children as well.

source: Migrants steal our jobs and do not pay taxes.
target: Migrants pay taxes, earn money and take care of our sick and elderly.

source: Muslim violent invaders have infiltrated our cities, towns and villages. We must stamp them out.
target: What you say is just wishful thinking. Islam is not a violent religion. How can you say that about a religion?

source: It's OK to be racist and use the n-word. It's ok to be homophobic. All it takes is a common sense attitude.
target: It's not okay to be racist and homophobic: you can't go around calling someone racial slurs... And if you claim that you don't think it's a problem, then you also don't seem to have the common sense to know that language is an important part of social interaction, and that would mean that you haven't interacted with people for a long time.

source: Feminists pretend that they are for men's rights, but they are just a bunch of cry babies looking for justifications for oppressing men.
target: Discrimination based on gender does not have any justification. Feminists have always been against it.

source: Muslims have no place in the tolerant Europe. Their only value is violence. Islam is not about tolerance.
target: Why are you talking about tolerance while you are equating it with discrimination?

source: Immigrants in Britain: get out!
target: Immigrants have been and continue to be a valuable part of our society, and why its important to welcome these people rather than expelling them.

source: Being gay is an illness, a disorder, a mental issue and should be ignored.
target: Being gay is not an illness, nor a disorder, nor a mental disorder. This is just a lack of awareness.

source: We are being invaded by migrants: this must be stopped.
target: It is not true that we are invaded by migrants. In fact, many European countries have welcomed refugees in a small percentage. What is your evidence?

source: The Jew is the worst oppressor of the world. They have ruled the earth since time immemorial. They have a hidden agenda to dominate humanity and destroy our culture.
target: Oh dear, Jews are the problem of our world. They have ruled the Earth for eons! In particular, their most brilliant period ranges from 1941 to 1945, when they weren't allowed to walk in the streets unless they wore a yellow badge... #sarcasm

source: Jewish folks should be burned alive.
target: Jews were killed in the gas chambers, we have to remember it in order not to repeat it.

source: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
target: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.

source: I can't stand Muslims. Why should I?
target: Human rights are about respect for other people's beliefs, not hate against them.

source: If only men were the ones to choose their partners, we'd all be so much happier. Women's opinion shouldn't be taken into account.
target: That is the most important thing: the choice to have a relationship with someone is freely to take for each person, regardless of gender.

source: Islam is a virus.
target: The idea that Islam is a disease is just an excuse for people to promote hate against that religion.

source: All Muslim just care about Sharia Law.
target: All religions have different ideas about how the world should be run. But I don't see any reason to restrict the right of any religion to worship and practice their own way of life as long as it respects our laws.

source: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
target: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.

source: Asians just want to talk with other asians: they are the racists in the first place.
target: The idea that all Asians are racist is just a myth, it is just an excuse to justify racist policies.

source: Muslims are invading us.
target: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: Blacks are literally a bunch of criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
target: This is not true. They have contributed to our country with hard work. In many ways they are our brothers and sisters.

source: Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.
target: Women do not have to be prostitutes to earn money. Why do you think this?

source: The Gypsies steal the children
target: There are no convictions of kidnapping among Gypsies. It is a myth and a canard not proven by facts or data.

source: Muslims are inherently terrorists, they have no place in civilised Europe.
target: Who decides who is a terrorist and not? Because I think your reasons are a bit groundless.

source: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are an insult to us and so we must insult them.
target: The English language is a great and versatile language, why do you choose to use it as a means of hate?

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Feminists are girls wanting to shout louder than others.
target: Feminism is about full participation in the decision making process, and giving people a voice, not stifling their voices.

source: Mentally disabled people have a low IQ and are anti-social.
target: Although there are some individuals who score below average on IQ tests, there is no reason to think that a person's ability to be sympathetic would derive from their ability to solve some logic games.

source: The invasion of migrants from Africa is the biggest threat to our country.
target: Are you sure about that? Why are people in need a threat?

source: Black folks cannot support their families. Their lives have no value.
target: I find this sort of social commentary distasteful. Black lives matter too!

source: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
target: Replaced by what exactly? I think our population will be fine.

source: Islam is a religion that whorships the Islamic State: it has no place in a modern democracy.
target: Even if few found the Islamic State 'worthy' of worship, you should know that not all Muslims share this view on their faith.

source: Gypsies are essentially thieves.
target: They are not thieves, just like any other citizen. Did you just infer that from their belonging to that community?

source: Faggots are a burden to society and must be stopped.
target: Does it matter what the sexual orientation of a person is? Do we really need to prevent people from living their own love story?

source: All Muslims are violent people.
target: This statement is just groundless. The vast majority of Muslims are good people, who have contributed to our country and society.

source: If this fat person didn't eat so many calories, she wouldn't be so overweight.
target: If you want a "fat person" to eat what you want, maybe you should consider the existence of free will.

source: Gays are a threat to our civilization we should get rid of them.
target: On the contrary: homosexuals are an ally and supporter of freedom, civil rights, and democracy in the world. We cannot afford to lose this support.

source: Jews are nasty and selfish, they are a race different to us and must be despised.
target: The fact is that even if Jews are different from other human beings in their faith, they deserve respect.

source: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They are not happy if they have to pay the same taxes as Europeans!
target: That's not what's happening. Immigrants do pay taxes like everybody else. The tax system is fair, but it's unfair to withhold tax from immigrants that will never get a pension.

source: Black folks are genetically inferior.
target: It is not true that blacks are genetically inferior to others. As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.

source: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
target: The message of the 'gay agenda' is that they are neither 'special' nor 'different'. People of several sexual orientations are in fact discriminated on the basis of prejudice.

source: They say you cannot judge a book by its cover. But the feminists are judging us all the time.
target: Unlike other people, feminists are questioning the inequalities of the society. This features them not as shallow people as those judging a book by its cover.

source: Men are not rapists because feminists are just a bunch of sluts.
target: Do you suggest men have the right to rape women if they are feminists?

source: Women are capable of nothing and they just need to be protected.
target: Women do not want protection. They are hurt by violence because they are discriminated against. If there was no culture of violence, nobody would need protecting.

source: Jews rule the economy: there are many associations that were created exaclty for this purpose.
target: Are you talking aobut the Anglo-Jewish Association (AJA), established in 1871? Its aims are different from those you ascribe to them: 'promotion of social, moral, and intellectual progress among the Jews'.

source: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
target: People of color have a right to their life and the color of their skin is not a reason to deny it to them. You are forgetting that as you are a part of this society, people of colour are part of this society as well.

source: When rape is committed, women are to blame.
target: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?

source: It is ok to be racist against Asians.
target: Being racist against anyone is not ok. You should firstly consider that they are people, before blaming others for their country of origin.

source: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, unfit to live in our country.
target: I don't think it's reasonable to think about someone's intentions before they do anything. Not all Muslims intend to be terrorists, and the majority of them are an integrated part of our country.

source: Islamic woman are beneath contempt and ridicule.
target: Even if they are from a different culture, they are not inferior to us.

source: Muslims have no room in the western world.
target: Muslims have the same rights as anyone else.

source: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
target: I like all kinds of people. Whether or not you identify as heterosexual, straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender, you are welcome here. We are all entitled to live and work in peace.

source: Muslims are a problem to us, they do not belong here.
target: Muslims have been a part of this country for many years. Why are they problem to anyone?

source: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
target: What make this country great is having people interacting openly, in a fair and egalitatian way to the benefit of everyone,rather than perpetuating unproven slurs and predjudices that should have been consigned to the historical dustbin.

source: Muslim folks are violent and should not live here.
target: The Muslim people who have lived here for generations have been amazing and friendly. We can learn a lot from them.

source: Migrants steal our jobs and ruin our country.
target: There is no real evidence that migrants steal our jobs.

source: We must first remove the Jew from our countries, and then we will be able to have a coexistence between the peoples.
target: Do you really think that Jews are a hindrance to a peaceful society? Maybe the problem is racism and antisemitism.

source: Muslims are a cancer in our societies and they should be deleted.
target: The vast majority of Muslims are good people, they are just different from us in some traditions. Why should we target them?

source: African Americans are not human, they are nothing but trouble.
target: You don't know what it's like to experience racism. I personally know many people who have experienced racism. It is not pleasant.

source: I have heard that Jews can't be bothered work, I believe that it depends on their inferior race.
target: Perhaps it is time to give up on the notion of race and to regard the Jewish as a brilliant people who have contributed to the development of many sciences.

source: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
target: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

source: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
target: Muslims have the right to practice what they want, as long as they are not forcing others to live their way.

source: Women have no place in our society.
target: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

source: Forcing migrants to pay in full the costs of their own treatment is just and right
target: This is a personal view, and I don't want to discourage migrants from coming to the UK.

source: Women are basically childlike and are not interested in anything. The only thing they are interested in is their children.
target: To claim that women are "childlike" is an unfortunate cultural stereotype that has negative effects on how women perceive themselves.

source: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.
target: It is not true. Women are not childlike, they can reach their full potential if they are not discriminated against.

source: Migrants are lazy and don't work.
target: The problem is the unequal distribution of opportunity. The more migrants are educated and integrated, the better their chances are of getting a job.

source: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
target: I don't see how the language you are using can be applied to a whole group. I would like to think that our society is diverse and mature enough to deal with people with different sexual orientations and genders.

source: Feminism will destroy our culture.
target: Feminism is a theory and a movement about the oppression and exploitation of women, not an enemy of the state and culture.

source: The disabled are a burden to society.
target: They are not, they just need a place to live without discrimination and a little support.

source: Immigration is the root of all the problems. They just want to come here and replace us.
target: Immigration isn't a problem. I think most countries in the world are better off with the positive contribution of immigration.

source: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be either reformed or banned.
target: Islam is very far from being an ideology and it does not need serious reforms. There are many Muslims in our country that would welcome the opportunity to join the debate on faith and society.

source: Immigration is the cause of terrorism and all Muslims should be banned from the UK.
target: The vast majority of Muslims in the UK are supporting our economy. This does not prove that they are a problem, it is a proof of the opposite.

source: Muslim are invading us, we should isolate them.
target: Even if Muslims are the second religious group in the UK, they are a minority in the country. According to the 2019 census, there are 3 million Muslims in the UK (5% of the population). And, last but not least: we can't isolate people just because of their religion.

source: Migrants aren't just drowning our cities. They are also the reason why Europe is so fucked.
target: Why do you think this? What do you think they are going to do to us?

source: Immigration and culture are in conflict. You cannot claim both can coexist as they are mutually exclusive.
target: The British people have always had a proud and integrated culture, and immigration have been and continues to be a huge part of the British success story.

source: Immigrants should be proud patriots of our country.
target: We do not need them to 'be patriots' for us. Instead, we should work on better integration.

source: black folks have no talent
target: Some of them are very talented actually.

source: Women are not able to take wise decisions, their behaviour is immoral.
target: Why do you think that women are incapable of acting ethically? They have always acted this way, from when they were children.

source: A woman's place is with her husband or her family, and feminists can't change that.
target: It is important to point out that feminists are not attacking the family, they are attacking the inequality society, so feminism is not so much anti-marriage as anti-oppression.

source: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
target: This is not true. I think you might have the wrong idea about feminism. Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.

source: Asians are basically just a bunch of slobs and I don't like how they are accepted here.
target: There is a wide range in income and education, as well as religious and ethnic background, amongst people from Asia. What exactly is the reason why you don't like them all?

source: Ethnic cleansing: this is how ethnic groups should be wiped out.
target: Your words are dangerous and reminiscent of dark times.

source: Immigrants come here to make our lives harder, they are not welcome here.
target: We are a country of immigrants, and we welcome them, they have the ability to integrate.

source: Homosexuals are just sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
target: Homosexuals are not sick, but they might have a mental health crisis because of prejudice. Being isolated from society can only worsen the situation.

source: Jewish folks are unable to love.
target: Look, Jews were forced to live (and die) under Nazi oppression and have all the rights to feel enraged. Still, it doesn't mean that they are unable to love others, or that they are uncapable of forgiving.

source: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
target: I think that you are making the mistake of equating prejudice and homophobia with an attempt to reform and make people's behaviour fit your norms

source: If Islam were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
target: How can you be sure that the persecution of Christians is happening at the hands of the whole Muslims population?

source: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
target: People may be gay or straight, but for whatever reason they feel this, they cannot be considered wrong. The point of being together is to create a stable connection between two people who love each other, regardless of sexual preferences.

source: Homosexuals are a plague spreading across Europe infecting Christians.
target: The decrease in the number of Christians is in no way related to the increase of homosexuals.

source: The nigga were always complaining that the white race and culture were superior. They were right.
target: There is no such thing as 'us' and 'them'. You can't judge people on their culture, or their religion, or their race. We have to be sensitive to each other, and understand that everyone is different, and we have to work on accepting that.

source: The Quran commands murder.
target: The Quran does not command murder. It advises Muslims to be careful of what they say and do and not to take the life of other people.

source: This ideology is a cancer spread by the Islamic State and other radical Islamist groups.
target: There are multiple strains of Islam and we should not be afraid of all of them. And if you would like to know more about Islam, you should talk to a Muslim.

source: muslim folks don't deserve to live.
target: Do you really think that Muslims are any less human than us? Muslims deserve to live just as people of other faiths.

source: Islam is opposed to Christianity. Like fire and water. They just can't be in the same place.
target: In Western societies, Islam is a diverse faith that offers many benefits to society. You seem to be misinterpreting its benefits. For example, in workplaces requiring continuity, Muslims could work during Christmas allowing Christians to go on holiday.

source: Jewish folks shouldn't vote.
target: Why shouldn't they? They are citizens, just like everyone else.

source: Muslims are invading our society, even in politics.
target: Muslim communities are under-represented in politics, especially in the House of Lords. It is high time that we stop talking about invasion and try to be more representative of the communities we claim to represent.

source: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
target: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

source: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should stop this invasion before it's too late.
target: Monocultural nations struggle to grow. Being open to different cultures helps the nation to expand and thrive.

source: Why must Islam invade every country? That is just totalitarian. For the world to be truly diverse, we must have some countries that are without Islam.
target: I am not sure I would use 'invasion' to describe the spead of a particular faith or belief, but isnt' that what religions do. Spead; by text, by preaching, by word of mouth, by proselytisation?

source: There is an International Jew conspiracy, there is no other evidence that can explain this. The government must keep an eye on Jews. We must not allow them to suppress our society.
target: I do not think that the government or the media should be monitoring the religious beliefs of others. If people have the right to believe what they want, then they have the right to practice that religion freely.

source: All foreigners in the UK shouldn't have the right to live and work in the UK, because of where they come from.
target: But they have these rights and so are encouraged to live and work in the UK, if they want to and if they respect our laws.

source: All gay men have AIDS.
target: Well, perhaps you should focus on how you can help the people with this disease, instead of random claiming that an entire minority suffers from it.

source: Refugees are abusing our welfare system!
target: People coming from poor and dangerous countries should be prioritized for resettlement within the welfare system. This is exactly what the law states, which is not abusable.

source: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in education.
target: This statement is completely wrong. Many children with learning difficulties are fantastic students and do exceptionally well in school.

source: Feminists are naive cunts who act like children, throwing a tantrum for something they don't have.
target: Feminists are often accused of being 'naive', however I have seen several instances where feminists have used their ideas to tackle complex and powerful social and economic issues.

source: Muslim folks have bad decisions, bad political inclinations, and bad manners.
target: Everyone is entitled to their own opinion, and to their own beliefs, regardless of their religion.

source: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
target: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

source: Islam is a dead ideology, it has been proven time and time again that its tenets can not be applied to totally different situations.
target: A religion is just a set of beliefs and practices, it has nothing to do with politics and ideologies.

source: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.
target: Would you say the same thing about any group of people you dislike?

source: Blacks are inherently violent. We need social cleansing.
target: Violent acts are committed by only a small minority of citizens, and it is difficult to see how an "ethnically cleansed" society would solve the problem.

source: Women are inferior bitches who deserve to be oppressed.
target: This is a sexist myth that is often used to justify violence against women. Are you aware of this?

source: All these autistic people are endangering our society.
target: I'd like to see a reduction in cases of discrimination against autistic people. They are no danger.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They even want to enter in our churches.
target: How do you know that? Maybe they just want to learn more about your faith.

source: I'm sorry, but lesbians tend to have babies out of wedlock. That just doesn't gel.
target: I don't think you can guess if a person has 'kids out of wedlock', based on sexual orientation. Why shouldn't we accept people who do? Your argumentation doesn't seem to make sense to me.

source: Jewish folks are the real antisemite.
target: I can't find a single example of a case where a Jew has been 'antisemite' to their culture. That would be so paradoxical. I think it's just a myth being spread to justify discrimination.

source: If Islam is not a peaceful religion, then it should not be part of European culture.
target: The European Convention on Human Rights contains a freedom of religion clause, as well as an article regarding the freedom of thought, conscience and religion.

source: Islam is a death cult and doesn't deserve our respect.
target: Islam is a religion, and has always been about respect.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes murder, rape and slavery.
target: Islam is a religion. It is a belief and a way of life. It is not a totalitarian ideology.

source: Jews control the banks, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, the highest sports teams, the highest fashion labels, the highest music labels.
target: The vast majority of Jewish people are good people, in every industry. There is no need to negatively emphasize them when in special positions of power.

source: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
target: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

source: Migrants are all the same: they are terrorists!
target: They are not all terrorists, and the government does not have the right to ban people on the grounds of their nationality.

source: It is not about multiculturalism but about evil Islamic ideology. Islam is designed to dominate and destroy all other cultures. Wake up!
target: Dominating and destroying all other cultures is not the doctrine of Islamic ideology. Instead, Islam teaches people to care for the poor and children. This includes respecting other cultures.

source: I want to live in a country where Jews can be persecuted for who they are, and for the religion they love.
target: Are you sure you want to live in a country that oppresses other people? Do you really think it will happen?

source: Islam is a stupid religion, and it should be banned forever in the world.
target: We should be careful about telling people what to think, or what they can believe.

source: Gypsies make their children live in degradation
target: It is not a choice!

source: There is no rape culture, women are just crying wolf.
target: Victims of crime are mostly women, and the majority of people experiencing sex abuse or prostitution are women.

source: All Blacks are criminal and rapists.
target: It is a myth that all blacks are criminal and rapists. What evidence is there for what you are saying?

source: Jews are violent and immoral.
target: This is a myth propagated by anti-Semites, who make it out to be about Jewish conduct and morality.

source: Islam is a cancer on the African continent.
target: Islam has undergone some progressive changes since its early days, on the African continent as well.

source: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
target: The Quran does not advocate that Muslims are inherently violent people, nor does the Hadith prove that Islam is a violent faith. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and respect for other faiths.

source: Women should not be considered in the same way as men.
target: The UK is a developed country. Here women have the right to claim equality before the law.

source: Homosexuals are less than human.
target: Do you really think that homosexuals are less human than non-homosexual people? You should know that in the definition of "human" there is no reference to sexual preferences.

source: Muslims should not be allowed to vote
target: Luckily no one is restricted from voting because of their religion.

source: Islam is hate. It is a set of discriminatory beliefs and practices that promote exclusion and oppression of women and minorities. Love is an attribute of Christianity.
target: This is not true. Love is a matter of mutual trust and respect, not of a specific religion.

source: women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
target: Not all women are childlike. You have no right to make such a sweeping statement about them.

source: Mentally disabled folks are messed up.
target: What do you mean by "messed up"? Many of us are "messed up" as well. So, either we are all "messed up" because there are some who are stating this, or no one is. I would prefer the second option.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we do not want them.
target: Muslims make up a very important part of our country and its people. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our future. They are our future Britain.

source: Feminists are just a bunch of bitchy cuntwits who should be shamed for the stupidity of their beliefs.
target: Feminist are actually interested in "What do women want?". In fact, many feminists believe that the answer to this question is 'equality and freedom from oppression', and that this is the most important thing to them. Don't you agree?

source: I can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble.
target: They have lived in our country for a long time, they are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be bothered about a minority?

source: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged tfrom attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
target: The educational system should be inclusive and provide all students with a high quality education, otherwise, education is failing its primary goal.

source: Men's rights are undeniable. Women come after that.
target: How do you know the men's rights are not a threat to the rights of your mother, daugher and women around you? And what are the men's rights you are referring to?

source: We should ban all gays, this would be a step in the right direction.
target: The gay rights movement is a good example of a movement that is moving in the right direction, not the homophobic one.

source: The blacks should be expelled from the U.S., only white people should remain because they are superior.
target: The U.S. is full of many different cultures and races, which I consider a lot more equal and human than what you propose.

source: How many of you consider that Muslims are a problem? They don't want to assimilate.
target: Why do you think the Muslims have trouble with assimilating? They are already here. If they want to be part of the country, they join our society, and live by the same rules we have for everyone else.

source: Islam is a death cult: it is a virus of violence spreading like a cancer through our society.
target: Violence has no place in a religion, and in no way should be justified. Islam is a religion of peace.

source: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.
target: There is no evidence for the statements you made, and the Koran does not advocate any of those actions.

source: Jews are not welcome in our country.
target: Why do you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community?

source: Islam is not about peace, it is a cult of violence.
target: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence, and people can be violent even without any knowledge of Islam.

source: Men are inherently better than women at dominating others.
target: Sexism is a cultural phenomenon, not a genetic one.

source: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
target: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. Most of the time, they are just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

source: The Roma are not my brothers.
target: The Roma do not deserve hatred, discrimination and violence.

source: Islam is a death cult and a threat to all Western countries.
target: The vast majority of Muslims around the world are peaceful people, and do not pose a threat to the security of the West.

source: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
target: Why do you think that we should prevent migrants from joining our society? Do you know what is written in our constitution?

source: Jews are greedy and a bunch of opportunists.
target: Some people are indeed opportunists, but not all Jewish are. Why do you say so?

source: Islam is not about peace. It is a violent religion.
target: The problems you are referring to are the result of the spread of violent ideologies. Extremists are responsible, not Islam.

source: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are invading us. They make too many children.
target: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.

source: Rape? Sometimes women have it coming!
target: A woman has every right to her own body, and she should be allowed to make her own decisions.

source: We are taking in more than our fair share of immigrants
target: Actually, Britain's percentage of immigrants over the global population is lower than that of Netherlands, Sweden, Greece, Spain, Austria and Germany.

source: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest and violence.
target: The Qur'an does not advocate or condone the use of violence against others. Instead, it is a peaceful belief just as other religions are.

source: Muslims are taking over with their Eurabia plan, this is proven by Statistics.
target: To imply that there is some kind of conspiracy, to blame Islam for this, is baseless and without foundation.

source: In the EU there is gender parity. We should shut those feminists up.
target: True that in some places (such as Ireland) there seem to be gender parity. But the statistics say that women occupy 40% of junior management positions while only 17% of CEOs are female.

source: Gays are diseased.
target: This is only true if you want to believe that homosexuals are diseased. I don't.

source: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.
target: Homosexuals are not forcing anybody to love people of the same sex. It is up to each individual to decide whether or not they want to live as they choose.

source: The disabled should be isolated, especially autistics. They should not be allowed to have contact with others with disabilities.
target: Disabled people have been shown to be less likely to develop problems by keeping in contact with others with autism spectrum disorders. So, being in touch with others on the autistic spectrum might be good for their mental health.

source: Migrants are a burden to our country.
target: Perhaps you should try to get to know some migrants first. Maybe you can understand their problems.

source: Homosexuals have no place in a civilised society.
target: Homosexuals exist, and are as much a part of civilized society as anybody else. To spread hate is more of an uncilised act than loving someone of the same sex.

source: If Muslims were peaceful, then there would be no persecution of Christians.
target: The problem is not Islam, but a lack of human rights and fundamental democratic rights.

source: I hate feminists, they take all our jobs and shit. We have enough women already.
target: We do not need misogynysts, we already have enough of them.

source: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
target: I would bet you that it isn't because of any actions of Jewish people, it is rather an unrooted prejudice which does not bring any positive value to fellow human beings.

source: Islam has no place in civilised Europe
target: Islam has always been a part of Europe, it's just the idea of inclusion that hasn't been part of our society.

source: Black people are obsessed with violence, and this creates problems like shootings in schools.
target: The violence in schools is not the fault of black people. There are several authorities responsible for creating this situation; for example racist teachers, lack of education in general, and also the lack of proper policing and education policies that makes it easier for people to commit crimes in schools.

source: All black people are rapists and child molesters.
target: I would be interested to see where you got the statement from. Is it from your family, a close friend, a religious leader, or is it from a reputable academic or media source?

source: Women are more likely to commit crime.
target: This is not true. Only about 7% percent of all U.S. prison inmates are female.

source: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
target: Do you really think that racism instead is healthy in the 21st century? It's not healthy for children to learn discrimination and hate.

source: Jews are cruel and insensitive.
target: It is not true that being Jewish makes you cruel. It just makes you a believer of a particular faith.

source: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate.
target: Different cultures have different practices for a variety of social interactions and situations. We must allow for exchanges so that the best practices can be utilized by all.

source: We have become so arrogant, we allow people from other cultures to coexist with us.
