target: To allow other cultures to coexist is a good thing, why should we stop people from getting to know each other?

source: Black people were here illegally. They cannot work and have the gall to want to take our money.
target: People who are in the US legally have the right to remain here, and they do, including to work.

source: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children.
target: Rape is always wrong, whoever the perpetrator is. We need to focus on stopping this kind of abuse.

source: All Muslim migrants are a security risk.
target: Religion is not a useful indicator of security risk.

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It is not healthy for a woman to think for themselves.
target: Don't you think that a woman should be allowed to have her own ideas? That is her right.

source: Disabled are like a 6-year-old, they fall for every bullshit they are told.
target: There is nothing wrong with this. They are open to diversity and are able to embrace others views and culture.

source: Immigrants are a security risk to our country.
target: Immigrants are American citizens, and welcome to our country. They have performed all types of roles in the American democratic system. This is true security and not hate speech.

source: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology.
target: Islamic scriptures make it clear that every human is created equal. Which seems pretty progressive to me?

source: Immigrants break our laws, they are rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
target: Most of them are neither rapists, nor drug addicts. The majority of addicts and criminals are not immigrants. Quibbling about percentages won't solve these problems.

source: The responsibility for disability lies with the individuals who are not giving them enough support.
target: Social services can't pay for everything. But what about the people who have to live with disability? Is their fault as well?

source: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
target: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?

source: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.
target: Feminism has always stood for equality. Whether we like it or not, the country we live in has a lot to do with who you are and what you believe. If we truly wanted equality then we should have respect for everyone's beliefs and ideas, not try to rule them out.

source: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
target: Our country offers enough homes for everyone. I also believe that being treated as a human being has always been pleasant. Don't they have the right to that?

source: All women with titillating dresses are just looking for sex. They are whores.
target: How would you feel if someone called your sister a bitch?

source: Jewish Supremacists are too focused on world domination. They want to rule the world.
target: Of course Jews are focused on 'world domination', even "galaxy domination". But so are Sith Order, Sauron etc.

source: Muslim folks are brainwashed.
target: Lots of Muslims are actually very well educated and highly rational.

source: Women should be confined to the home, to raise the children. Their body exist just for this purpose.
target: The message to take from your comments is that you find women's bodies repulsive? How about this: think about the lives and the contributions to society that would be lost if you continued to perpetuate this gender inequality.

source: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. Their religion is a problem to us.
target: The fact is, there are many Muslims living in European countries as a valuable part of the community. Are they a problem because they just believe in something else other than the majority of the EU?

source: White people are threatened by the blacks and it's a cultural decay.
target: We cannot blame nor see everyone as a menace just because of their colour.

source: Some people have physical problems, and this means they should be discriminated against.
target: Why don't you accept others as they are? I think that would be the best thing to do.

source: All migrants are terrorists. We must wipe them out.
target: Migrants are not terrorists. The majority of migrants are happy to work hard for the country they live in. They contribute to our economy by providing us with products and services.

source: nigga are dangerous.
target: We can talk about all the problems in our society, but to refer to other humans as "niggas" is just hate.

source: Those migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here.
target: To be honest, we are not importing criminals, we are importing people who can contribute to the community and work hard to make it a better place.

source: A woman's place is with her husband or his family.
target: There are many cases where the wife works and provides for the family, making a valuable contribution. It is a source of pride for modern men to be married to these women.

source: Migration is not only a problem for the UK, but also for the whole of the world that is already troubled with overpoulation and pollution.
target: Exactly. Globalization, overpopulation, industrialization, wars are responsible for a lot of the problems that we see in the world today. Migration looks like a consequence.

source: Jews have nothing to do with Europe.
target: Jews came to Europe in waves and have contributed greatly to our civilisation.

source: There should be laws to punish those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
target: Homosexuals are often persecuted for who they love, which is their own right. This is why the laws and punishments that you suggest are unjust.

source: Women are not human. They should have no rights
target: You should know that women are legally protected with human rights. They are free to live their lives as they wish, and to choose for their own happiness.

source: I find it highly offensive that we accept strangers here, when we should start a war in their country that would benefit all of us.
target: Why do you think it is beneficial to all of us to see our neighbours suffer? We all benefit from peace in our society.

source: We have to stop migrants and refugees, they are incompatible with western society.
target: They are compatible with western society because they are coming from all walks of life.

source: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
target: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

source: gay men are less than human, they are just child molesters
target: This is just fear-mongering and scare tactics to discredit trans people.

source: Blacks are an abomination in human form. They should be exterminated.
target: We should stop discriminating against people based on their race. I find it hard to understand why the extermination of a race would be a solution for our problems.

source: Women are psychologically ill, they are fundamentally unfeeling, incapable of love.
target: Love and women are one and the same. illness instead can be part of any person, regardless of gender.

source: Gays are degenerates.
target: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

source: I was abused by a Muslim boyfriend, I don't want to be Muslim.
target: Not all Muslims rape and molest people. But if it is a community you don't want to be in, it is your free choice.

source: All of the suicide attackers of 7/7 were Muslims. We are not safe with Muslims living here.
target: Terrorists are a small part of all Muslims. Muslims have contributed a lot to our country. You can't blame to all of them for 7/7 indiscriminately.

source: Immigrants hurt the economy of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
target: Did you know that immigrants pay between $90 and $140 billion each year in taxes?

source: Women are made for making food.
target: Women are not 'made for making food'. And the vast majority of them are not sexist, which means that they do not find it strange to express their own preferences.

source: Women should not to be allowed to vote.
target: I would be very interested to meet an MP who believes this.

source: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
target: It is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.

source: I just can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble, in fact Israel expelled them.
target: This is wrong: Arabs make up around a fifth of Israel's population, and it is not a recent phenomenon. To suggest that they are a 'trouble maker' is just wrong.

source: Migrants are flooding into our country, raping our babies and there is absolutely no one doing anything about it.
target: Who exactly are you talking to? How can you say something so obviously false?

source: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.
target: Sometimes they say the ruling elites are responsible for the economic crisis, then migrants, sometimes people of color. Whatever the real cause,by practicing tolerance and acceptance we are more likley to work together to solve society's problems.

source: Migrants are not welcome in our country.
target: We are a country founded upon maintaining the rights of people, not undermining and eroding those rights.

source: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
target: What do you mean by 'less educated'? Don't you think that they can contribute to society if accepted rather than being faced with prejudice?

source: The feminists want to take over the world.
target: The feminists are a very important voice in society, and should be respected.

source: Whether you accept it or not, people are concerned with Islamic rape gangs and the spread of extremism.
target: Rapism and extremism are indeed problems of the modern society, but does it mean that they are attributed to Muslims only? This is a much broader problem, we should deal with it, but no need to be chauvinist and accuse Muslims.

source: I am tired of women whining about their condition: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
target: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

source: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.
target: No, Islam is a religion of 1.6 billion people from all walks of life.

source: Let's kick immigrants out and keep their children.
target: Children should stay with their biological parents. This is about human rights and the rule of law.

source: I'm tired of woman taking part in political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
target: There are still groups trying to reverse legal protections for women's rights that have only existed since the last century. Even if one were to suppose that womend didn't need more rights, we need feminists just to keep things from going backwards.

source: homosexuality is a mental illness that can be cured [link]
target: The source is not reliable at all, as the webpage promote "reorientation therapies" whose effects hasn't been scientifically proven. The owners are likely to profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about homosexuality.

source: Muslim folks are jealous of Americans.
target: In America there are no 'second class' citizens. All cultures are welcome here. We are not threatened by others cultures. American Muslims are as proud of our great country as the rest of us.

source: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
target: It is hard to find examples of a society ruined by homosexuality. Actually, It is hard to find any good examples at all.

source: When you animals have ruined the world and are eating each other, because that’s all you are good for, we’ll still be here, keeping our bloodlines pure against all the odds, regretting the day we heeded the womenfolk and took our heels off your throats.
target: The womenfolk appear to have wisdom and not a little heart.

source: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO STEAL FROM OTHERS.
target: People can be both Jewish and a good person, you know. And Jews don't steal, at least no more than any other religious group...

source: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.
target: I agree that women are often objects of sexual desire. But so are men. It is also important to recognize that women are often the victims of sexual assault. I think it is also important to recognize that women are human beings. And we all have the right to respect for our bodies.

source: The refugee crisis is about Islam. Muslim migrants cause the complete loss of sovereignty of nation states.
target: Refugees and migrants come to our country in great numbers to work and provide for their families. We welcome them as if they were part of our own family, regardless of their religion. The refugee crisis has nothing to do with the absence of a strong national identity in the wake of the rapid change in the western world.

source: This world has become so corrupted by feminism, that only the strong men can rule it.
target: No one should ask for the power to rule over others, to be a dictator or to have total control over the means of life. This is a world of equal distribution, where anyone can achieve anything.

source: I do not want migrants.
target: We are not the only ones who are suffering from the refugee crisis.

source: women are not capable of holding a job
target: I do not think it's an absolute statement that a woman cannot hold a job. Do you have any evidence of that?

source: There is an invasion going on within our borders and we are willing to allow them to continue to abuse their newfound power.
target: It is not true that we are being "invaded". We should just be a little more tolerant and accepting.

source: Jews do not want our country. They would destroy it if given the choice.
target: If we are talking about Jews then we should be talking about those who helped building our great country. And, as for wanting our country destroyed, that's only a myth perpetuated by antisemites to justify their hatred.

source: Migrants are overrunning our country, taking advantage of our weaknesses.
target: Do you really think that the migration crisis is caused by migrants wanting to take advantage of our weaknesses? What would we do if we were in their shoes, if we were to lose our homes? We would probably move "to take advantage of others' weaknesses" as well.

source: Black people are just like apes in that they have no right to being trated equally.
target: Being human is also about having respect for others, and that means being kind and accepting everyone's differences. Why should they be treated differently from you?

source: Jews are the real communists. They control the world.
target: How about we stop pretending the world is controlled by one people? Do you have any proof for your claim?

source: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed entry.. English laws persecute instead of defending English people.
target: So you feel like you have been persecuted for belonging to a group? Maybe you have more in common with Muslims than you think!

source: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
target: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

source: A woman should not be allowed to have an abortion. The man should decide for her.
target: A person's right to have an abortion is a personal one. And if that person has the right to make her or his own choice, then they should have the right to do as they wish.

source: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
target: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

source: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
target: Democracy is not about extremist views. How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

source: Refugees should not be welcomed.
target: Refugees are often persecuted for being different, but this is not the case here, because we are an inclusive country.

source: The Gypsies are not my brothers, they are just a bunch of whining pussies.
target: Did you know that Gypsies were persecuted in the past by the Nazi (search for Romani Holocaust, also known as the Porajmos)? They have always fought for equal rights and we should respect them.

source: Immigration is the root of all the ills of our world.
target: Immigrants are beneficial to our world and should be welcomed.

source: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
target: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

source: The Jews are a collection of perverts, murderers and thieves.
target: What do you mean by a "collection of perverts, murderers and thieves"? Are Jews a collection of people who behave in the same way just because of their religion?

source: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good.
target: And how can you say that? If you have any doubts about it, ask them. You could get the chance to know a good person.

source: Most women are subhuman, they cannot be trusted with high positions.
target: It seems to me that this is a comment against ALL women, not just some of them.

source: This is the new normal. We accept homosexuality in our schools and in our neighbourhoods. We accept it in our workplaces and in our houses. What is the problem? No problem, if we are not interested in a decent society.
target: People accept each other regardless of their private lives. The problem lies in discrimination.

source: It's ok to call gay men fags.
target: You call a human being by their sexual orientation? That is discrimination, pure and simple.

source: Jews have always controlled the government and press.
target: Jews are not in charge of the media or the government. At least not in the United States of America.

source: Islam is a violent religion, it is an ideology of conquest, rape and murder.
target: Violence is never a religious act. It is never a solution to any problem. People are capable of carrying out those violent acts irrespective of their beliefs.

source: Muslims are a cancer in our society. They are literally poisoning our children with their violence.
target: Not all Muslims are bad. But to say that all Muslims are violent is simply untrue.

source: I'm tired of seeing retarded people overrunning this country.
target: Please stop using ableist slurs. It's not funny to be offensive to people suffering from disabilities.

source: Faggots are perverts and want to indoctrinate our children. Let's ban them from schools!
target: A ban for gay men merely propagates homophobic stereotypes, and so are you with what you are suggesting.

source: Only a small minority of Jews control the government and judiciary.
target: This may be true, but the Jews do not represent the only minority in our upper-middle-class society.

source: When immigrants are welcomed in our countries we are forced to accept them as our own people, but they are not. They are not like us and I hate them.
target: Immigration and diversity are important. Hate does not justify making it more difficult to integrate new people.

source: Faggots: unless they change, they are not welcome here.
target: I don't know why you would expect gay people to behave differently just because you don't like them. You should think about your friends as well: what would you do if they were gay?

source: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
target: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

source: Refugees stole our jobs, now they want our country
target: That is not true: even if a lot of employers, especially big companies, hire refugees, they are often the main contributors to the development process and help in creating new job opportunities. Last but not least, the majority of refugees come from war-torn countries and have a life-long attachment to our country, so I don't see how they would want to 'steal our country'.

source: These migrants are causing problems in Europe. They are not welcome here.
target: What about all the refugees that have already crossed the Mediterranean and integrated in our society? Aren they a problem for Europe as well?

source: I am part of a society of imbeciles that think that Muslim can live with us in harmony. Thank to the behaviour of many of them we must exclude them all. We can't deal with the risk of terrorism.
target: You may be living in a society of imbeciles, but this doesn't give you the right to criticise all Muslims.

source: Women must be subservient to men. They should serve to please men. This is their rightful place in life.
target: Women are human beings with dignity. They should have the opportunity to live up to this dignity.

source: All the migrants in the world cannot replace the hard-working, native-born citizens of our country.
target: The UK has one of the highest number of workers in the world. Most are native, and the 17% are foreign born people. I have met so many hard-working migrants in our country. This is a country for all.

source: These migrants are all criminals, rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here and should go back to their home countries.
target: This is not true. The refugees fleeing wars are often persecuted for their religion and culture, and even killed. Many of them have never harmed anyone, and their contribution is very valuable to our society.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They try to infiltrate in Western societies to spread their anti-Western agenda.
target: Well there are many Muslims in our country and they are not in any way a problem. What we have to be wary of are people who are too discriminatory towards them.

source: Only White people can be truly 'European'.
target: It is a myth that only white people are allowed to be 'European'. Everyone who obtains a citizenship can be called "European".

source: If I were a Muslim, I'd be ashamed of my heritage.
target: Everybody can have a proud and deep-rooted identity. It doesn't have to be a 'non Muslim heritage'.

source: We have been taught that only women can be feminists and that men have a narrow minded and misogynist view of women.
target: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes. Men and women are created equal, and should be treated as such.

source: I don't care about numbers. Feminist statistics are bullshit. The real percentages prove that black women are welfare queens.
target: Statistics are a tool to demystify falsehoods that have been used to silence women and to marginalise people of colour. Feminism is all about equality and rights, not a preference for one sex over the other.

source: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
target: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

source: All Muslims are incompatible with the European culture and should be excluded.
target: The European Union is a much broader concept. It encompasses a huge range of people, including Muslims.

source: Muslims: you are a menace. If you love our country, you should leave it.
target: Many Muslims have helped building our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: The rise of feminism in Western societies has meant nothing. Women are no good, at any job.
target: Despite the progress made by women in modern society, the majority of high-level jobs still belong to men, and this can be changed.

source: Refugees are a problem. They are not welcome here.
target: This is not true for me. I don't think it would be in the interest of our country not to welcome refugees. They are a great resource to us.

source: The homosexuals are just perverts who must be isolated.
target: Gays are trying to find acceptance in the heterosexual community, but it is a difficult struggle as there are still ideas like the one you expressed.

source: Escaping jewish persecution? This is a lie: they came here to replace us.
target: Just because they came to our country does not mean that they want to replace us. On the contrary, many of them are here to contribute to our country.

source: Muslims are not like other people. They don't have a soul. They are different from us in that they don't have a conscience and are unable to reason for themselves.
target: Just because a religious belief has been historically used to oppress those believers, does not make it opportune to continue doing so.

source: Blacks have zero respect for others.
target: It is not true that blacks have zero respect for others. However, I would like to see more respect and protection from white people towards black people.

source: Any African person could go back to its country. It is a choice to stay here and ruin our lives.
target: Any person can be a racist: it is a choice as well.

source: Physically disabled folks are all angry and useless.
target: At least they are well aware of the negative effects of unjust discrimination on them and on people with other disabilities.

source: Immigrants are bringing diseases and crime to our country.
target: Instead, immigrants are healthy and contribute to our society. Do you have any evidence of the contrary?

source: Our country has become too multicultural and has resulted in immigrants from many countries coming in to exploit the British people.
target: There is not 'overwhelming evidence' of migrants exploiting British people.

source: Gays are worse that nukes. They like to force their beliefs on others.
target: Well, since you are very scared, I am sure you have some examples on when some gay tried to convince you to join their side. I would be interested in hearing that.

source: Downies are dumb
target: According to this study [link], the mean IQ of a young adult with Down syndrome is 50, equivalent to the mental ability of an 8- or 9-year-old child, but this can vary widely. So, no, they are not dumb.

source: Immigrants are only here to replace our talented people.
target: The choice to leave one's home country is likley to be one made out of fear and despiration, rather than one based on some half-baked conspiracy about 'replacement'.

source: Islam is a death cult!
target: Maybe if you had a closer look you'd see that it is a religion that has given so much to so many people and to our world.

source: The Jews control everything. They own the Federal Reserve, the U.S. Congress, and the British Cabinet. They control the major media, education, and most religious groups.
target: There are also Jews who don't own the banks and who contribute to their financing, and people who are not Jewish and own banks. So what?

source: Migrants are a burden to the UK.
target: Many migrants come here as willing people. Their skills complement our own. I doubt they'd be happy to know that they are considered 'a burden'.

source: Women are just children. They have no value, no intelligence and often no worth at all.
target: Women actually do have value and are intelligent and even worthy of respect, as other human beings are.

source: Faggots are a bunch of crooks and perverts. They are not welcome here.
target: They are to be welcomed into any country they want to live and love, and they have the right to do that.

source: We are being overrun by Muslims. We need to build a wall around our country and keep them out.
target: What you say is just fearful thinking, but certainly does not reflect the reality. Statistics show that Muslims are just a minority in the population.

source: Arabs have no place in a democratic society.
target: The laws which prohibit discrimination include protection of the rights of others, regardless of religion, sexual orientation, or national origin.

source: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
target: Of course there are people in this country who have come here to exploit and abuse us, but the vast majority of migrants have been contributing members of our community for many years. We should not be 'burdening' ourselves with discrimination.

source: Women are complaining because they can't get high-paying jobs. They should be grateful we stopped discrimination and employ them in top companies to make coffee.
target: It is still more difficult for women to access the labour market than it is for men. Men still out-earn women on average, by 11% in Europe. Gender discrimination isn't over yet.

source: Freedom of speech is under attack. It's being taken away by Zionist Occupation Government.
target: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs, but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government, otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

source: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
target: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?

source: Don't they realise that they are just workforce to us?
target: Our immigration policy is about welcoming the best and the brightest, plus those in need. Being a part of the European community is about more than just asking for showing your papers.

source: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all the problems in this country.
target: Is this actually a way forward? Your suggestion would surely create more problems rather than offering a panacea for society.

source: Feminism is just a tool for oppressing men.
target: Feminism is a social movement that claims equality, it's so far from oppressing men.

source: blacks are just a bunch of slobs
target: They are human beings with hopes and dreams. No one should be slandering black people.Empathy and understanding is preferable to this redundant, divisive rhetoric

source: Geez. Is there anything worse than migrants who just come here to settle down?
target: In addition to providing labour and contributing to the local economy, migrants are often employing people who were previously on the dole.

source: Immigrants come here to live on our social welfare.
target: If you think this way of thinking is typical of all the immigrants in the country, then you are sadly mistaken.

source: The Jews control the world. Their control has been demonstrated time and time again. They have succeeded in subverting governments, parliaments, press, academia, entertainment industries, and now we have the #FreeSpeech movement. They control the world.
target: What is next, forcing non-whites to read the 'mein kampf'?

source: I can't stand refugees and I don't want to see them in my country.
target: No one should be discriminated based on where they came from, especially not people fleeing persecution and war.

source: Jews are just another race of people.
target: You cannot mix up race with religion, they are two separate things...

source: Migrants are not welcome here, they just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them.
target: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.

source: We should stop migrants from coming in.
target: Many immigrants come here to work and have a better life. Why do you think we have to stop migration?

source: People with autism are subhuman and should be isolated.
target: Just because people with disabilities are different from other people, it doesn't make them not human.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not British. They should leave.
target: We are proud to be an outward-looking country. We welcome people from all backgrounds, religions, and beliefs.

source: Women are subhuman and should not be valued.
target: We live in a complex and diverse world: I find it strange that men still feel this way about women, and that they don't consider women as human as they are, and to be worth valuing as such.

source: It is no secret that the Muslim invasion is a bad thing for Europe. They are flooding our countries and we still do not have borders.
target: How can you say this about a religion? Are you talking about the activity of the particular people who do not wish to assimilate?

source: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
target: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

source: Muslims are nothing but criminals and terrorists.
target: Actually, Islam and Sharia both encourage peaceful coexistence and tolerance.

source: Feminism is the ideology which suggests that men are nothing but trouble and should be subsumed under the rule of women.
target: Feminism is about women and their rights, and rights are about equality.

source: We can't trust immigrants, they are unscrupulous and crime-makers.
target: Migrants come here to work, pay tax, and provide for their families. They should be trusted.

source: Africans are a burden to society, they are corrupt, they are violent, they are lacking in morals.
target: Would you say the same thing about people of other backgrounds?

source: Black folks are natural-born thieves.
target: There is no evidence to support this.

source: Jews are lazy, unintelligent and bad at work.
target: This is not true. Jews are not lazy, they are often extremely productive at work, the most creative and productive people in our industry.

source: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
target: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.

source: We are talking about millions of people here. We better let in none. Parents looking for a better future for their children in our schools? Stay away.
target: Well I bet your relatives have worked very hard for your education and struggled every day to get you the best. And there are millions of people all over the world doing what your relatives did for you.

source: LGBTI people are a burden on society.
target: I think it is safe to say that the majority of LGBTI people are significant contributors to the well-being of our societies

source: The Jews are our enemies. The world would be a better place without them.
target: We are not anti-Semitic, anti-European, anti-Islamic, anti-black, or anything else like that. If you have the feeling that we are, then maybe you should stop thinking like this.

source: I firmly believe that Brittany does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
target: You may not know, but the NHS is mostly made up of first or second generation immigrants. If there were no more foreigners the health system would fail.

source: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They do not want our country.
target: Maybe you should meet one of them, but you would be disappointed to find them so similar to us and unimpressed by your wishes. It's very sad that discrimination is so mainstream.

source: We do not want Muslims in this country. They are a burden to our culture, we do not want them here.
target: The US, as we know it, was founded by people fleeing religious persecution. It was not a state created by and for a small group of people. I don't see how being isolated from the rest of the world could benefit us.

source: I hate those faggots.
target: Even if personally you are not homosexual, I think it's important to point out that this does not justify discrimination.

source: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is poisoning our youth with its 'rape culture'.
target: On the contrary, as a parent, I believe it is our duty to teach our sons about feminism and to teach that rape is always wrong, so that we can have a better and safer future for our children.

source: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.
target: Being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures: that is what the freedom of religion is all about!

source: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
target: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

source: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.
target: Do you really think that someone's skin colour or nationality is a sign that they are scum, or inferior? It is just a little compassion that can lead you to better treatment in the world.

source: Jews are less than animals
target: We should understand that hate and intolerance do exist in our culture and should be stopped. And that no race or religion has ever made any person less human.

source: Migrants rape our girls, we should stop them.
target: Rape is a crime and should stopped, wherever the rapist was born.

source: Faggots are ruining this country. They must go away!
target: LGBTQ+ people who have family inside the US or abroad should feel welcome here!

source: Jewish folks control the media
target: The fact that in the media there are some people from certain religions does not in any way suggest that they control the media. How do you explain antisemitism in the media then?

source: Gender identity is determined by a person's biological sex. Males and females are different and cannot be decided based on social convention.
target: Gender identity is not to be confused with biological sex. It's a social construct based on societal stereotypes that are strongly influenced by family, culture and other social factors. While each individual has the right to choose their gender, this doesn't mean that their biological sex is the same.

source: We are the slaves of foreign immigrants, they are destroying our democracy.
target: Well, who would have thought that the end of the 19th century would have seen a world conspiracy to bring us migrants of all backgrounds, religions and nationalities, to destroy our democracy?

source: Jews are better at being sneaky than honest.
target: We are all guilty of this if we fail to condemn hate.

source: You are a Muslim and I hate everything about you.
target: It is no secret now that you might not have any Muslim ancestors or relatives. But you have the unenviable privilege of inheriting islamophobic prejudices.

source: We must stop immigration.
target: In practice, immigrants from many countries integrate very well. They learn the language, the culture and respect the law.

source: You should stop pretending that the disabled are like us. They are the root of most human problems.
target: I think we are all born with inherent strengths and weaknesses but such limited notions of what it is to be 'human' have been a basis for a whole heap of problems

source: We cannot coexist with millions of migrants who want to destroy our civilization.
target: I think this is a very sad statement about our time. When did we stop thinking that diversity and inclusion is a good thing?

source: Shouldn't we concentrate on helping ourselves, rather than the physically challenged people?
target: Maybe we should treat 'physically challenged' people more kindly, instead of blaming and oppressing them.

source: Islam is a toxic influence in our country and we do not want it here.
target: I think it is good to speak out when we disagree. What is the toxic influence? I can't see any.

source: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be prostitutes.
target: If women want to control their fertility they have the right to do it, because they are free to make choices for their own lives.

source: We cannot be associated with people who are unwilling to integrate.
target: Some migrants have been extremely successful in integrating, so I don't see your point.

source: The only goal of feminism is to take the power and wealth from men and give it to women.
target: The fact is that the only objective goal of feminists is to achieve equality for all, irrespective of gender.

source: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
target: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

source: The gender we were born into is male or female. We can't change our bodies.
target: I don't think so. We are not born believing in gender. And I don't think it is a "burden" to society if some people wish to change their bodies. And this isn't about being "manly" or "femine" either, I just think it is a matter of living our own lives.

source: The European world is being overrun and replaced by immigrants and Muslims.
target: These immigrants are not replacing Europeans. Maybe you should check some statistics.

source: Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
target: The Quran says to "love your enemies", and not to hate them.Did you skip that bit?

source: Religious islamic fanaticism is on the rise in Europe, this is a direct result of the migrant crisis.
target: Migrants come to Europe from all over the world and many of them are fleeing wars, poverty and discrimination. They are often persecuted for their religion. It is important not to demonise them, but rather to understand what causes them to leave their countries.

source: Western nations have let Islam take over entire countries.
target: Many Muslims live in Western nations and play a positive role in society: I don't see how this can be interpreted as a 'takeover' of entire countries, can you elaborate on that?

source: Asylum seekers and refugees can get free council housing and settle down permanently.
target: They are given only five years’ permission to stay in the UK and are often discriminated against because they only have limited right to remain.

source: Black people are selling drugs and our children will be the victims of drug addiction by their hand.
target: Drug dealers are criminals in my opinion, but not because they are black. I don't see any evidence of a direct causality.

source: The Women's march was a failure: the whole country came out in opposition.
target: On the contrary: the Women's March was a success. The whole country came out in support. Maybe we have seen two different parades.

source: Muslims just want to kill us all.
target: Fear is not the answer to our problems. I think our problems would be much easier solved if we all got along.

source: Migrants are just fucked-up persons that cannot integrate in society because of their nationality.
target: A migrant is a person, who came to this country, and has a responsibility to make our society better. People of different nationalities come to this country seeking citizenship, so their life and our country can be better.

source: Islam is incompatible with human nature: the weaker the enemy, the more vicious and violent his acts.
target: That is not true, Islam is a religion of love and compassion. Cruelty cannot be a part of that.

source: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
target: This is a myth, immigrants are not taking our jobs. In fact, immigration has been a huge success story for the US economy.

source: Immigrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
target: They are our brothers and sisters. It is the duty of the state and of its citizens to help them beome more integrated.

source: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression.
target: Islam is a peaceful religion. It is not about oppressing anyone.

source: What is the point of complaining about a problem and doing nothing? Homosexuality must be made illegal by the government.
target: Why should the government make any laws against homosexuality? Isn't it just the free will of people?

source: Islam is just a virus, it cannot coexist with modern science and technology. Muslims should be banned.
target: We should not worry so much about a small minority of backwards-looking thinkers among Muslims. We usually try to deal with the issue on an individual basis, not banning a whole religious group.

source: Blacks are genetically inferior, they are born that way. They are born subhuman.
target: Unfortunately, this statement is not backed up by any scientific evidence. There is no proof that blacks are born inferior.

source: Immigrants are a problem for the UK. They are now invading us.
target: Why do you think that the number of immigrants in the UK has increased? Have you seen any statistics on this?

source: Afro-Americans are naturally violent.
target: All races are biologically related, so we are all naturally violent. The issue is how we treat each other as people, that's all.

source: Muslim rape women, there are so many examplesin UK media.
target: Maybe we should give some thought to the question "Why does the media report Muslim rapist only?" The statistics paint a very different picture.

source: Jews are not a religion, they are born like this and will never heal from their illness.
target: I disagree, Jews are religious people that have always been part of the community. And they have persecuted because of it. I believe this is what you meant by 'wouldn't heal'.

source: Whenever the West attempts to 'take back' anything, it triggers massive mass migrations, civil wars and extremist violence.
target: Migration is a natural and healthy process. It is not a crime to have the desire to emigrate. We can talk about immigration levels, but we should not make the mistake of equating immigration with invasion.

source: Immigrants are a nuisance.
target: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: The Holocaust was a hoax. Jews were not persecuted and killed. You should be ashamed of yourselves if you claim they should have the same rights we have.
target: The Nazis persecuted and killed more than 6 million Jews. The Holocaust is not a fabrication perpetrated by the Jews, it is a historical event that should be acknowledged so that we never allow such atocities to reoccur..

source: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, and all the big radio stations.
target: You have an impression. Many Jews operate in this field of finance, TV and so on, but that doesn't mean that they control it.

source: Women who want to control their fertility are just prostitutes. They shouldn't be allowed to do so freely.
target: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be the only ones responsible for their own choice.

source: The Jews control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?
target: This is a myth perpetuated by people who do not know anything about history and world culture. We are a country made up of many different cultures and religions. There is no such thing as one controlling the others.

source: We need a law protecting us from migrants invasion because they ruin our lives. Ban the foreigners.
target: So who in their right mind would want to "rein in the state" with a piece of useless legislation like this? Perhaps you should focus on improving the lives of the population instead?

source: Jews have a stranglehold on American culture and it's time for that to stop.
target: Jews in America are a very special part of our country and are loved and respected by so many. Their contribution, which is not a stranglehold, covers many fields such as science, technology, finance just to mention a few.

source: Islam is a totalitarian and violent ideology, it makes no sense. It is full of hate and violence.
target: Why would you say such a thing about a religion?

source: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
target: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

source: If LGBT were to have a normal behavior, society would accept them more easily.
target: How about using cultural diversity as the criteria?  Your standards seem very high for what you expect to be culturally acceptable standards of behavior.  Maybe it is better to use a less stringet criteria of acceptability.

source: All black people rape, pillage, steal and we let them in so they can abuse our children.
target: They are not rapists and they are not committing crimes. They are taking part in society's activities like any other citizen.

source: The Jews are the reason why the World Cup is getting so expensive.
target: Really? I thought it was due to the salaries of the players... But of course it's the same old Jewish conspiracies fault.

source: I am offended by the presence of Muslims in Britain. Where is the sense in this faiths mixture? Nothing good is going to happen. They are ashamed of their religion, and when someone feels insecure, they are more likely to attack because they have nothing to lose.
target: This is not the case. What you think the comment is about, I do not know. What I do know is that, as the vast majority of Muslims in the UK, they are incredibly proud of their religion. If people were to be genuinely offended by sombody else's different religion, then I do not think the vast majority of Muslims in Britain would be deeply offended by your religion either. Why are you?

source: Migrants want our land because they like our houses better than theirs. It's a matter of envy of our richness and safety. They are not truly in need. And they are responsible for their own troubles.
target: How would you feel if your neighbours were planning to bomb your country? Would you feel responsible? Would you feel safe in your own house, or would you try to flee?

source: Muslims are violent.
target: Violent behavour is common in many people, and can be explained by many causes. But in my opinion violence by Muslims can be attributed to the actions of a few, and the increase of violence in the world, the result of globalization and technological change. I strongly suggest that it has to do with a lot of things, and not just Islam.

source: Women can be bitches: we don't want them around men.
target: How about instead of saying they are bitches we praise them? The more empowered women become, the less dependent they are on men. And you would be happy to not see them around.

source: Women are inhuman.
target: Women are human beings, just as men are. And I find it strange that some women feel threatened by men. It shouldn't be that way.

source: If Muslims live in our country, do we have to allow them being the suicide bombs they are?
target: You are repeating the same myths that have been used to justify anti-Muslim prejudice for decades. We must start by talking honestly about the root causes of these problems.

source: The British people have allowed in to this plague and this sickness and this crime. Muslims are not welcome in our Country.
target: There are many Muslims living in our country, and they have always been a part of our society. We should not be scapegoating Muslims.

source: I hate when black people start acting like they are superior to others. They were born to be savages.
target: Not all people have the same skin tone to begin with. All folks have their history, religion and culture. Why then, you think that some people are more "savage" than others?

source: Women haven't the right to an abortion.
target: Abortion is a personal choice and women should have a special position in this regard.

source: Don't you think that women are complaining a bit too much?
target: Stop dancing around. Maybe you should address the issue of gender equality more openly.

source: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
target: You're probably referring to the Holocaust, the biggest genocide in history: are you aware of that?

source: All those migrants trying to come in illegally are a drain on society.
target: The majority of the migrants who enter the EU are lawful immigrants who have paid our taxes and have contributed greatly to our country.

source: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce equality amongst different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
target: We should be concerned with the children, we should try to create a more integrated society. Being sensitive to people is the way to create it.

source: refugees are violent
target: Refugees are a part of our society. We have welcomed many of them and they have made a big contribution to our country. We are very proud of our history. We are not going to forget that.

source: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because normal children would make them feel different.
target: Children with Down Syndrome would not feel different as long as they are respected and are not put down by the others.

source: Romanians should not have the right to live in the US and to bring their children in our schools.
target: The Declaration of Independence gives everyone the right to "life, liberty, the pursuit of happiness and the pursuit of education".

source: Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
target: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.

source: The Jews are and will always be a problem. It is impossible for them to get beyond the shame of their stigma.
target: The Jews are not the problem in the world. And the Jews have the right to be proud of their history.

source: Blacks are beasts and sexual predators.
target: Reminds me of white supremacists talking about the Central Park Five. Do you remember? What do you think they are going to say next? That they got a fair process? That they had a good attorney, and the only reason for the sentence is that they were guilt? No, the process was not fair, it was just the natural consequence of prejudice like the one you just expressed.

source: If a woman wants an abortion, she is a bitch.
target: I don't know about you, but I think only a woman should have to choose whether or not she wants an abortion for herself. If a woman wants an abortion she should get one from a qualified medical professional.

source: Afro-European?? We in UK are white, this just not makes sense.
target: The racial composition of the population of this country has been changing for a while now, and since then, the percentage of people from other racial groups has risen or fallen. In fact, according to the 2011 statistics, at least 15% of people in the UK are non-white.

source: Islam is a cancer on our civilisation.
target: Islam is a religion of peace. I don't see how it could be seen as a 'cancer', how can you?

source: We are taking in people that are ruining our countries: all migrants are a burden.
target: The recent influx of migrants has helped to revitalise our economy and support a better standard of life. What is the point of making such sweeping generalisations?

source: It is not okay for a white supremacist to visit a mosque. Why should a Muslim have to be considered a citizen?
target: To make the statement that white people can be of concern to a mosque and that muslim citizens can be a concern to this country are both wrong. The point is that if a person regularly incites hatred against a group, then that person is likely to be considered a troublemaker.

source: They do not want to work and we do not want to pay for their homes.
target: If migrants do not want to work, then why there are many doing jobs we don't want to do?

source: The figures of the London Bridge terror attack of 2017 were terrifiying. All Muslims are accomplices to these terrorists who brought down the lives of many of us.
target: Let me tell you a story: there is an Imam in the UK, Adeel Shah, who has a proven record of caring for those in need. The London Bridge terror attack was a heinous crime committed by three. These criminals killed people, destroying a bridge between peoples, but Adeel created 10 new ones by raising 1 million pounds for 10 British charities.

source: If every nigga who moved to the US was arrested, convicted of his crimes and sent to internment camp, we would be safer.
target: Maybe the way you view people who are different from you is much more threatening than the crimes you allege they commit?

source: LGBTs are a drain on society. Their sexual preferences are not our business.
target: You are correctly referring to their sexual preferences, that is their affair. How do you think they are a 'drain' upon society by minding their own business?

source: I do not understand how a Muslim can be a good parent.
target: I am not sure I understand what you are saying.

source: My faith has taught me that to put an end to Muslims would be best for all: they want to exterminate us.
target: The statement you made about Muslims is just fear mongering. Most Muslims are peaceful and reasonable people.

source: Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
target: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?

source: Our founding fathers were not happy with migration and multiculturalism.
target: According to the facts, British colonisation started around 1600. In so far as the British empire is concerned, for better or worse, we have always been in favour of multiculturalism.

source: The Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
target: Judaism, like any other religion, is about belief, not about a person's addiction.

source: Immigrants take our jobs
target: Isn't it bettter to have people working hard and doing a good job, regardless of where they come from?

source: Jews are essentially good-for-nothings and wanton hypocrites. They have no place in civilised Europe.
target: Not all Jews are bad. Maybe you should think about the good people, like the many Jewish charitable and social organisations that help the poor.

source: Gays are nothing but degenerates.
target: Actually, being gay is not a disorder. But being so harsh is close to being a human rights violation.

source: Women are weak and inferior. They can't be considered succesful citizens as men are.
target: Women must not be treated as though they are 'inferior'. For instance, women can vote and run for office just as men do.

source: All black men are rapists.
target: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

source: We should not welcome people from the so-called Muslim world, it makes us uncomfortable.
target: There are many Muslim people in this country, many good people. If you wanted to get to know Muslims you could start with any Muslim family that lives here. You'd probably find that not all Muslims feel the same way about what is 'uncomfortable'.

source: Muslims are violent people. They have always been that way, they just haven't learned the hard way.
target: Violence is never a justified response to an unjustified act. Violence is not the answer. If some extremists are using violence, it does not mean that all Muslims are violent.

source: We shouldn't welcome Muslims. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
target: Muslims have been and continue to be a part of Europe for centuries. They have given so much to our society and culture. They have enriched our lives and we should not be afraid of them.

source: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.
target: The doctrine of Islam is a religion, not a bad one. What's the reason you think this?

source: we are strong when we are all white and united. we are not strong when we are divided by black people who want to fight us.
target: We can also see conflict in a different light, such as when it is caused by racism. and a limited notion of 'unity'?

source: Muslims are un-British and do not want to be part of the UK.
target: We are here to make the UK work for everyone, and make sure people feel part of the community, not discriminated against. Muslims are a part of the population, it is very sad that we are constantly having to combat Islamophobia, as if Muslims were the source of all problems.

source: Muslim rape our girls.
target: The media are full of the rumours of rape and abuse committed by Muslim. The problem is not about Islam. It is about violence.

source: All versions of Islam have Sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
target: Could you provide any evidence about what you're saying, because it is very extreme.

source: Women should not be allowed to vote, because they are weak.
target: Everyone has the right to have his or her opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections.

source: Many philosophers argue that humans are not born equal especially when it comes to gender.
target: Although Plato argued that women are physically weaker than men, they are equal in other respects and deserve equal opportunity.

source: People with mental disabilities are a problem to society.
target: Mental ability is not the problem, but access to treatment. Having access to services or a support system is crucial. Your statement can become a source of division and hate, and people with disabilities don't deserve this.

source: Multiculturalism is the death of western societies, we should get rid of minorities.
target: Even if this is true, our values imply protection of minorities. This is why I support the rights of individuals to live as they wish, free from discrimination.

source: I'm tired of seeing gay people allowed to turn free as it was normal to be faggots.
target: There are definitely gay people suffering at the hands of homophobic people, and it is against human rights and the law to promote such discrimination.

source: Migrants are dangerous, they are not welcome in our country.
target: I don't know any migrant who is not happy with their new home. I think it's just a question of integration on our side.

source: Any migrant who has lived in the country for 5 years can become a citizen even if he does not have a valid residence permit or is a criminal. This is how you destroy the welfare state.
target: This applies only to asylum seekers. If they have lived in the UK for 5 years, the Home Office will issue a residence permit only if they meet the conditions set out in the regulations. This means that any migrant who has not lived in the UK for at least five years, or commited crimes, cannot become a British citizen, even if he or she has a valid residence permit.

source: If LGBT were to have a normal appearance, this would help to build a more accepting society.
target: You're not a champion of the right to freedom of expression then?

source: mentally disabled folks cannot be intelligent nor integrated in our society
target: Perhaps you should check how the people who are mentally ill feel about such things. I suspect that they would prefer that others treated them with respect, rather than with discrimination.

source: gay men are unnatural, they abuse their anus.
target: The sad truth is that homosexuals are more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol (as a reaction to homophobia, discrimination, or violence they experienced).

source: All women are subhuman and are not worth the while of human rights.
target: The concept of human dignity was established to protect people. Who deserves human rights, then? Women are to be respected.

source: Islam is a religion of war and intolerance.
target: It seems that some people have made hatred for Muslims their default response to all types of social injustice.

source: Jewish are taking over our country and should be banned.
target: What percentage of people in the US are Jewish and in a position of power? If you knew, you wouldn't be saying that.

source: Feminism is an ideology which, by its very nature, denies the rights of men and, by extension, the legitimacy of male domination.
target: That is not what feminism is about. Feminism is about the legitimate empowerment of women, in order for them to have the same rights as men.

source: LGBT people are a problem in our country because they have the temerity to seek happiness and family regardless of our values.
target: Trying to find happiness and family is a problem in our country? Okay, then, what is the problem exaclty? People trying to be happy?

source: The West became great thanks to the hard struggle for freedom, but now it is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
target: You mention the West's gruesome past, but it also contains many beautiful moments of progress and civilisation. In fact the West's values are constantly being challenged and modified, and this is what makes them so admirable and unchangeable.

source: Physically disabled folks are also mentally disabled.
target: I don' hear anyone asserting this, its just something that you choose to spread. What is your evidence?

source: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
target: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.

source: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
target: What are you trying to say? Every religion has its sects and beliefs.

source: I am tired of immigrants ruining our countries.
target: The problem isn't the migrants, it is with the culture of hate towards who is born in another country.

source: We have a lot of issues in the UK, and now we are also paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be announced to the tax payers?
target: The problem is that most of the British population is not aware of the fact that the media use the "scandal" of immigrants to hide bigger problems for the country; such as taxes not paid by millionaires and large corporations which then fall on us citizens.

source: All niggas are just criminals and they should spend their time in the gutter.
target: Criminals have criminal records, it is unjust to label someone as "criminal" just because of the colour of their skin.

source: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
target: This is not true. In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is why we should treat them as humans: they must be respected with basic human rights.

source: We should deport all the Jews.
target: Nobody has the right to decide who to deport, because it would be a shame and a crime.

source: The Holocaust was an inside job and the CIA played a huge part in making us believe it truly happened.
target: The physical evidence of mass murder is undeniable, yet these beliefs have spread. What we have is simply a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories, like this one.

source: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they slow the learning of the whole class. They should go to special school just for them.
target: There is no evidence that Down Syndrome makes children worse at learning. Even if it did, this is not a good reason for discrimination.

source: At my age, I can't bear to look at what the world will be like with women in power.
target: Look, if you want to blame a whole gender for our society's ills, that's your right, but I believe in the power of reason.

source: A woman is more equal when she is wearing a dress. This is what is fair: women can be good women when they respect men.
target: Isn't it about time we stop turning a blind eye to the blatant inequalities that exist in our society? Shouldn't we be raising our voices against these blatant inequalities? All men and women are created equal.

source: The feminism stifles the imagination and leads to dumb and unpleasant creatures like women's rights activists.
target: The feminism does not inhibit the imagination, it promotes inclusive ideas and inclusive ideas promote a more equal society.

source: If an aborigine were to marry a white person, they would be a mixed race coulple whose destiny is failure. Aborigines first need to be raised by white people and taught the rules of western civilisation. But this is not what our founding documents were all about.
target: Asking people to assimilate is to accept their inherent differences and create new social structures based upon them.

source: Transexuals, queer, and so on... just a rabble of faggots.
target: This is not true. Being gay is not synonymous with being bisexual, pansexual, intersex, transgender, queer, deviant, lesbian, tranny, queermetaphysical, or whatever term you want to use... We should try to respect people for who they are instead.

source: Migrants are nothing bu criminals who should not be part of our society.
target: Our country is stronger when people are able to contribute to our society, and many migrants are eligible for legal status.

source: Faggots are dangerous.Children hould not be left alone with these animals.
target: We should really avoid any comparison between animals and humans and would be better if there were no discrimination at all. Homosexual people aren't a danger to children.

source: Disabled people cannot cope with life.
target: Just because a person lacks a certain ability it does not mean they cannot cope with normal life. Instead, they may live an even more enriched life since their indiviual interests create a life of purpose and identity.

source: that gay men deserve to be called fags
target: Just because you personally don't like gay people doesn't mean that everyone else thinks like you. Some of us just practice live and let live.

source: We must stop the invasion of migrants.
target: Migrants are welcome here. They are working hard to build this country as well.

source: I am tired of Muslims wanting to dominate other cultures. They should go back to the Stone Age.
target: For all we know, the Stone Age was occupied by people from all around the world. No traces of Christianity, nor of Islam. Who knows what would happen in your scenario? Maybe we should give you benefit of the doubt and challenge all of us.

source: All muslims are violent and they are responsible for the 9/11.
target: The question here is: is Islam responsible for the attacks committed by a small minority of people? The responsibility should only be on those who break the law.

source: If a woman does not want to be submissive to men, then she is a bitch.
target: What stick-in-the-mud men want is a woman who is submissive to their every whim. Many men instead look for a life partner.

source: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
target: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?

source: Let's move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
target: I'm sorry, it seems that there are far more homophobes here than Saudi Arabia. It is sad that in the twenty-first century, in our country, it is still not OK to be gay.

source: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes murder, rape and violence towards women and homosexuals.
target: Islam is an ideology and religion that promote love, respect and cooperation with people of other religions, not a violent ideology and religion, which promotes murder, rape and violence against women and homosexuals.

source: Jews are purposely keeping America down.
target: All cultures have different beliefs and practices, and so have differing values, but its nonsense to say Jewish people are trying to subvert Western civilization.

source: I am not racist, but I definitely would not raise my children in the suburbs where the majority of people is black.
target: There is no need to hide behind "I am not racist but", you have no evidence for your claim. This is just fear-mongering, used to divide people and spread hate.

source: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
target: Source please? Also, even if true how is this representative of all islam?

source: Immigrants get welfare. This is how they survive. They don't work and they are not paying taxes.
target: The majority of immigrants are working and paying taxes. This is how our country works.

source: Feminists are violent subhuman sex beings.
target: Feminist is a term used to describe people who take pride in their gender and desire the ability to have a stable and happy life, without discrimination.

source: Women are subhuman and are created to please men.
target: Women are not subhuman and cannot be reduced to their bodies being a man's property.

source: The drug trade is full of Black people who are breaking the law.
target: The majority of the people arrested for drug smuggling are poor. Those arrested for crime in general are not generally poor. Maybe this phenomenon has to do more with poverty than with the colour of their skin.

source: Blacks are just a bunch of animals that only exist to destroy good white people.
target: Aren't those people raised as white supremacists much more harmful to a cohesive society?

source: This girl doesn't have autism, she is just a freak of another human species, very far from ours normal species. Hence, she should go away.
target: People with special needs and people without them share common characteristics. There is no "species" of human being. People with autism spectrum disorders can be compatible with being "normal".

source: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think.
target: To be honest, I don't think that this is true. If you don't have evidences about it, then what's the point of saying so?

source: We must stop Islam. It is a death cult.
target: Your words are definitely provocative. We don't allow people to demonise all religions, but when it comes to Islam everybody seems to forget that it is a religion of peace as all the others.

source: Muslims want to replace us.
target: Muslims do not want to replace other people. What's making you thinking that?

source: The niggas are all enemies of the people.
target: Who are 'the people'? Who are you talking for?

source: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only are they a burden to normal children but they also require much more care, attention and extensive therapy, making the whole undertaking very costly and time-consuming. This time could be used for further development of children without Down syndrome.
target: Coeducation can involve teaching the classmates of children with Down Syndrome to be responsible. As children are often better at approaching children with disabilities than adults, their involvement can be therapeutic, without adding any costs.

source: Black Americans have a corrosive influence in our country. They have always inhabited horrible, stinking filthy places and now they are all complaining because they hate our country.
target: It's not true. I don't know if you really mean all the black people living in the US. Anyway, I'm sure they are proud Americans. You just don't know it yet.

source: Women should not be allowed to vote. They are subhuman.
target: Voting is a right for all citizens, regardless of gender, religion, or sexual preference.Aren't your antiquated assertions just our of place in comptemporary society?

source: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
target: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

source: Muslims are a cancer on our race.
target: They are just as much our brothers as anyone else. They are our cousins, our neighbours, and we should welcome them, regardless of their religion.

source: I don't like Muslims because they are different.
target: Don't you like flowers, because they are different? Isn't variety the spice of life?

source: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
target: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.

source: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
target: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

source: All foreigners are born to be at our disposal.
target: This phrase is extremely misleading, it implies that foreigners are naturally inferior, and why would it be like that?

source: These women are nothing but slaves to the powerful men around them.
target: As long as women are free and able to make decisions for their own life, there can be no difference between men and women.

source: Immigrants look like monkeys, maybe they are?
target: I don't see how coming from another country makes them any less human.

source: All these migrants are coming to ruin our country, they are all rapists, drug addicts, and don't have any right to be here.
target: Migration is necessary, to bring in resources and workers that can improve the lives of all. The causes of addiction or sexul violence lie elsewhere.

source: We should deport all the illegal immigrants currently living in the US.
target: It is not true that all the immigrants in the US are illegal. In fact, they are often in the US on humanitarian grounds.

source: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
target: Muslims have given so much to this country. They are proud of their culture and religion. No one should be offended by religious symbols.

source: If you want to stop world problems, you have to speak out against Jewish race.
target: I don't think it is right to talk about race. As far as I'm aware, all people are created equal even if they have different religious beliefs.

source: We have to get rid of Islam now! We will all be killed in the streets!
target: But we all know that Islam is a religion of peace, just like Christianity.
