source: We must free homosexuals from their homosexuality.
target: The law allows for personal freedom, and it must be respected, even when you don't agree.

source: We must teach our children to consider women as inferior, because this is what they are.
target: The lesson you're teaching your children to be good citizens can be: observe the law and respect the rights of other people. Women are equal to men.

source: I think jihad is a global problem and we should bomb it out of existence.
target: We must understand and address the true causes behind terrorist attacks, so that we can prevent future ones.

source: Women desperately looking for men are just unacceptable.
target: If women truly wanted to have relationships and fulfilment they should be allowed to, not being pressured into giving up on what they want.

source: Being gay is not about marriage, it is about anal sex without brakes and this is horrible.
target: Homosexuality is also about love, not only about sex.

source: Gay men are promiscuous.
target: Gay men are not promiscuous. To suggest otherwise is to be grossly generalistic. How many gay men do you know?

source: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them.
target: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.

source: Women need to have children, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
target: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not British.
target: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country and are proud of that. They are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be afraid of a religious minority?

source: We should stop migrants from coming in: they are increasing crime level and they should just be all killed.
target: What you say is terrible. Such an irrational slaughter would be a crime against humanity.

source: I hate those faggots. They shouldn't be allowed to do what they do.
target: There is no harm in an equality of the right to be in love with someone.

source: If Muslims were only like other people with different religions, then they would stop trying to impose their religion on everyone else.
target: The problem with the current Islamic world order is not that they want to impose their religion on anyone else, but that there is no cohesion among them, so that they can speak with one voice.

source: Migrants are just a bunch of criminals, they do not deserve our hospitality.
target: Many migrants come to this country to work and integrate. You would be very surprised if you talked to them about their experience here.

source: Islam is a cancer in our society.
target: Islam is a religion, not a cancer.

source: The Muslims are not welcome here.
target: Many Muslims live in our country and contribute so much to our society. They are our neighbours, our friends. They are our brothers and sisters.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are only here to undermine European values.
target: We all have the right to our beliefs, we just have to accept people who believe in Islam.

source: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
target: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.

source: Black people are subhuman, they should stay in their caves.
target: The statement 'black people are subhuman' is not true. They are human beings with a human value.

source: Black people don't have brains.
target: The presence of a brain is not determined by skin colour. The fact that some people are born darker-skinned doesn't mean they aren't intelligent, rational human beings.

source: The Jews are the only few to receive public welfare.
target: The vast majority of the world's population gets public welfare if in need.

source: LGBTs are just sick people that should be isolated and ignored.
target: LGBT people are people, and deserve the full and equal human rights of all other citizens.

source: I hate Muslims, they are just a bunch of sexual molesters.
target: The Koran does not condone sexual molester behavior, and if the Koran were to be read, it is clear that it was intended as a guide for its believers.

source: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence.
target: Islam is a religion of peace.

source: Immigrants come here to get tax breaks and privileges. They do not want to assimilate.
target: Immigrants come here to work and provide for their families, and you would do the same if you were in their shoes.

source: Why are jews allowed to vote? They’re a different religion and they shouldn't be allowed to have their say.
target: You seem to be misinterpreting the meaning of the word “citizen”. The idea is that the individual is allowed to choose their own religion just like choosing how to vote, and that is the right of all citizens.

source: Disabled people are a problem. They do not belong to a society free of mental retardation.
target: All humans are equal in rights. Because of this it is unjust that some people are discriminated based on their genetics or abilities.

source: Jews are parasites, they bring disease, they are a burden on society.
target: The Jewish community has been and is still a strong force in society, for example in medicine and nursing home care. Jewish health professionals have saved and are continuing to save countless lives in the US and around the world. Many of your statements are not accurate.

source: Migrants are the cause of our problems.
target: You can't blame immigrants for our problems. It is rather about the "dream" of ethnically pure nations while living in a democratic and open world. The result has been that democracy has taken over that nightmare.

source: I would like to ask all these people supporting the idea that the NHS couldn't survive without migration how did it do it before mass migration and Tony Blair's migration policies in the 1990s.
target: There has always been migrant skilled labour migration into the UK, we have even contributed inviting asian and caribbean worker after WW2 to fill skills gaps. Migration isn't new, how it is being shown in the media has changed in order to cause a panic among people about high levels of migration.

source: That is EXACTLY how jihad was started by Muslims. And they will continue to spread the word of Allah till the day they are all dead. All Muslims are terrorists.
target: Terrorism? You mean like every other crime, this one is committed only by Muslims? It seems that you are repeating the same unfounded claim over and over.

source: The world would be a better place without black people.
target: I think that you are overstating the case a bit (just a bit of course). Black people are a part of human race. It would be better if we didn't isolate those individuals, indeed we should be proud of mankind as a whole.

source: Jews are intolerant.
target: Pot calling the kettle...

source: Immigrants rape our women and they are not welcome here.
target: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.

source: These 8 crooks are all Muslims and every one of their victims is Non-Muslim, white-British. Why do these criminals only target White British Non-Muslims?
target: You seem to have a new superpower? Ascertaining ethnicity and faith based on a person's last name?

source: Jews control the world
target: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

source: The Muslims are our enemies and we have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
target: It's a myth that all Muslims are terrorists. We need to understand that all religions have had terrorists in them.

source: Migrants are the cause of the migrant crisis.
target: They are not the only ones to blame for the crisis. People from all over the world come to our shores fleeing from wars, but this doesn't make them the cause of those wars.

source: Women are basically childlike and emotional, incapable of hard work and dedication.
target: Women have been shown to be as creative and productive as men, and that doesn't seem to be due to a "manipulation of data" of feminist propaganda, but rather to intrinsic qualities like hard work and dedication.

source: Gay people are sick.
target: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual preference. Homosexuality is not a sickness.

source: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
target: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?

source: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate into our civilised society.
target: Muslims have been part of our country since its beginning, they have helped in building our society. They are our brothers and sisters. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just not credible.

source: Feminists are a problem because they tell that they are entitled to the same rights as men.
target: Feminists promote equality, and I don't see how equality between men and women would be called a 'problem'. Why do you?

source: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
target: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

source: Being disabled is equivalent to being gay.
target: There is no point in insulting someone for being gay or being disabled. Individuals should be treated as individuals, and given the same opportunities. Being disabled does not make you gay, or viceversa.

source: Asians are a problem in my view. They are too many. I would rather have a million Romanians or Muslims rule our country than 300k Asians.
target: Why don't you just study the differences between cultures and try to see what's good in an inclusive society?

source: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
target: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

source: Also the Bible says that some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities.
target: There are several Bible verses and passages that emphasize equality between people and between ancient tribes.

source: Islam is just an ideology for terrorists.
target: Why do you say so? Are you familiar with the Quran? How much do you know Islam?

source: Niggas are serial offenders. We should take into account the race of the prisoner before releasing them.
target: Not only is it unfair to take into account the race of the prisoner, it also compromises the integrity of our democratic institutions. Who is to say that the race of the individual who has been sentenced must overthrow the rules of law?

source: We should reject people of different cultures living here.
target: Why should we? Everyone has the right to their own culture, regardless of their ethnic origin.

source: We are not supposed to be importing immigrants. They are all a bunch of criminal and terrorists.
target: You might be right that some immigrants are lawbreakers, but that does not mean that all immigrants are criminal and terrorists.

source: I hate Muslims. An invasion is the exact opposite of a religion.
target: The aim of muslim migrants is not to instill a hardline Islamic state, but just to work and live in peace here.

source: Africans have no right to speak their language and are incapable of establishing a complex civilisation such as ours.
target: Every human being has the right to choose how to live and to speak their mother language, and that's all.

source: Refugees are a burden to our country, they do not want to integrate. They are not welcome.
target: On the contrary, we are welcoming many refugees into our country and promoting their integration. We are proud of this successful integration story.

source: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
target: They have the same rights as all other citizens in the US: to be protected from discrimination, to choose their own leaders and to be free of violence, rape, and murder.

source: Islam is a death cult, it is opposed to the very concept of humanity and I would like to see all its worshippers' heads on a platter.
target: This is a really personal view and I would not wish harm on anyone.

source: Migrants are so lazy they don't even use public transportation.
target: This is not true! Many migrants try to get on the bus, but some aren't allowed to get on! We must reflect on this.

source: Jews are basically rapists and sex abusers, and this is their religious dogma.
target: This religion has nothing to do with sexual violence or abuse, and it's dangerous to generalize everything into a religion.

source: We should build a big wall around Europe so that the native inhabitants of the Middle East, Africans, and Asians will be kept in their places.
target: Nice work building a wall along thousands of kilometres of shores and land borders just to separate cultures... What if we add also some turrets equipped with laser cannons?

source: Afro-Caribbean has no right to speak in the United States Congress.
target: Why should they? There are many Afro-Caribbean people in the US politics. There are many others who have worked very hard to get here.

source: Feminism is a destructive ideology that has hurt so many and caused so much harm to our world.
target: I don't think feminism is a bad idea in itself. That's what people do when they are given the choice to engage in a movement for equality.

source: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. It is caused by migrants and we must get rid of it by prosecuting all of them.
target: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the nationality of the rapist. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted, which is different from prosecuting all migrants.

source: Gays are all rapists, child molesters, and sexual perverts.
target: Your claim about homosexuals is not supported by evidence, where are you getting the imformation that supports these nonsensical assertions.

source: Women are an abomination because they cannot provide for their family.
target: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family, and each one is valuable and necessary.

source: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, and we must preserve the purity of our religion from them.
target: Religious sources agree that all humans are born equal. What is the religion you are talking about?

source: Black people are a problem in my opinion. They always complain about racism, but they are incapable of doing anything about it.
target: One of the biggest problems that black people face is discrimination. Laws are needed to provide for them, but there is also a need for the citizens to respect their rights.

source: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
target: This looks like a conspiracy theory with no proof. I can think of a handful of legitimate ways that Jews could be of help to humanity.

source: Women are trash and we should have their respect!
target: There is a problem with traditional values and sexual ethics in our society. Saying that women are trash is disrespectful in the first place. Give and you will be given.

source: It's not 'Islamophobia' if you keep away dangerous Muslims. It's 'Islamophobia' if a Muslim says or does something offensive to you.
target: The misrepesentative Islamophobia narrative is based on the erroneous assumption that Islam is a religion based upon discrimination and conquest.
